tika-s0401t:16: Namāmi sirasā dhīraṃ, garuṃ me gaṇavācakaṃ.
tika-s0401t:48_2: ca katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti. Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ
tika-s0401t:48_3: tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā, mayaṃ pana idhādhippetameva payojanaṃ dassayissāma,
tika-s0401t:48_5: parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ. Idameva hi payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati –
tika-s0401t:51: Ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇena cettha yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavato, tāya paññāpāṭavañca rāgādimalavidhamanato. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0401t:52_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0401t:52_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0401t:52_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:54: Atha vā ratanattayapūjanassa paññāpadaṭṭhānasamādhihetuttā paññāpāṭavaṃ. Vuttañhi tassa samādhihetuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:55_0: “Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ,
tika-s0401t:55_1: labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati,
tika-s0401t:55_2: passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti.
tika-s0401t:56_0: Samādhissa ca paññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvo vuttoyeva – “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti.
tika-s0401t:56_1: Tato evaṃ paṭubhūtāya paññāya paṭiññāmahattakataṃ khedamabhibhuyya anantarāyena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samāpayissati.
tika-s0401t:57: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavaḍḍhanato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ratanattayappaṇāmena hi āyuvaṇṇasukhabalāni vaḍḍhanti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0401t:59: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti. –
tika-s0401t:61: Atha vā ratanattayagāravassa paṭibhānāparihānāvahattā. Aparihānāvahañhi tīsupi ratanesu gāravaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0401t:62: “Sattime, bhikkhave, aparihānīyā dhammā. Katame satta? Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, samādhigāravatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā”ti.
tika-s0401t:64: Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato. Vuttañhi tassā puññātisayattaṃ –
tika-s0401t:68: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:72_0: Upāyesu ca paṭipannassa hoteva kāriyaniṭṭhānaṃ. Ratanattayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā
tika-s0401t:72_2: pahoti, bhayādiupaddavañca nivāreti. Tasmā vuttaṃ – “saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:73_0: Evañca sappayojanaṃ ratanattayavandanaṃ kattukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ
tika-s0401t:73_1: kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ…pe… gativimutta”nti āha. Tattha
tika-s0401t:73_2: yassā desanāya saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāpadhānā, nāpi
tika-s0401t:73_3: abhidhammadesanā viya paññāpadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāpadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva
tika-s0401t:73_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti
tika-s0401t:73_6: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ
tika-s0401t:73_7: kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā.
tika-s0401t:73_8: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ
tika-s0401t:73_9: rundhati vibandhatīti attho. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ
tika-s0401t:74_3: avihiṃsabhūtā karuṇā visesena bhagavato cittassa cittappassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti
tika-s0401t:74_5: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca
tika-s0401t:74_6: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato
tika-s0401t:74_7: atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha – “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ
tika-s0401t:74_9: karuṇāva bhagavato “hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇa”nti vuttā. Karuṇānidānā hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā.
tika-s0401t:74_13: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu
tika-s0401t:75_0: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato
tika-s0401t:75_1: pakārehi dhammasabhāvāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Savāsanappahānato visesena
tika-s0401t:75_2: hataṃ samugghātitaṃ vihataṃ. Paññāpajjotena vihataṃ paññāpajjotavihataṃ, muyhanti
tika-s0401t:75_3: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, mohanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā. Sveva visayasabhāvappaṭicchādanato
tika-s0401t:75_4: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti mohatamo, paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti
tika-s0401t:75_5: paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo, taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-s0401t:75_6: satipi paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ
tika-s0401t:75_7: sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa
tika-s0401t:75_8: viseso vijjatīti sātisayena avijjāpahānena bhagavantaṃ thomento āha – “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0401t:76_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0401t:76_1: tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
tika-s0401t:76_2: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
tika-s0401t:76_4: bhagavato paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:77_2: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ – “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0401t:77_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇopacārena sasantānamohatamavidhamanaṃ
tika-s0401t:77_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti,
tika-s0401t:77_5: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0401t:78_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
tika-s0401t:78_1: gayhati, na pana sātisayaniravasesakilesappahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
tika-s0401t:78_2: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātassa vuttattā. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo niravasesaavijjāpahānena na pahīyatīti.
tika-s0401t:79_0: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā, niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā
tika-s0401t:79_1: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
tika-s0401t:80_0: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
tika-s0401t:80_1: sanarāmaraloko, tassa garūti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0401t:80_2: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:80_3: Na cettha padhānappadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Īdisesu
tika-s0401t:80_4: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0401t:80_5: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārabhājanavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
tika-s0401t:80_6: garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti
tika-s0401t:80_7: ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
tika-s0401t:81_0: Atha vā samūhattho lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
tika-s0401t:81_1: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva
tika-s0401t:81_2: yojetabbaṃ. Amarasaddena cettha visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Tepi hi maraṇābhāvato
tika-s0401t:81_3: paramatthato amarā. Narāmarānaṃyeva ca gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā
tika-s0401t:81_6: ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:82_0: Sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena
tika-s0401t:82_4: yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya sobhanamevāti. Atha vā sayambhuñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ
tika-s0401t:82_5: pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato, tathā lokasamudayaṃ
tika-s0401t:82_6: pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-s0401t:82_7: lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato, lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ
tika-s0401t:82_8: bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato. “Sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā
tika-s0401t:82_9: pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”tiādinā nayena ayamattho
tika-s0401t:82_10: vibhāvetabbo. Atha vā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ, nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti
tika-s0401t:82_11: sugato, yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva
tika-s0401t:82_12: ca dhammaṃ bhāsati, tasmā sammā gadatīti sugato, da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Iti sobhanagamanatādīhi
tika-s0401t:83_0: Puññapāpakammehi upapajjanavasena gantabbato gatiyo, upapattibhavavisesā. Tā pana
tika-s0401t:83_1: nirayādivasena pañcavidhā. Tāhi sakalassapi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena
tika-s0401t:83_2: avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti
tika-s0401t:83_3: āha – “gativimutta”nti. Etena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:86: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:87_2: suparimutto, taṃ gativimuttaṃ. Vandeti namāmi, thomemīti vā attho.
tika-s0401t:88_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi. Ettha
tika-s0401t:88_1: hi dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito parahitappaṭipattito
tika-s0401t:88_2: ca. Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantappahānato
tika-s0401t:88_5: ca. Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā, parahitappaṭipatti tividhā ca, attahitasampatti
tika-s0401t:88_6: pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ? “Karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena āsayato parahitappaṭipatti,
tika-s0401t:88_8: gativimutta”nti etehi catusaccasampaṭivedhanatthena ca sugatasaddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti,
tika-s0401t:88_9: avasiṭṭhena “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena cāpi attahitasampatti parahitappaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0401t:89_0: Atha vā tīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā hetuto, phalato, upakārato ca. Tattha
tika-s0401t:89_1: hetu mahākaruṇā, sā paṭhamapadena dassitā. Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā, pahānasampadā,
tika-s0401t:89_2: ānubhāvasampadā, rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu ñāṇappahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccappaṭivedhanatthena
tika-s0401t:89_3: ca sugatasaddena pakāsitā honti, ānubhāvasampadā tatiyapadena, rūpakāyasampadā yathāvuttakāyagamanasobhanatthena
tika-s0401t:89_4: sugatasaddena lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato. Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ
tika-s0401t:89_5: karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā. So sammāgadanatthena sugatasaddena
tika-s0401t:90_0: Tattha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-s0401t:90_1: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-s0401t:90_2: pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ. “Paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti
tika-s0401t:90_3: etena sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
tika-s0401t:90_6: karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato sugatasaddassa. Itarehi
tika-s0401t:90_7: sammāsambodhiyā padhānappadhānabhedaṃ payojanaṃ dasseti. Saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇañhettha
tika-s0401t:90_8: padhānaṃ payojanaṃ, tadaññamappadhānaṃ. Tesu padhānena parahitappaṭipattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:90_9: itarena attahitasampattiṃ. Tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu
tika-s0401t:90_10: bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ uttamavandaneyyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:91_0: Ettha ca karuṇāgahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato
tika-s0401t:91_3: papañcīyatīti. Karuṇāgahaṇena ca upagamanaṃ nirupakkilesaṃ dasseti, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0401t:91_4: apagamanaṃ. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā
tika-s0401t:91_5: karuṇāya, paññāgahaṇena samaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ. Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:91_6: samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ
tika-s0401t:91_7: dasseti, paññāgahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ, catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:91_9: cha abhiññā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, dasa balāni, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni,
tika-s0401t:91_10: soḷasa ñāṇacariyā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, sattasattati
tika-s0401t:91_11: ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti. Tathā
tika-s0401t:91_12: karuṇāgahaṇena caraṇasampattiṃ, paññāgahaṇena vijjāsampattiṃ. Karuṇāgahaṇena attādhipatitā,
tika-s0401t:91_13: paññāgahaṇena dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāgahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāgahaṇena attanāthabhāvo.
tika-s0401t:91_14: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena pubbakāribhāvo, paññāgahaṇena kataññutā. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena
tika-s0401t:91_15: aparantapatā, paññāgahaṇena anattantapatā. Karuṇāgahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi,
tika-s0401t:91_16: paññāgahaṇena buddhabhāvasiddhi. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0401t:91_17: sayaṃtaraṇaṃ. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāgahaṇena sabbadhammesu
tika-s0401t:92_0: Sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi tannidānabhāvato, paññā pariyosānaṃ tato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:92_1: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo
tika-s0401t:92_2: samādhikkhandho dassito hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito,
tika-s0401t:92_3: sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti. Paññāvacanena paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbesaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:92_4: ādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe
tika-s0401t:92_5: buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:92_6: dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggahaṇaṃ, aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ
tika-s0401t:97: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ, bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “apica me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:98_0: 2. Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ
tika-s0401t:98_1: thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha. Tattha buddhoti kattuniddeso. Buddhabhāvanti kammaniddeso.
tika-s0401t:98_2: Bhāvetvā sacchikatvāti ca pubbakālakiriyāniddeso. Yanti aniyamato kammaniddeso. Upagatoti
tika-s0401t:98_3: aparakālakiriyāniddeso. Vandeti kiriyāniddeso. Tanti niyamanaṃ. Dhammanti vandanakiriyāya
tika-s0401t:99_0: Tattha buddhasaddassa tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:99_1: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā savāsanāya aññāṇaniddāya accantavigamato,
tika-s0401t:99_2: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā
tika-s0401t:99_3: kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato
tika-s0401t:99_4: kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti
tika-s0401t:99_5: buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0401t:100: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-s0401t:101_0: Api-saddo sambhāvane. Tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇadhamme
tika-s0401t:101_1: sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti. Buddhabhāvanti sammāsambodhiṃ. Bhāvetvāti uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā
tika-s0401t:101_2: ca. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Upagatoti patto, adhigatoti attho. Etassa buddhabhāvanti
tika-s0401t:101_3: etena sambandho. Gatamalanti vigatamalaṃ, niddosanti attho. Vandeti paṇamāmi, thomemi
tika-s0401t:101_4: vā. Anuttaranti uttararahitaṃ, lokuttaranti attho. Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne
tika-s0401t:101_5: apāyato ca saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho
tika-s0401t:101_6: – evaṃ vividhaguṇagaṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0401t:101_7: bhāvetvā, phalanibbānaṃ pana sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigato, tamevaṃ
tika-s0401t:101_8: buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena anuttaraṃ
tika-s0401t:101_9: paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti. Pariyattisaddhammassapi tappakāsanattā idha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:102_0: Atha vā “abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ adhigañchi, tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:102_1: vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti sopi idha
tika-s0401t:102_2: vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi
tika-s0401t:102_3: pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge adhisīlasikkhādayopi idha dhammasaddena saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:102_4: Tāpi hi vigatappaṭipakkhatāya gatamalā, anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā cāti. Tathā
tika-s0401t:102_7: kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesānaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi
tika-s0401t:102_9: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ
tika-s0401t:103_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena
tika-s0401t:103_1: vimuttisampadāya. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena
tika-s0401t:103_2: vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Atha vā paṭhamena khayañāṇabhāvena,
tika-s0401t:103_3: dutiyena anuppādañāṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā vijjūpamatāya, dutiyena vajirūpamatāya.
tika-s0401t:103_4: Purimena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena,
tika-s0401t:103_5: dutiyena nissaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena, dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena. Paṭhamena
tika-s0401t:103_6: vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā adhipatibhāvena, dutiyena
tika-s0401t:103_7: amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti
tika-s0401t:103_8: etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena sandiṭṭhikatāya. Tathā
tika-s0401t:103_9: purimena akālikatāya, pacchimena ehipassikatāya. Purimena vā opaneyyikatāya, pacchimena
tika-s0401t:103_10: paccattaṃ veditabbatāya dhammaṃ thometi. “Gatamala”nti iminā saṃkilesābhāvadīpanena
tika-s0401t:103_11: dhammassa parisuddhataṃ dasseti, “anuttara”nti etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena
tika-s0401t:103_12: vipulaparipuṇṇataṃ. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadaṃ dhammassa dasseti, dutiyena pabhavasampadaṃ.
tika-s0401t:103_13: Bhāvetabbatāya vā dhammassa gatamalabhāvo yojetabbo. Bhāvanāguṇena hi so dosānaṃ
tika-s0401t:103_14: samugghātako hotīti. Sacchikātabbabhāvena anuttarabhāvo yojetabbo. Sacchikiriyānibbattito
tika-s0401t:103_15: hi taduttarikaraṇīyābhāvato anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttaroti. Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena
tika-s0401t:103_16: saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti. “Sacchikatvā”ti
tika-s0401t:103_17: etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0401t:104_0: 3. Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ
tika-s0401t:104_2: etena sambandho. Orasānanti puttavisesanaṃ. Mārasenamathanānanti orasaputtabhāve
tika-s0401t:104_3: kāraṇaniddeso tena kilesappahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaṃ anujānātīti
tika-s0401t:104_4: dasseti. Aṭṭhannanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Tena ca satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena
tika-s0401t:104_5: anekasatasahassabhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanato.
tika-s0401t:104_6: Samūhanti samudāyaniddeso. Ariyasaṅghanti guṇavisiṭṭhasaṃhatabhāvaniddeso. Tena asatipi
tika-s0401t:104_7: ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:105_0: Tattha urasi bhavā jātā saṃbaddhā ca orasā. Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajatāya
tika-s0401t:105_1: pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti, evametepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0401t:105_2: savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa ariyadhammaratanassa
tika-s0401t:105_3: ekantena bhāginoti orasā viya orasā. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ
tika-s0401t:105_4: okkamamānā okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya nippariyāyena
tika-s0401t:105_5: orasaputtāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā “bhagavato
tika-s0401t:106_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:106_1: devaputtamāro, māravāhinī vā na ekantena apasādeti, tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe
tika-s0401t:106_2: vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha – “mārasenamathanāna”nti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
tika-s0401t:106_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassapi guṇamāraṇe
tika-s0401t:106_5: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati. Yathāha – “kāmā te paṭhamā
tika-s0401t:106_6: senā”tiādi. Sā ca tehi diyaḍḍhasahassabhedā, anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇappaharaṇehi
tika-s0401t:106_7: odhiso vimathitā vihatā viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā, ariyasāvakā. Etena tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:107_0: Ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato ariyā niruttinayena. Atha
tika-s0401t:107_1: vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato, upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito
tika-s0401t:107_2: ariyā, ariyānaṃ saṅghoti ariyasaṅgho, ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho, taṃ
tika-s0401t:107_3: ariyasaṅghaṃ. Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti
tika-s0401t:107_4: assa ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā vande”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:108_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:108_3: pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti sabbasaṅghānaṃ aggabhāvadīpanato. Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṃ
tika-s0401t:108_6: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:108_7: dīpeti. Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā. “Mārasenamathanāna”nti
tika-s0401t:108_8: etena abhinīhārasampadāsiddhaṃ pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Katābhinīhārā
tika-s0401t:108_9: hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ māraparisaṃ vā abhivijinanti. “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena
tika-s0401t:108_12: sabbaguṇānaṃ ādi, sapubbabhāgappaṭipadā sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo majjhe, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo
tika-s0401t:108_13: pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0401t:109_0: 4. Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ
tika-s0401t:109_1: katvā idāni taṃnipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento “iti me”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:109_2: Tattha ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, buddhadhammasaṅghā. Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:109_3: yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:110_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0401t:110_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa
tika-s0401t:110_2: tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha. Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako
tika-s0401t:110_3: labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa pīti jāyatī”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:114: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0401t:115_0: Vandanāva vandanāmayaṃ yathā “dānamayaṃ, sīlamaya”nti. Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi
tika-s0401t:115_1: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā, thomanā vā. Pujjabhāvaphalanibbattanato puññaṃ, attano
tika-s0401t:115_2: santānaṃ punātīti vā. Suvihatantarāyoti suṭṭhu vihatantarāyo. Etena attano pasādasampattiyā,
tika-s0401t:115_3: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ
tika-s0401t:115_4: vihanane samatthanti dasseti. Hutvāti pubbakālakiriyā. Tassa “atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti
tika-s0401t:115_5: etena sambandho. Tassāti yaṃ ratanattayavandanāmayaṃ puññaṃ, tassa. Ānubhāvenāti balena.
tika-s0401t:116_0: 5. Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya
tika-s0401t:116_1: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo, tassā tāva guṇābhitthavanavasena upaññāpanatthaṃ “ekakadukādipaṭimaṇḍitassā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0401t:116_2: ekakādīni aṅgāni uparūpari vaḍḍhetvā desitehi suttantehi paṭimaṇḍitassa visiṭṭhassāti
tika-s0401t:116_3: attho. Etena “aṅguttaro”ti ayaṃ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti. Nanu
tika-s0401t:116_4: ca ekakādivasena desitāni suttāniyeva āgamo. Kassa pana ekakadukādīhi paṭimaṇḍitabhāvoti?
tika-s0401t:116_5: Saccametaṃ paramatthato, suttāni pana upādāya paññatto āgamo. Yatheva hi atthabyañjanasamudāye
tika-s0401t:116_6: suttanti vohāro, evaṃ suttasamudāye āgamoti vohāro. Ekakādīhi aṅgehi uparūpari uttaro
tika-s0401t:116_7: adhikoti aṅguttaro, āgamissanti ettha, etena, etasmā vā attatthaparatthādayoti āgamo,
tika-s0401t:116_9: varitabbato varo, āgamo ca so varo ca seṭṭhaṭṭhenāti āgamavaro, āgamasammatehi vā
tika-s0401t:116_10: varoti āgamavaro. Aṅguttaro ca so āgamavaro cāti aṅguttarāgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0401t:117_0: Puṅgavā vuccanti usabhā, asantasanaparissayasahanassa paripālanādiguṇehi taṃsadisatāya
tika-s0401t:117_3: vuttaṃ. Buddhānañhi saccappaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā
tika-s0401t:117_4: buddhānubuddhā. Ayampi āgamo tehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena guṇasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena ca saṃvaṇṇito
tika-s0401t:117_5: eva. Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ. Sammāsambuddheneva
tika-s0401t:117_6: hi tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito, yā “pakiṇṇakadesanā”ti vuccati. Tato
tika-s0401t:117_7: saṅgāyanādivaseneva sāvakehīti ācariyā vadanti. Idha pana “dhammakathikapuṅgavānaṃ
tika-s0401t:117_8: vicittapaṭibhānajananassa”icceva thomanā katā. Saṃvaṇṇanāsu cāyaṃ ācariyassa pakati,
tika-s0401t:117_9: yā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena
tika-s0401t:117_12: gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassā”tiādinā thomanā katā.
tika-s0401t:118_0: 6. Attho kathīyati etāyāti atthakathā, sā eva aṭṭhakathā, ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ
tika-s0401t:118_1: katvā yathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”ti. Āditotiādimhi paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ. Chaḷabhiññatāya
tika-s0401t:118_2: paramena cittavasībhāvena samannāgatattā jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasitāsabbhāvato ca
tika-s0401t:118_3: vasino, therā mahākassapādayo, tesaṃ satehi pañcahi. Yāti yā aṭṭhakathā. Saṅgītāti
tika-s0401t:118_4: atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho, ayaṃ etassa attho”ti saṅgahetvā
tika-s0401t:118_5: vuttā. Anusaṅgītā ca yasattherādīhi pacchāpi dutiyatatiyasaṅgītīsu. Iminā attano
tika-s0401t:119_0: 7. Sīhassa lānato gahaṇato sīhaḷo, sīhakumāro. Taṃvaṃsajātatāya tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:119_1: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo. Ābhatāti jambudīpato
tika-s0401t:119_2: ānītā. Athāti pacchā. Aparabhāge hi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0401t:119_3: Tena sā mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ ekantena karaṇīyanti
tika-s0401t:119_5: dīpavāsīnanti vā sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:120_0: 8. Apanetvānāti kañcukasadisaṃ sīhaḷabhāsaṃapanetvāna. Tatoti aṭṭhakathāto. Ahanti
tika-s0401t:120_1: attānaṃ niddisati. Manoramaṃ bhāsanti māgadhabhāsaṃ. Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitānaṃ
tika-s0401t:120_2: manaṃ ramayatīti. Tenevāha – “tantinayānucchavika”nti, pāḷigatiyā anulomikaṃ pāḷicchāyānuvidhāyininti
tika-s0401t:121_0: 9. Samayaṃ avilomentoti siddhantaṃ avirodhento. Etena atthadosābhāvamāha. Aviruddhattā
tika-s0401t:121_1: eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsīyissanti. Theravaṃsadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-s0401t:121_2: samannāgatattā therā, mahākassapādayo, tehi āgatā ācariyaparamparā theravaṃso. Tappariyāpannā
tika-s0401t:121_3: hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsadīpā,
tika-s0401t:121_4: mahāvihāravāsino therā, tesaṃ. Vividhehi ākārehi nicchīyatīti vinicchayo, gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu
tika-s0401t:121_5: khīlamaddanākārena pavattā vimaticchedakathā. Suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti
tika-s0401t:121_6: sunipuṇavinicchayā. Atha vā vinicchinotīti vinicchayo, yathāvuttatthavisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:121_7: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā. Etena mahākassapādittheraparamparābhato,
tika-s0401t:121_8: tatoyeva ca aviparīto saṇhasukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayoti tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:122_0: 10. Sujanassa cāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena “na kevalaṃ jambudīpavāsīnaṃyeva
tika-s0401t:122_1: atthāya, atha kho sādhujanānaṃ tosanatthañcā”ti dasseti. Tena ca “tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi
tika-s0401t:122_2: atthāyā”ti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahūpakārattā. Ciraṭṭhitatthanti
tika-s0401t:122_3: ciraṭṭhitiatthaṃ, cirakālāvaṭṭhānāyāti attho. Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītabyañjanasunikkhepassa
tika-s0401t:122_4: atthasunītassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā saṃvattati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0401t:123: “Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame dve? Sunikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ, attho ca sunīto”ti.
tika-s0401t:124_0: 11-12. Yaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ katthukāmo, tassā mahantattaṃ pariharituṃ “sāvatthipabhūtīna”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:124_1: Tenāha – “na idha vitthārakathaṃ karissāmi, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti ca. Tattha
tika-s0401t:124_2: dīghassāti dīghanikāyassa. Majjhimassāti majjhimanikāyassa. “Saṅgītīnaṃ dvinnaṃ yā
tika-s0401t:124_3: me atthaṃ vadantenā”tipi pāṭho. Tatthapi saṅgītīnaṃ dvinnanti dīghamajjhimanikāyānanti
tika-s0401t:124_4: attho gahetabbo. Meti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, mayāti attho. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:124_5: Heṭṭhā dīghassa majjhimassa ca atthaṃ vadantena sāvatthipabhutīnaṃ nagarānaṃ yā vaṇṇanā
tika-s0401t:124_6: katā, tassā vitthārakathaṃ na idha bhiyyo karissāmīti yojetabbaṃ. Yāni ca tattha
tika-s0401t:124_7: vatthūni vitthāravasena vuttāni, tesampi vitthārakathaṃ na idha bhiyyo karissāmīti sambandho.
tika-s0401t:125_0: 13. Idāni “na idha vitthārakathaṃ karissāmī”ti sāmaññato vuttassa atthassa pavaraṃ
tika-s0401t:125_1: dassetuṃ – “suttānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suttānaṃ ye atthā vatthūhi vinā na pakāsantīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:126_0: 14. Yaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo, tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo ca gahetabboti kathikānaṃ
tika-s0401t:126_1: upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dasseti – “sīlakathā”tiādinā.
tika-s0401t:126_2: Tattha sīlakathāti cārittavārittādivasena sīlassa vitthārakathā. Dhutadhammāti piṇḍapātikaṅgādayo
tika-s0401t:126_3: terasa kilesadhunanakadhammā. Kammaṭṭhānāni sabbānīti pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni aṭṭhatiṃsa,
tika-s0401t:126_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānāni. Cariyāvidhānasahitoti
tika-s0401t:126_5: rāgacaritādīnaṃ sabhāvādividhānena sahito. Jhānāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, samāpattiyo
tika-s0401t:126_6: catasso āruppasamāpattiyo. Aṭṭhapi vā paṭiladdhamattāni jhānāni samāpajjanavasībhāvappattiyā
tika-s0401t:126_7: samāpattiyo. Jhānāni vā rūpārūpāvacarajjhānāni, samāpattiyo phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattiyo.
tika-s0401t:127: 15. Lokiyalokuttarabhedā cha abhiññāyo sabbā abhiññāyo. Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṃkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0401t:128_1: tassa desanā paccayākāradesanā, paṭiccasamuppādakathāti attho. Sā pana ghanavinibbhogassa
tika-s0401t:128_3: tattha vicāritāti āha – “suparisuddhanipuṇanayā”ti. Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ avissajjetvāva
tika-s0401t:129: 17. Iti pana sabbanti iti-saddo parisamāpane, pana-saddo vacanālaṅkāre, etaṃ sabbanti attho. Idhāti imissā aṭṭhakathāya na vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:130_0: 18. Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:130_1: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā
tika-s0401t:130_2: visuddhimaggo, na sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya asādhāraṇaṭṭhakathāti dasseti. “Visesato”ti
tika-s0401t:130_3: ca idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti evāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:131_0: 19. Iccevāti iti eva. Tampīti visuddhimaggampi. Etāyāti manorathapūraṇiyā. Ettha
tika-s0401t:131_2: sujanassa ca tuṭṭhatthaṃ ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti etena payojanaṃ, apanetvāna
tika-s0401t:131_4: visuddhimagge ca vicāritānaṃ atthānaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0401t:135_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanavaseneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva nipātasuttavasena
tika-s0401t:135_1: vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha aṅguttarāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti “aṅguttarāgamassa
tika-s0401t:135_2: atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ vacane, “yassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti
tika-s0401t:135_3: paṭiññātaṃ, so aṅguttarāgamo nāma nipātasuttavasena evaṃ vibhāgoti attho. Atha vā
tika-s0401t:135_4: tatthāti “aṅguttaranissitaṃ attha”nti etasmiṃ vacane yo aṅguttarāgamo vutto, so nipātasuttādivasena edisoti attho.
tika-s0401t:136_0: Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇitukāmo attano saṃvaṇṇanāya paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:136_2: Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ
tika-s0401t:136_3: saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti. Etena taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānaṃ suttānañca ādipariyosānesu
tika-s0401t:136_4: antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikāravacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Saṅgīyamānassa
tika-s0401t:136_5: atthassa mahantatāya pūjanīyatāya ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti, paṭhamā mahāsaṅgīti
tika-s0401t:136_6: paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti, tassā pavattikālo paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikālo, tasmiṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle.
tika-s0401t:136_7: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ. Yo
tika-s0401t:136_8: lokiyehi upogghātoti vuccati, svāyamettha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādiko gantho veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:136_9: Na “sanidānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemī”tiādīsu viya ajjhāsayādidesanuppattihetu.
tika-s0401t:136_10: Tenevāha – “evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti.
tika-s0401t:137_0: 1. “Sā panesā”tiādinā bāhiranidāne vattabbaṃ atidisitvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ ādito
tika-s0401t:137_1: paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇituṃ “yaṃ paneta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena saṃvaṇṇetabbe
tika-s0401t:137_2: dhamme padāni padavibhāgaṃ tadatthañca dassetvā tato paraṃ piṇḍatthādinidassanavasena
tika-s0401t:137_3: ca saṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā, tasmā padāni tāva dassento “evanti nipātapada”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:137_4: Tattha padavibhāgoti padānaṃ viseso, na padaviggaho. Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo
tika-s0401t:137_5: ca padavibhāgo, padaviggaho ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahā
tika-s0401t:137_6: padavibhāgasaddena vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha padaviggaho “jetassa vanaṃ jetavana”ntiādinā
tika-s0401t:138_0: Atthatoti padatthato. Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃ-saddassa
tika-s0401t:138_1: dassento “evaṃ-saddo tāvā”tiādimāha. Avadhāraṇādīti ettha ādi-saddena idamatthapucchāparimāṇādiatthānaṃ
tika-s0401t:138_2: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evaṃgatāni puthusippāyatanāni, evamādīnī”tiādīsu idaṃ-saddassa
tika-s0401t:138_3: atthe evaṃ-saddo. Gata-saddo hi pakārapariyāyo, tathā vidhākāra-saddā ca. Tathā hi
tika-s0401t:138_4: vidhayuttagatasadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti. “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū
tika-s0401t:138_5: āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā
tika-s0401t:138_6: paricārenti seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti. No hidaṃ, bho gotamā”tiādīsu pucchāyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:139_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā evamāyupariyanto”ti ettha evaṃ-saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:139_1: vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ-saddoti? Na, visesasabbhāvato. Ākāramattavācako hi evaṃ-saddo
tika-s0401t:139_2: ākāratthoti adhippeto yathā “evaṃ byākho”tiādīsu, na pana ākāravisesavācako. Evañca
tika-s0401t:139_3: katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādiudāharaṇāni upapannāni honti. Tathā hi
tika-s0401t:139_6: puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena kattabbāti jotitattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva
tika-s0401t:139_7: upamā. Tesaṃ upamākāro yathā-saddena aniyamato vuttoti “evaṃ-saddo upamākāranigamanattho”ti
tika-s0401t:139_8: vattuṃ yuttaṃ, so pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha – “upamāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:139_9: āgato”ti. Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya
tika-s0401t:139_10: ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro, so atthato upadeso evāti vuttaṃ – “evaṃ
tika-s0401t:139_11: te…pe… upadese”ti. Tathā evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatāti ettha bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:139_12: aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ pakārehi haṃsanaṃ udaggatākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:140_0: Evamevaṃ panāyanti ettha garahaṇākāroti yojetabbaṃ, so ca garahaṇākāro “vasalī”tiādikhuṃsanasaddasannidhānato
tika-s0401t:140_1: idha evaṃ-saddena pakāsitoti viññāyati. Yathā cettha, evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena
tika-s0401t:140_2: vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ, bhanteti khotiādīsu
tika-s0401t:140_3: pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārena niyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa
tika-s0401t:140_4: paṭijānanavasena vuttattā ettha evaṃ-saddo vacanasampaṭicchanattho vutto, tena “evaṃ,
tika-s0401t:140_5: bhante, sādhu bhante, suṭṭhu bhante”ti vuttaṃ hoti. Evañca vadehīti “yathāhaṃ vadāmi,
tika-s0401t:140_6: evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehī”ti vadanākāro idāni vattabbo evaṃ-saddena nidassīyatīti
tika-s0401t:140_7: nidassanattho vutto. Evaṃ noti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve
tika-s0401t:140_8: sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatiggahaṇavasena “no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya
tika-s0401t:140_9: katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-saddena vibhāvitanti
tika-s0401t:140_10: viññāyati. So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno avadhāraṇattho
tika-s0401t:140_11: hotīti āha – “evaṃ no ettha hotītiādīsu avadhāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0401t:141_1: vā ādhārādibhedavasena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā. Nayā vā pāḷigatiyo, tā ca paññattiādivasena
tika-s0401t:141_4: ca nānappakārāti nānānayā, tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumanti nānānayanipuṇaṃ. Āsayova
tika-s0401t:141_5: ajjhāsayo, te ca sassatādibhedena tattha ca apparajakkhatādibhedena ca aneke, attajjhāsayādayo
tika-s0401t:141_6: eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthabyañjanasampannanti
tika-s0401t:142_1: ca pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti. Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi, ye haritabbā.
tika-s0401t:142_2: Puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ
tika-s0401t:142_3: pavattati, tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vatthuṃ.
tika-s0401t:142_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato
tika-s0401t:142_5: “pāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā
tika-s0401t:142_6: titthiyā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena ca diṭṭhippakāsane
tika-s0401t:142_7: asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ
tika-s0401t:142_8: saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu
tika-s0401t:142_9: viya, tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0401t:142_10: paṭihāriyaṃ, attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:142_11: paṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:142_12: puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni
tika-s0401t:142_13: hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti. Paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ, paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye
tika-s0401t:142_14: bhavaṃ ekamekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0401t:142_15: tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena
tika-s0401t:142_16: visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāyaṃ labbhamānattā āha – “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0401t:143_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho, na pana bhagavato
tika-s0401t:143_1: desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā hi bhagavato desanā. Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena
tika-s0401t:143_2: ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati, dhāraṇabaladassanañca na
tika-s0401t:143_3: virujjhati sutākārāvirujjhanassa adhippetattā. Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnaṃ
tika-s0401t:143_4: atthānaṃ ekavisayattā, itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho
tika-s0401t:144_0: “Yo paro na hoti, so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyaṃ vattanato
tika-s0401t:144_1: tividhopi me-saddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃyeva atthe dissati, karaṇasampadānasāminiddesavasena
tika-s0401t:144_2: pana vijjamānabhedaṃ sandhāyāha – “me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti.
tika-s0401t:145_0: Kiñcāpi upasaggo kiriyaṃ viseseti, jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ suta-saddo eva
tika-s0401t:145_1: taṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa suta-saddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:145_2: na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti āha. Assāti sutasaddassa.
tika-s0401t:145_3: Kammabhāvasādhanāni idha sutasadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ – “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti
tika-s0401t:145_4: vā attho”ti. Mayāti atthe satīti yadā me-saddassa kattuvasena karaṇaniddeso, tadāti
tika-s0401t:145_5: attho. Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0401t:146_0: Sutasaddasanniṭṭhāne payuttena evaṃ-saddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:146_3: Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ evakāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti
tika-s0401t:146_4: āha – “assavanabhāvappaṭikkhepato”ti. Etena avadhāraṇena niyāmataṃ dasseti. Yathā
tika-s0401t:146_5: ca sutaṃ sutamevāti niyāmetabbaṃ, taṃ sammā sutaṃ hotīti āha – “anūnādhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti.
tika-s0401t:146_6: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti sutanti assutaṃ na hotīti
tika-s0401t:146_8: karoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – na idaṃ mayā diṭṭhaṃ, na sayambhuñāṇena sacchikataṃ, atha
tika-s0401t:146_10: Avadhāraṇatthe vā evaṃ-sadde ayamatthayojanā – “karīyatī”ti tadapekkhassa suta-saddassa
tika-s0401t:147_0: Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0401t:147_1: idāni pakārantarehi taṃ dassetuṃ – “tathā eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti yā sā
tika-s0401t:147_2: bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā. Sā hi
tika-s0401t:147_3: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ – “sotadvārānusārenā”ti.
tika-s0401t:147_4: Nānappakārenāti vakkhamānānaṃ anekavihitānaṃ byañjanatthaggahaṇānaṃ nānākārena. Etena
tika-s0401t:147_5: imissā yojanāya ākārattho evaṃ-saddo gahitoti dīpeti. Pavattibhāvappakāsananti pavattiyā
tika-s0401t:147_6: atthibhāvappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsananti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi
tika-s0401t:147_7: nānappakārena pavattā, tassa dhammattā vuttaṃ, na sutasaddassa dhammatthattā. Vuttassevatthassa
tika-s0401t:147_8: pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ “ayañhetthā”tiādi. Tattha viññāṇavīthiyāti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, mayāti kattuatthe.
tika-s0401t:148_0: Evanti niddisitabbappakāsananti nidassanatthaṃ evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nidassetabbassa
tika-s0401t:148_1: nidassitabbattābhāvābhāvato. Tena evaṃ-saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:148_3: tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ – “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti. Na hi puggalavohārarahite
tika-s0401t:149_0: Yassa cittasantānassātiādipi ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā
tika-s0401t:149_1: atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva dhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:149_2: pavattiākārupādānavasena tathā vuttā. Sutanti visayaniddesoti sotabbabhūto dhammo
tika-s0401t:149_3: savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ. Cittasantānavinimuttassa
tika-s0401t:149_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ – “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgīno”ti.
tika-s0401t:149_7: paramatthato kattubhāvato, savanavasena cittapavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato
tika-s0401t:149_8: taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ – “taṃsamaṅgīno kattuvisaye”ti. Sutākārassa
tika-s0401t:149_9: ca therassa sammānicchitabhāvato āha – “gahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti. Etena vā avadhāraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:150_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa
tika-s0401t:150_1: nidassanassa, avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvo evaṃ-saddoti tadākārādiupadhāraṇassa
tika-s0401t:150_3: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti
tika-s0401t:150_4: āha – “sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Meti saddappavattiyā ekanteneva sattavisayattā
tika-s0401t:150_7: atthāti te tathārūpapaññattiupādānabyāpārabhāvena dassento āha – “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso,
tika-s0401t:150_10: kattukaraṇabyāpārakattuniddesavasena ca dutiyādayo catasso atthayojanā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:151_0: Sabbassapi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca
tika-s0401t:151_1: vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:151_2: sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha – “evanti ca meti cā”tiādi. Tattha evanti ca meti ca vuccamānassatthassa
tika-s0401t:151_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho, anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya
tika-s0401t:151_6: anuttamattho ca na hoti, so rūpasaddādisabhāvo, ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo vā attho
tika-s0401t:151_7: saccikaṭṭho paramattho cāti vuccati, na tathā “evaṃ me”tipadānaṃ atthoti. Etamevatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:151_8: pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiñhettha ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sutanti pana saddāyatanaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0401t:151_9: – “vijjamānapaññattī”ti. Teneva hi “yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:151_10: “Sotadvārānusārena upaladdha”nti pana vutte atthabyañjanādi sabbaṃ labbhati. Taṃ
tika-s0401t:151_11: taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino
tika-s0401t:151_12: paccāmasanavasena evanti, sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe upādāya meti vattabbattāti
tika-s0401t:151_13: attho. Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko
tika-s0401t:151_14: viya paṭhamādīni diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvā pavattoti āha – “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya
tika-s0401t:151_15: vattabbato”ti. Assutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsito ayamatthoti.
tika-s0401t:152_0: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā evanti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha – “asammohaṃ
tika-s0401t:152_1: dīpetī”ti. Nānappakārappaṭivedhasamattho hotīti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ
tika-s0401t:152_2: duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti. Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetīti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā
tika-s0401t:152_3: vuttaṃ. Asammohenāti sammohābhāvena, paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi.
tika-s0401t:152_4: Evaṃ asammosenāti etthāpi vattabbaṃ. Byañjanānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro,
tika-s0401t:152_5: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti
tika-s0401t:152_7: padhānabhāvo “manopubbaṅgamā”tiādīsu viya, pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:152_8: viya appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati, evaṃ satipubbaṅgamāyāti
tika-s0401t:153_2: bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvase pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena
tika-s0401t:153_3: na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Vikkhittacittassātiādi tassevatthassa samatthanavasena
tika-s0401t:153_5: viya ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthehi yonisomanasikārassa, saddhammassavanena viya ca
tika-s0401t:153_7: siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato. Evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ
tika-s0401t:153_8: siddhi dassetabbā siyā assutavato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa ca tadabhāvato. Na
tika-s0401t:153_9: hi vikkhittacittotiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena
tika-s0401t:153_10: ca phalabhūtassa saddhammassavanassa siddhi dassitā. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo yutto
tika-s0401t:153_11: siyā, saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā,
tika-s0401t:153_12: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti. Evampi
tika-s0401t:153_13: avikkhepena sappurisūpanissayasiddhijotanā na samatthitāva. No na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ
tika-s0401t:153_14: sappurisapayirupāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhattā. Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa
tika-s0401t:153_15: siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa, dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa
tika-s0401t:153_16: siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0401t:154_1: niravasesaparahitapāripūritākāraṇanti vuttaṃ – “evaṃ bhaddako ākāro”ti. Yasmā na
tika-s0401t:154_3: Aparāparaṃ vuttiyā cettha cakkabhāvo, caranti etehi sattā sampattibhavesūti vā. Ye
tika-s0401t:154_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0401t:154_5: catucakkaṃ vattatī”tiādi. Purimapacchimabhāvo cettha desanākkamavasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:154_7: ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasiddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha – “āsayasuddhi
tika-s0401t:154_8: siddhā hotī”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti,
tika-s0401t:154_9: “katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja, khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo”ti ca. Tenevāha
tika-s0401t:154_12: vā kāyavacīpayogassa niddosabhāvena. Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato
tika-s0401t:155_1: asammohadīpanato catuppaṭisambhidāvasena atthayojanaṃ dasseti. Tattha sotappabhedapaṭivedhadīpakenāti
tika-s0401t:155_2: etena ayaṃ suta-saddo evaṃ-saddasannidhānato, vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ
tika-s0401t:155_4: visesato manasikārappaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃ-saddena
tika-s0401t:155_6: te avikkhepadīpakena suta-saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane
tika-s0401t:155_7: ussāhaṃ janeti. Tattha dhammāti pariyattidhammā. Manasā anupekkhitāti “idha sīlaṃ
tika-s0401t:155_8: kathitaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā, ettakā ettha anusandhayo”tiādinā nayena manasā
tika-s0401t:155_9: anu anu pekkhitā. Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti nijjhānakkhanti bhūtāya, ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya
tika-s0401t:155_10: vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā suṭṭhu
tika-s0401t:156_0: Sakalena vacanenāti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ. Asappurisabhūminti
tika-s0401t:156_2: attano dahatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ anariyavohārāvatthaṃ. Sā eva anariyavohārāvatthā asaddhammo.
tika-s0401t:156_3: Nanu ca ānandattherassa “mamedaṃ vacana”nti adhimānassa, mahākassapattherādīnañca
tika-s0401t:156_5: “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato. Keci pana “devatānaṃ
tika-s0401t:156_6: parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti. Tasmiṃ kira
tika-s0401t:156_7: khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā parinibbuto, ayañca
tika-s0401t:156_8: āyasmā desanākusalo idāni dhammaṃ deseti, sakyakulappasuto tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto,
tika-s0401t:156_9: kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti, udāhu bhagavato eva vacanaṃ yathāsuta”nti,
tika-s0401t:156_10: evaṃ tadāsaṅkitappakārato asappurisabhūmisamokkamādito atikkamādi vibhāvitanti. Attano
tika-s0401t:156_11: adahantoti “mameda”nti attani aṭṭhapento. Appetīti nidasseti. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthesu
tika-s0401t:156_12: yathārahaṃ satte netīti netti, dhammoyeva netti dhammanetti.
tika-s0401t:157_0: Daḷhataraniviṭṭhā vicikicchā kaṅkhā. Nātisaṃsappanaṃ matibhedamattaṃ vimati. Assaddhiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:157_1: vināseti bhagavatā bhāsitattā sammukhā cassa paṭiggahitattā khalitaduruttādiggahaṇadosābhāvato
tika-s0401t:157_2: ca. Ettha ca pañcamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-saddaṃ
tika-s0401t:157_3: gahetvā dassitā, tato parā catasso ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vibhāvitā, pacchimā
tika-s0401t:157_4: pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0401t:158_0: Eka-saddo aññaseṭṭhaasahāyasaṅkhādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0401t:158_1: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati, “cetaso
tika-s0401t:158_2: ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu seṭṭhe, “eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu asahāye “ekova kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:158_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhāyaṃ. Idhāpi saṅkhāyanti dassento
tika-s0401t:158_4: āha – “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti. Kālañca samayañcāti yuttakālañca paccayasāmaggiñca.
tika-s0401t:158_5: Khaṇoti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayappaṭilābhahetuttā.
tika-s0401t:158_6: Khaṇo eva ca samayo. Yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati, so eko evāti hi attho. Mahāsamayoti
tika-s0401t:158_7: mahāsamūho. Samayopi khoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetupi. Samayappavādaketi diṭṭhippavādake.
tika-s0401t:158_8: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadantīti. Atthābhisamayāti hitappaṭilābhā.
tika-s0401t:158_9: Abhisametabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayo attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena
tika-s0401t:158_10: ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni. Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti
tika-s0401t:158_11: tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni. Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ
tika-s0401t:159_0: Tattha sahakārikāraṇe sanijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati
tika-s0401t:159_1: ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo. Sameti ettha, etena
tika-s0401t:159_2: vā saṃgacchati satto, sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi, uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo.
tika-s0401t:159_3: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:159_4: viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ
tika-s0401t:159_5: pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi
tika-s0401t:159_6: samūhoti. Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0401t:159_7: hetu yathā “samudayo”ti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambaddho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0401t:159_8: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo,
tika-s0401t:159_9: diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti
tika-s0401t:159_10: samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ
tika-s0401t:159_11: ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhisametabboti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena
tika-s0401t:159_12: sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ
tika-s0401t:159_13: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā. Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre
tika-s0401t:159_14: abhisamayasaddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Assāti samayasaddassa. Kālo
tika-s0401t:159_15: attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato, desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa
tika-s0401t:160_0: Kasmā panettha aniyamitavaseneva kālo niddiṭṭho, na utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyametvāti
tika-s0401t:160_1: āha – “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa
tika-s0401t:160_2: vacane ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha. Sāmaññajotanā hi
tika-s0401t:160_3: visese avatiṭṭhatīti. Tattha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasamayo devasikaṃ jhānasamāpattīhi
tika-s0401t:160_4: vītināmanakālo, visesato sattasattāhāni. Suppakāsāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā pakampanaobhāsapātubhāvādīhi
tika-s0401t:160_5: pākaṭā. Yathāvuttabhedesu eva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0401t:160_6: “yo cāya”ntiādimāha. Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo attahitappaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo,
tika-s0401t:161_0: Karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti sambandho. Tatthāti abhidhammavinayesu. Tathāti bhummakaraṇehi.
tika-s0401t:161_1: Adhikaraṇattho ādhārattho. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:161_2: Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena
tika-s0401t:161_3: paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhe jāto, sāyanhe
tika-s0401t:161_4: gacchatī”ti ca ādīsu, samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho
tika-s0401t:161_5: avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsiyaṃ sambhūto”tiādīsu,
tika-s0401t:161_6: evaṃ idhāpīti dassento āha – “adhikaraṇaṃ…pe… dhammāna”nti. Yasmiṃ kāle, dhammapuñje
tika-s0401t:161_7: vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ eva kāle, dhammapuñje ca phassādayopi
tika-s0401t:161_8: hontīti ayañhi tattha attho. Yathā “gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato”ti dohanakiriyāya
tika-s0401t:161_9: gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evaṃ idhāpi “yasmiṃ samaye, tasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte “satī”ti
tika-s0401t:161_10: ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti samayassa sattākiriyāya
tika-s0401t:161_11: cittassa uppādakiriyā, phassādīnaṃ bhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyatīti. Yasmiṃ samayeti
tika-s0401t:161_12: yasmiṃ navame khaṇe, yasmiṃ yonisomanasikārādihetumhi, paccayasamavāye vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-s0401t:161_13: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe hetumhi paccayasamavāye ca phassādayopi
tika-s0401t:161_14: hontīti ubhayattha samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti dassento
tika-s0401t:162_0: Hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati “annena vasati, ajjhenena vasati, pharasunā chindati,
tika-s0401t:162_1: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya. Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇe
tika-s0401t:162_2: vatthusmiṃ taṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ
tika-s0401t:162_3: anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadāni paññāpento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-s0401t:163_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ parahitappaṭipattisaṅkhātena
tika-s0401t:163_2: kato yathā “māsaṃ ajjhetī”ti. Porāṇāti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Abhilāpamattabhedoti vacanamattena
tika-s0401t:163_3: viseso. Tena suttavinayesu vibhattibyattayo katoti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:164_0: Idāni “bhagavā”ti imassa atthaṃ dassento āha – “bhagavāti garū”tiādi. Bhagavāti vacanaṃ
tika-s0401t:164_1: seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ, seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇaṃ seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ. Atha vā
tika-s0401t:164_2: vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho. Yasmā yo “bhagavā”ti vacanena vacanīyo attho, so seṭṭhoti
tika-s0401t:164_3: attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Gāravayuttoti garubhāvayutto
tika-s0401t:164_4: garuguṇayogato. Garukaraṇaṃ vā sātisayaṃ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.
tika-s0401t:164_5: Sippādisikkhāpakā garū honti, na ca gāravayuttā, ayaṃ pana tādiso na hoti, tasmā
tika-s0401t:164_6: garūti vatvā gāravayuttoti vuttanti keci. Vuttoyeva, na idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa
tika-s0401t:165_0: Dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotīti “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito
tika-s0401t:165_1: paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti
tika-s0401t:165_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo parehi abhejjasarīrattā. Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye
tika-s0401t:165_3: kenaci sakkā antarāyo kātunti. Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalasuttassa
tika-s0401t:165_4: evanti niddisanato. Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāpattena pañcasu ṭhānesu
tika-s0401t:165_5: bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ, tañca kho mayā sutaṃ, na anussutikaṃ,
tika-s0401t:165_6: na paramparābhatanti imassa atthassa dīpanato. Kālasampattiṃ niddisati “bhagavā”ti
tika-s0401t:165_7: padassa sannidhāne payuttassa samayasaddassa kālassa buddhuppādappaṭimaṇḍitabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0401t:169_0: Evaṃnāmake nagareti kathaṃ panetaṃ nagaraṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ jātanti? Vuccate, yathā kākandassa
tika-s0401t:169_1: isino nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitā nagarī kākandī, mākandassa nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitā mākandī,
tika-s0401t:169_2: kusambassa nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitā kosambīti vuccati, evaṃ savatthassa isino nivāsaṭṭhāne
tika-s0401t:169_3: māpitā nagarī sāvatthīti vuccati. Evaṃ tāva akkharacintakā vadanti. Aṭṭhakathācariyā
tika-s0401t:169_4: pana bhaṇanti – “yaṃ kiñci manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ, sabbamettha atthī”ti sāvatthi.
tika-s0401t:169_5: Satthasamāyoge ca ‘kiṃ bhaṇḍamatthī’ti pucchite ‘sabbamatthī’ti vacanamupādāya sāvatthi.
tika-s0401t:176_0: Avisesenāti na visesena, vihārabhāvasāmaññenāti attho. Iriyāpathavihāro…pe… vihāresūti
tika-s0401t:176_1: iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu. Samaṅgiparidīpananti
tika-s0401t:176_2: samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Etanti viharatīti etaṃ padaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ “idhekacco gihisaṃsaṭṭho
tika-s0401t:176_3: viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre āgataṃ, “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:176_4: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu dibbavihāre,
tika-s0401t:176_5: “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu brahmavihāre, “so
tika-s0401t:176_6: khohaṃ, aggivessana, tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte
tika-s0401t:176_7: ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi, samādahāmi, yena sudaṃ
tika-s0401t:177_0: Tattha iriyanaṃ pavattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo. Tassā pavattanūpāyabhāvato ṭhānādi
tika-s0401t:177_1: iriyāpatho. Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā.
tika-s0401t:177_2: Atha vā iriyati pavattati etena attabhāvo, kāyakiccaṃ vāti iriyā, tassā pavattiyā
tika-s0401t:177_3: upāyabhāvato pathoti iriyāpatho, ṭhānādi eva. So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena
tika-s0401t:177_4: pavatto catusantatirūpappabandho eva. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro. Divi
tika-s0401t:177_5: bhavo dibbo, tattha bahulappavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevaloke bhavoti attho. Tattha
tika-s0401t:177_6: yo dibbānubhāvo, tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo, abhiññābhinīhāravasena mahāgatikattā
tika-s0401t:177_7: vā dibbo, dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro, catasso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo. Arūpasamāpattiyopi
tika-s0401t:177_8: ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Brahmānaṃ, brahmāno vā vihārā brahmavihārā, catasso appamaññāyo.
tika-s0401t:177_9: Ariyo, ariyānaṃ vā vihāro ariyavihāro, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni. So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi
tika-s0401t:177_10: yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:177_11: tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha
tika-s0401t:177_12: katthaci vasanto veneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento
tika-s0401t:177_13: vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhahitasukhaṃ harati upaneti uppādeti, tasmā vividhaṃ
tika-s0401t:178_0: Jetassa rājakumārassāti ettha attano paccatthikajanaṃ jinātīti jeto. Sotasaddo viya
tika-s0401t:178_1: hi kattusādhano jetasaddo. Atha vā raññā pasenadikosalena attano paccatthikajane
tika-s0401t:178_2: jite jātoti jeto. Rañño hi jayaṃ āropetvā kumāro jitavāti jetoti vutto. Maṅgalakāmatāya
tika-s0401t:178_3: vā tassa evaṃnāmameva katanti jeto. Maṅgalakāmatāya hi jeyyoti etasmiṃ atthe jetoti
tika-s0401t:178_4: vuttaṃ. Vitthāro panātiādinā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti ettha sudatto nāma so, gahapati,
tika-s0401t:178_5: mātāpitūhi katanāmavasena, sabbakāmasamiddhatāya pana vigatamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya
tika-s0401t:178_6: ca niccakālaṃ anāthānaṃ piṇḍamadāsi. Tena anāthapiṇḍikoti saṅkhaṃ gato. Āramanti
tika-s0401t:178_7: ettha pāṇino, visesena vā pabbajitāti ārāmo, tassa pupphaphalādisobhāya nātidūranaccāsannatādipañcavidhasenāsanaṅgasampattiyā
tika-s0401t:178_8: ca tato tato āgamma ramanti abhiramanti, anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā nivasantīti attho. Vuttappakārāya
tika-s0401t:178_9: vā sampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantaraṃyeva ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
tika-s0401t:178_10: So hi anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā jetassa rājakumārassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi
tika-s0401t:178_11: santhārena kiṇitvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi senāsanāni kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi
tika-s0401t:178_13: bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātito, tasmā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo”ti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ nidasseti.
tika-s0401t:179_0: Tatthāti “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti
tika-s0401t:179_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ vākyaṃ, tattha. Siyāti kassaci evaṃ parivitakko siyā, vakkhamānākārena
tika-s0401t:179_2: kadāci codeyya vāti attho. Atha tattha viharatīti yadi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa
tika-s0401t:179_3: ārāme viharati. Na vattabbanti nānāṭhānabhūtattā sāvatthijetavanānaṃ, “ekaṃ samaya”nti
tika-s0401t:179_4: ca vuttattāti adhippāyo. Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ “na hi sakkā”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:179_5: vivarati. Itaro sabbametaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantena tayā vuttanti dassento “na
tika-s0401t:179_6: kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”ntiādimāha. Tattha etanti “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane
tika-s0401t:179_7: anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Evanti “yadi tāva bhagavā”tiādinā yaṃ taṃ
tika-s0401t:179_8: bhavatā coditaṃ, taṃ atthato evaṃ na kho pana daṭṭhabbaṃ, na ubhayattha apubbaṃ acarimaṃ
tika-s0401t:179_9: vihāradassanatthanti attho. Idāni attanā yathādhippetaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ, tassa ca
tika-s0401t:179_10: paṭikacceva vuttabhāvaṃ, tena ca appaṭividdhataṃ pakāsento “nanu avocumha…pe… jetavane”ti
tika-s0401t:179_11: āha. Evampi “jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme viharati”cceva vattabbaṃ, na “sāvatthiya”nti
tika-s0401t:180_0: Avassañcettha gocaragāmakittanaṃ kattabbaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ yathā jetavanādikittanaṃ
tika-s0401t:180_3: okāsadānena dhammadesanāya saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena yathūpanissayaṃ uparivisesādhigamāvahanena
tika-s0401t:180_4: ca gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇaṃ, uggahaparipucchānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ca anurūpavasanaṭṭhānapariggahenettha
tika-s0401t:180_5: pabbajitānuggahakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Karuṇāya upagamanaṃ, na lābhādinimittaṃ. Paññāya
tika-s0401t:180_6: apagamanaṃ, na virodhādinimittanti upagamanāpagamanānaṃ nirupakkilesataṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0401t:180_7: Dhammikasukhaṃ nāma anavajjasukhaṃ. Devatānaṃ upakārabahulatā janavivittatāya. Pacurajanavivittañhi
tika-s0401t:180_8: ṭhānaṃ devā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññanti. Tadatthaparinipphādananti lokatthanipphādanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:180_9: buddhakiccasampādananti attho. Evamādināti ādi-saddena sāvatthikittanena rūpakāyassa
tika-s0401t:180_10: anuggaṇhanaṃ dasseti, jetavanādikittanena dhammakāyassa. Tathā purimena parādhīnakiriyākaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:180_11: dutiyena attādhīnakiriyākaraṇaṃ. Purimena vā karuṇākiccaṃ, itarena paññākiccaṃ. Purimena
tika-s0401t:180_12: cassa paramāya anukampāya samannāgamaṃ, pacchimena paramāya upekkhāya samannāgamaṃ
tika-s0401t:180_13: dīpeti. Bhagavā hi sabbasatte paramāya anukampāya anukampati, na ca tattha sinehadosānupatito
tika-s0401t:180_14: paramupekkhakabhāvato. Upekkhako ca na parahitasukhakaraṇe appossukko mahākāruṇikabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:181_0: Tathā hesa bodhisattabhūto mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso sakalalokahitāya ussukkamāpanno
tika-s0401t:181_1: mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya tadatthanipphādanatthaṃ puññañāṇasambhāre sampādento aparimitaṃ
tika-s0401t:181_2: kālaṃ anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhosi, upekkhakatāya sammā patitehi dukkhehi na vikampitatā.
tika-s0401t:181_3: Mahākāruṇikatāya saṃsārābhimukhatā, upekkhakatāya tato nibbindanā. Tathā upekkhakatāya
tika-s0401t:181_4: nibbānābhimukhatā, mahākāruṇikatāya tadadhigamo. Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya paresaṃ ahiṃsāpanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:181_5: upekkhakatāya sayaṃ parehi abhāyanaṃ. Mahākāruṇikatāya paraṃ rakkhato attano rakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:181_6: upekkhakatāya attānaṃ rakkhato paresaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Tenassa attahitāya paṭipannādīsu
tika-s0401t:181_7: catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti. Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya saccādhiṭṭhānassa ca cāgādhiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0401t:181_8: ca pāripūrī, upekkhakatāya upasamādhiṭṭhānassa ca paññādhiṭṭhānassa ca pāripūrī.
tika-s0401t:181_10: upagamanaṃ, upekkhakatāya tiṇāyapi amaññamānassa tato apagamanaṃ. Iti suvisuddhaupagamāpagamassa
tika-s0401t:181_11: mahākāruṇikatāya lokahitatthameva dānavasena sampattīnaṃ pariccajanā, upekkhakatāya
tika-s0401t:181_12: cassa phalassa attano apaccāsīsanā. Evaṃ samudāgamanato paṭṭhāya acchariyabbhutaguṇasamannāgatassa
tika-s0401t:181_13: mahākāruṇikatāya paresaṃ hitasukhatthaṃ atidukkarakāritā, upekkhakatāya kāyampi analaṅkāritā.
tika-s0401t:182_0: Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya carimattabhāve jiṇṇāturamatadassanena sañjātasaṃvego, upekkhakatāya
tika-s0401t:182_1: uḷāresu devabhogasadisesu bhogesu nirapekkho mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami. Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya
tika-s0401t:182_2: “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā karuṇāmukheneva vipassanārambho, upekkhakatāya
tika-s0401t:182_3: buddhabhūtassa satta sattāhāni vivekasukheneva vītināmanaṃ. Mahākāruṇikatāya dhammagambhīrataṃ
tika-s0401t:182_4: paccavekkhitvā dhammadesanāya appossukkanaṃ āpajjitvāpi mahābrahmuno ajjhesanāpadesena
tika-s0401t:182_6: Mahākāruṇikatāya katthaci paṭighātābhāvenassa sabbattha amittasaññābhāvo, upekkhakatāya
tika-s0401t:182_7: katthacipi anurodhābhāvena sabbattha sinehasanthavābhāvo. Mahākāruṇikatāya paresaṃ
tika-s0401t:182_8: pasādanā, upekkhakatāya pasannākārehi na vikampanā. Mahākāruṇikatāya dhammānurāgābhāvena
tika-s0401t:182_10: Mahākāruṇikatāya dhammaṃ desetuṃ parehi saṃsaggamupagacchatopi upekkhakatāya na tattha
tika-s0401t:182_11: abhirati. Mahākāruṇikatāya gāmādīnaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne vasatopi upekkhakatāya araññaṭṭhāne
tika-s0401t:182_12: eva viharaṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “purimenassa paramāya anukampāya samannāgamaṃ dīpetī”ti.
tika-s0401t:183_0: Tanti tatrāti padaṃ. “Desakālaparidīpana”nti ye desakālā idha viharaṇakiriyāvisesanabhāvena
tika-s0401t:183_1: vuttā, tesaṃ paridīpananti dassento “yaṃ samayaṃ…pe… dīpetī”ti āha. Taṃ-saddo hi
tika-s0401t:183_2: vuttassa atthassa paṭiniddeso, tasmā idha kālassa desassa vā paṭiniddeso bhavitumarahati,
tika-s0401t:183_3: na aññassa. Ayaṃ tāva tatra-saddassa paṭiniddesabhāve atthavibhāvanā. Yasmā pana
tika-s0401t:183_4: īdisesu ṭhānesu tatra-saddo dhammadesanāvisiṭṭhaṃ desakālañca vibhāveti, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:183_5: – “bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle dīpetī”ti. Tena tatrāti yatra bhagavā dhammadesanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:183_6: bhikkhū ālapati bhāsati, tādise dese, kāle vāti attho. Na hītiādinā tamevatthaṃ samattheti.
tika-s0401t:183_7: Nanu ca yattha ṭhito bhagavā “akālo kho tāvā”tiādinā bāhiyassa dhammadesanaṃ paṭikkhipi,
tika-s0401t:183_8: tattheva antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhito tassa dhammaṃ desesīti? Saccametaṃ, adesetabbakāle
tika-s0401t:183_9: adesanāya idaṃ udāharaṇaṃ. Tenevāha – “akālo kho tāvā”ti.
tika-s0401t:184_0: Yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ – “antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā”ti, tampi tassa akālabhāvasseva
tika-s0401t:184_1: pariyāyena dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa hi tadā addhānaparissamena rūpakāye akammaññatā
tika-s0401t:184_2: ahosi, balavapītivegena nāmakāye. Tadubhayassa vūpasamaṃ āgamento papañcaparihāratthaṃ
tika-s0401t:184_3: bhagavā “akālo kho”ti pariyāyena paṭikkhipi. Adesetabbadese adesanāya pana udāharaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:184_4: “atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi, vihārapacchāyāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:184_5: paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti ca evamādikaṃ idha ādisaddena saṅgahitaṃ. “Atha kho so,
tika-s0401t:184_6: bhikkhave, bālo idha pubbe nesādo idha pāpāni kammāni karitvā”tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte
tika-s0401t:184_7: kho-saddo, “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso”tiādīsu avadhāraṇe, “kittāvatā
tika-s0401t:184_8: nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādīsu
tika-s0401t:184_9: ādikālatthe, vākyārambheti attho. Tattha padapūraṇena vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-s0401t:184_10: ādikālatthena vākyassa upaññāsamattaṃ. Avadhāraṇatthena pana niyamadassanaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0401t:184_11: āmantesi evāti āmantane niyamo dassito hoti.
tika-s0401t:185_0: Bhagavāti lokagarudīpananti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu pubbepi bhagavāsaddassa attho vuttoti?
tika-s0401t:185_1: Yadipi vutto, taṃ panassa yathāvutte ṭhāne viharaṇakiriyāya kattu visesadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_2: kataṃ, na āmantanakiriyāya, idha pana āmantanakiriyāya, tasmā tadatthaṃ puna “bhagavā”ti
tika-s0401t:185_3: pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti tassatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavāti lokagarudīpana”nti āha. Tena lokagarubhāvato
tika-s0401t:185_4: tadanurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ patthento attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_5: dhammaṃ desetuṃ te āmantesīti dasseti. Kathāsavanayuttapuggalavacananti vakkhamānāya
tika-s0401t:185_6: cittapariyādānadesanāya savanayoggapuggalavacanaṃ. Catūsupi parisāsu bhikkhū eva
tika-s0401t:185_7: edisānaṃ desanānaṃ visesena bhājanabhūtāti sātisayaṃ sāsanasampaṭiggāhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_8: idha bhikkhuggahaṇanti dassetvā idāni saddatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0401t:185_9: bhikkhakoti bhikkhūti bhikkhanadhammatāya bhikkhūti attho. Bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti
tika-s0401t:185_10: buddhādīhi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ, uñchācariyaṃ, ajjhupagatattā anuṭṭhitattā
tika-s0401t:185_11: bhikkhu. Yo hi appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
tika-s0401t:185_12: so kasigorakkhādijīvikākappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā
tika-s0401t:185_13: bhikkhu, parappaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_14: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu, piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_15: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhūti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ādinā nayenāti “chinnabhinnapaṭadharoti
tika-s0401t:185_16: bhikkhu, bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu, bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_17: dhammānaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgatanayena. Ñāpaneti avabodhane, paṭivedaneti attho.
tika-s0401t:186_0: Bhikkhanasīlatāti bhikkhanena jīvanasīlatā, na kasivāṇijjādinā jīvanasīlatā. Bhikkhanadhammatāti
tika-s0401t:186_1: “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhantī”ti evaṃ vuttā bhikkhanasabhāvatā, na yācanakohaññasabhāvatā.
tika-s0401t:186_2: Bhikkhane sādhukāritāti “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti vacanaṃ anussaritvā tattha appamajjanā.
tika-s0401t:186_3: Atha vā sīlaṃ nāma pakatisabhāvo, idha pana tadadhiṭṭhānaṃ. Dhammoti vataṃ. Sādhukāritāti
tika-s0401t:186_4: sakkaccakāritā ādarakiriyā. Hīnādhikajanasevitanti ye bhikkhubhāve ṭhitāpi jātimadādivasena
tika-s0401t:186_5: uddhatā unnaḷā, ye ca gihibhāve paresaṃ adhikabhāvampi anupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṃ
tika-s0401t:186_6: paramakāruññataṃ maññanti, tesaṃ ubhayesampi yathākkamaṃ “bhikkhavo”ti vacanena hīnajanehi
tika-s0401t:186_7: daliddehi paramakāruññataṃ pattehi parakulesu bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentehi
tika-s0401t:186_8: sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti. Adhikajanehi uḷārabhogakhattiyakulādito
tika-s0401t:186_9: pabbajitehi buddhādīhi ājīvavisodhanatthaṃ sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento dīnabhāvaniggahaṃ
tika-s0401t:186_10: karotīti yojetabbaṃ. Yasmā “bhikkhavo”ti vacanaṃ āmantanabhāvato abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:186_11: pakaraṇato sāmatthiyato ca sussusājananaṃ sakkaccasavanamanasikāraniyojanañca hoti,
tika-s0401t:186_12: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “bhikkhavoti iminā”tiādimāha. Tattha sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāreti
tika-s0401t:186_13: sādhukasavane sādhukamanasikāre ca. Kathaṃ pana pavattitā savanādayo sādhukaṃ pavattitā
tika-s0401t:186_14: hontīti? “Addhā imāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sakalasāsanasampatti hatthagatā bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0401t:186_15: ādaragāravayogena kathādīsu aparibhavādinā ca. Vuttañhi “pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi
tika-s0401t:186_16: samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:186_17: Katamehi pañcahi? Kathaṃ na paribhoti, kathitaṃ na paribhoti, na attānaṃ paribhoti,
tika-s0401t:186_18: avikkhittacitto dhammaṃ suṇāti ekaggacitto, yoniso ca manasikaroti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:186_19: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu
tika-s0401t:186_20: dhammesu sammatta”nti. Tenevāha – “sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārāyattā hi sāsanasampattī”ti.
tika-s0401t:187_1: eva āmantane kāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni bhikkhū āmantetvāva dhammadesanāya payojanaṃ
tika-s0401t:187_2: dassetuṃ “kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha aññaṃ cintentāti
tika-s0401t:187_3: aññavihitā. Vikkhittacittāti asamāhitacittā. Dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāti hiyyo tato
tika-s0401t:187_4: paraṃ divasesu vā sutadhammaṃ pati pati manasā avekkhantā. Bhikkhū āmantetvā dhamme
tika-s0401t:187_5: desiyamāne ādito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkontīti imamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0401t:188_0: Bhikkhavoti cettha sandhivasena i-kāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Bhikkhavo itīti ayaṃ iti-saddo
tika-s0401t:188_2: Tathā hesa “ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā rūpanti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetvatthe dissati.
tika-s0401t:188_3: “Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu
tika-s0401t:188_4: anukampā. Kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu parisamāpane.
tika-s0401t:188_5: “Iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe. “Māgaṇḍiyoti
tika-s0401t:188_6: tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti
tika-s0401t:188_7: byañjanamabhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo bālo,
tika-s0401t:188_8: appaṭibhayo paṇḍito, saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito, saupasaggo bālo, anupasaggo
tika-s0401t:188_9: paṇḍito”tiādīsu pakāre. “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti puṭṭhena satā, ‘ānanda,
tika-s0401t:188_10: atthī’tissa vacanīyaṃ. ‘Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇa’nti iti ce vadeyya. Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:188_11: iccassa vacanīya”ntiādīsu avadhāraṇe. “Atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, natthīti
tika-s0401t:188_12: kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane. Idhāpi nidassane eva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:188_13: Bhikkhavoti hi āmantanākāro. Tamesa iti-saddo nidasseti “bhikkhavoti āmantesī”ti.
tika-s0401t:188_14: Iminā nayena “bhaddante”tiādīsupi yathārahaṃ iti-saddassa attho veditabbo. Pubbe
tika-s0401t:188_16: āmantanameva sambandhiantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato āmantanaṃ
tika-s0401t:188_17: paṭiassosu”nti vuttaṃ. “Bhagavato”ti pana idaṃ paṭissavasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ
tika-s0401t:188_18: yathā “devadattāya paṭissuṇotī”ti. Yaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti sambandho. Imassa suttassa
tika-s0401t:188_25: mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇagambhīrabhāvasaṃsūcakassa
tika-s0401t:189_0: Etthāha – “kimatthaṃ pana dhammavinayasaṅgahe kayiramāne nidānavacanaṃ, nanu bhagavatā
tika-s0401t:189_2: Kāladesadesakanimittaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā
tika-s0401t:189_3: hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca. Desakālakattuhetunimittehi upanibaddho viya vohāravinicchayo.
tika-s0401t:189_4: Teneva ca āyasmatā mahākassapena “cittapariyādānasuttaṃ, āvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā
tika-s0401t:189_5: desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā
tika-s0401t:189_6: imassa suttassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ. Apica satthusampattippakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:189_8: Na hi sammāsambussa pubbacaraṇādīhi attho atthi sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya
tika-s0401t:189_10: khīṇāsavabhāvasiddhi. Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhassa parānuggahappavatti.
tika-s0401t:189_14: bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo attahitaparahitappaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā
