tika-s0401t:385: 37-38. Sattamaṭṭhamesu upamā panetthāti yathā paṭhamādīsu adantahatthiassādayo upamābhāvena gahitā, evamettha satthamaṭṭhamesu “asaṃvutagharadvārādivasena veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:386: 39-40. Navamadasamesu catūhipi padehīti adantādīhi catūhi padehi yojetvā navamadasamāni suttāni vuttānīti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:389_0: 41. Pañcamassa paṭhame upamāva opammaṃ, so eva attho, tasmiṃ opammatthe bodhetabbe
tika-s0401t:389_1: nipāto. Seyyathāpīti yathāti attho. Ettha ca tatra bhagavā katthaci atthena upamaṃ
tika-s0401t:389_2: parivāretvā dasseti vatthasutte viya, pāricchattakopama aggikkhandhopamādi suttesu
tika-s0401t:389_3: viya ca. Katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dasseti loṇambilasutte viya, suvaṇṇakārasattasūriyopamādisuttesu
tika-s0401t:389_4: viya ca. Imasmiṃ pana sālisūkopame upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassento “seyyathāpi,
tika-s0401t:389_5: bhikkhave”tiādimāhāti potthakesu likhanti, taṃ majjhimaṭṭhakathāya vatthasuttavaṇṇanāya
tika-s0401t:389_6: na sameti. Tattha hi idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:390_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vatthanti upamāvacanamevetaṃ. Upamaṃ karonto ca bhagavā katthaci
tika-s0401t:390_1: paṭhamaṃyeva upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dasseti, katthaci paṭhamaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0401t:390_2: pacchā upamaṃ, katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dasseti, katthaci atthena upamaṃ.
tika-s0401t:390_3: Tathā hesa “seyyathāpissu, bhikkhave, dve agārā sadvārā, tattha cakkhumā puriso majjhe
tika-s0401t:390_4: ṭhito passeyyā”ti sakalampi devadūtasuttaṃ upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ
tika-s0401t:390_5: dassento āha. “Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi,
tika-s0401t:390_6: ākāse”tiādinā pana nayena sakalampi iddhividhaṃ atthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā pacchā upamaṃ
tika-s0401t:390_7: dassento āha. “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇapuriso sāratthiko sāragavesī”tiādinā nayena sakalampi
tika-s0401t:390_8: cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassento āha. “Idha pana, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:390_9: ekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ…pe… seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:390_10: nayena sakalampi alagaddasuttaṃ mahāsāropamasuttanti evamādīni suttāni atthena upamaṃ
tika-s0401t:390_11: parivāretvā dassento āha. Svāyaṃ idha paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dassetīti.
tika-s0401t:391_0: Ettha hi cūḷasāropamādīsu paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ upameyyatthaṃ vatvā
tika-s0401t:391_1: puna upamaṃ vadanto upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassetīti vutto. Alagaddūpamasuttādīsu
tika-s0401t:391_2: pana atthaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ upamaṃ vatvā puna atthaṃ vadanto atthena
tika-s0401t:391_3: upamaṃ parivāretvā dassetīti vutto. Tenevettha līnatthappakāsiniyaṃ vuttaṃ – “upameyyatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:391_4: paṭhamaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ atthaṃ vatvā puna upamaṃ vadanto upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā
tika-s0401t:391_5: dassetī”ti vutto. Atthena upamaṃ parivāretvāti etthāpi eseva nayoti. Idha pana katthaci
tika-s0401t:391_7: viya cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vatthasutte tāva “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vatthaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0401t:391_8: malaggahitaṃ, tamenaṃ rajako yasmiṃ yasmiṃ raṅgajāte upasaṃhareyya. Yadi nīlakāya,
tika-s0401t:391_9: yadi pītakāya, yadi lohitakāya, yadi mañjiṭṭhakāya, durattavaṇṇamevassa aparisuddhavaṇṇamevassa.
tika-s0401t:391_10: Taṃ kissa hetu? Aparisuddhattā, bhikkhave, vatthassa. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte
tika-s0401t:391_11: saṃkiliṭṭhe duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”tiādinā paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā upameyyattho
tika-s0401t:391_12: vutto, na pana paṭhamaṃ atthaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ upamaṃ dassetvā puna attho vutto.
tika-s0401t:391_13: Yena katthaci atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti. Vatthasutte viyāti vadeyya.
tika-s0401t:392_0: Tathā pāricchattakopamepi “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako
tika-s0401t:392_1: koviḷāro paṇḍupalāso hoti, attamanā, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṃsā, tasmiṃ samaye honti
tika-s0401t:392_2: paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako koviḷāro, na cirasseva dāni pannapalāso bhavissati…pe…
tika-s0401t:392_3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye ariyasāvako agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya
tika-s0401t:392_4: ceteti. Paṇḍupalāso, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako tasmiṃ samaye hotī”tiādinā paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ
tika-s0401t:392_5: dassetvā pacchā attho vutto. Aggikkhandhopame “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amuṃ
tika-s0401t:392_6: mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtanti. Evaṃ, bhanteti. Taṃ
tika-s0401t:392_7: kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ
tika-s0401t:392_8: sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā, yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ
tika-s0401t:392_9: vā brāhmaṇakaññaṃ vā gahapatikaññaṃ vā mudutalunahatthapādaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya
tika-s0401t:392_10: vā upanipajjeyya vā”tiādinā paṭhamaṃ upamaṃyeva dassetvā pacchā attho vutto, na pana
tika-s0401t:392_11: paṭhamaṃ atthaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ upamaṃ dassetvā puna attho vutto, tasmā “katthaci
tika-s0401t:392_12: atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti vatthasutte viya pāricchattakopamaaggikkhandhopamādisuttesu
tika-s0401t:393_0: Keci panettha evaṃ vaṇṇayanti “atthaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā ca upamaṃ dassento atthena
tika-s0401t:393_1: upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti nāma, upamaṃ pana paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā atthaṃ dassento
tika-s0401t:393_2: upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dasseti nāma, tadubhayassapi āgataṭṭhānaṃ nidassento ‘vatthasutte
tika-s0401t:393_3: viyā’tiādimāhā”ti. Tampi “katthaci atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti vatthasutte
tika-s0401t:393_4: viya pāricchattakopamaaggikkhandhopamādisuttesu viya cā”ti vattabbaṃ, evañca vuccamāne
tika-s0401t:393_5: “katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dasseti loṇambilasutte viyā”ti visuṃ na vattabbaṃ
tika-s0401t:393_6: “aggikkhandhopamādisutte viyā”ti ettha ādisaddeneva saṅgahitattā. Loṇambilasuttepi hi –
tika-s0401t:394_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattaṃ vā nānaccayehi
tika-s0401t:394_1: sūpehi paccupaṭṭhito assa ambilaggehipi tittakaggehipi kaṭukaggehipi madhuraggehipi
tika-s0401t:395_0: “Sa kho so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti
tika-s0401t:395_1: ‘idaṃ vā me ajja bhattasūpeyyaṃ ruccati, imassa vā abhiharati, imassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0401t:395_2: imassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Ambilaggaṃ vā me ajja bhattasūpeyyaṃ ruccati, ambilaggassa
tika-s0401t:395_3: vā abhiharati, ambilaggassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti, ambilaggassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati…pe…
tika-s0401t:395_4: aloṇikassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī’ti. Sa kho so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo
tika-s0401t:395_5: lābhī ceva hoti acchādanassa, lābhī vetanassa, lābhī abhihārānaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu?
tika-s0401t:395_6: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattanimittaṃ uggaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:395_7: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī
tika-s0401t:395_8: viharati…pe… vedanāsu…pe… citte…pe… dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
tika-s0401t:395_9: satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ
tika-s0401t:395_10: samādhiyati, upakkilesā pahīyanti, so taṃ nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:396_0: “Sa kho, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu lābhī ceva hoti diṭṭheva dhamme
tika-s0401t:396_1: sukhavihārānaṃ, lābhī hoti satisampajaññassa. Taṃ kissa hetu? Tathā hi so, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:396_2: paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī”ti –
tika-s0401t:397_0: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā attho vutto. “Suvaṇṇakārasūriyopamādisuttesu
tika-s0401t:397_1: viya cā”ti idañca udāharaṇamattena saṅgahaṃ gacchati suvaṇṇakārasuttādīsu paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0401t:397_2: upamāya adassitattā. Etesu hi suvaṇṇakāropamasutte tāva –
tika-s0401t:398_0: “Adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tīṇi nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasi kātabbāni,
tika-s0401t:398_1: kālena kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ, kālena kālaṃ paggahanimittaṃ manasi
tika-s0401t:398_2: kātabbaṃ, kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ. Sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto
tika-s0401t:398_3: bhikkhu ekantaṃ samādhinimittaṃyeva manasi kareyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya.
tika-s0401t:398_4: Sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṃ paggahanimittaṃyeva manasi kareyya,
tika-s0401t:398_5: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvatteyya. Sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu
tika-s0401t:398_6: ekantaṃ upekkhānimittaṃyeva manasi kareyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na sammā samādhiyeyya
tika-s0401t:398_7: āsavānaṃ khayāya. Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ
tika-s0401t:398_8: samādhinimittaṃ…pe… paggahanimittaṃ…pe… upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karoti, taṃ hoti cittaṃ
tika-s0401t:398_9: muduñca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca, na ca pabhaṅgu, sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya.
tika-s0401t:399_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā ukkaṃ bandheyya, ukkaṃ
tika-s0401t:399_1: bandhitvā ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpeyya, ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpitvā saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0401t:399_2: ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyya, ukkāmukhe pakkhipitvā kālena kālaṃ abhidhamati, kālena kālaṃ
tika-s0401t:399_3: udakena paripphoseti, kālena kālaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Sace, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā
tika-s0401t:399_4: suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ abhidhameyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ daheyya.
tika-s0401t:399_5: Sace, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ udakena
tika-s0401t:399_6: paripphoseyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ nibbāpeyya. Sace, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī
tika-s0401t:399_7: vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ ajjhupekkheyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ na sammā paripākaṃ
tika-s0401t:399_8: gaccheyya. Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ
tika-s0401t:399_9: kālena kālaṃ abhidhamati, kālena kālaṃ udakena paripphoseti, kālena kālaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
tika-s0401t:399_10: taṃ hoti jātarūpaṃ muduñca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca, na ca pabhaṅgu, sammā upeti
tika-s0401t:399_11: kammāya. Yassā yassā ca piḷandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati, yadi paṭṭikāya yadi kuṇḍalāya
tika-s0401t:399_12: yadi gīveyyakena yadi suvaṇṇamālāya, tañcassa atthaṃ anubhoti.
tika-s0401t:400_0: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyuttena bhikkhu…pe… sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ
tika-s0401t:400_1: khayāya. Yassa yassa ca abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
tika-s0401t:400_2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”ti –
tika-s0401t:401: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā tadatantaraṃ upamaṃ vatvā punapi attho evaṃ paṭhamaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ upamaṃ vatvā punapi attho vutto.
tika-s0401t:403_0: “Aniccā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā, adhuvā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā, anassāsikā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:403_1: saṅkhārā, yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ
tika-s0401t:403_2: alaṃ vimuccituṃ. Sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsītiyojanasahassāni āyāmena,
tika-s0401t:403_4: caturāsītiyojanasahassāni mahāsamuddā accuggato. Hoti so kho, bhikkhave, samayo,
tika-s0401t:403_5: yaṃ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni
tika-s0401t:403_6: vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassati, deve kho pana, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:403_7: avassante ye kecime bījagāmabhūtagāmā osadhitiṇavanappatayo, te ussussanti visussanti
tika-s0401t:403_8: na bhavanti. Evaṃ aniccā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā, evaṃ adhuvā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā”tiādinā –
tika-s0401t:404_0: Paṭhamaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ upamaṃ vatvā punapi attho vutto. Atha vā “sūriyassa,
tika-s0401t:404_1: bhikkhave, udayato etaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ etaṃ pubbanimittaṃ, yadidaṃ aruṇuggaṃ. Evameva
tika-s0401t:404_2: kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa uppādāya etaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0401t:404_3: etaṃ pubbanimittaṃ, yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti yadetaṃ saṃyuttanikāye āgataṃ, taṃ
tika-s0401t:404_4: idha sūriyopamasuttanti adhippetaṃ siyā. Tampi “katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā
tika-s0401t:404_5: dassetī”ti iminā na sameti paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ atthaṃ dassetvā puna
tika-s0401t:404_6: upamāya avuttattā. Paṭhamameva hi tattha upamā dassitā, “imasmiṃ pana sālisūkopame
tika-s0401t:404_7: upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassento seyyathāpi, bhikkhaveti ādimāhā”ti. Idampi vacanamasaṅgahitaṃ
tika-s0401t:404_8: vatthasuttassa imassa ca visesābhāvato. Ubhayatthāpi hi paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0401t:404_9: pacchā attho vutto, tasmā evamettha pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ “tatra bhagavā katthaci paṭhamaṃyeva
tika-s0401t:404_10: upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dasseti vatthasutte viya pāricchattakopama- aggikkhandhopamādisuttesu
tika-s0401t:404_11: viya ca, katthaci atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti suvaṇṇakārasattasūriyopamādisuttesu
tika-s0401t:404_12: viya, imasmiṃ pana sālisūkopame paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dassento seyyathāpi,
tika-s0401t:404_13: bhikkhaveti ādimāhā”ti. Aññathā majjhimaṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. Idhāpi ca pubbenāparaṃ
tika-s0401t:404_14: na sameti. Majjhimaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayeneva vā idhāpi pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-s0401t:405_0: Kaṇasadiso sāliphalassa tuṇḍe uppajjanakavālo sālisūkaṃ, tathā yavasūkaṃ. Sūkassa
tika-s0401t:405_1: tanukabhāvato bhedavato bhedo nātimahā hotīti āha – “bhindissati, chaviṃ chindissatīti
tika-s0401t:405_2: attho”ti. Yathā micchāṭhapitasālisūkādi akkantampi hatthādiṃ na bhindati bhindituṃ
tika-s0401t:405_3: ayoggabhāvena ṭhitattā, evaṃ ācayagāmicittaṃ avijjaṃ na bhindati bhindituṃ ayoggabhāvena
tika-s0401t:405_5: aññāṇa”ntiādinā vuttesu dukkhādīsu catūsu saccesu pubbantādīsu catūsu cāti aṭṭhasu
tika-s0401t:405_6: ṭhānesu. Ghanabahalanti cirakālaparibhāvanāya ativiya bahalaṃ. Mahāvisayatāya mahāpaṭipakkhatāya
tika-s0401t:405_7: bahuparivāratāya bahudukkhatāya ca mahatī avijjāti mahāavijjā. Taṃ mahāavijjaṃ. Mahāsaddo
tika-s0401t:405_8: hi bahubhāvatthopi hoti “mahājano”tiādīsu viya. Taṇhāvānato nikkhantabhāvenāti tattha
tika-s0401t:406_0: 42. Dutiye pādeneva avamaddite akkantanti vuccamāne hatthena avamadditaṃ akkantaṃ
tika-s0401t:406_1: viya akkantanti ruḷhī hesāti āha – “akkantanteva vutta”nti. Ariyavohāroti ariyadesavāsīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:406_2: vohāro. Mahantaṃ aggahetvā appamattakasseva gahaṇe payojanaṃ dassetuṃ – “kasmā panā”tiādi
tika-s0401t:406_3: āraddhaṃ. Tena “vivaṭṭūpanissayakusalaṃ nāma yoniso uppāditaṃ appaka”nti na cintetabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:406_4: anukkamena laddhapaccayaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānaṃ khuddakanadī viya pakkhandamahoghā samuddaṃ,
tika-s0401t:406_5: anukkamena nibbānamahāsamuddameva purisaṃ pāpetīti dīpeti. Paccekabodhiṃ buddhabhūminti
tika-s0401t:406_6: ca paccatte upayogavacanaṃ. Vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti yathākkamena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:407_0: 43. Tatiye dosena paduṭṭhacittanti sampayuttadhammānaṃ, yasmiṃ santāne uppajjati,
tika-s0401t:407_1: tassa ca dūsanena visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttasadisena dosena padūsitacittaṃ. Attano cittenāti
tika-s0401t:407_2: attano cetopariyañāṇena sabbaññutaññāṇena vā sahitena cittena. Paricchinditvāti ñāṇena
tika-s0401t:407_3: paricchinditvā. Iṭṭhākārena etīti ayo, sukhaṃ. Sabbaso apeto ayo etassa, etasmāti
tika-s0401t:407_4: vā apāyo, kāyikassa cetasikassa ca dukkhassa gati pavattiṭṭhānanti duggati, kāraṇāvasena
tika-s0401t:407_5: vividhaṃ vikārena ca nipātiyanti etthāti vinipāto, appakopi natthi ayo sukhaṃ etthāti
tika-s0401t:408_0: 44. Catutthe saddhāpasādena pasannanti saddhāsaṅkhātena pasādena pasannaṃ, na indriyānaṃ
tika-s0401t:408_1: avippasannatāya. Sukhassa gatinti sukhassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Sukhamevettha gacchanti,
tika-s0401t:408_2: na dukkhanti vā sugati. Manāpiyarūpāditāya saha aggehīti saggaṃ, lokaṃ.
tika-s0401t:409_0: 45. Pañcame pariḷāhavūpasamakaro rahado etthāti rahado, udakapuṇṇo rahado udakarahado.
tika-s0401t:409_1: Udakaṃ dahati dhāretīti udakadaho. Āviloti kalalabahulatāya ākulo. Tenāha – “avippasanno”ti.
tika-s0401t:409_2: Luḷitoti vātena āloḷito. Tenāha – “aparisaṇṭhito”ti. Vātābhighātena vīcitaraṅgamalasamākulatāya
tika-s0401t:409_3: hi parito na saṇṭhito vā aparisaṇṭhito. Vātābhighātena udakassa ca appabhāvena kalalībhūto
tika-s0401t:409_4: kaddamabhāvappattoti āha – “kaddamībhūto”ti. Sippiyo muttasippiādayo. Sambukā saṅkhasalākavisesā.
tika-s0401t:409_5: Carantampi tiṭṭhantampīti yathālābhavacanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tameva hi yathālābhavacanataṃ
tika-s0401t:410_0: Pariyonaddhenāti paṭicchāditena. Tayidaṃ kāraṇena āvilabhāvassa dassanaṃ. Diṭṭhadhamme
tika-s0401t:410_1: imasmiṃ attabhāve bhavo diṭṭhadhammiko, so pana lokiyopi hoti lokuttaropīti āha –
tika-s0401t:410_3: hi parattha atthoti parattho”ti. Iti dvidhāpi sakasantatipariyāpanno eva gahitoti
tika-s0401t:410_5: dasavidho dhammo. Satthantarakappāvasāneti idaṃ tassa āsannabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:410_6: Yassa kassaci antarakappassāvasāneti veditabbaṃ. Ariyānaṃ yuttanti ariyānaṃ ariyabhāvāya
tika-s0401t:410_7: yuttaṃ, tato eva ariyabhāvaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ. Ñāṇameva ñeyyassa paccakkhakaraṇaṭṭhena
tika-s0401t:410_8: dassananti āha – “ñāṇameva hī”tiādi. Kiṃ pana tanti āha – “dibbacakkhū”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:411_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe acchoti tanuko. Tanubhāvameva hi sandhāya “abahalo”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pasanno
tika-s0401t:411_1: nāma accho na bahalo, tasmā “pasannotipi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Vippasannoti visesena
tika-s0401t:411_2: pasanno. So pana sammā pasanno nāma hotīti āha – “suṭṭhu pasanno”ti. Anāviloti akaluso.
tika-s0401t:411_4: Sevālanti kaṇṇikasevālaṃ. Paṇakanti udakamalaṃ. Cittassa āvilabhāvo nīvaraṇahetukoti
tika-s0401t:412_0: 47. Sattame rukkhajātānīti ettha jātasaddena padavaḍḍhanameva kataṃ yathā “kosajāta”nti
tika-s0401t:412_1: āha – “rukkhānamevetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Koci hi rukkho vaṇṇena aggo hoti yathā taṃ
tika-s0401t:412_2: rattacandanādi. Koci gandhena yathā taṃ gosītacandanaṃ. Koci rasena khadirādi. Koci
tika-s0401t:412_3: thaddhatāya campakādi. Maggaphalāvahatāya vipassanāvasena bhāvitampi gahitaṃ. “Tattha
tika-s0401t:413_0: 48. Aṭṭhame cittassa parivattanaṃ uppādanirodhā evāti āha – “evaṃ lahuṃ uppajjitvā
tika-s0401t:413_2: attho. Tenāha – “ativiya na sukarā”ti. Cakkhuviññāṇampi adhippetamevāti sabbassapi
tika-s0401t:413_3: cittassa samānakhaṇattā vuttaṃ. Cittassa ativiya lahuparivattibhāvaṃ theravādena
tika-s0401t:413_4: dīpetuṃ – “imasmiṃ panatthe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cittasaṅkhārāti sasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ vadati.
tika-s0401t:413_5: Vāhasatānaṃ kho, mahārāja, vīhīnanti potthakesu likhanti, “vāhasataṃ kho, mahārāja,
tika-s0401t:413_6: vīhīna”nti pana pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ. Milindapañhepi hi katthaci ayameva pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0401t:413_7: “Vāhasatāna”nti vā paccatte sāmivacanaṃ byattayena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aḍḍhacūḷanti
tika-s0401t:413_8: thokena ūnaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ. Kassa pana upaḍḍhanti? Adhikārato vāhassāti viññāyati. “Aḍḍhacuddasa”nti
tika-s0401t:413_9: keci. “Aḍḍhacatuttha”nti apare. Sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍhasataṃ vāhāti daḷhaṃ katvā vadanti,
tika-s0401t:413_10: vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Catunāḷiko tumbo. Pucchāya abhāvenāti “sakkā pana, bhante, upamaṃ
tika-s0401t:413_11: kātu”nti evaṃ pavattāya pucchāya abhāvena na katā upamā. Dhammadesanāpariyosāneti
tika-s0401t:414_1: parisuddha”nti. Pabhassaratādayo nāma vaṇṇadhātuyaṃ labbhanakavisesāti āha – “kiṃ
tika-s0401t:414_2: pana cittassa vaṇṇo nāma atthī”ti? Itaro arūpatāya “natthī”ti paṭikkhipitvā pariyāyakathā
tika-s0401t:414_4: Tathā hi “so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “idampi
tika-s0401t:414_5: nirupakkilesatāya parisuddhanti pabhassara”nti. Kiṃ pana bhavaṅgacittaṃ nirupakkilesanti?
tika-s0401t:414_6: Āma sabhāvato nirupakkilesaṃ, āgantukaupakkilesavasena pana siyā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0401t:414_7: – “tañca kho”tiādi. Tattha attano tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ paccakkhabhāvato pubbe “ida”nti
tika-s0401t:414_8: vatvā idāni paccāmasanavasena “ta”nti āha. Ca-saddo atthūpanayane. Kho-saddo vacanālaṅkāre,
tika-s0401t:414_9: avadhāraṇe vā. Vakkhamānassa atthassa nicchitabhāvato bhavaṅgacittena sahāvaṭṭhānābhāvato
tika-s0401t:414_10: upakkilesānaṃ āgantukatāti āha – “asahajātehī”tiādi. Rāgādayo upecca cittasantānaṃ
tika-s0401t:414_11: kilissanti vibādhenti upatāpenti cāti āha – “upakkilesehīti rāgādīhī”ti. Bhavaṅgacittassa
tika-s0401t:414_12: nippariyāyato upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhatā nāma natthi asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvato, ekasantatipariyāpannatāya
tika-s0401t:414_13: pana siyā upakkiliṭṭhatāpariyāyoti āha – “upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāmāti vuccatī”ti. Idāni
tika-s0401t:414_14: tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Tena bhinnasantānagatāyapi nāma
tika-s0401t:414_15: iriyāya loke gārayhatā dissati, pageva ekasantānagatāya iriyāyāti imaṃ visesaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:415_0: 50. Dasame bhavaṅgacittameva cittanti “pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:415_1: bhavaṅgacittameva. Yadaggena bhavaṅgacittaṃ tādisapaccayasamavāye upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāma
tika-s0401t:415_2: vuccati, tadaggena tabbidhurapaccayasamavāye upakkilesato vimuttanti vuccati. Tenāha
tika-s0401t:415_3: – “upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ nāma hotī”ti. Sesamettha navamasutte vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:418_0: 51. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame assutavāti ettha “sādhu paññāṇavā naro”tiādīsu atthitāmattassa
tika-s0401t:418_1: bodhako vā-saddo. “Sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo”tiādīsu pasaṃsāvisiṭṭhāya atthitāya.
tika-s0401t:418_3: atthitāya, tasmā yassa pasatthaṃ atisayena vā sutaṃ atthi, so sutavā, saṃkilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:418_4: pariyattidhammassavanaṃ, taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca “sutavā”ti iminā padena
tika-s0401t:418_5: pakāsitā. Sotabbayuttaṃ sutvā kattabbanipphattivasena suṇīti vā sutavā, tappaṭikkhepena
tika-s0401t:419_0: Ayañhi akāro “ahetukā dhammā, abhikkhuko āvāso”tiādīsu taṃsamāyoganivattiyaṃ diṭṭho.
tika-s0401t:419_2: apaccayuppannattā ataṃsambandhitā ettha jotitā. “Anidassanā dhammā”ti taṃsabhāvanivattiyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:419_3: Nidassanañhi ettha daṭṭhabbatā. Atha vā passatīti nidassanaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Taggahetabbatānivattiyaṃ,
tika-s0401t:419_4: tathā “anāsavā dhammā”ti. “Appaṭighā dhammā anārammaṇā dhammā”ti taṃkiccanivattiyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:419_5: “Arūpino dhammā acetasikādhammā”ti taṃsabhāvanivattiyaṃ. Tadaññatā hi idha pakāsitā.
tika-s0401t:419_7: Sadisatā hi ettha sūcitā. “Assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño”ti
tika-s0401t:419_8: ca taṃsambhāvanīyaguṇanivattiyaṃ. Garahā hi idha ñāyati. “Kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ anudarā
tika-s0401t:419_11: kālavinimuttassa ca vijjamānattā uppannānukūlatā, pageva paccuppannānanti tabbidhuratā
tika-s0401t:419_13: pakāsitanti evaṃ anekesaṃ atthānaṃ jotako. Idha pana “arūpino dhammā, acetasikā dhammā”tiādīsu
tika-s0401t:419_14: viya taṃsabhāvanivattiyaṃ daṭṭhabbo, aññattheti attho. Etenassa sutādiñāṇavirahaṃ
tika-s0401t:419_15: dasseti. Tena vuttaṃ – “āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā itī”ti.
tika-s0401t:420_0: Idāni tassatthaṃ vivaranto “yo hī”tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā khandhadhātādikosallenapi
tika-s0401t:420_2: nu kho, bhante, bahussuto hoti? Yato kho, bhikkhu, khandhakusalo hoti. Dhātu…pe…
tika-s0401t:420_3: āyatana…pe… paṭiccasamuppādakusalo hoti. Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhu, bahussuto hotī”ti.
tika-s0401t:420_5: vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Atthaparipucchanaṃ puripucchā. Kusalehi saha codanāpariharaṇavasena
tika-s0401t:420_6: vinicchayakaraṇaṃ vinicchayo. Ācariye pana payirupāsitvā atthadhammānaṃ āgamanaṃ
tika-s0401t:420_7: sutamayañāṇavasena avabujjhanaṃ āgamo. Maggaphalanibbānānaṃ sacchikiriyā adhigamo.
tika-s0401t:421_0: Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ avihatattā tā janenti, tāhi vā janitāti
tika-s0401t:421_1: puthujjanā. Avighātameva vā jana-saddo vadati. Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti ettha
tika-s0401t:421_2: puthū janā satthupaṭiññā etesanti puthujjanā. Sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti ettha janetabbā,
tika-s0401t:421_3: jāyanti vā ettha sattāti janā, gatiyo, tā puthū etesanti puthujjanā. Ito pare jāyanti
tika-s0401t:421_4: etehīti janā, abhisaṅkhārādayo, te etesaṃ puthū vijjantīti puthujjanā. Abhisaṅkhārādiattho
tika-s0401t:421_5: eva vā jana-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Oghā kāmoghādayo. Rāgaggiādayo santāpā. Te eva sabbepi
tika-s0401t:421_6: vā kilesā pariḷāhā. Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattāti ettha jāyatīti jano, rāgo gedhoti
tika-s0401t:421_7: evamādiko, puthu jano etesanti puthujjanā. Puthūsu janā jātā rattāti evaṃ rāgādiattho
tika-s0401t:422_0: Rattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakarena chandarāgena rattā sārattā.
tika-s0401t:422_1: Giddhāti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā. Gadhitāti ganthitā
tika-s0401t:422_2: viya dummocanīyabhāvena tattha paṭibaddhā. Mucchitāti kilesavasena visaññibhūtā viya
tika-s0401t:422_3: anaññakiccā mohamāpannā. Ajjhopannāti anaññasādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā
tika-s0401t:422_4: ṭhitā. Laggāti vaṅkakaṇṭake viya āsattā, mahāpalipe yāva nāsikaggā palipannapuriso
tika-s0401t:422_5: viya uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena nimuggā. Laggitāti makkaṭālepe ālaggabhāvena sammasito
tika-s0401t:422_6: viya makkaṭo pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena ālaggitā. Palibuddhāti sambaddhā, upaddutā
tika-s0401t:422_7: vā. Āvutāti āvaritā. Nivutāti nivāritā. Ovutāti paliguṇṭhitā, pariyonaddhā vā. Pihitāti
tika-s0401t:423_0: “Assutavā”ti etena avijjandhatā vuttāti āha – “andhaputhujjano vutto”ti. Cittaṭṭhiti
tika-s0401t:423_1: cittapariggaho natthīti yāya paṭipattiyā cittassa upakkilesaṃ tato vippamuttiñca
tika-s0401t:423_2: yathāsabhāvato jāneyya, sā cittabhāvanā cittaṭṭhiti. Ekārammaṇe suṭṭhu samādhānavasena
tika-s0401t:423_3: avaṭṭhitiṃ pādakaṃ katvā pavattitā sampayuttadhammehi nissayārammaṇehi ca saddhiṃ
tika-s0401t:423_4: cittassa pariggahasaññitā vipassanābhāvanāpi natthi, yāya vuttamatthaṃ yathāsabhāvato jāneyya.
tika-s0401t:424_0: 52. Dutiye sutavāti padassa attho anantarasutte vuttoyeva. Ariyasāvakoti ettha catukkaṃ
tika-s0401t:424_1: sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ – “atthi ariyo”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Paccekaṃ saccāni buddhavantoti
tika-s0401t:424_2: paccekabuddhā. Nanu sabbepi ariyā paccekameva saccāni paṭivijjhanti dhammassa paccattavedanīyabhāvato?
tika-s0401t:424_3: Nayidamīdisaṃ paṭivedhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathā pana sāvakā aññesaṃ nissayena saccāni
tika-s0401t:424_4: paṭivijjhanti paratoghosena vinā tesaṃ dassanamaggassa anuppajjanato. Yathā ca sammāsambuddhā
tika-s0401t:424_5: aññesaṃ nissayabhāvena saccāni abhisambujjhanti, na evamete, ete pana aparaneyyā
tika-s0401t:424_6: hutvā aparanāyakabhāvena saccāni paṭivijjhanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “paccekaṃ saccāni buddhavantoti paccekabuddhā”ti.
tika-s0401t:425_0: Atthi sāvako na ariyoti ettha pothujjanikāya saddhāya ratanattaye abhippasanno saddhopi
tika-s0401t:425_1: gahito eva. Gihī anāgataphaloti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāvuttapuggalo
tika-s0401t:425_2: hi saraṇagamanato paṭṭhāya sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannoicceva vattabbataṃ
tika-s0401t:425_3: labhati. Svāyamattho dakkhiṇāvisuddhisuttena dīpetabbo. Sutavāti ettha vuttaattho
tika-s0401t:425_4: nāma attahitaparahitappaṭipatti, tassa vasena sutasampanno. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:425_5: “so ca hoti sutena upapanno, appampi ce sahitaṃ bhāsamāno”ti ca ādi. Ariyasāvakoti
tika-s0401t:425_6: veditabboti ariyassa bhagavato dhammassavanakicce yuttappayuttabhāvato vuttaṃ. Upakkilesehi
tika-s0401t:425_7: vippamutti anupakkiliṭṭhatā, tassā yathāsabhāvajānanaṃ daḷhatarāya eva cittabhāvanāya
tika-s0401t:425_8: sati hoti, na aññathāti “balavavipassanā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:426_1: Taṃdesanāhetukañhi ekaccānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ micchāpaṭipattiṃ nimittaṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ
tika-s0401t:426_2: suttaṃ desesi. Avijahitameva hoti sabbakālaṃ suppatiṭṭhitasatisampajaññattā. Yasmā
tika-s0401t:426_3: buddhānaṃ rūpakāyo bāhirabbhantarehi malehi anupakkiliṭṭho sudhotajātimaṇisadiso,
tika-s0401t:426_5: vītināmetvā. Kālaparicchedavasena vivittāsane vītināmanaṃ vivekaninnatāya ceva paresaṃ
tika-s0401t:426_7: Kadāci ekakassa, kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa, kadāci pakatiyā, kadāci pāṭihāriyehi
tika-s0401t:426_8: vattamānehi ca gāmappaveso tathā tathā vinetabbapuggalavasena. Upasaṃharitvāti himavantādīsu
tika-s0401t:426_9: pupphitarukkhādito ānetvā. Oṇatuṇṇatāya bhūmiyā satthu padanikkhepasamaye samabhāvāpatti,
tika-s0401t:427_0: Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatteti idaṃ yāvadeva veneyyajanavinayatthāya satthu pāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0401t:427_1: pavattanti katvā vuttaṃ. Dakkhiṇapādeti idaṃ buddhānaṃ sabbapadakkhiṇatāya. “Chabbaṇṇarasmiyo”ti
tika-s0401t:427_2: vatvāpi “suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni viyā”ti idaṃ buddhānaṃ sarīre pītābhāya yebhuyyatāya
tika-s0401t:427_3: vuttaṃ. Madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti daṭṭhabbasārassa diṭṭhatāya. Bheriādīnaṃ pana
tika-s0401t:427_4: saddāyanaṃ dhammatāva. Paṭimānentīti “sudullabhaṃ idaṃ ajja amhehi labbhati, ye mayaṃ
tika-s0401t:427_5: īdisena paṇītena āhārena bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahāmā”ti patītamānasā mānenti pūjenti.
tika-s0401t:427_6: Tesaṃ santānāni oloketvāti tesaṃ tathā upaṭṭhākānaṃ puggalānaṃ atīte etarahi ca pavattacittasantānāni
tika-s0401t:427_7: oloketvā. Arahatte patiṭṭhahantīti sambandho. Tatthāti vihāre. Gandhamaṇḍalamāḷeti
tika-s0401t:428_1: guṇā dullabhāti attho. Cātumahārājika…pe… vasavattibhavanaṃ gacchantīti idaṃ tattha
tika-s0401t:428_2: suññavimānāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā pacchābhattaṃ tayo bhāge
tika-s0401t:428_3: katvā paṭhamabhāge sace ākaṅkhati, dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Sace ākaṅkhati,
tika-s0401t:428_4: buddhāciṇṇaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Atha yathākālaparicchedaṃ tato vuṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0401t:428_5: dutiyabhāge pacchimayāme tatiyakoṭṭhāse viya lokaṃ voloketi veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ
tika-s0401t:429_0: Kālayuttanti pattakallaṃ, “imissā velāya imassa evaṃ vattabba”nti taṃkālānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0401t:429_1: Samayayuttanti tasseva vevacanaṃ, aṭṭhuppattianurūpaṃ vā. Samayayuttanti vā ariyasamayasaṃyuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:429_2: Desakālānurūpameva hi buddhā bhagavanto dhammaṃ desenti, desentā ca ariyasammataṃ
tika-s0401t:429_3: paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ dīpentāva desenti. Atha vā samayayuttanti hetūdāharaṇasahitaṃ.
tika-s0401t:429_4: Kālena sāpadesañhi bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti, kālaṃ viditvā parisaṃ uyyojeti, na yāva
tika-s0401t:430_0: Utuṃ gaṇhāpeti, na pana malaṃ pakkhāletīti adhippāyo. Na hi bhagavato kāye rajojallaṃ
tika-s0401t:430_1: upalimpatīti. Tato tatoti attano attano divāṭṭhānādito. Okāsaṃ labhamānāti purebhattapacchābhattapurimayāmesu
tika-s0401t:430_2: okāsaṃ alabhitvā idāni majjhimayāme okāsaṃ labhamānā, bhagavatā vā katokāsatāya okāsaṃ
tika-s0401t:430_3: labhamānā. Pacchābhattassa tīsu bhāgesu paṭhamabhāge sīhaseyyakappanaṃ ekantikaṃ
tika-s0401t:430_4: na hotīti āha – “purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāpīḷitassa sarīrassā”ti. Teneva hi tattha
tika-s0401t:430_5: “sace ākaṅkhatī”ti tadā sīhaseyyakappanassa anibaddhatā vibhāvitā. Kilāsubhāvo parissamo.
tika-s0401t:430_6: Sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthanti yojetabbaṃ. Buddhacakkhunā
tika-s0401t:430_7: lokaṃ voloketīti idaṃ pacchimayāme bhagavato bahulaṃ āciṇṇavasena vuttaṃ. Appekadā
tika-s0401t:430_8: avasiṭṭhabalañāṇehi sabbaññutaññāṇeneva ca bhagavā tamatthaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0401t:431_0: Imasmiṃyeva kicceti pacchimayāmakicce. Balavatā paccanutāpena saṃvaḍḍhamānena karajakāye
tika-s0401t:431_1: mahāpariḷāho uppajjatīti āha – “nāmakāye santatte karajakāyo santatto”ti. Nidhānagatanti
tika-s0401t:431_2: sannicitalohitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchīti lohitaṃ uṇhaṃ
tika-s0401t:431_3: hutvā mukhato uggañchi. Ṭhānanti bhikkhupaṭiññaṃ. Taṃ pāpaṃ vaḍḍhamānanti bhikkhupaṭiññāya
tika-s0401t:431_4: avijahitattā tathā pavaḍḍhamānapāpaṃ. Antimavatthuajjhāpannānampi upāyena pavattiyamāno
tika-s0401t:431_5: yonisomanasikāro sātthako hotiyevāti dassento “jātasaṃvegā”tiādimāha. Aho sallekhitanti
tika-s0401t:431_6: aho ativiya sallekhena itaṃ pavattaṃ. Kāsāvapajjototi bhikkhūnaṃ bahubhāvato ito
tika-s0401t:431_7: cito ca vicarantānaṃ tesaṃ kāsāvajutiyā pajjotito. Isivātaparivātoti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:431_8: nibbānassa ca esanato isīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ guṇagandhena ceva guṇagandhavāsitena sarīragandhena
tika-s0401t:432_0: Dhammasaṃvego uppajji anāvajjanena pubbe tassa atthassa asaṃviditattā. Dhammasaṃvegoti
tika-s0401t:432_1: ca tādise atthe dhammatāvasena uppajjanakaṃ sahottappañāṇaṃ. Assāsaṭṭhānanti cittassāsakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:432_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbesaṃ kiccānaṃ pubbabhāgo sabbapubbabhāgo. “Sabbe sattā averā hontū”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:432_3: hi cittassa paṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ hitapharaṇaṃ. Itaraṃ ito thokaṃ mahantanti katvā
tika-s0401t:432_5: akkhinimisakālo, yo ekassa akkharassa uccāraṇakkhaṇo. Tenāha – “dve aṅguliyo paharitvā
tika-s0401t:432_6: saddakaraṇamatta”nti. Sabbasattānaṃ hitapharaṇacittanti sabbesampi sattānaṃ sammadeva
tika-s0401t:432_7: hitesitavasena pavattacittaṃ. Āvajjento āsevatīti hitesitavasena āvajjento. Āvajjanena
tika-s0401t:432_8: ābhujantopi āsevati nāma ñāṇavippayuttena. Jānantoti tathā ñāṇamattaṃ uppādentopi.
tika-s0401t:432_9: Passantoti tathā ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato viya vipassantopi. Paccavekkhantoti tamatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:432_10: pati pati avekkhantopi. Saddhāya adhimuccantotiādi pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:432_11: Abhiññeyyantiādi catusaccavasena vuttaṃ. Sabbameva cetaṃ vitthārato, sāmaññena āsevanadassanamevāti
tika-s0401t:433_0: Arittajjhānoti avirahitajjhāno. Atucchajjhānoti jhānena atuccho. Cāgo vā vevacananti
tika-s0401t:433_1: āha – “apariccattajjhāno”ti. Viharatīti padassa vibhaṅge āgatanayena atthaṃ dassento
tika-s0401t:433_2: “viharatīti iriyatī”tiādimāha. Ayaṃ panettha saddattho – viharatīti ettha vi-saddo
tika-s0401t:433_3: vicchedatthajotano. Haratīti neti, pavattetīti attho, vicchinditvā harati viharatīti
tika-s0401t:433_4: vuttaṃ hoti. So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ
tika-s0401t:433_5: attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti, tasmā “viharatī”ti vuccati. Iriyatīti ṭhānanisajjādikiriyaṃ
tika-s0401t:433_6: karonto pavattati. Pavattatīti ṭhānādisamaṅgī hutvā pavattati. Pāletīti ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ
tika-s0401t:433_7: iriyāpathantarehi rakkhanto pāleti. Yapeti yāpetīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ekañhi iriyāpathabādhanaṃ
tika-s0401t:433_8: aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ pālento yapeti yāpetīti
tika-s0401t:433_9: vuccati. Caratīti ṭhānanisajjādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī hutvā pavattati. Iminā padenāti
tika-s0401t:434_0: Iriyāpathavihāroti ettha iriyanaṃ pavattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo kāyikakiriyā. Tassā
tika-s0401t:434_1: pavattanūpāyabhāvato iriyāya patho iriyāpatho, ṭhānanisajjādi. Na hi ṭhānanisajjādīhi
tika-s0401t:434_2: avatthāhi vinā kiñci kāyikakiriyaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkā. Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci
tika-s0401t:434_3: kareyya, gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro, iriyāpathova
tika-s0401t:434_4: vihāro iriyāpathavihāro, so ca atthato ṭhānanisajjādiākārappavatto catusantatirūpappabandho
tika-s0401t:434_5: eva. Ovādānusāsanīnaṃ ekānekavārādivisiṭṭhoyeva bhedo, na pana paramatthato tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:434_6: nānākaraṇanti dassetuṃ – “paramatthato panā”tiādimāha. Tattha ese eke ekaṭṭhetiādīsu
tika-s0401t:435_0: Raṭṭhassa, raṭṭhato vā laddho piṇḍo raṭṭhapiṇḍo. Tenāha – “ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:435_2: parivaṭṭo, ñātiyeva parivaṭṭo ñātiparivaṭṭo. Theyyaparibhogo nāma anarahassa paribhogo.
tika-s0401t:435_3: Bhagavatā hi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā, na dussīlassa. Dāyakānampi
tika-s0401t:435_4: sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato.
tika-s0401t:435_5: Iti satthārā ananuññātattā dāyakehi ca apariccattattā saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-s0401t:435_6: dussīlassa paribhogo theyyāya paribhogo theyyaparibhogo. Iṇavasena paribhogo iṇaparibhogo
tika-s0401t:435_7: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho.
tika-s0401t:436_0: Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā, puttānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tesaṃ bhāvo
tika-s0401t:436_1: dāyajjaṃ, dāyajjavasena paribhogo dāyajjaparibhogo, puttabhāvena paribhogoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:436_2: hoti. Sekkhā hi bhikkhū bhagavato orasaputtā, te pitu santakānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te
tika-s0401t:436_3: paccaye paribhuñjanti. Kiṃ pana te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti, udāhu gihīnanti?
tika-s0401t:436_4: Gihīhi dinnāpi bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-s0401t:436_5: paribhogābhāvato, anuññātesuyeva ca paribhogasambhavato. Dhammadāyādasuttañcettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0401t:437_0: Vītarāgā eva taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantīti āha – “khīṇāsavassa
tika-s0401t:437_1: paribhogo sāmiparibhogo nāmā”ti. Avītarāgānañhi taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge
tika-s0401t:437_2: sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruciparibhogasambhavato.
tika-s0401t:437_3: Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena, appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena, tadubhayampi
tika-s0401t:437_4: vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti, dāyakānañca manorathaṃ pūrenti.
tika-s0401t:437_5: Yo panāyaṃ sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo, so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo
tika-s0401t:437_6: nāma hoti. Yathā hi iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitaṃ desaṃ gantuṃ na labhati, evaṃ
tika-s0401t:437_7: iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo
tika-s0401t:437_9: paribhogoti veditabbo. So idha visuṃ na vutto, dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0401t:437_10: Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā “sekho”tveva vuccati. Imesu paribhogesu
tika-s0401t:437_11: sāmiparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo ca ariyānaṃ puthujjanānañca vaṭṭati, iṇaparibhogo
tika-s0401t:437_12: na vaṭṭati. Theyyaparibhoge kathāyeva natthi. Kathaṃ panettha sāmiparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo
tika-s0401t:437_13: ca puthujjanānaṃ sambhavati? Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassapi sallekhappaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:437_14: ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so sāmiparibhogo
tika-s0401t:437_15: viya hoti. Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti dāyakānaṃ
tika-s0401t:437_16: manorathassa avirādhanato. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge vattabbameva natthi tassa
tika-s0401t:438_0: Imassa bhikkhunoti accharāsaṅghātamattampi kālaṃ mettacittaṃ āsevantassa bhikkhuno.
tika-s0401t:438_1: Amogho raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogoti “ayaṃ pabbajito samaṇo bhikkhūti āmisaṃ dentānaṃ tāya
tika-s0401t:438_2: mettāsevanāya attano santāne dosamalassa vā tadekaṭṭhānañca pāpadhammānaṃ pabbājanato
tika-s0401t:438_3: vūpasamanato saṃsāre ca bhayassa sammāva ikkhaṇato ajjhāsayassa avisaṃvādanenassa
tika-s0401t:438_4: amogho raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogo. Mahaṭṭhiyanti mahatthikaṃ mahāpayojanaṃ. Mahapphalanti
tika-s0401t:438_5: vipulapphalaṃ. Mahānisaṃsanti mahānissandapphalaṃ. Mahājutikanti mahānubhāvaṃ. Mahāvipphāranti
tika-s0401t:438_6: mahāvitthāraṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ mettāsevanāya tassa bhikkhuno sāmiādibhāvena
tika-s0401t:438_7: raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogārahatā, dutiyaṃ parehi dinnassa dānassa mahaṭṭhiyabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:438_8: Ko pana vādoti mettāya āsevanamattampi evaṃmahānubhāvaṃ, ko pana vādo bahulīkāre,
tika-s0401t:439: 54. Catutthe uppādeti vaḍḍhetīti ettha bhāvanāsaddassa uppādanavaḍḍhanatthatā pubbe vuttā eva.
tika-s0401t:440_0: 55. Pañcame imesu dvīsūti catutthapañcamesu. “Tatiye vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti
tika-s0401t:440_1: vatvā tathā veditabbataṃ dassetuṃ – “yo hi āsevatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena āsevanābhāvanāmanasikārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:440_2: atthavisesābhāvamāha. Yadi evaṃ suttantassa desanā kathanti āha – “sammāsambuddho
tika-s0401t:440_3: panā”tiādi. Yāya dhammadhātuyāti sabbaññutaññāṇamāha. Tena hi dhammānaṃ ākārabhedaṃ
tika-s0401t:440_4: ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ ekampi dhammaṃ tathā vibhajitvā bhagavā dasseti. Tīhi koṭṭhāsehīti
tika-s0401t:440_5: āsevanābhāvanāmanasikārabhāgehi. Mettā hi sabbavatthuno mettāyanavasena ānītā sevanā
tika-s0401t:440_6: āsevanā, tassā vaḍḍhanā bhāvanā, avissajjetvā manasi ṭhapanaṃ manasikāro.
tika-s0401t:441_0: 56. Chaṭṭhe aniyamitavacanaṃ “ime nāmā”ti niyametvā avuttattā. Niyamitavacanaṃ “akusalā”ti
tika-s0401t:441_1: sarūpeneva vuttattā. Asesato pariyādinnā honti appakassapi akusalabhāgassa aggahitassa
tika-s0401t:441_2: abhāvato. Akusalaṃ bhajantīti akusalabhāgiyā. Akusalapakkhe bhavāti akusalapakkhikā.
tika-s0401t:441_3: Tenāha – “akusalāyevā”tiādi. Paṭhamataraṃ gacchatīti paṭhamataraṃ pavattati, paṭhamo
tika-s0401t:441_4: padhāno hutvā vattatīti attho. Ekuppādādivasena hi ekajjhaṃ pavattamānesu catūsu
tika-s0401t:441_5: arūpakkhandhesu ayameva paṭhamaṃ uppajjatīti idaṃ natthi, lokuttaramaggesu viya pana
tika-s0401t:441_6: paññindriyassa, lokiyadhammesu manindriyassa puretarassa bhāvo sātisayoti “sabbete
tika-s0401t:441_7: manopubbaṅgamā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi abhidhammepi “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ
tika-s0401t:441_8: cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ katvā desanā pavattā. Suttesupi
tika-s0401t:441_9: vuttaṃ – “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, chadvārādhipati rājā”ti. Tenāha – “ete hī”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:441_10: Tesaṃ mano uppādakoti ca yadaggena mano sampayuttadhammānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā pavattati,
tika-s0401t:441_11: tadaggena te attānaṃ anuvattāpento te tathā uppādento nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:441_12: pana cittassa jeṭṭhakabhāvameva sandhāya rājagamanaññāyena sahuppattipi paṭhamuppatti
tika-s0401t:441_13: viya katvā vuttāti ayamattho dassito. Anvadevāti eteneva cittassa khaṇavasena paṭhamuppattiyā
tika-s0401t:442: 57. Sattame catubhūmakāpi kusalā dhammā kathitāti “ye keci kusalā dhammā”ti anavasesapariyādānato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:443_0: 58. Aṭṭhame idanti liṅgavipallāsena niddeso, nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ “yadida”ntiādīsu
tika-s0401t:443_1: viyāti āha – “ayaṃ pamādoti attho”ti. Pamajjanākāroti pamādāpatti. Cittassa vossaggoti
tika-s0401t:443_2: imesu ettakesu ṭhānesu satiyā aniggaṇhitvā cittassa vossajjanaṃ sativiraho. Vossaggānuppadānanti
tika-s0401t:443_3: vossaggassa anu anu padānaṃ punappunaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Asakkaccakiriyatāti etesaṃ dānādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:443_4: kusaladhammānaṃ pavattane puggalassa vā deyyadhammassa vā asakkaccakiriyā. Satatabhāvo
tika-s0401t:443_5: sātaccaṃ, sātaccena kiriyā sātaccakiriyā, sāyeva sātaccakiriyatā, na sātaccakiriyatā
tika-s0401t:443_6: asātaccakiriyatā. Anaṭṭhitakiriyatāti aniṭṭhitakiriyatā nirantaraṃ na anuṭṭhitakiriyatā
tika-s0401t:443_7: ca. Olīnavuttitāti nirantarakaraṇasaṅkhātassa vipphārassa abhāvena olīnavuttitā.
tika-s0401t:443_9: vīriyadhurassa oropanaṃ, osakkitamānasatāti attho. Anadhiṭṭhānanti kusalakaraṇe appatiṭṭhitabhāvo.
tika-s0401t:443_10: Ananuyogoti ananuyuñjanaṃ. Kusaladhammesu āsevanādīnaṃ abhāvo anāsevanādayo. Pamādoti
tika-s0401t:443_11: sarūpaniddeso. Pamajjanāti ākāraniddeso. Pamajjitattanti bhāvaniddeso. Parihāyantīti
tika-s0401t:443_12: iminā pamādassa sāvajjataṃ dasseti. Tayidaṃ lokiyānaṃ vasena, na lokuttarānanti āha
tika-s0401t:444_0: 59. Navame na pamajjati etenāti appamādo, pamādassa paṭipakkho satiyā avippavāso.
tika-s0401t:444_1: Atthato niccaṃ upaṭṭhitāya satiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. Pamādo pana satiyā satisampajaññassa
tika-s0401t:444_2: vā paṭipakkhabhūto akusalacittuppādo daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha – “pamādassa paṭipakkhavasena
tika-s0401t:445: 60. Dasame kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā, tassa bhāvo kosajjaṃ, ālasiyanti attho.
tika-s0401t:448_0: 61. Sattamassa paṭhame vīrānaṃ kammanti vīriyaṃ, vidhinā vā īrayitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0401t:448_1: vīriyaṃ, tadeva kusalakiriyāya padhānaṭṭhena ārambho vīriyārambho. Āraddhavīriyatā
tika-s0401t:449_0: 62. Dutiye mahatī icchā etassāti mahiccho, tassa bhāvo mahicchatā. Mahāvisayo lobho
tika-s0401t:449_1: mahālobho mahantānaṃ vatthūnaṃ bahūnañca abhigijjhanato. Itarītarātiādinā pabbajitānaṃ
tika-s0401t:449_2: uppajjanamahicchatā vuttā. Pañcahi kāmaguṇehītiādi gahaṭṭhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Icchāti
tika-s0401t:449_3: sabhāvaniddeso. Icchāgatāti icchāpavattā. Mahicchatāti mahāicchatā. Atthato panāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:450_0: 63. Tatiye appicchassāti ettha appa-saddo abhāvattho “appābādho hoti appātaṅko”tiādīsu
tika-s0401t:450_1: viyāti āha – “anicchassā”ti. Loke pākaṭassa hi akkhirogakucchirogādibhedassa ābādhassa
tika-s0401t:450_2: abhāvaṃ sandhāya “appābādho”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “ettha
tika-s0401t:450_3: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viya parittakepi appasaddassa dissamānattā.
tika-s0401t:450_4: Attho pana niravaseso sabbaso paccayicchāya abhāvassa adhippetattā. Tenāha – “na hī”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:451_0: Icchāya abhāveneva appiccho nāma hotīti imamatthaṃ pakārantarena dīpetuṃ – “apicā”tiādi
tika-s0401t:451_1: vuttaṃ. Atricchatā nāma atra atra icchā. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatāya pāpā lāmikā nihīnā
tika-s0401t:451_2: icchā pāpicchatā. Yāya paccayuppādanatthaṃ attani vijjamānaguṇe sambhāveti, paccayānaṃ
tika-s0401t:451_3: paṭiggahaṇe ca na mattaṃ jānāti, ayaṃ mahicchatā. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatāti attani
tika-s0401t:451_4: avijjamānānaṃ guṇānaṃ vijjamānānaṃ viya paresaṃ pakāsanā. Santaguṇasambhāvanatāti
tika-s0401t:451_5: icchācāre ṭhatvā attani vijjamānasīladhutadhammādiguṇavibhāvanā. Tādisassapi paṭiggahaṇe
tika-s0401t:451_6: amattaññutāpi hoti, sāpi abhidhamme āgatāyevāti sambandho. Dussantappayoti duttappayo.
tika-s0401t:452_0: Atilūkhabhāvanti pattacīvaravasena ativiya lūkhabhāvaṃ. Tadassa disvā manussā “ayaṃ
tika-s0401t:452_1: amaṅgaladivaso, sumbhakasiniddhapattacīvaro ayyo pubbaṅgamo kātabbo”ti cintetvā,
tika-s0401t:452_2: “bhante, thokaṃ bahi hothā”ti āhaṃsu. Ummujjīti manussānaṃ ajānantānaṃyeva pathaviyaṃ
tika-s0401t:452_3: nimujjitvā gaṇhantoyeva ummujji. Yadi thero “khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ jānantū”ti iccheyya,
tika-s0401t:452_4: na naṃ manussā “bahi hothā”ti vadeyyuṃ, khīṇāsavānaṃ pana tathācittameva na uppajjeyya.
tika-s0401t:453_0: Appicchatāpadhānaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ catubbidhaicchāpabhedaṃ dassetvā punapi puggalādhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0401t:453_1: catubbidhaṃ icchābhedaṃ dassento “aparopi catubbidho appiccho”tiādimāha. Paccayaappicchoti
tika-s0401t:453_2: paccayesu icchārahito. Dhutaṅgaappicchoti dhutaguṇasambhāvanāya icchārahito. Pariyattiappicchoti
tika-s0401t:453_4: Dāyakassa vasanti appaṃ vā yaṃ dātukāmo bahuṃ vāti dāyakassa cittassa vasaṃ, ajjhāsayanti
tika-s0401t:453_5: attho. Deyyadhammassa vasanti deyyadhammassa abahubhāvaṃ. Attano thāmanti attano
tika-s0401t:453_6: pamāṇaṃ. Yattakena attā yāpeti, tattakasseva gahaṇaṃ. Yadi hītiādi saṅkhepato vuttassa
tika-s0401t:454_0: Ekabhikkhupi nāññāsīti sosānikavatte sammadeva vattitattā ekopi bhikkhu na aññāsi.
tika-s0401t:454_1: Abbokiṇṇanti avicchedaṃ. Dutiyo maṃ jāneyyāti dutiyo sahāyabhūtopi yathā maṃ jānituṃ
tika-s0401t:454_2: na sakkuṇeyya, tathā saṭṭhi vassāni nirantaraṃ susāne vasāmi, tasmā ahaṃ aho sosānikuttamo.
tika-s0401t:454_3: Upakāro hutvāti uggahaparipucchādīhi pariyattidhammavasena upakāro hutvā. Dhammakathāya
tika-s0401t:454_5: “kathaṃ nu kho appaṃ ayyassa santike dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti kolāhalavasena mahājanaṃ
tika-s0401t:454_6: khobhetvā? Yadi thero bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ iccheyya, pubbeva janapadaṃ khobhento
tika-s0401t:454_7: dhammaṃ katheyya. Gatoti “ayaṃ so, yena rattiyaṃ dhammakathā katā”ti jānanabhāvena
tika-s0401t:455_0: Tayo kulaputtā viyāti pācīnavaṃsadāye sāmaggivāsaṃvuṭṭhā anuruddho, nandiyo, kimiloti
tika-s0401t:455_1: ime tayo kulaputtā viya. Etesupi hi anuruddhattherena bhagavatā “atthi pana vo anuruddhā
tika-s0401t:455_2: evaṃ appamattānaṃ ātāpīnaṃ pahitattānaṃ viharantānaṃ uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso
tika-s0401t:455_3: adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti puṭṭhena “idha pana mayaṃ, bhante, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma, vivicceva
tika-s0401t:455_4: kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0401t:455_5: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmā”tiādinā anupubbavihārasamāpattīsu ārocitāsu itare therā
tika-s0401t:455_6: na icchiṃsu. Tathā hi te pakkante bhagavati āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavocuṃ – “kinnu
tika-s0401t:455_7: mayaṃ āyasmato anuruddhassa evamārocimha ‘imāsañca imāsañca vihārasamāpattīnaṃ mayaṃ
tika-s0401t:455_8: lābhino’ti? Yaṃ no āyasmā anuruddho bhagavato sammukhāpi āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pakāsetī”ti?
tika-s0401t:455_9: Ghaṭīkāropi attano ariyabhāve kikissa rañño bhagavatā ārocite na attamano ahosi?
tika-s0401t:455_11: appicchatā”ti vutte appicchatāsaṅkhāte atthe. Balavaalobhenāti daḷhatarappavattikena alobhena.
tika-s0401t:456: 64. Catutthe natthi etassa santuṭṭhīti asantuṭṭhi, tassa bhāvo asantuṭṭhitā. Taṃ pana sarūpato dassento “asantuṭṭhe puggale…pe… lobho”ti āha. Sevantassātiādīni aññamaññavevacanāni.
tika-s0401t:457_0: 65-67. Pañcame tussanaṃ tuṭṭhi, samaṃ, sakena, santena vā tuṭṭhi etassāti santuṭṭhi,
tika-s0401t:457_1: tassa bhāvo santuṭṭhitā. Yassa santosassa atthitāya bhikkhu “santuṭṭho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0401t:457_2: taṃ dassento “itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassā”ti āha – cīvarādike yattha
tika-s0401t:457_3: katthaci kappiye paccaye santussanena samaṅgībhūtassāti attho. Atha vā itaraṃ vuccati
tika-s0401t:457_4: hīnaṃ paṇītato aññattā, tathā paṇītampi itaraṃ hīnato aññattā. Apekkhāsiddhā hi itaratā.
tika-s0401t:457_5: Iti yena dhammena hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādipaccayena santussati, so tathā pavatto
tika-s0401t:457_6: alobho itarītarapaccayasantoso, tena samannāgatassa. Yathālābhaṃ attano lābhānurūpaṃ
tika-s0401t:457_7: santoso yathālābhasantoso. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Labbhatīti vā lābho, yo yo
tika-s0401t:457_8: lābho yathālābho, tena santoso yathālābhasantoso. Balanti kāyabalaṃ. Sāruppanti bhikkhuno anucchavikatā.
tika-s0401t:458_0: Yathāladdhato aññassa apatthanā nāma siyā appicchatāpi pavattiākāroti tato vinivecitameva
tika-s0401t:458_1: santosassa sarūpaṃ dassento “labhantopi na gaṇhātī”ti āha. Taṃ parivattetvā pakatidubbalādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:458_2: garucīvaraṃ aphāsubhāvāvahaṃ sarīrakhedāvahañca hotīti payojanavasena na atricchatādivasena
tika-s0401t:458_3: taṃ parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo santosavirodhi na hotīti āha – “lahukena yāpentopi
tika-s0401t:458_4: santuṭṭhova hotī”ti. Mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā tāni vissajjetvā
tika-s0401t:458_5: tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha – “tesaṃ…pe…
tika-s0401t:458_6: dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti. Evaṃ sesapaccayesupi yathāsāruppaniddese api-saddaggahaṇe
tika-s0401t:458_7: adhippāyo veditabbo. Muttaharītakanti gomuttaparibhāvitaṃ, pūtibhāvena vā chaḍḍitaṃ
tika-s0401t:458_8: harītakaṃ. Buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti appicchatāsantuṭṭhīsu bhikkhū niyojetuṃ “pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ
tika-s0401t:458_9: nissāya pabbajjā”tiādinā buddhādīhi pasatthaṃ. Paramasantuṭṭhova hoti paramena ukkaṃsagatena
tika-s0401t:458_10: santosena samannāgatattā. Yathāsāruppasantosova aggoti tattha tattha bhikkhu sāruppaṃyeva
tika-s0401t:458_11: nissāya santussanavasena pavattanato aggo. Chaṭṭhasattamesu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:459: 68-69. Aṭṭhamanavamesu na sampajānātīti asampajāno, tassa bhāvo asampajaññaṃ. Vuttappaṭipakkhena sampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:460_0: 70. Dasame pāpamittā devadattasadisā. Te hi hīnācāratāya, dukkhassa vā sampāpakatāya
tika-s0401t:460_1: “pāpā”ti vuccanti. Tenākārena pavattānanti yo pāpamittassa khanti ruci adhimutti
tika-s0401t:460_3: nāmanti catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ “pāpamittatā”ti etaṃ nāmaṃ. Yasmā assaddhiyādipāpadhammasamannāgatā
tika-s0401t:460_4: puggalā visesato pāpā puññadhammavimokkhatāya, te yassa mittā sahāyā, so pāpamitto,
tika-s0401t:460_5: tassa bhāvo pāpamittatā. Tenāha – “ye te puggalā assaddhā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:463: 71. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame buddhā, sāriputtādayo vā kalyāṇamittā. Vuttapaṭipakkhanayenāti “pāpamittatā”ti pade vuttassa paṭipakkhanayena.
tika-s0401t:464: 72-73. Dutiye yogoti samaṅgībhāvo. Payogoti payuñjanaṃ paṭipatti. Ayogoti asamaṅgībhāvo. Appayogoti appayuñjanaṃ appaṭipatti. Anuyogenāti anuyogahetu.
tika-s0401t:465_1: Aṅgabhūtāti tasseva paṭivedhassa kāraṇabhūtā. Ettha ca cattāri ariyasaccāni bujjhati,
tika-s0401t:465_2: aññāṇaniddāya vāpi bujjhatīti bodhīti laddhanāmo ariyasāvako bujjhanakasatto, tassa
tika-s0401t:465_3: bujjhanakasattassa. Bodhiyāti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā. Bujjhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0401t:465_4: bodhiyo, bodhiyo eva saccasampaṭibodhassa aṅgāti vuttaṃ. “Bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
tika-s0401t:465_5: Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ bujjhanato anubujjhantīti
tika-s0401t:465_6: bojjhaṅgā, paṭimukhaṃ paccakkhabhāvena abhimukhaṃ bujjhanato paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā,
tika-s0401t:465_7: sammā aviparītato bujjhanato sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgāti evaṃ atthavisesadīpakehi
tika-s0401t:465_8: upasaggehi anubujjhantītiādi vuttaṃ. Bodhisaddo sabbavisesayuttaṃ bujjhanasāmaññena
tika-s0401t:465_9: saṅgaṇhāti. Bodhāya saṃvattantīti iminā tassā dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhanassa ekantakāraṇataṃ
tika-s0401t:465_10: dasseti. Evaṃ panetaṃ padaṃ vibhattamevāti vuttappakārena etaṃ “bojjhaṅgā”ti padaṃ
tika-s0401t:466_0: 75. Pañcame yāthāvasarasabhūmīti yāthāvato sakiccakaraṇabhūmi. Sāti yāthāvasarasabhūmi.
tika-s0401t:466_1: Vipassanāti balavavipassanā. Keci “bhaṅgañāṇato paṭṭhāyā”ti vadanti. Vipassanāya
tika-s0401t:466_2: pādakajjhāne ca satiādayo bojjhaṅgapakkhikā eva pariyāyabodhipakkhiyabhāvato. Tatthātiādi
tika-s0401t:467_0: 76. Chaṭṭhe tesaṃ antareti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare. Kāmaṃ saṅgītiāruḷhavasena appakamidaṃ
tika-s0401t:467_1: suttapadaṃ, bhagavā panettha sannipatitaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vitthārikaṃ karotīti
tika-s0401t:467_2: katvā idaṃ vuttaṃ – “mahatī desanā bhavissatī”ti. Gāmanigamādikathā natthīti tassā
tika-s0401t:467_3: kathāya atiracchānakathābhāvamāhu. Tathā hi sā pubbe bahuñātikaṃ ahosi bahupakkhaṃ,
tika-s0401t:467_4: idāni appañātikaṃ appapakkhanti aniccatāmukhena niyyānikapakkhikā jātā. Etāyāti yathāvuttāya
tika-s0401t:467_5: parihāniyā. Patikiṭṭhanti nihīnaṃ. Mama sāsaneti idaṃ kammassakatajjhānapaññānampi
tika-s0401t:467_6: visesanameva. Tadubhayampi hi bāhirakānaṃ tappaññādvayato sātisayameva sabbaññubuddhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:468_0: 77. Sattame tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvāti tathā kathentānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tattha upagamanena
tika-s0401t:468_1: attano desanāya bhājanabhūtaṃ cittappavattiṃ ñatvā. Kammassakatādīti ādisaddena jhānapaññādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:469: 78-80. Aṭṭhamādīsu heṭṭhā vuttanayenevāti “yā esa mama sāsane”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-s0401t:473_0: 98-115. Dasame vagge ajjhattasantāne bhavaṃ ajjhattikaṃ. Ajjhattasantānato bahiddhā
tika-s0401t:473_1: bhavaṃ bāhiraṃ. Vuttapaṭipakkhanayenāti “avināsāyā”ti evamādinā attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0401t:473_2: Catukkoṭiketi “anuyogo akusalānaṃ, ananuyogo kusalānaṃ, anuyogo kusalānaṃ, ananuyogo
tika-s0401t:473_3: akusalāna”nti evaṃ pariyosānasutte āgatanayaṃ gahetvā “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi
tika-s0401t:474_1: ūnato adhikato ca pavedanaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpanaṃ. Tesaṃyeva pana aviparītato
tika-s0401t:474_2: anūnādhikato ca pavedanaṃ dhammaṃ dhammoti dīpanaṃ. Evaṃ vinayappaṭipattiyā ayathāvidhippavedanaṃ
tika-s0401t:474_3: adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpanaṃ. Yathāvidhippavedanaṃ dhammaṃ dhammoti dīpanaṃ. Suttantanayena
tika-s0401t:474_4: pañcavidho saṃvaravinayo pahānavinayo ca vinayo, tappaṭipakkhena avinayo. Vinayanayena
tika-s0401t:474_5: vatthusampadādinā yathāvidhippaṭipatti eva vinayo, tabbipariyāyena avinayo veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:474_6: Tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti ettha iti-saddo ādyattho. Tena dvenavuti pācittiyā,
tika-s0401t:474_7: cattāro pāṭidesaniyā, satta adhikaraṇasamathāti imesaṃ saṅgaho. Ekatiṃsa nissaggiyāti
tika-s0401t:475_0: Adhigantabbato adhigamo, maggaphalāni. Nibbānaṃ pana antaradhānābhāvato idha na gayhati.
tika-s0401t:475_1: Paṭipajjanaṃ paṭipatti, sikkhattayasamāyogo. Paṭipajjitabbato vā paṭipatti. Pariyāpuṇitabbato
tika-s0401t:475_2: pariyatti, piṭakattayaṃ. Maggaggahaṇena gahitāpi tatiyavijjāchaṭṭhābhiññā vijjābhiññāsāmaññato
tika-s0401t:475_3: “tisso vijjā cha abhiññā”ti punapi gahitā. Tato paraṃ cha abhiññāti vassasahassato
tika-s0401t:475_4: paraṃ cha abhiññā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, na paṭisambhidāti adhippāyo. Tatoti abhiññākālato
tika-s0401t:475_5: pacchā. Tāti abhiññāyo. Pubbabhāge jhānasinehābhāvena kevalāya vipassanāya ṭhatvā
tika-s0401t:475_6: aggaphalappattā sukkhavipassakā nāma, maggakkhaṇe pana “jhānasineho natthī”ti na
tika-s0401t:475_7: vattabbo “samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti vacanato. Pacchimakassāti sabbapacchimassa.
tika-s0401t:475_8: Kiñcāpi ariyo aparihānadhammo, sotāpannassa pana uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā adhigatadhammo
tika-s0401t:475_9: uppanno nāma natthi, paccayasāmaggiyā asati yāva uparivisesaṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0401t:475_10: tāva adhigamassa asambhavo evāti āha – “sotāpannassa…pe… nāma hotī”ti. Tassidaṃ manussalokavasena
tika-s0401t:476_0: Na codentīti aññamaññasmiṃ vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ jānantāpi na codenti na sārenti. Akukkuccakā
tika-s0401t:476_1: hontīti kukkuccaṃ na uppādenti. “Asakkaccakārino hontī”ti ca paṭhanti, sāthalikatāya
tika-s0401t:476_2: sikkhāsu asakkaccakārino hontīti attho. Bhikkhūnaṃ satepi sahassepi dharamāneti idaṃ
tika-s0401t:476_3: bāhullavasena vuttaṃ. Antimavatthuanajjhāpannesu katipayamattesupi bhikkhūsu dharantesu,
tika-s0401t:476_4: ekasmiṃ vā dharante paṭipatti anantarahitā eva nāma hoti. Tenevāha – “pacchimakassa…pe… antarahitā hotī”ti.
tika-s0401t:477_0: Antevāsike gahetunti antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ. Atthavasenāti aṭṭhakathāvasena. Matthakato
tika-s0401t:477_1: paṭṭhāyāti uparito paṭṭhāya. Uposathakkhandhakamattanti vinayamātikāpāḷimāha. Āḷavakapañhādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:477_2: viya devesu pariyattiyā pavatti appamāṇanti āha – “manussesū”ti.
tika-s0401t:478_0: Oṭṭhaṭṭhivaṇṇanti oṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ, dantakasāvaṃ ekaṃ vā dve vā vāre rajitvā
tika-s0401t:478_1: dantavaṇṇaṃ katvā dhārentīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kesesu vā allīyāpentīti tena kāsāvakhaṇḍena
tika-s0401t:478_2: kese bandhantā allīyāpenti. Bhikkhugottassa abhibhavanato vināsanato gotrabhuno.
tika-s0401t:478_3: Atha vā gottaṃ vuccati sādhāraṇaṃ nāmaṃ, mattasaddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tasmā “samaṇā”ti
tika-s0401t:478_4: gottamattaṃ anubhavanti dhārentīti gotrabhuno, nāmamattasamaṇāti attho. Kāsāvagatakaṇṭhatāya,
tika-s0401t:478_5: kāsāvaggahaṇahetuuppajjanakasokatāya vā kāsāvakaṇṭhā. Saṅghagatanti saṅghaṃ uddissa
tika-s0401t:478_6: dinnattā saṅghagataṃ. Taṃ sarīranti taṃ dhātusarīraṃ.
tika-s0401t:479_0: Tenevāti pariyattiantaradhānamūlakattā eva itaraantaradhānassa. Sakko devarājā chātakabhaye
tika-s0401t:479_1: paratīragamanāya bhikkhū ussukkamakāsīti adhippāyo. Neti ubhayepi paṃsukūlikatthere
tika-s0401t:479_2: dhammakathikatthere ca. Therāti tattha ṭhitā sakkhibhūtā therā. Dhammakathikattherā
tika-s0401t:479_3: “yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā…pe… yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā “suttante
tika-s0401t:479_4: rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā”ti iminā vacanena paṃsukūlikatthere appaṭibhāne
tika-s0401t:479_5: akaṃsu. Idāni pariyattiyā anantaradhānameva itaresaṃ anantaradhānahetūti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:479_6: byatirekato anvayato ca upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0401t:483_1: tato eva dutiyādipaṭikkhepattho. Padhānāsahāyatthopi ekasaddo hotīti tannivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:483_2: “gaṇanaparicchedo”ti āha. Sammutiyā desanā sammutidesanā. Paramatthassa desanā paramatthadesanā.
tika-s0401t:483_3: Tatthāti sammutiparamatthadesanāsu, na sammutiparamatthesu. Tenāha – “evarūpā sammutidesanā,
tika-s0401t:483_4: evarūpā paramatthadesanā”ti. Tatridaṃ sammutiparamatthānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – yasmiṃ bhinne,
tika-s0401t:483_5: buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsamaññā, sā ghaṭapaṭādippabhedā sammuti,
tika-s0401t:483_6: tabbipariyāyena paramatthā. Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve so nayo labbhati. Tattha
tika-s0401t:483_7: rūpādidhammasamūhaṃ santānavasena pavattamānaṃ upādāya puggalavohāroti puggaloti
tika-s0401t:483_8: sammutidesanā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Uppādavayavanto sabhāvadhammā na niccāti
tika-s0401t:483_9: aniccāti āha – “aniccanti paramatthadesanā”ti. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Nanu khandhadesanāpi
tika-s0401t:483_10: sammutidesanāva. Rāsaṭṭho vā hi khandhaṭṭho koṭṭhāsaṭṭho vāti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana
tika-s0401t:483_11: khandhasamaññā phassādīsu pavattatajjāpaññatti viya paramatthasannissayā tassa āsannatarā,
tika-s0401t:483_12: puggalasamaññādayo viya na dūreti paramatthasaṅgahā vuttā. Khandhasīsena vā tadupādānasabhāvadhammā
tika-s0401t:483_13: eva gahitā. Nanu ca sabhāvadhammā sabbepi sammutimukheneva desanaṃ ārohanti, na samukhenāti
tika-s0401t:483_14: sabbāpi desanā sammutidesanāva siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ, desetabbadhammavibhāgena desanāvibhāgassa
tika-s0401t:483_15: adhippetattā. Na hi saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti.
tika-s0401t:484_0: Sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvāti “idhekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitāpānuyogamanuyutto”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:484_1: sammutimukhena pavattitadesanaṃ sutamayañāṇuppādavasena sutvā. Atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvāti
tika-s0401t:484_2: tadanusārena catusaccasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0401t:484_3: Mohaṃ pahāyāti tadekaṭṭhakilesehi saddhiṃ anavasesaṃ mohaṃ pajahitvā. Visesanti aggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0401t:484_4: visesaṃ. Tesanti tādisānaṃ veneyyānaṃ. Paramatthavasenāti “pañcimāni, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:485_0: Tatrāti tassaṃ sammutivasena paramatthavasena ca desanāyaṃ. Desabhāsākusaloti nānādesabhāsāsu
tika-s0401t:485_1: kusalo. Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti nidassanamattaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ sippuggahaṇaṭṭhānānampīti
tika-s0401t:485_2: adhippāyo. Teneva sippuggahaṇaṃ parato vakkhati. Sippāni vā vijjāṭṭhānabhāvena vedantogadhāni
tika-s0401t:485_3: katvā “tiṇṇaṃ vedāna”nti vuttaṃ. Kathetabbabhāvena ṭhitāni, na katthaci sannicitabhāvenāti
tika-s0401t:485_4: vedānampi kathetabbabhāveneva ṭhānaṃ dīpento “guhā tīṇi nihitā na gayhantī”tiādimicchāvādaṃ
tika-s0401t:486_0: Paramo uttamo attho paramattho, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvo. Lokasaṅketamattasiddhā
tika-s0401t:486_1: sammuti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sammutikathāya saccatāti āha – “lokasammutikāraṇā”ti, lokasamaññaṃ
tika-s0401t:486_2: nissāya pavattanatoti attho. Lokasamaññā hi abhinivesena viññeyyā, nāññāpanā ekaccassa
tika-s0401t:486_3: sutassa sāvanā viya na musā anatidhāvitabbato tassā. Tenāha bhagavā – “janapadaniruttiṃ
tika-s0401t:486_4: nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṃ nātidhāvaye”ti. Dhammānanti sabhāvadhammānaṃ. Bhūtakāraṇāti
tika-s0401t:486_5: yathābhūtakāraṇā yathābhūtaṃ nissāya pavattanato. Sammutiṃ voharantassāti “puggalo,
tika-s0401t:487_0: Hirottappadīpanatthanti lokapālanakicce hirottappadhamme kiccato pakāsetuṃ. Tesañhi
tika-s0401t:487_1: kiccaṃ sattasantāne eva pākaṭaṃ hotīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya taṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:487_2: Esa nayo sesesupi. Yasmiñhi cittuppāde kammaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃsantāne eva tassa phalassa
tika-s0401t:487_3: uppatti kammassakatā. Evañhi kataviññāṇanāso akatāgamo ca natthīti sā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
tika-s0401t:487_4: eva desanāya dīpetabbā. Tehi sattehi kātabbapuññakiriyā paccattapurisakāro. Sopi
tika-s0401t:487_5: santānavasena niṭṭhapetabbato puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbo. Ānantariyadīpanatthanti
tika-s0401t:487_6: cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttāni taṃnibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlāni,
tika-s0401t:487_7: anantarakaraṇapayojanāni vāti ānantariyāni, mātughātādīni, tesaṃ dīpanatthaṃ. Tānipi
tika-s0401t:487_8: hi santānavasena niṭṭhapetabbato “mātaraṃ jīvitā voropetī”tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
tika-s0401t:487_9: eva kathāya dīpetabbāni, tathā “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:487_10: “so anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati ekampi jāti”ntiādinā, “atthi dakkhiṇā dāyakato
tika-s0401t:487_12: puggalādhiṭṭhānā eva katvā dīpetabbā sattasantānavisayattā. “Aṭṭha purisapuggalā
tika-s0401t:487_13: na samayavimutto puggalo”tiādinā ca paramatthakathaṃ kathentopi lokasammutiyā appahānatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:487_14: puggalakathaṃ katheti. Etena vuttāvasesāya kathāya puggalādhiṭṭhānabhāve payojanaṃ
tika-s0401t:487_15: sāmaññavasena saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmañcetaṃ sabbaṃ apariññātavatthukānaṃ vasena
tika-s0401t:487_16: vuttaṃ, pariññātavatthukānampi pana evaṃ desanā sukhāvahā hoti.
tika-s0401t:488_1: sadevake loke visiṭṭho nāma koci natthi, tathā sadisopi samānakāle. Tenāha – “na
tika-s0401t:488_2: imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana buddhena seṭṭho sadiso ca vijjatī”ti, tasmā sadisopi
tika-s0401t:488_3: koci natthi. Hīnopi apassayabhūto nattheva. Tena vuttaṃ – “visiṭṭhasamācārāpassayavirahito
tika-s0401t:488_4: ekapuggalo”ti. Ye ca sīlādiguṇehi natthi etesaṃ samāti asamā, purimakā sammāsambuddhā.
tika-s0401t:488_5: Tehi samo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇanekkhaṃ viya nibbisiṭṭhoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo
tika-s0401t:489_0: Sattaloko adhippeto sattanikāye uppajjanato. Manussaloke eva uppajjati devabrahmalokānaṃ
tika-s0401t:489_1: buddhānaṃ uppattiyā anokāsabhāvato. Kāmadevaloke tāva nuppajjati brahmacariyavāsassa
tika-s0401t:489_2: aṭṭhānabhāvato tathā anacchariyabhāvato. Acchariyadhammā hi buddhā bhagavanto. Tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:489_3: sā acchariyadhammatā devattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ loke na pākaṭā hoti yathā manussabhūtānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:489_4: Devabhūte hi sammāsambuddhe dissamānaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ devānubhāvatova loke dahati,
tika-s0401t:489_5: na buddhānubhāvato. Tathā sati “ayaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti nādhimuccati na sampasīdati,
tika-s0401t:489_6: issarakuttaggāhaṃ na vissajjeti, devattabhāvassa ca cirakālāvaṭṭhānato ekaccasassatavādato
tika-s0401t:489_7: na parimuccati. Brahmaloke nuppajjatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sattānaṃ tādisaggāhavinimocanatthañhi
tika-s0401t:489_8: buddhā bhagavanto manussasugatiyaṃyeva uppajjanti, na devasugatiyaṃ. Yasmā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ
tika-s0401t:489_9: majjhe katvā iminā saddhiṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ dasasahassasseva jātikkhettabhāvo dīpito
tika-s0401t:489_10: ito aññassa buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānassa tepiṭake buddhavacane āgataṭṭhānassa abhāvato.
tika-s0401t:490_0: Idha uppajjantopi kasmā jambudīpe eva uppajjati, na sesadīpesūti? Keci tāva āhu –
tika-s0401t:490_1: “yasmā pathaviyā nābhibhūtā buddhabhāvasahā acalaṭṭhānabhūtā bodhimaṇḍabhūmi jambudīpe
tika-s0401t:490_2: eva, tasmā jambudīpe eva uppajjatī”ti. Eteneva “tattha majjhimadese eva uppajjatī”ti
tika-s0401t:490_3: etampi saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ tathā itaresampi avijahitaṭṭhānānaṃ tattheva labbhanato.
tika-s0401t:490_4: Yasmā purimabuddhānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca nibbattiyā sāvakabodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0401t:490_6: imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe jambudīpe eva ijjhati, na aññattha. Veneyyajanavinayanattho
tika-s0401t:490_8: eva buddhā nibbattanti, na sesadīpesu. Ayañca nayo sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti
tika-s0401t:490_9: tesaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ tattheva uppatti sampatticakkānaṃ viya aññamaññūpanissayatāya
tika-s0401t:490_10: daṭṭhabbā. Tena vuttaṃ – aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti, jambudīpe
tika-s0401t:491_1: vā uppajjituṃ samattho. Sattiattho cāyaṃ māna-saddo. Yāvatā hi sāmatthiyena mahābodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0401t:491_2: carimabhave uppatti icchitabbā, tatthakena bodhisambhārasambhūtena paripuṇṇena samannāgatoti
tika-s0401t:491_3: attho. Bhedoti viseso. Tameva hi tividhaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ – “esa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:491_4: Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa mahābhinīhārassa siddhakālato paṭṭhāya mahābodhisatto buddhabhāvāya
tika-s0401t:491_6: uppajjamāno nāmāti attho uppādassa ekantikattā. Pariyesantoti vicinanto. Paripakkagate
tika-s0401t:491_7: ñāṇeti iminā tato pubbe ñāṇassa aparipakkatāya eva laddhāvasarāya kammapilotiyā vasena
tika-s0401t:491_8: bodhisatto tathā mahāpadhānaṃ padahīti dasseti. Arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma
tika-s0401t:491_9: “uppanno hotī”ti vattabbattā. Āgatova nāma hetusampadāya sammadeva nipphannattā.
tika-s0401t:492_0: Hitatthāyāti lokiyalokuttarassa hitassa siddhiyā. Sukhatthāyāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0401t:492_1: Tassāti tassa sattalokassa. So panāyaṃ sattaloko yena anukkamena dhammābhisamayaṃ
tika-s0401t:492_2: pāpuṇi, taṃ teneva anukkamena dassento “mahābodhimaṇḍe”tiādimāha. Yāvajjadivasāti
tika-s0401t:492_3: ettha ajja-saddena sāsanassa avaṭṭhānakālaṃ vadati. Devamanussānanti ukkaṭṭhaniddesoti
tika-s0401t:493_0: Ayaṃ pucchāti iminā “katamo”ti padassa sāmaññato pucchābhāvo dassito, na visesatoti
tika-s0401t:493_1: tassa pucchāvisesabhāvañāpanatthaṃ mahāniddese āgatā sabbāpi pucchā atthuddhāranayena
tika-s0401t:493_2: dasseti “pucchā ca nāmesā”tiādinā. Adiṭṭhaṃ jotīyati etāyāti adiṭṭhajotanā. Diṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0401t:493_3: saṃsandīyati etāyāti diṭṭhasaṃsandanā. Saṃsandanañca sākacchāvasena vinicchayakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:493_4: Vimatiṃ chindati etāyāti vimaticchedanā. Anumatiyā pucchā anumatipucchā. “Taṃ kiṃ
tika-s0401t:493_5: maññatha, bhikkhave”tiādi pucchāya “kā tumhākaṃ anumatī”ti anumati pucchitā hoti.
tika-s0401t:493_6: Kathetukamyatāpucchāti kathetukamyatāya pucchā. Lakkhaṇanti ñātuṃ icchito yo koci
tika-s0401t:493_7: sabhāvo. Aññātanti yena kenaci ñāṇena aññātabhāvamāha. Adiṭṭhanti dassanabhūtena
tika-s0401t:493_8: ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ viya adiṭṭhataṃ. Atulitanti “ettakaṃ eta”nti tulābhūtena atulitataṃ.
tika-s0401t:493_9: Atīritanti tīraṇabhūtena akatañāṇakiriyāsamāpanataṃ. Avibhūtanti ñāṇassa apākaṭabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0401t:494_0: Yehi guṇavisesehi nimittabhūtehi bhagavati “tathāgato”ti ayaṃ samaññā pavattā, taṃdassanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:494_1: “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Guṇavisesanemittikāneva hi bhagavato
tika-s0401t:497_0: Tathā āgatoti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo. Sāmaññajotanāpi
tika-s0401t:497_1: hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti. Paṭipadāgamanattho āgata-saddo, na ñāṇagamanattho “tathalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:497_2: āgato”tiādīsu viya, nāpi kāyagamanattho “āgato kho mahāsamaṇo, magadhānaṃ giribbaja”ntiādīsu
tika-s0401t:497_3: viya. Tattha yadākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo, taṃkaruṇāpadhānattā
tika-s0401t:497_4: mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanappaṭipadaṃ udāharaṇavasena sāmaññato dassento
tika-s0401t:497_6: vatvā puna taṃ paṭipadaṃ mahāpadhānasuttādīsu sambahulaniddesena supākaṭānaṃ āsannānañca
tika-s0401t:497_7: vipassiādīnaṃ channaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ vasena nidassento “yathā vipassī bhagavā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:497_9: vasena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena mahāpaṇidhānena. Sabbesañhi buddhānaṃ kāyappaṇidhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:497_10: imināva abhinīhārena samijjhatīti. Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravisesena “tathāgato”ti padassa
tika-s0401t:497_11: atthaṃ dassetvā idāni pāramipūraṇavasena dassetuṃ – “yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… kassapo
tika-s0401t:498_0: Ettha ca suttantikānaṃ mahābodhippaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ kā panetā pāramiyo,
tika-s0401t:498_1: kenaṭṭhena pāramiyo, katividhā cetā, ko tāsaṃ kamo, kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni,
tika-s0401t:498_2: ko paccayo, ko saṃkileso, kiṃ vodānaṃ, ko paṭipakkho, kā paṭipatti, ko vibhāgo, ko
tika-s0401t:498_3: saṅgaho, ko sampādanūpāyo, kittakena kālena sampādanaṃ, ko ānisaṃso, kiñcetāsaṃ phalanti
tika-s0401t:498_4: pāramīsu ayaṃ vitthārakathā veditabbā. Sā panesā icchantena dīghāgamaṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-s0401t:498_5: veditabbā, na idha dassitā. Yathāvuttāya paṭipadāya yathāvuttavibhāgānaṃ pāramīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:499_1: mahāpariccāgehi visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tatoyeva ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:499_4: pubbayogo. Dānādīsuyeva sātisayappaṭipattinipphādanaṃ pubbacariyā, yā vā cariyāpiṭakasaṅgahitā.
tika-s0401t:499_5: “Abhinīhāro pubbayogo, dānādippaṭipatti vā kāyavivekavasena ekacariyā vā pubbacariyā”ti
tika-s0401t:499_6: keci. Dānādīnañceva appicchatādīnañca saṃsāranibbānesu ādīnavānisaṃsānañca vibhāvanavasena
tika-s0401t:499_7: sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena ca pavattā kathā dhammakkhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:499_8: Ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ñātatthacariyā. Sāpi karuṇāyanavaseneva. Ādi-saddena lokatthacariyādayo
tika-s0401t:499_11: Sā pana atthato paññāpāramīyeva, ñāṇasambhāradassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Koṭīti pariyanto,
tika-s0401t:499_12: ukkaṃsoti attho. Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvāti sambandho. Tattha bhāvetvāti uppādetvā.
tika-s0401t:499_13: Brūhetvāti vaḍḍhetvā. Satipaṭṭhānādiggahaṇena āgamanappaṭipadaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
tika-s0401t:499_14: dasseti. Vipassanāsahagatā eva vā satipaṭṭhānādayo daṭṭhabbā. Ettha ca “yena abhinīhārenā”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:500_0: Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto nikkhantamatto. Nikkhantamattañhi mahāsattaṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno
tika-s0401t:500_1: suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā, tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:500_2: hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ
tika-s0401t:500_3: patiṭṭhito. Yathāhātiādinā mahāpadānadesanāya vuttavacanaṃ nidasseti. Setamhi chatteti
tika-s0401t:500_4: dibbasetacchatte. Anudhāriyamāneti dhāriyamāne. Ettha ca chattaggahaṇeneva khaggādīni
tika-s0401t:500_6: hi chattena saha tadā upaṭṭhitā ahesuṃ. Chattādīniyeva ca tadā paññāyiṃsu, na chattādiggāhakā.
tika-s0401t:500_7: Sabbā ca disāti dasa disā, nayidaṃ sabbadisāvilokanaṃ sattapadavītihāruttarakālaṃ.
tika-s0401t:500_8: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi, tattha devamanussā
tika-s0401t:500_9: gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā, “mahāpurisa, idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti
tika-s0401t:500_10: āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisā heṭṭhā uparīti sabbā disā anuviloketvā
tika-s0401t:500_11: sabbattha attanā sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsi.
tika-s0401t:500_12: Āsabhinti uttamaṃ. Aggoti sabbapaṭhamo. Jeṭṭhoti seṭṭhoti ca tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ayamantimā
tika-s0401t:500_13: jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi. “Anekesaṃ
tika-s0401t:505_0: Imissā gāthāya. Sabbaññutaññāṇameva sabbattha appaṭihatacāratāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti
tika-s0401t:505_1: āha – “sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābhassā”ti. Tathā ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato…pe… pubbanimittabhāvenāti
tika-s0401t:505_2: etena abhijātiyaṃ dhammatāvasena uppajjanakavisesā sabbabodhisattānaṃ sādhāraṇāti
tika-s0401t:506_0: Vikkamīti agamāsi. Marūti devā. Samāti vilokanasamatāya samā sadisiyo. Mahāpuriso
tika-s0401t:506_1: hi yathā ekaṃ disaṃ vilokesi, evaṃ sesadisāpi, na katthaci vilokane vibandho tassa
tika-s0401t:506_2: ahosīti. Samāti vā viloketuṃ yuttāti attho. Na hi tadā bodhisattassa virūpabībhacchavisamarūpāni
tika-s0401t:507_0: “Evaṃ tathā gato”ti kāyagamanaṭṭhena gatasaddena tathāgatasaddaṃ niddisitvā idāni
tika-s0401t:507_1: ñāṇagamanaṭṭhena taṃ dassetuṃ – “atha vā”tiādimāha. Tattha nekkhammenāti alobhappadhānena
tika-s0401t:507_2: kusalacittuppādena. Kusalā hi dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ, na pabbajjādayo. “Paṭhamajjhānenā”ti
tika-s0401t:507_3: ca vadanti. Pahāyāti pajahitvā. Gato adhigato, paṭipanno uttarivisesanti attho. Pahāyāti
tika-s0401t:507_4: vā pahānahetu, pahānalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Hetulakkhaṇattho hi ayaṃ pahāyasaddo. Kāmacchandādippahānahetukañhi
tika-s0401t:507_5: “gato”ti ettha vuttaṃ gamanaṃ avabodho, paṭipatti eva vā kāmacchandādippahānena ca
tika-s0401t:507_6: lakkhīyati. Esa nayo padāletvātiādīsupi. Abyāpādenāti mettāya. Ālokasaññāyāti vibhūtaṃ
tika-s0401t:507_7: katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasañjānanena. Avikkhepenāti samādhinā. Dhammavavatthānenāti
tika-s0401t:507_9: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānassa
tika-s0401t:507_10: pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya bhagavato tathāgatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhahi
tika-s0401t:507_11: samāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi taṃ dassetuṃ – “ñāṇenā”tiādimāha. Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānañhi
tika-s0401t:507_12: vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti,
tika-s0401t:507_13: tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya
tika-s0401t:507_15: uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhā nīvaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti
tika-s0401t:507_16: daṭṭhabbo. Samāpattivihārappavesavibandhanena nīvaraṇāni kavāṭasadisānīti āha – “nīvaraṇakavāṭaṃ ugghāṭetvā”ti.
tika-s0401t:508_0: “Rattiṃ vitakketvā vicāretvā divā kammante payojetī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne vitakkavicārā
tika-s0401t:508_2: dukkhaṃ, catutthajjhānopacāreyeva ca sukhaṃ pahīyati, atisayappahānaṃ pana sandhāyāha
tika-s0401t:508_4: ceva tadārammaṇāni ca vuttāni. Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi “rūpa”nti vuccati uttarapadalopena
tika-s0401t:508_5: “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu. Tassa ārammaṇampi kasiṇarūpaṃ “rūpa”nti vuccati purimapadalopena
tika-s0401t:508_6: “bahiddhā rūpāni passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsu. Tasmā idha rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatasaññā
tika-s0401t:508_7: rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānāni vuttāni. Rūpaṃ saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ,
tika-s0401t:508_8: rūpassa nāmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti
tika-s0401t:508_9: veditabbaṃ. Paṭighasaññāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena
tika-s0401t:508_10: paṭihananena visayivisayasamodhāne samuppannā dvipañcaviññāṇasahagatā saññā paṭighasaññā.
tika-s0401t:508_11: Nānattasaññāyoti nānatte gocare pavattā saññā, nānattā vā saññā nānattasaññā, aṭṭha
tika-s0401t:508_13: dve akusalavipākasaññā, ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti etāsaṃ catucattālīsasaññānametaṃ
tika-s0401t:508_14: adhivacanaṃ. Etā hi yasmā rūpasaññādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti,
tika-s0401t:508_15: yasmā ca nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ asadisā, tasmā “nānattasaññā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0401t:509_0: Aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
tika-s0401t:509_1: gahetvā pavattāya anupassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññanti saṅkhatadhamme “niccā sassatā”ti
tika-s0401t:509_2: pavattaṃ micchāsaññaṃ. Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0401t:509_3: ito paresupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbijjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
tika-s0401t:509_4: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virāgānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu virajjanākārena pavattāya
tika-s0401t:509_5: anupassanāya. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya. “Te saṅkhārā
tika-s0401t:509_6: nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ samudayavasena na uppajjantī”ti evaṃ vā anupassanā nirodhānupassanā.
tika-s0401t:509_7: Tenevāha – “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti, no samudetī”ti. Muccitukamyatā hi ayaṃ
tika-s0401t:509_8: balappattāti. Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Paṭisaṅkhā
tika-s0401t:509_9: santiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. Ādānanti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:509_10: vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti vipariṇāmo.
tika-s0401t:509_12: ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahaggahaṇaṃ. Paṇidhinti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena
tika-s0401t:510_1: asāre sāraggahaṇavipallāsaṃ. Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppannoti abhiniveso sammohābhiniveso.
tika-s0401t:510_2: Keci pana “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānantiādinā pavattasaṃsayāpatti sammohābhiniveso”ti
tika-s0401t:510_4: vacanato ālayo taṇhā, sāyeva cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu ca abhinivesavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti
tika-s0401t:510_5: keci. “Evaṃvidhā saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī”ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā.
tika-s0401t:510_6: Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Tattha ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena anupassanena
tika-s0401t:510_7: pavattiyā vivaṭṭānupassanā, gotrabhū. Saṃyogābhinivesanti saṃyujjanavasena saṅkhāresu
tika-s0401t:510_8: abhinivisanaṃ. Diṭṭhekaṭṭheti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. Oḷāriketi
tika-s0401t:510_9: uparimaggavajjhe kilese apekkhitvā vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanapahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi
tika-s0401t:510_10: oḷārikāti. Aṇusahagateti aṇubhūte. Idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Sabbakileseti
tika-s0401t:510_11: avasiṭṭhasabbakilese. Na hi paṭhamādimaggehipi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyantīti.
tika-s0401t:511_0: Kakkhaḷattaṃ kathinabhāvo. Paggharaṇaṃ dravabhāvo. Lokiyavāyunā bhastāya viya yena
tika-s0401t:511_1: taṃtaṃkalāpassa uddhumāyanaṃ, thaddhabhāvo vā, taṃ vitthambhanaṃ. Vijjamānepi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0401t:511_2: kalāpantarabhūtehi phuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ
tika-s0401t:511_3: yo paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova, aññathā bhūtānaṃ paricchedabhāvo na siyā byāpitabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0401t:511_4: Yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo, tehi asamphuṭṭhabhāvo asamphuṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0401t:512_1: cetanāvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ – “saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇa”nti. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye
tika-s0401t:512_3: ca cetanā. Yathāha – “tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro, kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:512_4: Pharaṇaṃ savipphārikatā. Assaddhiyeti assaddhiyahetu. Nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0401t:512_6: adhicitte pavattamāne paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatāya ajjhupekkhanaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:513_0: Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā
tika-s0401t:513_2: puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti sā pariggahalakkhaṇā. Kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0401t:513_3: sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratīpi samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇā
tika-s0401t:513_4: daṭṭhabbā, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ
