tika-s0401t:513_5: viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā jīvitindriyapavattiyā, ājīvasseva
tika-s0401t:513_6: vā suddhi vodānaṃ. “Saṅkhārā”ti idha cetanā adhippetāti vuttaṃ – “saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇa”nti.
tika-s0401t:513_7: Namanaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvo. Āyatanaṃ pavattanaṃ. Āyatanavasena hi āyasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0401t:513_8: cittacetasikānaṃ pavatti. Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇanti vaṭṭassa janakahetubhāvo, maggassa
tika-s0401t:514_0: Tathalakkhaṇaṃ aviparītasabhāvo. Ekaraso aññamaññanātivattanaṃ anūnādhikabhāvo. Yuganaddhā
tika-s0401t:514_2: maggo. Anuppādapariyosānatāya anuppādo phalaṃ. Passaddhi kilesavūpasamo. Chandassāti
tika-s0401t:514_5: yā saṅgatīti vuccati. Samaṃ, saha odahanti anena sampayuttadhammāti vā samodhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:514_6: phasso. Samosaranti sannipatanti etthāti samosaraṇaṃ. Vedanāya vinā appavattamānā
tika-s0401t:514_7: sampayuttadhammā vedanānubhavananimittaṃ samosaṭā viya hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Gopānasīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:514_8: kūṭaṃ viya sampayuttānaṃ pāmokkhabhāvo pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ. Tato, tesaṃ vā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:514_9: uttari padhānanti tatuttari. Paññuttarā hi kusalā dhammā. Vimuttiyāti phalassa. Tañhi
tika-s0401t:514_10: sīlādiguṇasārassa paramukkaṃsabhāvena sāraṃ. Ayañca lakkhaṇavibhāgo chadhātupañcajhānaṅgādivasena
tika-s0401t:514_11: taṃtaṃsuttapadānusārena porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena ca katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0401t:514_12: hi pubbe vuttopi koci dhammo pariyāyantarappakāsanatthaṃ puna dassito, tato eva ca
tika-s0401t:514_15: āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ca suttapadānaṃ vasena “chandassa mūlalakkhaṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:515_0: Tathadhammā nāma cattāri ariyasaccāni aviparītasabhāvattā. Tathāni taṃsabhāvattā,
tika-s0401t:515_2: jātipaccayā sambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo,
tika-s0401t:515_3: anupavattatthoti attho. Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho,
tika-s0401t:515_4: na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotīti jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho,
tika-s0401t:515_5: itthañca jātito samudāgacchatīti jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭho. Yā yā jāti yathā yathā
tika-s0401t:515_6: paccayo hoti, tadanurūpaṃ pātubhāvoti attho. Avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭhoti etthāpi
tika-s0401t:515_7: na avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo na hoti, na ca avijjaṃ vinā saṅkhārā uppajjanti. Yā
tika-s0401t:515_8: yā avijjā yesaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathā yathā paccayo hoti, ayaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:516_0: Bhagavā taṃ jānāti passatīti sambandho. Tenāti bhagavatā. Taṃ vibhajjamānanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:516_1: Tanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīti ādi-saddena majjhattaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, tathā atītānāgatapaccuppannaparittaajjhattabahiddhātadubhayādibhedaṃ.
tika-s0401t:516_3: rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ mutaṃ, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta”nti vacanato diṭṭhapadañca
tika-s0401t:516_4: viññātapadañca rūpārammaṇe labbhati. Anekehi nāmehīti “rūpārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0401t:516_5: majjhattaṃ parittaṃ atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā diṭṭhaṃ viññātaṃ
tika-s0401t:516_6: rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”nti
tika-s0401t:516_7: evamādīhi anekehi nāmehi. Terasahi vārehīti rūpakaṇḍe āgate terasa niddesavāre sandhāyāha.
tika-s0401t:516_8: Dvepaññāsāya nayehīti ekekasmiṃ vāre catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ vasena
tika-s0401t:516_9: dvipaññāsāya nayehi. Tathamevāti aviparītadassitāya appaṭivattiyadesanatāya ca tathameva
tika-s0401t:516_10: hoti. Jānāmi abbhaññāsinti vattamānātītakālesu ñāṇappavattidassanena anāgatepi ñāṇappavatti
tika-s0401t:516_11: vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā. Vidita-saddo anāmaṭṭhakālaviseso veditabbo “diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ
tika-s0401t:516_12: muta”ntiādīsu viya. Na upaṭṭhāsīti attattaniyavasena na upagañchi. Yathā rūpārammaṇādayo
tika-s0401t:516_13: dhammā yaṃsabhāvā yaṃpakārā ca, tathā ne passati jānāti gacchatīti tathāgatoti evaṃ
tika-s0401t:516_14: padasambhavo veditabbo. Keci pana “niruttinayena pisodarādipakkhepena vā dassīsaddassa
tika-s0401t:516_15: lopaṃ, āgata-saddassa cāgamaṃ katvā tathāgato”ti vaṇṇenti.
tika-s0401t:517_0: Yaṃ rattinti yassaṃ rattiyaṃ. Accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ mārānanti
tika-s0401t:517_1: kilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ. Anupavajjanti niddosatāya na
tika-s0401t:517_2: upavajjaṃ. Anūnanti pakkhipitabbābhāvena na ūnaṃ. Anadhikanti apanetabbābhāvena na
tika-s0401t:517_4: No aññathāti “tathevā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekena sampādeti. Tena yadatthaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0401t:517_5: tadatthanipphādanato yathā bhāsitaṃ bhagavatā, tathevāti aviparītadesanataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:517_6: Gadatthoti etena tathaṃ gadatīti tathāgatoti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā niruttinayena
tika-s0401t:517_7: vuttanti dasseti. Tathā gatamassāti tathāgato. Gatanti ca kāyassa vācāya vā pavattīti
tika-s0401t:517_8: attho. Tathāti ca vutte yaṃ-taṃ-saddānaṃ abyabhicāritasambandhatāya yathāti ayamattho
tika-s0401t:517_9: upaṭṭhitoyeva hoti. Kāyavācākiriyānañca aññamaññānulomena vacanicchāyaṃ kāyassa vācā,
tika-s0401t:517_10: vācāya ca kāyo sambandhabhāvena upatiṭṭhatīti imamatthaṃ dassento āha – “bhagavato
tika-s0401t:517_11: hī”tiādi. Imasmiṃ pana atthe tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti ayampi attho siddho hoti.
tika-s0401t:517_12: So pana pubbe pakārantarena dassitoti āha – “evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato”ti.
tika-s0401t:518_0: Tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsūti etena yadeke “tiriyaṃ viya upari adho ca santi
tika-s0401t:518_1: lokadhātuyo”ti vadanti, taṃ paṭisedheti. Desanāvilāsoyeva desanāvilāsamayo yathā
tika-s0401t:518_3: pavattanato gata-saddoyeva avagatatthaṃ atītatthañca vadatīti āha – “gatoti avagato
tika-s0401t:518_4: atīto”ti. Atha vā abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sambodhi, etthantare mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0401t:518_5: hānaṭṭhānasaṃkilesanivattīnaṃ abhāvato yathā paṇidhānaṃ, tathā gato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ
tika-s0401t:518_6: paṭipannoti tathāgato. Atha vā mahiddhikatāya paṭisambhidānaṃ ukkaṃsādhigamena anāvaraṇañāṇatāya
tika-s0401t:518_7: ca katthacipi paṭighātābhāvato yathā ruci, tathā kāyavācācittānaṃ gatāni gamanāni
tika-s0401t:518_8: pavattiyo etassāti tathāgato. Yasmā ca loke vidhayuttagatapakārasaddā samānatthā
tika-s0401t:518_9: dissanti, tasmā yathāvidhā vipassiādayo bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tathāvidhoti tathāgato.
tika-s0401t:518_10: Yathā yuttā ca te bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tathā yuttoti tathāgato. Atha vā yasmā
tika-s0401t:518_11: saccaṃ tatvaṃ tacchaṃ tathanti ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā tathena ñāṇena āgatoti
tika-s0401t:543: Saṅgahagāthā mukhamattameva, kasmā? Appamādapadaṃ viya sakalakusaladhammasampaṭipattiyā sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ saṅgāhakattā. Tenevāha – “sabbākārenā”tiādi. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-s0401t:544_0: 171. Dutiye uppattīti paṭhamāya jātiyā nibbattiṃ vatvā ariyāya jātiyā nibbattiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0401t:544_1: – “nipphattī”ti āha. Tadā hissa buddhabhāvanipphattīti. “Dullabho”tiādiṃ vatvā kāraṇassa
tika-s0401t:544_2: dūrasambhārabhāvato tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “ekavāra”ntiādimāha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-s0401t:544_3: – tattha vāragaṇanā nāma māsasaṃvaccharakappagaṇanādikā, kappānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
tika-s0401t:544_4: dve asaṅkhyeyyāni tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyānipi pāramiyo pūretvāpi buddhena bhavituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0401t:544_5: heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pana cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca nirantaraṃ dasa pāramiyo
tika-s0401t:544_6: pūretvā buddhabhāvaṃ pattuṃ sakkā, na ito aññathāti iminā kāraṇena dullabho pātubhāvo buddhānanti.
tika-s0401t:545_0: 172. Tatiye niccaṃ na hotīti abhiṇhappavattikaṃ na hoti kadācideva sambhavato. Yebhuyyena
tika-s0401t:545_1: manussā acchariyaṃ disvā accharaṃ paharanti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “accharaṃ paharitvā
tika-s0401t:545_2: passitabbo”ti. Samannāgatattāti etena acchariyā guṇadhammā etasmiṃ santīti acchariyoti
tika-s0401t:545_3: dasseti. Apica ādito pabhuti abhinīhārāvaho, tato parampi anaññasādhāraṇe guṇadhamme
tika-s0401t:545_7: mahābodhisattabhāvato anivattanasabhāvena. Buddhakārakadhammānaṃ pūraṇampi na aññassa
tika-s0401t:545_8: kassaci āciṇṇantiādinā hetuavatthāya phalāvatthāya sattānaṃ upakārāvatthāya cāti
tika-s0401t:545_9: tīsupi avatthāsu lokanātho anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ guṇadhammānaṃ āciṇṇatāya acchariyamanusso vuttoti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:546_0: 173. Catutthe kāle kiriyāti kālakiriyā. Katarasmiṃ kāle kīdisī kiriyā. Sāmaññajotanā
tika-s0401t:546_1: hi visese avatiṭṭhati, visesatthinā ca viseso anuppayojitabboti āha – “ekasmiṃ kāle
tika-s0401t:546_2: pākaṭā kiriyā”ti. Katarasmiṃ pana ekasmiṃ kāle, kathañca pākaṭāti? Kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni
tika-s0401t:546_4: ekasmiṃ kāle, sadevaloke ativiya acchariyamanussassa parinibbānanti accantapākaṭā.
tika-s0401t:546_5: Anutāpakarāti cetodukkhāvahā. Dasasahassacakkavāḷesūti vuttaṃ tassa buddhakkhettabhāvena
tika-s0401t:547_0: 174. Pañcame dutiyassa buddhassāti dutiyassa sabbaññubuddhassa abhāvā. Sutabuddho
tika-s0401t:547_1: nāma sutamayena ñāṇena bujjhitabbassa buddhattā. Catusaccabuddho nāma catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
tika-s0401t:547_2: anavasesato buddhattā. Paccekabuddho nāma paccekaṃ attanoyeva yathā catusaccasambodho
tika-s0401t:547_3: hoti, evaṃ buddhattā. Sammāsambuddho eva hi yathā sadevakassa lokassa catusaccasambodho
tika-s0401t:547_4: hoti, evaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati. Cattāri vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vāti idaṃ katamahābhinīhārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:547_6: saddhā mandā hoti, paññā tikkhā. Saddhādhikānaṃ paññā majjhimā hoti. Vīriyādhikānaṃ
tika-s0401t:547_7: paññā mandā, paññānubhāvena ca sammāsambodhi adhigantabbā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:547_8: Avisesena pana vimuttiparipācanīyadhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena tayopete bhedā
tika-s0401t:547_9: yuttāti vadanti. Tividhā hi bodhisattā abhinīhārakkhaṇe bhavanti ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyabhedena.
tika-s0401t:547_10: Tesu ugghaṭitaññū sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā cātuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto tatiyapade
tika-s0401t:547_11: apariyositeyeva chahi abhiññāhi saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthūpanissayo
tika-s0401t:547_12: hoti. Dutiyo satthu sammukhā ekaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto apariyositeyeva catutthapade chahi
tika-s0401t:547_13: abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti. Itaro bhagavato sammukhā cātuppadikagāthaṃ
tika-s0401t:547_14: sutvā pariyositāya gāthāya chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti.
tika-s0401t:547_15: Tayopete vinā kālabhedena katābhinīhārā laddhabyākaraṇā pāramiyo pūrento yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0401t:547_16: yathāvuttabhedena kālena sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇanti, tesu tesu pana kālabhedesu aparipuṇṇesu
tika-s0401t:547_17: te te mahāsattā divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ dānaṃ dentāpi tadanurūpaṃ sīlādisesapāramidhamme
tika-s0401t:547_18: ācinantāpi antarā buddhā bhavissantīti akāraṇametaṃ. Kasmā? Ñāṇassa aparipaccanato.
tika-s0401t:547_19: Paricchinnakālanipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ paricchinnakāle nipphāditā sammāsambodhi
tika-s0401t:547_20: tadantarā sabbussāhena vāyamantenapi na sakkā pāpuṇitunti pāramipūrī yathāvuttakālavisesena
tika-s0401t:548_0: Asahāyoti nippariyāyato vuttaṃ. Sahaayanaṭṭho hi sahāyaṭṭho. Paṭipattivasena bhagavatā
tika-s0401t:548_1: saha samaṃ ayanaṃ nāma kassacipi nattheva. Hatthādiavayavato paṭi paṭi minitabbato
tika-s0401t:548_2: paṭimā vuccati attabhāvo. Samattho nāma natthīti devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci natthi.
tika-s0401t:548_3: Paṭisamoti paṭinidhibhāvena samo. Paṭibhāgaṃ dātunti “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:548_4: vuttassa dhammabhāgassa dhammakoṭṭhāsassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ katvā bhāgaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-s0401t:548_5: paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Natthi etassa sīlādiguṇehi paṭibimbabhūto
tika-s0401t:548_6: puggaloti appaṭipuggalo. Tenāha – “añño kocī”tiādi. Tisahassimahāsahassīnaṃ vibhāgo
tika-s0401t:549_0: 175. Chaṭṭhādīsu tasmiṃ puggaleti sammāsambuddhe. Tanti paññācakkhu. Pātubhūtameva
tika-s0401t:549_1: hoti tassa sahassa uppajjanato. Uppattīti uppajjanaṃ. Nipphattīti parivuddhi. Kīvarūpassāti
tika-s0401t:549_2: kīdisassa. Sāvakavisayeva hatthagataṃ paññācakkhu nāma dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃyevāti
tika-s0401t:549_4: khippanisantiādivisesāvahā paññā”ti keci. Ālokoti paññāāloko eva. Tathā obhāso. Tīṇipīti
tika-s0401t:549_5: tīṇipi suttāni. Lokiyalokuttaramissakānīti pubbabhāgapaññāya adhippetattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:550_0: Uttamadhammānanti attano uttaritarassa abhāvena seṭṭhadhammānaṃ. Daṭṭhabbato dassanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:550_1: bhagavato rūpakāyo. Tatthapi visesato rūpāyatanaṃ. Tenāha – “cakkhuviññāṇena daṭṭhuṃ
tika-s0401t:550_2: labhatī”ti. Natthi ito uttaranti anuttaraṃ, tadeva anuttariyaṃ, dassanañca taṃ anuttariyañcāti
tika-s0401t:550_3: dassanānuttariyaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana padaviseso – suyyatīti savanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:550_4: bhagavato vacanaṃ. Labbhatīti lābho, bhagavati saddhā. Sikkhitabbato sikkhā. Sīlasamādhipaññāparicaraṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:550_5: pāricariyā, upaṭṭhānaṃ. Anussaraṇaṃ anussati, satthu guṇānussaraṇaṃ. Imesanti yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-s0401t:550_6: channaṃ anuttariyānaṃ. Pātubhāvo hotīti tathāgatassa pātubhāvā tappaṭibaddhattā tabbisayattā
tika-s0401t:550_7: ca pātubhāvo hoti. “Dassanānuttariya”nti ca sadevake loke uttaritarassa bhagavato
tika-s0401t:550_8: rūpassa na dassanamattaṃ adhippetaṃ, atha kho tassa rūpadassanamukhena aveccappasādena
tika-s0401t:550_9: buddhaguṇe okappetvā ogāhetvā dassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha – “āyasmā hī”tiādi. Idampi
tika-s0401t:550_10: dassanānuttariyanti pubbe vuttato nibbisesattā vuttaṃ. Dasabalaṃ dassanāya labhitvāti
tika-s0401t:550_11: ānandatthero viya pasādabhattimettāpubbakaṃ dasabalaṃ dassanāya labhitvā. Dassanaṃ
tika-s0401t:550_12: vaḍḍhetvāti dassanamukhena pavattaṃ vipassanācāraṃ vaḍḍhetvā. Dassanamukhena yāva
tika-s0401t:550_13: anulomañāṇaṃ vipassanācāraṃ vaḍḍhetvā tadanantaraṃ aṭṭhamakamahābhūmiṃ okkamanto
tika-s0401t:550_14: dassanaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti nāma. Idha parato pavattaṃ dassanaṃ dassanameva nāma,
tika-s0401t:550_15: mūladassanaṃ pana saccadassanassapi kāraṇabhāvato dassanānuttariyaṃ nāma. Esa nayo sesānuttariyesupi.
tika-s0401t:551_0: Dasabale saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti sammāsambuddhe bhagavati saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. Tisso
tika-s0401t:551_1: sikkhā sikkhitvāti tisso pubbabhāgasikkhā sikkhitvā. Paricaratīti upaṭṭhānaṃ karoti.
tika-s0401t:551_2: “Itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā buddhānussativasena anussatijjhānaṃ uppādetvā taṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:552_0: Sacchikiriyā hotīti paccakkhakaraṇaṃ hoti. Maggakkhaṇe hi labbhamānā paṭisambhidā
tika-s0401t:552_1: phalakkhaṇe sacchikatā nāma hoti tato paraṃ atthādīsu yathicchitaṃ viniyogakkhamabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:552_2: Catassoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Paṭisambhidāti pabhedā. Kassa pana pabhedāti? “Atthe
tika-s0401t:552_3: ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādivacanato ñāṇassetā pabhedā. Tasmā catasso paṭisambhidāti
tika-s0401t:552_4: cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti attho. Atthapaṭisambhidāti atthe paṭisambhidā, atthapabhedassa
tika-s0401t:553_0: Atthesu ñāṇantiādīsu atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ. Tañhi hetuvasena araṇīyaṃ gantabbaṃ
tika-s0401t:553_1: pattabbaṃ, tasmā “attho”ti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:553_2: bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā “attho”ti veditabbā. Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa
tika-s0401t:553_3: tasmiṃ pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Dhammoti saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā
tika-s0401t:553_4: tanti dahati vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca ṭhapeti ca, tasmā “dhammo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:553_5: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu ariyamaggo bhāsitaṃ kusalaṃ akusalanti
tika-s0401t:553_6: pañcavidhoti veditabbo, taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ
tika-s0401t:554_0: Atthadhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ
tika-s0401t:554_1: ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttiabhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:554_2: Evamayaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā. Kasmā?
tika-s0401t:554_3: Yasmā saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti pajānāti. Paṭisambhidāpatto
tika-s0401t:554_4: hi “phasso”ti vutte “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti, “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā
tika-s0401t:554_5: vutte “ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panesa nāmākhyātopasaggābyayapadampi
tika-s0401t:554_6: jānātiyeva sabhāvaniruttiyā yāthāvato jānanato. Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:555_0: Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ asekkhabhūmiyanti dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ
tika-s0401t:555_1: gacchanti. Adhigamo pariyatti savanaṃ paripucchā pubbayogoti imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi
tika-s0401t:555_2: visadā honti. Adhigamo nāma saccappaṭivedho. Pariyatti nāma buddhavacanaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0401t:555_3: gaṇhantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Savanaṃ nāma dhammassavanaṃ. Sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0401t:555_4: suṇantassapi hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Paripucchā nāma aṭṭhakathā. Uggahitapāḷiyā
tika-s0401t:555_5: atthaṃ kathentassapi hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Pubbayogo nāma pubbayogāvacaratā.
tika-s0401t:555_6: Haraṇapaccāharaṇanayena paṭipākaṭakammaṭṭhānassapi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti. Lokiyalokuttarā
tika-s0401t:555_7: vāti ettha tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā, atthapaṭisambhidā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarāti
tika-s0401t:556_0: Buddhuppādeyevāti avadhāraṇena buddhuppāde eva labbhanato, abuddhuppāde alabbhanato
tika-s0401t:556_1: anaññasādhāraṇo paṭivedho adhippeto. Evañca katvā “mahato cakkhussā”tiādīsu paññāmahattādikampi
tika-s0401t:556_3: paresaṃ tabbhāvāvahā daṭṭhabbā. Yā kāci dhātuyo lokiyā lokuttarā vā, sabbā tā imāheva
tika-s0401t:556_4: saṅgahitā, ettheva antogadhāti vuttaṃ – “imāva aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo nānāsabhāvato nānādhātuyo”ti.
tika-s0401t:557_0: 187. Yasmā cakkati aparāparaṃ parivattatīti cakkaṃ, tasmā iriyāpathāpi aparāparaṃ
tika-s0401t:557_1: parivattanaṭṭhena cakkasadisattā cakkanti vuttā, tathā patirūpadesavāsādisampattiyo.
tika-s0401t:557_2: Tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṃ abhinīharati nāmāti ettha tadā mahāsatto attānaṃ abhinīhārayogaṃ
tika-s0401t:557_3: karonto “dhammacakkaṃ abhinīharati nāmā”ti vutto tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkābhinīhāravibandhakaradhammānuppajjanato.
tika-s0401t:557_4: Abhinīhaṭaṃ nāmāti etthapi ayameva nayo. Arahattamaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi dhammacakkaṃ
tika-s0401t:557_5: uppādetiyeva nāma tadatthaṃ ñāṇaṃ paripācetīti katvā. Arahattaphalakkhaṇe dhammacakkaṃ
tika-s0401t:557_6: uppāditaṃ nāma tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammacakkassa uppādanāya kātabbakiccassa kassaci abhāvā.
tika-s0401t:557_7: Paṭivedhañāṇañhi idha “dhammacakka”nti adhippetaṃ. Idāni desanāñāṇavasena dhammacakkaṃ
tika-s0401t:557_8: dassetuṃ – “kadā pavatteti nāmā”tiādimāha. Na kevalaṃ therasseva, atha kho sabbesampi
tika-s0401t:557_9: sāsanikānaṃ dhammakathā bhagavato dhammadesanā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ catunnañca
tika-s0401t:557_10: ekattādinayānaṃ avirādhanatoti dassetuṃ – “yo hi koci bhikkhu vā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:562_0: 188. Etadaggesu paṭhamavaggassa paṭhame ādimhi dissatīti ettha aggasaddoti ānetvā
tika-s0401t:562_1: yojetabbaṃ. Ajjataggeti ajjadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvāti attho. Aṅgulaggenāti aṅgulikoṭiyā.
tika-s0401t:562_2: Ambilagganti ambilakoṭṭhāso. Koṭibhūtāti paramakoṭibhūtā tasmiṃ ṭhāne tādisānaṃ aññesaṃ
tika-s0401t:562_3: abhāvato. Tato eva seṭṭhabhūtātipi aggā. Etadaggasannikkhepoti etadagge ṭhapanaṃ
tika-s0401t:562_4: aṭṭhuppattiādīhi catūhipi kāraṇehi. Mahāpaññatāya therena etadaggaṭṭhānassa laddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:562_5: vitthārato dassetuṃ – “katha”ntiādimāha. Dve padantarānīti kaṇḍambamūle yugandharapabbateti
tika-s0401t:562_6: dvīsu ṭhānesu dve padāni dassetvā. Muṇḍapīṭhakanti yaṃ sattaṅgaṃ pañcaṅgaṃ vā na
tika-s0401t:562_7: hoti, kevalaṃ muṇḍakapīṭhaṃ, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Avattharitvā nisīdīti buddhānubhāvena
tika-s0401t:562_8: ajjhottharitvā nisīdi. Tenāha – “evaṃ nisīdanto”tiādi. Kāyasakkhiṃ katvāti nāmakāyena
tika-s0401t:562_9: desanāya sampaṭicchanavasena sakkhibhūtaṃ katvā. Kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā
tika-s0401t:562_10: dhammāti iti-saddo ādyattho, tena sabbaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:563_0: Pāṭihāriyaṭṭhāneti yamakapāṭihāriyassa kataṭṭhāne. Passathāti tesaṃ bahubhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0401t:563_1: vuttaṃ. Assāti manussasamūhassa ekabhāvaṃ. Ākappanti ākāraṃ. Mahājanoti sadevake
tika-s0401t:563_2: loke sabbo mahājano. Yathā nirayadassanaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ, evaṃ devalokadassanampi
tika-s0401t:563_4: saggo anicco addhuvo cavanadhammo”ti. Sajjetvāti samapaṇṇāsāya mucchanāhi yathā kāmena
tika-s0401t:564_0: Puthujjanapañcakaṃ pañhanti puthujjanapañhaṃ ādiṃ katvā pavattitaṃ khīṇāsavapañhapariyantaṃ
tika-s0401t:564_1: pañhapañcakaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ…pe… pucchīti puthujjanavisaye pañhaṃ pucchi. Paṭisambhidā
tika-s0401t:564_2: yathābhinīhāraṃ yathāsakaṃ vipassanābhinīhārena paṭhamabhūmiyādayo viya pavattitavisayāti
tika-s0401t:564_3: vuttaṃ – “te attano attano paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvā kathayiṃsū”ti. Buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchīti –
tika-s0401t:565: “Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha;
tika-s0401t:566: Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti. –
tika-s0401t:567_0: Idaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Tattha saṅkhātadhammāti saṅkhātā ñātā catusaccadhammā, ye ca
tika-s0401t:567_1: saṅkhātadhammā catūhi maggehi paṭividdhacatusaccadhammāti attho. Iminā asekkhā kathitā.
tika-s0401t:567_2: Puthu-saddo ubhayatthapi yojetabbo “ye puthū saṅkhātadhammā, ye ca puthū sekhā”ti.
tika-s0401t:567_3: Tesanti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sekkhāsekkhapuggalānaṃ me puṭṭhoti yojetabbaṃ, mayā puṭṭhoti
tika-s0401t:567_4: attho. Iriyanti sekkhāsekkhabhūmiyā āgamanappaṭipadaṃ. Iriyati gacchati sekkhabhūmiṃ
tika-s0401t:567_5: asekkhabhūmiñca etāyāti iriyā, taṃ tesaṃ iriyaṃ āgamanappaṭipadaṃ mayā puṭṭho pabrūhi
tika-s0401t:567_6: kathehīti attho. Evaṃ bhagavā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitvā “imassa nu kho, sāriputta,
tika-s0401t:567_7: saṃkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti āha. Thero pañhaṃ oloketvā
tika-s0401t:567_8: “satthā maṃ sekkhāsekkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanappaṭipadaṃ pucchatī”ti pañhe nikkaṅkho
tika-s0401t:567_9: hutvā “āgamanappaṭipadā nāma khandhādivasena bahūhipi mukhehi sakkā kathetuṃ, katarākārena
tika-s0401t:567_10: nu kho kathento satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti ajjhāsaye kaṅkhi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
tika-s0401t:567_11: vuttaṃ – “dhammasenāpati…pe… na sakkotī”ti. Pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ paṭibhāne
tika-s0401t:567_12: asati disāvilokanaṃ sattānaṃ sabhāvoti dassento, “puratthima…pe... nāsakkhī”ti āha.
tika-s0401t:568_0: Therassa kilamanabhāvaṃ jānitvāti “sāriputto pañhe nikkaṅkho, ajjhāsaye me kaṅkhamāno
tika-s0401t:568_1: kilamatī”ti therassa kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā. Catumahābhūtikakāyapariggahanti etena
tika-s0401t:568_3: hi vadantena bhagavatā khandhavasena nāmarūpapariggaho dassito. Evaṃ kirassa bhagavato
tika-s0401t:568_4: ahosi “sāriputto mayā naye adinne kathetuṃ na sakkhissati, dinne pana naye mamajjhāsayaṃ
tika-s0401t:568_5: gahetvā khandhavasena kathessatī”ti. Therassa saha nayadānena so pañho nayasatena
tika-s0401t:568_6: nayasahassena upaṭṭhāsi. Tenāha – “aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugatā”ti.
tika-s0401t:569_0: Arūpāvacare paṭisandhi nāma na hotīti bodhisambhārasambharaṇassa anokāsabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:569_2: attho. Rūpāvacare nibbattīti kammavasitāsambhavato arūpāvacare anibbattitvā rūpāvacare nibbatti.
tika-s0401t:570_0: Parosahassantiādinā parosahassajātakaṃ dasseti. Tattha parosahassampīti atirekasahassampi.
tika-s0401t:570_1: Samāgatānanti sannipatitānaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānituṃ asakkontānaṃ bālānaṃ. Kandeyyuṃ
tika-s0401t:570_2: te vassasataṃ apaññāti te evaṃ samāgatā apaññā ime bālattā sasā viya vassasatampi
tika-s0401t:570_3: vassasahassampi rodeyyuṃ parideveyyuṃ. Rodamānāpi pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā neva
tika-s0401t:570_4: jāneyyunti dīpeti. Ekova seyyo puriso sapaññoti evarūpānaṃ bālānaṃ parosahassatopi
tika-s0401t:570_5: eko paṇḍitapurisova seyyo varataroti attho. Kīdiso sapaññoti āha – “yo bhāsitassa
tika-s0401t:570_6: vijānāti attha”nti, ayaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko viya yo bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti, so tādiso
tika-s0401t:570_7: sapañño varataroti attho. Dutiye parosatajātake jhāyeyyunti yāthāvato atthaṃ jānituṃ
tika-s0401t:571_0: Tatiyajātake ye saññinoti ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanalābhino avasesacittakasatte
tika-s0401t:571_1: dasseti. Tepi duggatāti tassā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā alābhato tepi duggatā
tika-s0401t:571_2: dukkhaṃ upagatā saññībhave. “Saññā rogo saññā gaṇḍo saññā salla”nti hi te saññāya
tika-s0401t:571_3: ādīnavadassino. Yepi asaññinoti asaññībhave nibbatte acittakasatte dasseti. Tepi
tika-s0401t:571_4: imissāyeva samāpattiyā alābhato duggatāyeva. Jhānasukhaṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ niddosaṃ yathāvuttadosābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:571_5: Balavacittekaggatāsabhāvenapi taṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Nevasaññī nāsaññīti āhāti
tika-s0401t:571_6: atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññāyatane kālaṃ karonto
tika-s0401t:571_7: antevāsikehi puṭṭho “nevasaññī nāsaññī”ti āha. Purimajātake vuttanayeneva tāpasā
tika-s0401t:571_8: jeṭṭhantevāsikassa kathaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu. Bodhisatto ābhassarato āgantvā ākāse ṭhatvā
tika-s0401t:571_9: imaṃ gāthamāha. Tena vuttaṃ – “sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti.
tika-s0401t:572_0: Catutthajātake candassa viya ābhā etassāti candābhaṃ, odātakasiṇaṃ. Sūriyābhanti
tika-s0401t:572_1: sūriyassa viya ābhā etassāti sūriyābhaṃ, pītakasiṇaṃ. Yodha paññāya gādhatīti yo
tika-s0401t:572_2: puggalo idha sattaloke idaṃ kasiṇadvayaṃ paññāya gādhati, ārammaṇaṃ katvā anuppavisati,
tika-s0401t:572_3: tattha vā patiṭṭhahati. Avitakkena dutiyajjhānena ābhassarūpago hotīti so puggalo
tika-s0401t:572_4: tathā katvā paṭiladdhena dutiyena jhānena ābhassarabrahmalokūpago hoti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva
tika-s0401t:572_5: veditabbanti iminā imaṃ dasseti – atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto
tika-s0401t:572_6: araññāyatane kālaṃ karonto antevāsikehi pucchito “candābhaṃ sūriyābha”nti vatvā ābhassare
tika-s0401t:572_7: nibbatto. Tāpasā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa na saddahiṃsu. Bodhisatto āgantvā ākāse ṭhito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0401t:573_0: Pañcamajātake āsīsethevāti āsācchedaṃ akatvā attano kammesu āsaṃ kareyyeva. Na nibbindeyyāti
tika-s0401t:573_1: na nibbedaṃ uppādeyya, na ukkaṇṭheyyāti attho. Voti nipātamattaṃ. Yathā icchinti
tika-s0401t:573_2: ahañhi saṭṭhihatthā narakā uṭṭhānaṃ icchiṃ, somhi tatheva jāto, tato uṭṭhitoyevāti dīpeti.
tika-s0401t:574_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sarabhamigayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
tika-s0401t:574_1: araññe paṭivasati. Rājā migavittako ahosi thāmasampanno. Ekadivasaṃ gantvā amacce
tika-s0401t:574_2: āha – “yassa passena migo palāyati, teneva so dātabbo”ti. Athekadivasaṃ sarabhamigo
tika-s0401t:574_3: uṭṭhāya rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānena palāyi. Atha naṃ amaccā uppaṇḍesuṃ. Rājā cintesi – “ime
tika-s0401t:574_4: maṃ parihāsanti, mama pamāṇaṃ na jānantī”ti gāḷhaṃ nivāsetvā pattikova khaggaṃ ādāya
tika-s0401t:574_5: “sarabhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vegena pakkhandi. Atha naṃ disvā tīṇi yojanāni anubandhi.
tika-s0401t:574_6: Sarabho araññaṃ pāvisi. Rājāpi pāvisiyeva. Tattha sarabhamigassa gamanamagge saṭṭhihatthamatto
tika-s0401t:574_7: mahāpūtipātanarakaāvāṭo atthi, so tiṃsahatthamattaṃ udakena puṇṇo tiṇehi ca paṭicchanno.
tika-s0401t:574_8: Sarabho udakagandhaṃ ghāyitvāva āvāṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā thokaṃ osakkitvā gato. Rājā pana
tika-s0401t:575_0: Sarabho tassa padasaddaṃ asuṇanto nivattitvā taṃ apassanto “narakaāvāṭe patito bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0401t:575_1: ñatvā āgantvā olokento taṃ gambhīre udake appatiṭṭhe kilamantaṃ disvā tena katāparādhaṃ
tika-s0401t:575_2: hadaye akatvā sañjātakāruñño “mā mayi passante varāko nassatu, imamhā taṃ dukkhā
tika-s0401t:575_3: mocessāmī”ti āvāṭatīre ṭhito “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, ahaṃ taṃ dukkhā mocessāmī”ti vatvā
tika-s0401t:575_4: attano piyaputtaṃ uddharituṃ ussāhaṃ karonto viya tassuddharaṇatthāya silāya yoggaṃ
tika-s0401t:575_5: katvā “vijjhissāmī”ti āgataṃ rājānaṃ saṭṭhihatthā narakā uddharitvā assāsetvā piṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0401t:575_6: āropetvā araññā nīharitvā senāya avidūre otāretvā ovādamassa datvā pañcasu sīlesu
tika-s0401t:575_7: patiṭṭhāpesi. Rājā senaṅgaparivuto nagaraṃ gantvā “ito paṭṭhāya sakalaraṭṭhavāsino
tika-s0401t:575_8: pañca sīlāni rakkhantū”ti dhammabheriṃ carāpesi. Mahāsattena pana attano kataguṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:575_9: kassaci akathetvā sāyaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā alaṅkatasayane sayitvā paccūsakāle
tika-s0401t:575_10: mahāsattassa guṇaṃ saritvā uṭṭhāya sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅkena nisīditvā pītipuṇṇena
tika-s0401t:575_11: hadayena udānaṃ udānento “āsīsetheva puriso”tiādinā imā cha gāthā abhāsi.
tika-s0401t:576_0: Tattha ahitā hitā cāti dukkhaphassā sukhaphassā ca, maraṇaphassā, jīvitaphassātipi
tika-s0401t:576_1: attho. Sattānañhi maraṇaphasso ahito, jīvitaphasso hito. Tesaṃ acintito maraṇaphasso
tika-s0401t:576_2: āgacchatīti dasseti. Acintitampīti mayā “āvāṭe patissāmī”ti na cintitaṃ, “sarabhaṃ
tika-s0401t:576_3: māressāmī”ti cintitaṃ. Idāni pana me cintitaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acintitameva jātanti udānavasena
tika-s0401t:576_4: vadati. Bhogāti yasaparivārā, ete cintāmayā na honti. Tasmā ñāṇavatā vīriyameva kātabbanti
tika-s0401t:577_0: Tassetaṃ udānaṃ udānentasseva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahi. Purohito pātova sukhaseyyapucchanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:577_1: āgantvā dvāre ṭhito tassa udānagītasaddaṃ sutvā cintesi – “rājā hiyyo migavaṃ agamāsi,
tika-s0401t:577_2: tattha sarabhamigaṃ viddho bhavissati, tena maññe udānaṃ udānetī”ti. Evaṃ brāhmaṇassa
tika-s0401t:577_3: rañño paripuṇṇabyañjanaṃ udānaṃ sutvā sumajjite ādāse mukhaṃ olokentassa chāyā viya
tika-s0401t:577_4: raññā ca sarabhena ca katakāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi, so nakhaggena dvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Rājā
tika-s0401t:577_5: “ko eso”ti pucchi. Ahaṃ, deva, purohitoti. Athassa dvāraṃ vivaritvā “ito ehācariyā”ti
tika-s0401t:577_6: āha. So pavisitvā rājānaṃ jayāpetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “ahaṃ, mahārāja, tayā araññe
tika-s0401t:577_7: katakāraṇaṃ jānāmi, tvaṃ ekaṃ sarabhamigaṃ anubandhanto narake patito, atha naṃ so
tika-s0401t:577_8: sarabho silāya yoggaṃ katvā narakato uddhari, so tvaṃ tassa guṇaṃ saritvā udānaṃ
tika-s0401t:577_9: udānesī”ti vatvā “sarabhaṃ giriduggasmi”ntiādinā dve gāthā abhāsi.
tika-s0401t:578_0: Tattha anusarīti anubandhi. Vikkantanti uddharaṇatthāya kataparakkamaṃ. Anujīvasīti
tika-s0401t:578_1: upajīvasi, tassānubhāvena tayā jīvitaṃ laddhanti attho. Samuddharīti uddharaṇaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0401t:578_2: Silāya yoggaṃ sarabho karitvāti silāya sopānasadisāya narakato uddharaṇayoggataṃ
tika-s0401t:578_3: karitvā. Alīnacittanti saṅkocaṃ appattacittaṃ. Ta migaṃ vadesīti suvaṇṇasarabhamigaṃ
tika-s0401t:578_4: idha sirisayane nipanno vaṇṇesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā, “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ na migavaṃ āgato,
tika-s0401t:578_5: sabbañca pavattiṃ jānāti, kathaṃ nu kho jānāti, pucchissāmi na”nti cintetvā – “kiṃ
tika-s0401t:578_6: tvaṃ nu tatthevā”ti navamagāthamāha. Tattha bhiṃsarūpanti kiṃ nu te ñāṇaṃ balavajātikaṃ,
tika-s0401t:578_7: tenetaṃ jānāsīti vadati. Brāhmaṇo “nāhaṃ sabbaññubuddho, byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā tayā
tika-s0401t:578_8: kathitagāthāya pana mayhaṃ attho upaṭṭhātī”ti dīpento “na cevaha”nti dasamagāthamāha.
tika-s0401t:578_9: Tattha subhāsitānanti byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā suṭṭhu bhāsitānaṃ. Atthaṃ tadānentīti
tika-s0401t:578_10: yo tesaṃ attho, taṃ ānenti upadhārentīti attho. Tadā purohito dhammasenāpati ahosi.
tika-s0401t:580_2: ca rattaññutā veditabbāti taṃ dassento “ṭhapetvā hi sammāsambuddha”ntiādimāha. Pākaṭova
tika-s0401t:580_3: hotīti satipaññāvepullappattiko pākaṭo vibhūto hoti. Aññāsikoṇḍaññoti sāvakesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-s0401t:580_4: cattāri ariyasaccāni ñātakoṇḍañño. Sabbesupi etadaggesūti sabbesupi etadaggasuttesu,
tika-s0401t:581_0: Dhurapattānīti pattānaṃ pamukhabhūtāni bāhirapattāni. Navutihatthānīti majjhimapurisassa
tika-s0401t:581_1: hatthena navutiratanāni. Padumeneva taṃ taṃ padesaṃ uttarati atikkamatīti padumuttaro,
tika-s0401t:581_2: bhagavā. Gandhadāmamālādāmādīhīti ādisaddena pattadāmādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha gandhadāmehi
tika-s0401t:581_3: katamālā gandhadāmaṃ. Lavaṅgatakkolajātipupphādīhi katamālā mālādāmaṃ. Tamālapattādīhi
tika-s0401t:581_4: katamālā pattadāmaṃ. Vaṅgapaṭṭeti vaṅgadese uppannaghanasukhumavatthe. Uttamasukhumavatthanti kāsikavatthamāha.
tika-s0401t:582_2: pariññāta”ntiādinā katavasena ca tīhi ākārehi parivaṭṭetvā catunnaṃ saccānaṃ desitattā
tika-s0401t:582_3: tayo parivaṭṭā etassa atthīti tiparivaṭṭaṃ, tiparivaṭṭameva teparivaṭṭaṃ, teparivaṭṭañca
tika-s0401t:583_0: Sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā ādāyāti sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā tattha labbhamānaṃ sālikhīrarasaṃ
tika-s0401t:583_1: ādāya. Anucchavikanti buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ khīrapāyasaṃ pacāpema. Veṇiyo purisabhāvavasena
tika-s0401t:583_2: bandhitvā kalāpakaraṇe kalāpaggaṃ. Khale kalāpānaṃ ṭhapanadivase khalaggaṃ. Madditvā
tika-s0401t:583_3: vīhīnaṃ rāsikaraṇadivase khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ. Koṭṭhesu hi dhaññassa pakkhipanadivase koṭṭhaggaṃ.
tika-s0401t:584_0: Dve gatiyoti dve eva nipphattiyo, dve niṭṭhāti attho. Tasmiṃ kumāre sabbaññutaṃ patteti
tika-s0401t:584_1: koṇḍaññamāṇavasseva laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā itarepi cha janā putte anusāsiṃsu. Bodhirukkhamūle
tika-s0401t:584_2: pācīnapassaṃ acalaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, yaṃ “vajirāsana”ntipi vuccati. Mahataṃ mahatiyo vahatīti
tika-s0401t:584_4: appaṭighātaṃ mahāvisayañcāti. Caturaṅgasamannāgatanti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi
tika-s0401t:585_0: Idaṃ pana sabbamevāti “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmī”tiādinayappavattaṃ
tika-s0401t:585_1: sabbameva. Parivitakkamattameva tathā atthasiddhiyā abhāvato. Pupphitaphalitaṃ katvāti
tika-s0401t:585_3: karonto pupphitaṃ phalitaṃ katvā. Apakkamitukāmo hutvāti dvepi aggasāvake attano
tika-s0401t:585_4: nipaccakāraṃ karonte disvā tesaṃ guṇātirekataṃ bahu maññanto buddhānaṃ santikā apakkamitukāmo
tika-s0401t:587_0: 189-190. Dutiyatatiyesu iddhimantānanti ettha manta-saddo atisayatthavisayoti therassa
tika-s0401t:587_1: atisayikaiddhitaṃ dassetuṃ – “iddhiyā sampannāna”nti vuttaṃ. Saha paṃsūhi kīḷiṃsūti
tika-s0401t:587_4: sāriputto, puthupañño, bhikkhave, sāriputto, hāsapañño, bhikkhave, sāriputto, javanapañño,
tika-s0401t:587_5: bhikkhave, sāriputto, tikkhapañño, bhikkhave, sāriputto, nibbedhikapañño, bhikkhave,
tika-s0401t:587_6: sāriputto”ti evamāgatā mahāpaññādikā cha, tasmiṃyeva sutte āgatā navānupubbavihārasamāpattipaññā,
tika-s0401t:587_7: arahattamaggapaññāti imā soḷasavidhā paññā paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito.
tika-s0401t:588_0: Pañhasākacchanti pañhassa pucchanavasena vissajjanavasena ca sākacchaṃ karoti. Atthikehi
tika-s0401t:588_1: upaññātaṃ magganti etaṃ anubandhanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃnūnāhaṃ
tika-s0401t:588_2: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā idaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito
tika-s0401t:588_3: anubandhanaṃ nāma atthikehi upaññātaṃ maggaṃ, ñāto ceva upagato ca maggoti attho.
tika-s0401t:588_4: Atha vā atthikehi amhehi maraṇe sati amatenapi bhavitabbanti evaṃ kevalaṃ atthīti
tika-s0401t:588_5: upaññātaṃ, anumānañāṇena upagantvā ñātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ magganto pariyesantoti
tika-s0401t:589_0: Nesaṃ parisāyāti dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ parivārabhūtaparisāya. Dve aggasāvaketi sāriputtamoggallāne
tika-s0401t:589_1: dve mahānubhāve sāvake. Ṭhānantareti aggasāvakattasaññite ṭhānantare ṭhapesi. Kasmā
tika-s0401t:589_2: panettha “aggasāvake”ti avatvā “mahāsāvake”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi aññepi mahātherā abhiññātādiguṇavisesayogena
tika-s0401t:589_3: “mahāsāvakā”ti vattabbataṃ labhanti, imeyeva pana sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇabhūtā visesato
tika-s0401t:591_0: 191. Catutthe yasmā dhutavādadhutadhammadhutaṅgāni dhutamūlakāni, tasmā “dhuto veditabbo”ti
tika-s0401t:591_1: āraddhaṃ, tattha kilese dhuni dhutavāti dhuto, dhutakileso puggalo, kilesadhunano
tika-s0401t:591_2: vā dhammo, kilesadhunano dhammoti ca sapubbabhāgo ariyamaggo daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ dhutasaññitaṃ
tika-s0401t:591_3: kilesadhunanadhammaṃ vadati, pare tattha patiṭṭhāpetīti dhutavādo. Catukkañcettha
tika-s0401t:591_4: sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ – “ettha panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tayidanti nipāto, tassa so
tika-s0401t:591_5: ayanti attho. Dhutabhūtassa dhutabhūtā dhammā dhutadhammā. Appicchatā santuṭṭhitā
tika-s0401t:591_6: heṭṭhā vuttā eva. Kilese sammā likhati tacchatīti sallekho, kilesajegucchī, tassa
tika-s0401t:591_7: bhāvo sallekhatā. Dvīhipi kāmehi viviccatīti paviveko, yonisomanasikārabahulo puggalo,
tika-s0401t:591_8: tassa bhāvo pavivekatā. Iminā sarīraṭṭhapanamattena atthīti idamaṭṭhi ttha-kārassa
tika-s0401t:591_9: ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā, tassa bhāvo idamaṭṭhitā, imehi vā kusaladhammehi atthi idamaṭṭhi,
tika-s0401t:591_10: yena ñāṇena “pabbajitena nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabba”nti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0401t:591_11: dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca, taṃ ñāṇaṃ idamaṭṭhitā. Tenāha – “idamaṭṭhitā
tika-s0401t:591_12: ñāṇamevā”ti. Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:591_13: dhunanavasena pavattiyā dhutoti laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti
tika-s0401t:591_14: katvā dhutadhammā nāma. Anupatantīti tadantogadhā tappariyāpannā honti tadubhayasseva
tika-s0401t:592_0: Paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ…pe… nesajjikaṅganti uddesopi peyyālanayena dassito. Yadettha vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:592_1: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttaṃ. Dhutavādaggahaṇeneva therassa dhutabhāvopi
tika-s0401t:592_2: gahito hotīti “dhutavādāna”nteva vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ mahāti abhinīhārādimahantatāyapi sāsanassa
tika-s0401t:592_3: upakāritāyapi ayaṃ thero mahā, guṇamahantatāya pasaṃsāvacanameva vā etaṃ therassa
tika-s0401t:593_0: Satthu dhammadesanāya vatthuttaye sañjātappasādatāya upāsakabhāve ṭhitattā vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:593_2: saccabhāvāvaho kāro, avisaṃvādanavasena vā tadatthasādhanoti attho. Kolāhalanti kutūhalavipphāro.
tika-s0401t:593_3: Satthā sattame sattame saṃvacchare dhammaṃ kathento sattānaṃ savanayoggaṃ kālaṃ sallakkhento
tika-s0401t:593_4: divā sāyanhasamayaṃ katheti, rattiyaṃ sakalayāmaṃ. Tenāha – “brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇe āha
tika-s0401t:593_5: – ‘bhoti kiṃ rattiṃ dhammaṃ suṇissasi divā”’ti. Vissāsikoti vissāsikabhāvo. “Tato
tika-s0401t:594_0: Dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramissāti idaṃ sā paramparāya sotapatitaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0401t:594_1: āha. Adinnavipākassāti avipakkavipākassa. Bhaddake kāleti yutte kāle. Nakkhattanti
tika-s0401t:594_2: nakkhattena lakkhitaṃ chaṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiñhi nakkhatte anubhavitabbachaṇāni nakkhattāni
tika-s0401t:594_3: nāma, itarāni pana chaṇāni nāma. Sammāpatitadukkhato vimocanena tato niyyānāvahatāya
tika-s0401t:594_4: icchitatthassa labhāpanato ca niyyānikaṃ. Tesanti suvaṇṇapadumānaṃ. Olambakāti suvaṇṇaratanavicittā
tika-s0401t:594_5: ratanadāmā. Puññaniyāmenāti puññānubhāvasiddhena niyāmena. Svassa bārāṇasirajjaṃ
tika-s0401t:594_7: pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍanti vadanti. Idha pana setacchattaṃ visuṃ gahitanti
tika-s0401t:594_8: sīhāsanaṃ pañcamaṃ katvā vadanti. Pārupanakaṇṇanti pārupanavatthassa dasantaṃ. Dibbavatthadāyipuññānubhāvacodito
tika-s0401t:594_9: “nanu tātā thūla”nti āha. Aho tapassīti aho kapaṇo ahaṃ rājāti attho. Buddhānaṃ saddahitvāti
tika-s0401t:594_10: buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ saddahitvā. Caṅkamanasatānīti iti-saddo ādyattho. Tena hi aggisālādīni
tika-s0401t:595_0: Sādhukīḷitanti ariyānaṃ parinibbutaṭṭhāne kātabbasakkāraṃ vadati. Nappamajji, nirogā
tika-s0401t:595_1: ayyāti pucchitākāradassanaṃ. Parinibbutā devāti devī paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. Paṭiyādetvāti
tika-s0401t:595_2: niyyātetvā. Samaṇakapabbajjanti samitapāpehi ariyehi anuṭṭhātabbapabbajjaṃ. So hi
tika-s0401t:595_3: rājā paccekabuddhānaṃ vesassa diṭṭhattā “idameva bhaddaka”nti tādisaṃyeva liṅgaṃ
tika-s0401t:595_4: gaṇhi. Tatthevāti brahmaloke eva. Vīsatime vasse sampatteti āharitvā sambandho. Brahmalokato
tika-s0401t:595_5: cavitvā nibbattattā, brahmacariyādhikārassa ca cirakālasambhūtattā “evarūpaṃ kathaṃ
tika-s0401t:595_6: mā kathethā”ti āha. Vīsati dharaṇāni nikkhanti vadanti, pañcapalaṃ nikkhanti apare.
tika-s0401t:595_7: Itthākaroti itthiratanassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Ayyadhītāti amhākaṃ ayyassa dhītā, bhaddakāpilānīti
tika-s0401t:595_8: attho. Samānapaṇṇanti sadisapaṇṇaṃ sadisalekhaṃ kumārassa kumārikāya ca yuttaṃ paṇṇalekhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:595_9: Te purisā samāgataṭṭhānato magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāmaṃ maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagarañca
tika-s0401t:595_10: uddissa apakkamantā aññamaññaṃ vissajjantā nāma hontīti “ito ca etto ca pesesu”nti vuttā.
tika-s0401t:596_0: Pupphadāmanti hatthihatthappamāṇaṃ pupphadāmaṃ. Tānīti tāni ubhohi ganthāpitāni dve
tika-s0401t:596_1: pupphadāmāni. Teti ubho bhaddā ceva pippalikumāro ca. Lokāmisenāti kāmassādena. Asaṃsaṭṭhāti
tika-s0401t:596_2: na saṃyuttā ghaṭe jalantena viya padīpena ajjhāsaye samujjalantena vimokkhabījena
tika-s0401t:596_3: samussāhitacittattā. Yantabaddhānīti sassasampādanatthaṃ tattha tattha dvārakavāṭayojanavasena
tika-s0401t:596_4: baddhāni nikkhamanatumbāni. Kammantoti kasikammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Dāsikagāmāti dāsānaṃ
tika-s0401t:596_5: vasanagāmā. Osāretvāti pakkhipitvā. Ākappakuttavasenāti ākāravasena kiriyāvasena.
tika-s0401t:596_6: Ananucchavikanti pabbajitabhāvassa ananurūpaṃ. Tassa matthaketi dvedhāpathassa dvidhābhūtaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0401t:596_7: Etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti nisīdatīti sambandho. Sā pana tattha satthu nisajjā
tika-s0401t:596_8: edisīti dassetuṃ – “nisīdanto panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yā buddhānaṃ aparimitakālasambhūtācinteyyāpariññeyyapuññasambhārūpacayanibbattā
tika-s0401t:596_10: byāmappabhāketumālālaṅkatā sabhāvasiddhitāya akittimā rūpakāyasirī, taṃyeva mahākassapassa
tika-s0401t:596_12: nisīdī”ti vutto. Asītihatthappadesaṃ byāpetvā pavattiyā asītihatthāti vuttā. Satasākhoti
tika-s0401t:596_13: bahusākho anekasākho. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇova ahosi nirantaraṃ buddharasmīhi samantato samokiṇṇabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:597_0: Tīsu ṭhānesūti dūrato nātidūre āsanneti tīsu ṭhānesu. Tīhi ovādehīti “tasmātiha te,
tika-s0401t:597_1: kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu
tika-s0401t:597_2: navesu majjhimesū’ti. Evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ
tika-s0401t:597_3: sikkhitabbaṃ ‘yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ suṇissāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā
tika-s0401t:597_4: manasi karitvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti, evañhi
tika-s0401t:597_5: te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘sātasahagatā
tika-s0401t:597_6: ca me kāyagatāsati na vijahissatī’ti, evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba”nti imehi tīhi
tika-s0401t:597_7: ovādehi. Ettha hi bhagavā paṭhamaṃ ovādaṃ therassa brāhmaṇajātikattā jātimānappahānatthamabhāsi,
tika-s0401t:597_8: dutiyaṃ bāhusaccaṃ nissāya uppajjanakaahaṃkārappahānatthaṃ, tatiyaṃ upadhisampattiṃ
tika-s0401t:597_9: nissāya uppajjanakaattasinehappahānatthaṃ. Mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ.
tika-s0401t:597_10: Kasmā pana bhagavā evamāha? Therena saha cīvaraṃ parivattetukāmatāya. Kasmā parivattetukāmo
tika-s0401t:597_11: jātoti? Theraṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetukāmatāya. Kiṃ sāriputtamoggallānā natthīti? Atthi,
tika-s0401t:597_12: evaṃ panassa ahosi “imena ciraṃ ṭhassanti, kassapo pana vīsativassasatāyuko, so mayi
tika-s0401t:597_13: parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ vasitvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālappavattanakaṃ
tika-s0401t:597_14: karissatīti attano ṭhāne ṭhapesi. Evaṃ bhikkhū kassapassa sussūsitabbaṃ maññissantī”ti. Tasmā evamāha.
tika-s0401t:598_0: Candūpamoti candasadiso hutvā. Kiṃ parimaṇḍalatāya? No, apica kho yathā cando gaganatalaṃ
tika-s0401t:598_1: pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā karoti, na ca na
tika-s0401t:598_2: hoti mahājanassa piyo manāpo, ayampi evaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena
tika-s0401t:598_3: bahujanassa piyo manāpo candūpamo hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamatīti
tika-s0401t:598_4: attho. Apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena kāyañca
tika-s0401t:598_5: cittañca apakaḍḍhitvā, apanetvāti attho. Niccaṃ navoti niccanavakova, āgantukasadiso
tika-s0401t:598_6: hutvāti attho. Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagehaṃ pavisitvā sace naṃ gharasāmikā
tika-s0401t:598_7: disvā “amhākampi puttabhātaro vippavāsaṃ gantvā evaṃ vicariṃsū”ti anukampamānā nisīdāpetvā
tika-s0401t:598_8: bhojenti, bhuttamattoyeva “tumhākaṃ bhājanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti uṭṭhāya pakkamati, na tehi
tika-s0401t:598_9: saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā karoti, kiccakaraṇīyāni vā saṃvidahati, evamayampi paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0401t:598_10: sampattaṃ gharaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ iriyāpathe pasannā manussā denti, taṃ gahetvā chinnasanthavo
tika-s0401t:598_11: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭo hutvā nikkhamatīti dīpeti.
tika-s0401t:599_0: Appagabbhoti nappagabbho, aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena, catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena,
tika-s0401t:599_1: anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitoti attho. Aṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ kāyapāgabbhiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:599_3: ca kāyena appatirūpakaraṇaṃ. Catuṭṭhānaṃ vacīpāgabbhiyaṃ nāma saṅghagaṇapuggalaantaragharesu
tika-s0401t:599_4: appatirūpavācānicchāraṇaṃ. Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi
tika-s0401t:599_5: ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasā kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanaṃ. Sabbesampi imesaṃ pāgabbhiyānaṃ
tika-s0401t:599_6: abhāvena appagabbho hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamatīti attho. Kassapasaṃyuttena ca candūpamappaṭipadāditherassa
tika-s0401t:599_7: dhutavādesu aggabhāvassa bodhitattā vuttaṃ “etadeva kassapasaṃyuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0401t:601_2: Lohamayesupi hi tesu dīpādhāresu dīparukkhakāti ruḷhiresā daṭṭhabbā. Olambakadīpamaṇḍaladīpasañcaraṇadīpādikā sesadīpā.
tika-s0401t:602_0: Anupariyāyi padakkhiṇakaraṇavasena. Ahaṃ tenāti yena tuyhaṃ attho, ahaṃ tena pavāremi,
tika-s0401t:602_1: tasmā taṃ āharāpetvā gaṇhāti attho. Suvaṇṇapātiyaṃyevassa bhattaṃ uppajjīti devatānubhāvena
tika-s0401t:602_2: uppajji, na kiñci pacanakiccaṃ atthi. Satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakkesīti “appicchassāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:602_3: dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo mahicchassā”tiādike satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakkesi. Aṭṭhameti
tika-s0401t:602_4: “nippapañcārāmassāyaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo papañcārāmassā”ti etasmiṃ purisavitakke.
tika-s0401t:603_0: Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti “appicchassāyaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo mahicchassā”tiādinā mahāpurisavitakkavasena
tika-s0401t:603_1: āraddhamattaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ asamatthabhāvena ṭhitaṃ mama saṅkappaṃ jānitvā. Manomayenāti
tika-s0401t:603_2: manomayena viya manasā nimmitasadisena, pariṇāmitenāti attho. Iddhiyāti “ayaṃ kāyo
tika-s0401t:603_3: idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti evaṃ pavattāya adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā.
tika-s0401t:604_0: Yadā me ahu saṅkappoti yasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ “kīdiso nu kho aṭṭhamo mahāpurisavitakko”ti
tika-s0401t:604_1: parivitakko ahosi, yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato mama saṅkappamaññāya iddhiyā upasaṅkami,
tika-s0401t:604_2: uttari desayīti yojanā. Uttari desayīti “nippapañcārāmassāyaṃ dhammo nippapañcaratino,
tika-s0401t:604_3: nāyaṃ dhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino”ti imaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūrento
tika-s0401t:604_4: upari desayi. Taṃ pana desitaṃ dassento āha – “nippapañcarato buddho, nippapañcamadesayī”ti,
tika-s0401t:604_5: papañcā nāma rāgādayo kilesā, tesaṃ vūpasamanatāya tadabhāvato ca lokuttaradhammā
tika-s0401t:604_6: nippapañcā nāma. Yathā taṃ pāpuṇāti, tathā dhammaṃ desesi, sāmukkaṃsikaṃ catusaccadesanaṃ adesayīti attho.
tika-s0401t:605_0: Tassāhaṃ dhammamaññāyāti tassa satthu desanādhammaṃ jānitvā. Vihāsinti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0401t:605_1: paṭipajjanto vihariṃ. Sāsane ratoti sikkhattayasaṅgahe sāsane abhirato. Tisso vijjā
tika-s0401t:605_2: anuppattāti pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ, dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇanti imā tisso vijjā
tika-s0401t:605_3: mayā anuppattā sacchikatā. Tato eva kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ, anusiṭṭhi ovādo anuṭṭhitoti attho.
tika-s0401t:607_0: 193. Chaṭṭhe ucca-saddena samānattho uccā-saddoti āha – “uccākulikānanti ucce kule
tika-s0401t:607_1: jātāna”nti. Kāḷī sā devīti kāḷavaṇṇatāya kāḷī sā devī. Kulānukkamena rajjānuppatti
tika-s0401t:609_0: 194. Sattame rittakoti deyyavatthurahito. Guṇe āvajjetvāti bhagavato rūpaguṇe ceva
tika-s0401t:609_1: ākappasampadādiguṇe ca attano adhippāyaṃ ñatvā ambapakkassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ paribhuñjananti
tika-s0401t:611_0: 195. Aṭṭhame abhītanādabhāvena sīhassa viya nādo sīhanādo, so etesaṃ atthīti sīhanādikā,
tika-s0401t:611_1: tesaṃ sīhanādikānaṃ. Garahitabbapasaṃsitabbadhamme yāthāvato jānantasseva garahā
tika-s0401t:611_2: pasaṃsā ca yuttarūpāti āha – “buddhā ca nāmā”tiādi. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa
tika-s0401t:611_3: bhūmiṃ dasseti. Tena hi ñāṇena ariyasāvako paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādiṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0401t:611_4: Katamā panassa jāti khīṇā, kathañca pajānātīti? Na tāvassa atītā khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
tika-s0401t:611_5: na anāgatā anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā vijjamānattā. Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā
tika-s0401t:611_6: uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti, sā maggassa
tika-s0401t:611_7: bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā. Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese
tika-s0401t:611_8: paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotī”ti jānanto pajānāti.
tika-s0401t:612_0: Vusitanti vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:612_1: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā maggabrahmacariyaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo
tika-s0401t:612_2: vuṭṭhavāso. Tasmā ariyasāvako attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti
tika-s0401t:612_3: pajānāti. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena
tika-s0401t:612_4: soḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti,
tika-s0401t:612_5: khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā ariyasāvako attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ
tika-s0401t:612_6: karaṇīya”nti pajānāti. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasavidhakiccabhāvāya,
tika-s0401t:612_7: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanāya kiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti. Atha vā itthattāyāti
tika-s0401t:612_8: itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ
tika-s0401t:612_9: mayhaṃ natthi, ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya,
tika-s0401t:612_10: te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti pajānāti.
tika-s0401t:614_0: 196. Navame aṭṭhārasasupi vijjāṭṭhānesu nipphattiṃ gatattā “sabbasippesu kovido hutvā”ti
tika-s0401t:614_1: vuttaṃ. Abhidayāabbhaññāvahasseva dhammassa tattha upalabbhanato “mokkhadhammaṃ adisvā”ti
tika-s0401t:614_2: vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “idaṃ vedattayaṃ nāmā”tiādi. Tathā hi anena duggatiparimuccanampi
tika-s0401t:614_3: dullabhaṃ, abhiññāparivārānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ lābhitāya sayaṃ ekadesena upasanto
tika-s0401t:614_5: “ayaṃ puriso”tiādimāha. Piṭakāni gahetvā āgacchantīti phalabhājanāni gahetvā assāmikāya
tika-s0401t:614_6: āgacchanti. Buddhānanti gāravavasena bahuvacananiddeso kato. Paribhuñjīti devatāhi
tika-s0401t:614_8: hi devatā tattha dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Sammasitvāti paccavekkhitvā, parivattetvāti
tika-s0401t:614_9: ca vadanti. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti mahādevattherassa anumodanakathāya anupubbikathāsakkhikāya
tika-s0401t:615_0: Dasahi kathāvatthūhīti appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā
tika-s0401t:615_3: jātibhūmivantadesavāsino, satthu jātadesavāsinoti attho. Sīsānulokikoti purato gacchantassa
tika-s0401t:615_4: sīsaṃ anu anu passanto. Okāsaṃ sallakkhetvāti sākacchāya avasaraṃ sallakkhetvā. Sattavisuddhikkamaṃ
tika-s0401t:615_5: pucchīti “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:615_6: satta visuddhiyo pucchi. Dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi savisesena dasakathāvatthulābhitāya.
tika-s0401t:617_0: 197. Dasame saṃkhittena kathitadhammassāti madhupiṇḍikasuttantadesanāsu viya saṅkhepena
tika-s0401t:617_1: desitadhammassa. Taṃ desanaṃ vitthāretvāti taṃ saṅkhepadesanaṃ āyatanādivasena vitthāretvā.
tika-s0401t:617_2: Atthaṃ vibhajamānānanti tassā saṅkhepadesanāya atthaṃ vibhajitvā kathentānaṃ. Atthavasena
tika-s0401t:617_3: vāti “ettakā etassa atthā”ti atthavasena vā desanaṃ pūretuṃ sakkonti. Byañjanavasena
tika-s0401t:617_4: vāti “ettakāni ettha byañjanāni desanāvasena vattabbānī”ti byañjanavasena vā pūretuṃ
tika-s0401t:617_5: sakkonti. Ayaṃ pana mahākaccānatthero ubhayavasenapi sakkoti tassa saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhassa
tika-s0401t:617_6: vitthārena satthu ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ desanato, tasmā tattha aggoti vutto. Vuttanayenevāti
tika-s0401t:617_7: “pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāyā”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva.
tika-s0401t:617_8: Aññehīti aññāsaṃ itthīnaṃ kesehi ativiya dīghā. Na kevalañca dīghā eva, atha kho
tika-s0401t:617_9: siniddhanīlamudukañcikā ca. Nikkesīti appakesī yathā “anudarā kaññā”ti.
tika-s0401t:618_0: Paṇiyanti vikketabbabhaṇḍaṃ. Āvajjetvāti upanissayaṃ kesānaṃ pakatibhāvāpattiñca
tika-s0401t:618_1: āvajjetvā. Gāravenāti muṇḍasīsāpi there gāravena ekavacaneneva āgantvā. Nimantetvāti
tika-s0401t:618_2: svātanāya nimantetvā. Imissā itthiyāti yathāvuttaseṭṭhidhītaramāha. Diṭṭhadhammikovāti
tika-s0401t:618_3: avadhāraṇaṃ aṭṭhānapayuttaṃ, diṭṭhadhammiko yasapaṭilābhova ahosīti attho. Yasapaṭilābhoti
tika-s0401t:618_4: ca bhavasampattipaṭilābho. Sattasu hi javanacetanāsu paṭhamā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaphalā,
tika-s0401t:618_5: pacchimā upapajjavedanīyaphalā, majjhe pañca aparāpariyavedanīyaphalā, tasmā paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0401t:618_6: ekaṃ cetanaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā yathāsakaṃ paripuṇṇaphaladāyino honti, paṭhamacetanāya
tika-s0401t:623_0: 198-200. Dutiyassa paṭhame manena nibbattitanti abhiññāmanena uppāditaṃ. Manena katakāyoti
tika-s0401t:623_1: abhiññācittena desantaraṃ pattakāyo. Manena nibbattitakāyoti abhiññāmanasā nimmitakāyo
tika-s0401t:623_2: “aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”tiādīsu viya. Ekasadiseyevāti attasadiseyeva. Ekavidhamevāti
tika-s0401t:623_3: attanā katappakārameva. Etapparamo hi yebhuyyena sāvakānaṃ iddhinimmānavidhi. Aggo
tika-s0401t:624_0: Lābhitāyāti ettha lābhīti īkāro atisayattho. Tena therassa catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
tika-s0401t:624_1: atisayena savisesalābhitaṃ dasseti. Arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ lābhitāyāti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0401t:624_2: nayo. Na kevalañcetā cetosaññāvivaṭṭakusalatā rūpārūpajjhānalābhitāya eva, atha kho
tika-s0401t:624_3: imehipi kāraṇehīti dassetuṃ – “cūḷapanthako cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cetoti cettha cittasīsena
tika-s0401t:624_4: samādhi vutto, tasmā cetaso samādhissa vivaṭṭanaṃ cetovivaṭṭo, ekasmiṃyevārammaṇe
tika-s0401t:624_5: samādhicittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa uparūpari hāpanato rūpāvacarajjhānalābhī
tika-s0401t:624_8: tathā itthipurisādisaññā niccasaññādito cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā kevale rūpārūpadhammamatte
tika-s0401t:624_9: asaṅkhate nibbāne ca visesato vaṭṭanato ca suññatānupassanābahulo saññāvivaṭṭakusalo.
tika-s0401t:624_11: saññāvivaṭṭakusalatā. Ekoti cūḷapanthakattheraṃ vadati. Samādhilakkhaṇeti savitakkasavicārādisamādhisabhāve.
tika-s0401t:624_12: Puna ekoti mahāpanthakattheramāha. Vipassanālakkhaṇeti sattaanupassanā aṭṭhārasamahāvipassanādivipassanāsabhāve.
tika-s0401t:624_13: Samādhigāḷhoti samādhismiṃ ogāḷhacitto subhāvitabhāvanatā. Aṅgasaṃkhitteti caturaṅgikativaṅgikādivasena
tika-s0401t:624_15: saṃkhipane. Aṅgavavatthāpaneti vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vavatthāpane. Ārammaṇavavatthāpaneti
tika-s0401t:625_0: Jhānaṅgehīti rūpāvacarajjhānaṅgehi, jhānaṅgāneva jhānaṃ. Puna jhānaṅgehīti arūpāvacarajjhānaṅgehi.
tika-s0401t:625_1: Bhātāti jeṭṭhabhātā. Assāti kuṭumbiyassa. Suvaṇṇapūjanti sovaṇṇamayaṃ pupphapūjaṃ
tika-s0401t:625_2: katvā. Devapureti tāvatiṃsabhavane sudassanamahānagare. Aggadvārenāti tasmiṃ divase
tika-s0401t:626_0: Kokanadanti padumavisesanaṃ yathā “kokāsaka”nti. Taṃ kira bahupattaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ
tika-s0401t:626_1: atisugandhañca hoti. “Kokanadaṃ nāma setapaduma”ntipi vadanti. Pātoti pageva. Ayañhettha
tika-s0401t:626_2: attho – yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pāto sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ phullaṃ vikasitaṃ
tika-s0401t:626_3: avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ, evaṃ sarīragandhena guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṃ saradakāle
tika-s0401t:626_4: antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano tejasā tapantaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇakajutiyā aṅgīrasaṃ
tika-s0401t:627_0: Cūḷapanthako kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle pabbajitvā paññavā hutvā aññatarassa
tika-s0401t:627_1: dandhabhikkhuno uddesagahaṇakāle parihāsakeḷiṃ akāsi. So bhikkhu tena parihāsena
tika-s0401t:627_2: lajjito neva uddesaṃ gaṇhi, na sajjhāyamakāsi. Tena kammenāyaṃ pabbajitvāva dandho
tika-s0401t:627_3: jāto, tasmā gahitagahitapadaṃ upariuparipadaṃ gaṇhantassa nassati. Iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā
tika-s0401t:627_4: suddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ adāsīti tassa pubbahetuṃ disvā tadanurūpe kammaṭṭhāne niyojento
tika-s0401t:627_5: suddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ adāsi. So kira pubbe rājā hutvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto nalāṭato
tika-s0401t:627_6: sede muccante parisuddhena sāṭakena nalāṭaṃ puñchi, sāṭako kiliṭṭho ahosi. So “imaṃ
tika-s0401t:627_7: sarīraṃ nissāya evarūpo parisuddhasāṭako pakatiṃ jahitvā kiliṭṭho jāto, aniccā vata
tika-s0401t:627_8: saṅkhārā”ti aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhi. Tena kāraṇenassa rajoharaṇameva paccayo jāto.
tika-s0401t:628_1: Evaṃgatikamevāti idaṃ cittampi bhavaṅgavasena pakatiyā paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ rāgādisampayuttadhammavasena
tika-s0401t:628_2: saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ jātanti dasseti. Nakkhattaṃ samānetvāti nakkhattaṃ samannāharitvā, āvajjetvāti
tika-s0401t:628_3: attho. Biḷārassatthāyāti biḷārassa gocaratthāya. Jalapathakammikenāti samuddakammikena.
tika-s0401t:628_4: Cārinti khāditabbatiṇaṃ. Saccakāranti saccabhāvāvahaṃ kāraṃ, “attanā gahite bhaṇḍe
tika-s0401t:628_5: aññesaṃ na dātabba”nti vatvā dātabbalañjanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatiyena paṭihārenāti tatiyena
tika-s0401t:629_0: Appakenapīti thokenapi parittenapi. Medhāvīti paññavā. Pābhatenāti bhaṇḍamūlena.
tika-s0401t:629_1: Vicakkhaṇoti vohārakusalo. Samuṭṭhāpeti attānanti mahantaṃ dhanaṃ yasañca uppādetvā
tika-s0401t:629_2: tattha attānaṃ saṇṭhapeti patiṭṭhāpeti. Yathā kiṃ? Aṇuṃ aggiṃva sandhamaṃ, yathā
tika-s0401t:629_3: paṇḍito puriso parittakaṃ aggiṃ anukkamena gomayacuṇṇādīni pakkhipitvā mukhavātena
tika-s0401t:629_4: dhamento samuṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍheti, mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ karoti, evameva paṇḍito thokampi
tika-s0401t:629_5: pābhataṃ labhitvā nānāupāyehi payojetvā dhanañca yasañca vaḍḍheti, vaḍḍhetvā puna
tika-s0401t:629_6: tattha attānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. Tāya eva vā pana dhanassa mahantatāya attānaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0401t:631_0: 201-202. Tatiye raṇāti hi rāgādayo kilesā vuccantīti “saraṇā dhammā”tiādīsu rāgādayo
tika-s0401t:631_1: kilesā “raṇā”ti vuccanti. Raṇanti etehīti raṇā. Yehi abhibhūtā sattā nānappakārena
tika-s0401t:631_2: kandanti paridevanti, tasmā te rāgādayo “raṇā”ti vuttā. Desitaniyāmato anokkamitvāti
tika-s0401t:631_3: desitānokkamanato anupagantvā deseti, satthārā desitaniyāmeneva anodissakaṃ katvā
tika-s0401t:631_4: dhammaṃ desetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evanti evaṃ mettājhānato vuṭṭhāya bhikkhāgahaṇe sati.
tika-s0401t:631_5: Bhikkhādāyakānaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatīti idaṃ cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttena dīpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:631_6: Accharāsaṅghātamattampi hi kālaṃ mettacittaṃ āsevantassa bhikkhuno dinnadānaṃ mahapphalaṃ
tika-s0401t:631_7: hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ, tena ca so amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjatīti ayamattho tattha āgatoyeva.
tika-s0401t:633_0: 203. Pañcame vanasabhāganti sabhāgaṃ vanaṃ, sabhāganti ca sappāyanti attho. Yañhi
tika-s0401t:633_1: pakativiruddhaṃ byādhiviruddhañca na hoti, taṃ “sabhāga”nti vuccati. Udakasabhāgantiādīsupi
tika-s0401t:633_2: imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Kalyāṇakammāyūhanakkhaṇoti kalyāṇakammūpacayassa
tika-s0401t:633_3: okāso. Tiṇṇaṃ bhātikānanti upatisso, cundo, upasenoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:633_4: Tissannañca bhaginīnanti cālā, upacālā, sīsupacālāti imesaṃ tissannaṃ jeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ.
tika-s0401t:633_5: Ettha ca sāriputtatthero sayaṃ pabbajitvā cālā, upacālā, sīsupacālāti tisso bhaginiyo,
tika-s0401t:633_6: cundo upasenoti ime bhātaro pabbājesi, revatakumāro ekova gehe avasissati. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:633_7: – “amhākaṃ…pe… pabbājentī”ti. Mahallakatarāti vuddhatarā. Idañca kumārikāya cirajīvitaṃ
tika-s0401t:633_8: abhikaṅkhamānā āhaṃsu. Sā kira tassa ayyikā vīsativassasatikā khaṇḍadantā palitakesā
tika-s0401t:633_9: valittacā tilakāhatagattā gopānasivaṅkā ahosi. Vidhāvanikanti vidhāvanakīḷikaṃ. Tissannaṃ
tika-s0401t:633_10: sampattīnanti anussavavasena manussadevamokkhasampattiyo sandhāya vadati, manussadevabrahmasampattiyo
tika-s0401t:633_11: vā. Sīvalissa puññaṃ vīmaṃsissāmāti “sīvalinā katapuññassa vipākadānaṭṭhānamida”nti
tika-s0401t:634_0: Taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakanti kiñcāpi arahanto gāmante kāyavivekaṃ na labhanti, cittavivekaṃ
tika-s0401t:634_1: pana labhanteva. Tesañhi dibbappaṭibhāgānipi ārammaṇāni cittaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0401t:634_2: tasmā gāmo vā hotu araññādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ, ‘yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ’,
tika-s0401t:636_0: 204. Chaṭṭhe akappiyo, āvuso, guḷoti ekadivasaṃ thero antarāmagge guḷakaraṇaṃ okkamitvā
tika-s0401t:636_1: guḷe piṭṭhampi chārikampi pakkhitte disvāna “akappiyo guḷo, sāmiso na kappati guḷo
tika-s0401t:636_2: vikāle paribhuñjitu”nti kukkuccāyanto evamāha. Akappiyā muggāti ekadivasaṃ antarāmagge
tika-s0401t:636_3: vacce muggaṃ jātaṃ disvā “akappiyā muggā, pakkāpi muggā jāyantī”ti kukkuccāyanto
tika-s0401t:638_0: 205. Sattame hāpetabbameva ahosi accāraddhavīriyattā. Udakena samupabyūḷheti udakena
tika-s0401t:638_1: thalaṃ ussāretvā tattha tattha rāsikate. Haritūpalittāyāti gomayaparibhaṇḍakatāya.
tika-s0401t:638_2: Tividhena udakena posentīti khīrodakaṃ gandhodakaṃ kevalodakanti evaṃ tividhena udakena
tika-s0401t:638_3: posenti paripālenti. Parissāvetvāti parisodhetvā gahite taṇḍuleti yojetabbaṃ. Devo
tika-s0401t:638_4: maññeti devo viya. Vīṇovādenāti “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā
tika-s0401t:638_5: honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṃ, bhanteti.
tika-s0401t:638_6: Evameva kho, soṇa, accāraddhavīriyaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati, atisithilavīriyaṃ kosajjāya
tika-s0401t:638_7: saṃvattati. Tasmātiha tvaṃ, soṇa, vīriyasamataṃ adhiṭṭhaha, indriyānañca samataṃ
tika-s0401t:638_8: paṭivijjhā”ti evaṃ vīṇaṃ upamaṃ katvā pavattitena vīṇopamovādena. Vīriyasamathayojanatthāyāti
tika-s0401t:640_1: Kulaghare bhavā kulagharikā. Sā kira avantiraṭṭhe kulaghare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhissa
tika-s0401t:640_2: bhariyā. Dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya cintesīti idaṃ
tika-s0401t:640_3: aṅguttarabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttaṃ. Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sapariso bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0401t:640_4: upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ assosi, na ca kañci visesaṃ adhigañchi. Kasmā? So hi dhammaṃ
tika-s0401t:640_5: suṇanto hemavataṃ anussaritvā ‘āgato nu kho me sahāyako, no’ti disādisaṃ oloketvā
tika-s0401t:640_6: taṃ apassanto ‘vañcito me sahāyo, yo evaṃ vicittappaṭibhānaṃ bhagavato desanaṃ na
tika-s0401t:641_1: hutvāva paṭivigacchanti, na ciraṭṭhitikāni honti, dhammacakkappavattane pana tāni
tika-s0401t:641_2: savisesāni hutvā cirataraṃ ṭhatvā nirujjhanti, tasmā vuttaṃ – “tiyojanasahassaṃ himavantaṃ
tika-s0401t:641_3: akālapupphitaṃ disvā”tiādi. Aggabalakāyāti sabbapurato gacchantā balakāyā. Kena pupphitabhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:641_4: jānāsīti kena kāraṇena himavantassa pupphitabhāvaṃ jānāsīti, yena kāraṇena imaṃ akālapupphapāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0401t:641_5: jātaṃ, taṃ jānāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa pavattitabhāvanti tassa dhammacakkassa bhagavatā
tika-s0401t:641_6: pavattitabhāvaṃ. Sadde nimittaṃ gaṇhīti sadde ākāraṃ sallakkhesi. Tatoti “ahaṃ ‘etaṃ
tika-s0401t:641_7: amatadhammaṃ tampi jānāpessāmī’ti tava santikaṃ āgatosmī”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tadanantaranti attho.
tika-s0401t:642_0: Sātāgiro hemavatassa buddhuppādaṃ kathetvā taṃ bhagavato santikaṃ ānetukāmo “ajja
tika-s0401t:642_1: pannaraso”tiādigāthamāha. Tattha ajjāti ayaṃ rattindivo pakkhagaṇanato pannaraso,
tika-s0401t:642_2: upavasitabbato uposatho. Tīsu vā uposathesu ajja pannaraso uposatho, na cātuddasiuposatho,
tika-s0401t:642_3: na sāmaggīuposatho. Divi bhavāni dibbāni, dibbāni ettha atthīti dibbāni. Kāni tāni?
tika-s0401t:642_4: Rūpāni. Tañhi rattiṃ devānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuto sannipatitānaṃ sarīravatthābharaṇavimānappabhāhi
tika-s0401t:642_5: abbhādiupakkilesavirahitāya candappabhāya ca sakalajambudīpo alaṅkato ahosīti ativiya
tika-s0401t:642_6: alaṅkato ca parivisuddhidevassa bhagavato sarīrappabhāya. Tenāha – “dibbā ratti upaṭṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0401t:643_0: Evaṃ rattiguṇavaṇṇanāpadesenapi sahāyassa cittaṃ pasādaṃ janento buddhuppādaṃ kathetvā
tika-s0401t:643_1: āha – “anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ, handa passāma gotama”nti. Tattha anomehi alāmakehi sabbākāraparipūrehi
tika-s0401t:643_2: guṇehi nāmaṃ assāti anomanāmo. Tathā hissa “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti
tika-s0401t:643_3: buddho”tiādinā nayena buddhoti anomehi guṇehi nāmaṃ. “Bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti
tika-s0401t:643_4: bhagavā”tiādinā nayena bhagavāti anomehi guṇehi nāmaṃ. Esa nayo “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho
tika-s0401t:643_6: pajahatha, imaṃ samādāya vattathā”ti satthā. Taṃ anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ. Handāti vacasāyatthe
tika-s0401t:643_7: nipāto. Passāmāti tena attānaṃ saha saṅgahetvā paccuppannabahuvacanaṃ. Gotamanti
tika-s0401t:643_8: gotamagottaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “satthā, na satthā”ti mā vimatiṃ akāsi, ekantabyavasito
tika-s0401t:644_0: Evaṃ vutte hemavato “ayaṃ sātāgiro ‘anomanāmaṃ satthāra’nti bhaṇanto tassa sabbaññutaṃ
tika-s0401t:644_1: pakāseti, sabbaññuno ca dullabhā loke, sabbaññupaṭiññehi pūraṇādisadiseheva loko
tika-s0401t:644_2: upadduto. So pana yadi sabbaññū, addhā tādilakkhaṇaṃ patto bhavissati, tena evaṃ
tika-s0401t:644_3: gahessāmī”ti cintetvā tādilakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto āha – “kacci mano”tiādi. Tattha kaccīti
tika-s0401t:644_4: pucchā. Manoti cittaṃ. Supaṇihitoti suṭṭhu ṭhapito acalo asampavedhī. Sabbesu bhūtesu
tika-s0401t:644_5: sabbabhūtesu. Tādinoti tādilakkhaṇaṃ pattasseva sato. Pucchā eva vā ayaṃ “so tava
tika-s0401t:644_6: satthā sabbabhūtesu tādī, udāhu no”ti. Iṭṭhe aniṭṭhecāti evarūpe ārammaṇe. Saṅkappāti
tika-s0401t:644_7: vitakkā. Vasīkatāti vasaṃ gamitā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ taṃ satthāraṃ vadasi, tassa
tika-s0401t:644_8: te satthuno kacci tādilakkhaṇaṃ sampattassa sato sabbabhūtesu mano supaṇihito, udāhu
tika-s0401t:644_9: yāva paccayaṃ na labhati, tāva supaṇihito viya khāyati. So vā te satthā kacci sabbabhūtesu
tika-s0401t:644_10: sattesu tādī, udāhu no, ye ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu rāgadosavasena saṅkappā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0401t:644_11: tyāssa kacci vasīkatā, udāhu kadāci tesampi vasena vattatīti.
tika-s0401t:645_0: Tīṇi vassānīti soṇassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya tīṇi vassāni. Tadā kira bhikkhū
tika-s0401t:645_1: yebhuyyena majjhimadeseyeva vasiṃsu, tasmā tattha katipayā eva ahesuṃ. Te ca ekasmiṃ
tika-s0401t:645_2: nigame eko dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu, therānañca katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu
tika-s0401t:645_3: ānīyamānesu pubbaṃ ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu, kañci kālaṃ āgametvā puna
tika-s0401t:645_4: tesu ānīyamānesu itare pakkamiṃsu, evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi,
tika-s0401t:645_5: thero ca tadā ekavihārī ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “tīṇi vassāni gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā”ti.
tika-s0401t:645_6: Tīṇi vassānīti ca accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Satthu adhippāyaṃ ñatvāti attano
tika-s0401t:645_7: āṇāpaneneva “iminā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitukāmo bhagavā”ti satthu adhippāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:645_8: jānitvā. Bhagavā kira yena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitukāmo, tassa senāsanapaññattiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:646_0: Ajjhokāse vītināmetvāti ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā. Yasmā bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa
tika-s0401t:646_1: samāpattisamāpajjanena paṭisanthāraṃ karonto sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo anulomappaṭilomaṃ
tika-s0401t:646_2: samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ
tika-s0401t:646_3: pāvisi, tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ sabbā tā samāpattiyo
tika-s0401t:646_4: samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ
tika-s0401t:646_5: pāvisīti vadanti. Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto cīvaratirokaraṇiyaṃ katvā bhagavato
tika-s0401t:646_6: pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi. Ajjhesīti āṇāpesi. Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitunti
tika-s0401t:646_7: bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu, ñāṇamukhaṃ āgacchatu, yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ
tika-s0401t:646_8: dhammaṃ bhaṇāhīti attho. Aṭṭhakavaggiyānīti aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni kāmasuttādisoḷasasuttāni.
tika-s0401t:646_9: Suggahitoti sammā uggahito. Sabbe vare yācīti vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā
tika-s0401t:646_10: dhuvanhānaṃ cammattharaṇaṃ gaṇaṅgaṇūpāhanaṃ cīvaravippavāsoti ime pañca vare yāci.
tika-s0401t:646_11: Sutte āgatamevāti udānapāḷiyaṃ āgatasuttaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0401t:648_0: 207. Navame sākacchitvā sākacchitvāti raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanavasena punappunaṃ
tika-s0401t:648_1: sākacchaṃ katvā. Guḷadadhinti patthinnaṃ guḷasadisaṃ kaṭhinadadhiṃ. Atiañchitunti
tika-s0401t:648_2: ativiya ākaḍḍhituṃ. Kañjiyaṃ vāhetvāti dadhimatthuṃ pavāhetvā, parissāvetvāti attho.
tika-s0401t:648_3: “Dadhito kañjiyaṃ gahetvā”tipi pāṭho. Nanti suppavāsaṃ. Bījapacchiṃ phusāpentīti
tika-s0401t:648_4: iminā sambandho. Yāva na ukkaḍḍhantīti yāva dāne na ukkaḍḍhanti, dātukāmāva hontīti
tika-s0401t:648_5: adhippāyo mahādukkhaṃ anubhosīti pasavanibandhanaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosi. Sāmikaṃ
tika-s0401t:648_6: āmantetvāti sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā tibbāhi kharāhi dukkhavedanāhi phuṭṭhā “sammāsambuddho
tika-s0401t:648_7: vata so bhagavā, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti. Suppaṭipanno
tika-s0401t:648_8: vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno.
tika-s0401t:648_9: Susukhaṃ vata nibbānaṃ, yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi
tika-s0401t:648_10: taṃ dukkhaṃ adhivāsentī satthu santikaṃ pesetukāmatāya sāmikaṃ āmantetvā. Pure maraṇāti
tika-s0401t:648_11: maraṇato puretarameva. Iṅgitanti ākāraṃ. Jīvitabhattanti jīvitasaṃsaye dātabbabhattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:648_12: Sabbakammakkhamo ahosīti sattavassikehi dārakehi kātabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-s0401t:648_13: samatthatāya sabbassa kammassa khamo ahosi. Teneva so sattāhaṃ mahādāne dīyamāne
tika-s0401t:648_14: jātadivasato paṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇaṃ ādāya saṅghassa udakaṃ parissāvetvā adāsi.
tika-s0401t:649_0: Yomantiādigāthāya “yo bhikkhu imaṃ rāgapalipathañceva kilesaduggañca saṃsāravaṭṭañca
tika-s0401t:649_1: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ appaṭivijjhanakamohañca atīto cattāro oghe tiṇṇo hutvā pāraṃ anuppatto,
tika-s0401t:649_2: duvidhena jhānena jhāyī, taṇhāya abhāvena anejo, kathaṃkathāya abhāvena akathaṃkathī,
tika-s0401t:649_3: upādānānaṃ abhāvena anupādiyitvā kilesanibbānena nibbuto, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmī”ti attho.
tika-s0401t:650_0: Sabbesaṃyeva pana kesānaṃ oropanañca arahattasacchikiriyā ca apacchāapurimā ahosīti
tika-s0401t:650_1: iminā therassa khuraggeyeva arahattuppatti dīpitā. Ekacce pana ācariyā evaṃ vadanti
tika-s0401t:650_2: “heṭṭhā vuttanayena dhammasenāpatinā ovāde dinne ‘yaṃ mayā kātuṃ sakkā, tamahaṃ jānissāmī’ti
tika-s0401t:650_3: pabbajitvā vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ divasaṃyeva aññataraṃ vicittaṃ kuṭikaṃ
tika-s0401t:650_4: disvā pavisitvā mātukucchiyaṃ satta vassāni attanā anubhūtadukkhaṃ anussaritvā tadanusārena
tika-s0401t:650_5: atītānāgate ñāṇaṃ nentassa ādittā viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Ñāṇassa paripākaṃ
tika-s0401t:650_6: gatattā vipassanāvīthiṃ otaritvā tāvadeva maggappaṭipāṭiyā sabbepi āsave khepento
tika-s0401t:650_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti. Ubhayathāpi therassa arahattuppattiyeva pakāsitā, thero pana
tika-s0401t:652_0: 208. Dasame āhārakaraṇavelanti bhojanakiccavelaṃ. Adhigacche padaṃ santanti saṅkhārūpasamaṃ
tika-s0401t:652_1: sukhanti laddhanāmaṃ santaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigaccheyya. Paṭhamapādena pabbate ṭhitoyevāti
tika-s0401t:652_2: paṭhamena pādena gijjhakūṭe pabbate ṭhitoyeva. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0401t:657_1: tisso sikkhā. Cuddasa bhattacchede katvāti sattāhaṃ nirāhāratāya ekekasmiṃ divase
tika-s0401t:657_2: dvinnaṃ bhattacchedānaṃ vasena cuddasa bhattacchede katvā.
tika-s0401t:658_0: Tesanti tesaṃ tāpasānaṃ. Lābubhājanādiparikkhāraṃ saṃvidhāyāti lābubhājanāditāpasaparikkhāraṃ
tika-s0401t:658_2: satasahassaparimāṇā. Satasahassaṃ parimāṇaṃ etesanti satasahassā uttarapadalopena
tika-s0401t:658_3: yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti, atthiatthe vā akārapaccayo daṭṭhabbo. Pāṇātipātādiakusaladhammasamudācārasaṅkhāto
tika-s0401t:658_4: āmagandho kuṇapagandho natthi etesanti nirāmagandhā, yathāvuttakilesasamudācārarahitāti
tika-s0401t:658_5: attho. Kilesasamudācāro hettha “āmagandho”ti vutto. Kiṃkāraṇā? Amanuññattā, kilesaasucimissattā,
tika-s0401t:658_6: sabbhi jigucchitattā, paramaduggandhabhāvavahattā ca. Tathā hi ye ye ussannakilesā
tika-s0401t:658_7: sattā, te te atiduggandhā honti. Teneva nikkilesānaṃ matasarīrampi duggandhaṃ na
tika-s0401t:658_8: hoti. Dānaggaparivahanaketi dānaggadhuravahanake. Māpakoti divase divase parimitaparibbayadānavasena dhaññamāpako.
tika-s0401t:659_0: Pāḷiyanti vinayapāḷiyaṃ. Migajātakaṃ āharitvā kathesīti atīte kira bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ
tika-s0401t:659_1: nibbattitvā migagaṇaparivuto araññe vasati. Athassa bhaginī attano puttakaṃ upanetvā
tika-s0401t:659_2: “bhātika imaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ migamāyaṃ sikkhāpehī”ti āha. Bodhisatto “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā
tika-s0401t:659_3: “gaccha tāta, asukavelāyaṃ nāma āgantvā sikkheyyāsī”ti āha. So mātulena vuttavelaṃ
tika-s0401t:659_4: anatikkamitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā migamāyaṃ sikkhi. So ekadivasaṃ vane vicaranto pāsena
tika-s0401t:659_5: baddho baddharavaṃ viravi. Migagaṇo palāyitvā “putto te pāsena baddho”ti tassa mātuyā
tika-s0401t:659_6: ārocesi. Sā bhātu santikaṃ gantvā “bhātika bhāgineyyo te migamāyaṃ sikkhāpito”ti
tika-s0401t:659_7: pucchi. Bodhisatto “mā tvaṃ puttassa kiñci pāpakaṃ āsaṅki, suggahitā tena migamāyā,
tika-s0401t:659_8: idāni taṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissatī”ti vatvā “migaṃ tipallattha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:660_0: Tattha miganti bhāgineyyamigaṃ. Tipallatthaṃ vuccati sayanaṃ, ubhohi passehi ujukameva
tika-s0401t:660_1: ca nipannakavasena tīhākārehi pallatthaṃ assa, tīṇi vā pallatthāni assāti tipallattho,
tika-s0401t:660_2: taṃ tipallatthaṃ. Anekamāyanti bahumāyaṃ bahuvañcanaṃ. Aṭṭhakkhuranti ekekasmiṃ pāde
tika-s0401t:660_3: dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhahi khurehi samannāgataṃ. Aḍḍharattāpapāyinti purimayāmaṃ
tika-s0401t:660_4: atikkamitvā majjhimayāme araññato āgamma pānīyassa pivanato aḍḍharatte āpaṃ pivatīti
tika-s0401t:660_5: aḍḍharattāpapāyī. “Aḍḍharatte āpapāyi”ntipi pāṭho. Mama bhāgineyyaṃ migaṃ ahaṃ sādhukaṃ
tika-s0401t:660_6: migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpesiṃ. Kathaṃ? Yathā ekena sotena chamāyaṃ assasanto chahi kalāhi
tika-s0401t:660_7: atibhoti bhāgineyyo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ayañhi tava puttaṃ tathā uggaṇhāpesiṃ, yathā
tika-s0401t:660_8: ekasmiṃ uparimanāsikāsote vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā pathaviyaṃ allīnena ekena heṭṭhimanāsikāsotena
tika-s0401t:660_9: tatheva chamāyaṃ assasanto chahi kalāhi luddakaṃ atibhoti, chahi koṭṭhāsehi ajjhottharati
tika-s0401t:660_10: vañcetīti attho. Katamehi chahi? Cattāro pāde pasāretvā ekena passena seyyāya, khurehi
tika-s0401t:660_12: vātassa nirumbhanenāti. Atha vā tathā naṃ uggaṇhāpesiṃ, yathā ekena sotena chamāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:660_13: assasanto. Chahīti heṭṭhā vuttehi chahi kāraṇehi. Kalāhīti kalāyissati, luddakaṃ
tika-s0401t:660_14: vañcessatīti attho. Bhotīti bhaginiṃ ālapati. Bhāgineyyoti evaṃ chahi kāraṇehi vañcakaṃ
tika-s0401t:661_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto bhāgineyyassa migamāyaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahitabhāvaṃ vadanto bhaginiṃ
tika-s0401t:661_1: samassāsesi. Sopi migapotako pāse baddho anibandhitvāyeva bhūmiyaṃ mahāphāsukapassena
tika-s0401t:661_2: pāde pasāretvā nipanno pādānaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne khurehi eva paharitvā paṃsuñca tiṇāni
tika-s0401t:661_3: ca uppāṭetvā uccārapassāvaṃ vissajjetvā sīsaṃ pātetvā jivhaṃ ninnāmetvā sarīraṃ kheḷakilinnaṃ
tika-s0401t:661_4: katvā vātaggahaṇena udaraṃ uddhumātakaṃ katvā akkhīni parivattetvā heṭṭhānāsikāsotena
tika-s0401t:661_5: vātaṃ sañcarāpento uparimanāsikāsotena vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā sakalasarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:661_6: gāhāpetvā matakākāraṃ dassesi, nīlamakkhikāpi naṃ samparivāresuṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-s0401t:661_7: kākā nilīyiṃsu. Luddo āgantvā udare hatthena paharitvā “pātova baddho bhavissati,
tika-s0401t:661_8: pūtiko jāto”ti tassa bandhanarajjuṃ mocetvā “ettheva dāni naṃ ukkantitvā maṃsaṃ ādāya
tika-s0401t:661_9: gamissāmī”ti nirāsaṅko hutvā sākhāpalāsaṃ gahetuṃ āraddho. Migapotakopi uṭṭhāya catūhi
tika-s0401t:661_10: pādehi ṭhatvā kāyaṃ vidhunitvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā mahāvātena chinnavalāhako viya vegena
tika-s0401t:661_11: mātu santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, rāhulo idāneva sikkhākāmo, pubbepi
tika-s0401t:662_0: Ambalaṭṭhiyarāhulovādaṃ desesīti “passasi no tvaṃ, rāhula, imaṃ parittaṃ udakāvasesaṃ
tika-s0401t:662_1: udakādāne ṭhapitanti? Evaṃ, bhante. Evaṃ parittakaṃ kho, rāhula, tesaṃ sāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0401t:662_2: yesaṃ natthi sampajānamusāvāde lajjā”ti evamādinā ambalaṭṭhiyarāhulovādaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0401t:662_3: Gehasitaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkentassāti āyasmā kira rāhulo bhagavato piṭṭhito piṭṭhito
tika-s0401t:662_4: gacchantova pādatalato yāva upari kesantā tathāgataṃ olokesi, so bhagavato buddhavesavilāsaṃ
tika-s0401t:662_8: viya cīnapiṭṭhacuṇṇapūjitasuvaṇṇacetiyaṃ viya lākhārasānulitto kanakathūpo viya rattavalāhakantaragato
tika-s0401t:662_9: taṅkhaṇamuggatapuṇṇacando viya aho samatiṃsapāramitānubhāvena sajjitassa attabhāvassa
tika-s0401t:662_10: sirisampattī”ti cintesi. Tato attānampi oloketvā “ahampi sobhāmi, sace bhagavā catūsu
tika-s0401t:662_11: mahādīpesu cakkavattirajjaṃ akarissa, mayhaṃ pariṇāyakaṭṭhānantaramadassa, evaṃ sante
tika-s0401t:662_12: ativiya jambudīpatalaṃ atisobhissā”ti attabhāvaṃ nissāya gehasitaṃ chandarāgaṃ uppādesi.
tika-s0401t:662_13: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “satthu ceva attano ca rūpasampattiṃ disvā gehasitaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkentassā”ti.
tika-s0401t:663_0: Bhagavāpi purato gacchantova cintesi – “paripuṇṇacchavimaṃsalohito dāni rāhulassa
tika-s0401t:663_1: attabhāvo, rajanīyesu rūpārammaṇādīsu cittassa pakkhandanakālo jāto, nipphalatāya
tika-s0401t:663_2: nu kho rāhulo vītināmetī”ti. Atha sahāvajjaneneva pasanne udake macchaṃ viya parisuddhe
tika-s0401t:663_3: ādāsamaṇḍale mukhanimittaṃ viya ca tassa taṃ cittuppādaṃ addasa, disvā ca “ayaṃ rāhulo
tika-s0401t:663_4: mayhaṃ atrajo hutvā mama pacchato āgacchanto ‘ahaṃ sobhāmi, mayhaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasanna’nti
tika-s0401t:663_5: attabhāvaṃ nissāya gehasitaṃ chandarāgaṃ uppādeti, atitthe pakkhando, uppathaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0401t:663_6: agocare carati, disāmūḷhaaddhiko viya agantabbaṃ disaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ kho panassa
tika-s0401t:663_7: kileso abbhantare vaḍḍhanto attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ passituṃ na dassissati paratthampi
tika-s0401t:663_8: ubhayatthampi, tato nirayepi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāpessati, tiracchānayoniyampi pettivisayepi
tika-s0401t:663_9: asurakāyepi sambādhepi mātukucchisminti anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe paripātessati. Yathā
tika-s0401t:663_10: kho pana anekaratanapūrā mahānāvā bhinnaphalakantarena udakaṃ ādiyamānā muhuttampi
tika-s0401t:663_11: na ajjhupekkhitabbā hoti, vegena vegenassā vivaraṃ pidahituṃ vaṭṭati, evameva ayampi
tika-s0401t:663_12: na ajjhupekkhitabbo. Yāvassa ayaṃ kileso abbhantare sīlaratanādīni na vināseti, tāvadeva
tika-s0401t:663_13: naṃ niggaṇhissāmī”ti ajjhāsayaṃ akāsi. Tato rāhulaṃ āmantetvā “yaṃ kiñci, rāhula,
tika-s0401t:663_14: rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:663_15: vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso
tika-s0401t:663_16: attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbanti. Rūpameva nu kho bhagavā
tika-s0401t:663_17: rūpameva nu kho sugatāti. Rūpampi rāhula, vedanāpi rāhula, saññāpi rāhula, saṅkhārāpi
tika-s0401t:663_18: rāhula, viññāṇampi rāhulā”ti mahārāhulovādasuttaṃ abhāsi. Taṃ dassetuṃ – “yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0401t:664_0: Saṃyuttake pana rāhulovādoti rāhulasaṃyutte vuttarāhulovādaṃ sandhāya vadanti. Tattha
tika-s0401t:664_1: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ, bhante, bhagavato
tika-s0401t:664_2: dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti therena yācito
tika-s0401t:664_3: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, rāhula, cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti? Aniccaṃ, bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ,
tika-s0401t:664_4: dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti? Dukkhaṃ, bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ,
tika-s0401t:664_5: kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”’tiādinā rāhulovādaṃ
tika-s0401t:664_6: ārabhi. Therassa vipassanācāroyeva, na pana mahārāhulovādo viya vitakkūpacchedāya vuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:665_0: Athassa satthā ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvātiādīsu bhagavato kira rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa
tika-s0401t:665_1: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā,
tika-s0401t:665_2: yannūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttari āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti? Athassa bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
tika-s0401t:665_3: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
