tika-s0401t:905_0: “Titthaṃ jānitabbaṃ, titthakaro jānitabbo, titthiyā jānitabbā, titthiyasāvakā jānitabbā.
tika-s0401t:905_1: Tattha titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo. Ettha hi satthā taranti uplavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ
tika-s0401t:905_2: karonti, tasmā titthanti vuccanti. Tādisānaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādetā titthakaro nāma pūraṇakassapādiko.
tika-s0401t:905_3: Tassa laddhiṃ gahetvā pabbajitā titthiyā nāma. Te hi titthe jātāti titthiyā. Yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:905_4: vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā, titthikā eva titthiyā. Tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:906_1: dasasahassaparimāṇaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ jātikhettaṃ. Saraseneva āṇāpavattanaṭṭhānaṃ āṇākhettaṃ.
tika-s0401t:906_2: Visayabhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ visayakhettaṃ. Dasasahassī lokadhātūti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ
tika-s0401t:906_3: imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā dasasahassī lokadhātu. Tattakānaṃyeva jātikhettabhāvo
tika-s0401t:906_5: jātikhettaṃ tannivāsīnaṃyeva devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo”ti ca vadanti. Mātukucchi
tika-s0401t:906_6: okkamanakālādīnaṃ channaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi tassa
tika-s0401t:906_7: pakampanassa labbhanato. Āṇākhettaṃ nāma yaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṃvaṭṭati vivaṭṭati ca, āṇā
tika-s0401t:906_8: pavattati āṇāya tannivāsidevatānaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanena, tañca kho kevalaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:906_9: ānubhāveneva, na adhippāyavasena. Adhippāyavasena pana “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti
tika-s0401t:907_0: Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādiṃ imissā
tika-s0401t:907_1: lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā “kiṃ panāvuso, sāriputta, atthetarahi aññe
tika-s0401t:907_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiyanti, evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0401t:907_3: ‘no’ti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā
tika-s0401t:907_4: lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyu”nti imaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0401t:907_5: āharantena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha
tika-s0401t:908_0: Ekatoti saha, ekasmiṃ kāleti attho, so pana kālo kathaṃ paricchinnoti carimabhave
tika-s0401t:908_2: Anacchariyattāti dvīsupi uppajjamānesu acchariyattābhāvatoti attho. Dvīsupi uppajjamānesu
tika-s0401t:908_3: anacchariyatā, kimaṅgaṃ pana bahūsūti dassento, “yadi cā”tiādimāha. Buddhā nāma majjhe
tika-s0401t:908_4: bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti tesaṃ desanāpi ekarasā ekadhāti āha – “desanāya ca
tika-s0401t:908_5: visesābhāvato”ti. Etenapi anacchariyattameva sādheti. Vivādabhāvatoti etena vivādābhāvatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:908_6: dve buddhā ekato na uppajjantīti dasseti. Etaṃ kāraṇanti etaṃ anacchariyatādikāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:909_0: Ekaṃ eva buddhaṃ dhāretīti ekabuddhadhāraṇī. Etena evaṃsabhāvā ete buddhaguṇā, yena
tika-s0401t:909_1: dutiyabuddhaguṇe dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti. Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi
tika-s0401t:909_2: guṇadhammānaṃ bhāriyo viseso mahāpathaviyāpi dussahoti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tathā hi abhisambodhisamaye
tika-s0401t:909_3: upagatassa lokanāthassa guṇabhāraṃ bodhirukkhassa tīsupi disāsu mahāpathavī sandhāretuṃ
tika-s0401t:909_4: nāsakkhi. Tasmā “na dhāreyyā”ti vatvā tameva adhāraṇaṃ pariyāyantarehi pakāsento
tika-s0401t:909_5: “caleyyā”tiādimāha. Tattha caleyyāti paripphandeyya. Kampeyyāti pavedheyya. Nameyyāti
tika-s0401t:909_6: ekapassena nameyya. Onameyyāti osīdeyya. Vinameyyāti vividhaṃ ito cito ca nameyya.
tika-s0401t:909_7: Vikireyyāti vātena thusamuṭṭhi viya vippakireyya. Vidhameyyāti vinasseyya. Viddhaṃseyyāti
tika-s0401t:909_8: sabbaso viddhastā bhaveyya. Tathābhūtā ca na katthaci tiṭṭheyyāti āha – “na ṭhānamupagaccheyyā”ti.
tika-s0401t:910_0: Idāni tattha nidassanaṃ dassento, “yathā, mahārājā”tiādimāha. Tattha eke puriseti
tika-s0401t:910_1: ekasmiṃ purise. Samupādikāti samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjati pavattatīti samupādikā, udakassa
tika-s0401t:910_2: upari samaṃ gāminīti attho. “Samuppādikā”tipi paṭhanti, ayamevattho. Vaṇṇenāti saṇṭhānena.
tika-s0401t:910_3: Pamāṇenāti ārohena. Kisathūlenāti kisathūlabhāvena, pariṇāhenāti attho. Dvinnampīti
tika-s0401t:911_0: Chādentanti rocentaṃ ruciṃ uppādentaṃ. Tandikatoti tena bhojanena tandibhūto. Anonamitadaṇḍajātoti
tika-s0401t:911_1: yāvadatthaṃ bhojanena onamituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya anonamanadaṇḍo viya jāto. Sakiṃ bhutto
tika-s0401t:911_2: vameyyāti ekampi ālopaṃ ajjhoharitvā vameyyāti attho.
tika-s0401t:912_0: Atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti dhammena nāma pathavī tiṭṭheyya. Sā kiṃ teneva
tika-s0401t:912_1: calati vinassatīti adhippāyena pucchati. Puna thero “ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ
tika-s0401t:912_2: abhimatañca lokena attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ
tika-s0401t:912_3: diṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ dhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ dhārento abhimato ca viññūnaṃ
tika-s0401t:912_4: gambhīrappameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā atibhārabhūto pathavīcalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotī”ti
tika-s0401t:912_5: dassento, “idha, mahārāja, dve sakaṭā”tiādimāha. Eteneva tathāgatassa mātukucchiokkamanādikāle
tika-s0401t:912_6: pathavīkampanakāraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekassāti ekasmā, ekassa vā sakaṭassa
tika-s0401t:913_0: Osāritanti uccāritaṃ, vuttanti attho. Aggoti sabbasattehi aggo. Jeṭṭhoti vuddhataro.
tika-s0401t:913_1: Seṭṭhoti pasatthataro. Visiṭṭhehi sīlādīhi guṇehi samannāgatattā visiṭṭho. Uggatatamoti
tika-s0401t:913_2: uttamo. Pavaroti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Natthi etassa samoti asamo. Asamā pubbabuddhā,
tika-s0401t:913_3: tehi samoti asamasamo. Natthi etassa paṭisamo paṭipuggaloti appaṭisamo. Natthi etassa
tika-s0401t:913_4: paṭibhāgoti appaṭibhāgo. Natthi etassa paṭipuggaloti appaṭipuggalo.
tika-s0401t:914_0: Sabhāvapakatikāti sabhāvabhūtā akittimā pakati. Kāraṇamahantattāti kāraṇānaṃ mahantatāya,
tika-s0401t:914_1: mahantehi buddhakaradhammehi pāramisaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti
tika-s0401t:914_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Pathavīādīni mahantāni vatthūni, mahantā cakkavāḷādayo attano attano
tika-s0401t:914_3: visaye ekekāva, evaṃ sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye eko eva. Ko ca tassa
tika-s0401t:914_4: visayo? Buddhabhūmi, yāvatakaṃ vā ñeyyaṃ. “Ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā eko eva
tika-s0401t:914_5: hotī”ti vadanto paracakkavāḷesupi dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:915_0: Imināva padenāti “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti iminā eva padena. Dasa cakkavāḷasahassāni
tika-s0401t:915_1: gahitānīti jātikhettāpekkhāya gahitāni. Ekacakkavāḷenevāti iminā eva ekacakkavāḷena,
tika-s0401t:915_2: na yena kenaci. Yathā “imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjantī”ti vutte imasmimpi cakkavāḷe
tika-s0401t:915_3: jambudīpe eva, tatthāpi majjhimadese evāti paricchindituṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti
tika-s0401t:915_4: jātikhette adhippetepi imināva cakkavāḷena paricchindituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0401t:919_0: 278. Vivādupacchedatoti vivādupacchedakāraṇā. Dvīsu uppannesu yo vivādo bhaveyya,
tika-s0401t:919_1: tassa anuppādoyevettha vivādupacchedo. Ekasmiṃ dīpetiādinā dīpantarepi ekajjhaṃ na
tika-s0401t:919_2: uppajjati, pageva ekadīpeti dasseti. Sopi parihāyethāti cakkavāḷassa padese eva pavattitabbattā parihāyeyya.
tika-s0401t:920_0: 279-280. Manussattanti manussabhāvo tasseva pabbajjādiguṇānaṃ yoggabhāvato. Liṅgasampattīti
tika-s0401t:920_1: purisabhāvo. Hetūti manovacīpaṇidhānapubbikā hetusampadā. Satthāradassananti satthusammukhībhāvo.
tika-s0401t:920_2: Pabbajjāti kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu, bhikkhūsu vā pabbajjā. Guṇasampattīti abhiññādiguṇasampadā.
tika-s0401t:920_3: Adhikāroti buddhe uddissa adhiko kāro, savisesā upakārakiriyā adhiko sakkāroti vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:920_4: hoti. Chandova chandatā, sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa sātisayo kattukamyatākusalacchando.
tika-s0401t:920_5: Aṭṭhadhammasamodhānāti etesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ samāyogena. Abhinīhāroti kāyapaṇidhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:920_6: Samijjhatīti nipphajjati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāya
tika-s0401t:920_8: sabbākārena sampannameva. Na hi itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhatādi sambhavati. Dutiyapakati
tika-s0401t:920_9: ca nāma paṭhamapakatito nihīnā eva. Tenevāha – anantaravāre “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:921_0: 281. Idha purisassa tattha nibbattanatoti imasmiṃ manussaloke purisabhūtassa tattha
tika-s0401t:921_1: brahmaloke brahmattabhāvena nibbattanato. Tena asatipi purisaliṅge purisākārā brahmāno
tika-s0401t:921_2: hontīti dasseti. Taṃyeva ca purisākāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā “yaṃ puriso brahmattaṃ
tika-s0401t:921_3: kāreyyā”ti. Tenevāha – “samānepī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ itthiyo brahmaloke na uppajjeyyunti
tika-s0401t:922_1: samannāgamo, so etassa atthīti samaṅgī, samannāgato, samañjanasīlo vā samaṅgī, pubbabhāge
tika-s0401t:922_4: cetanāsamaṅgītā. Katūpacitassa avipakkavipākassa kammassa vasena kammasamaṅgitā.
tika-s0401t:922_5: Kamme pana vipaccituṃ āraddhe vipākappavattivasena vipākasamaṅgitā. Kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānakālavasena
tika-s0401t:922_7: ca samīhanakkhaṇe. Tathāti iminā kusalākusalakammapadaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Yathā kataṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0401t:922_8: phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitaṃ. Vipākārahanti dutiyabhavādīsu vipaccanārahaṃ.
tika-s0401t:922_9: Uppajjamānānaṃ upapattinimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti yojanā. Upapattiyā uppajjanassa nimittaṃ
tika-s0401t:922_10: kāraṇanti upapattinimittaṃ, kammaṃ, kammanimittaṃ, gatinimittañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:922_11: pana gatinimittavaseneva yojanā dassitā. Kammakammanimittānampi upaṭṭhānaṃ yathārahaṃ
tika-s0401t:922_12: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yānissa tāni pubbe katāni kammāni, tānissa tasmiṃ samaye olambanti ajjholambanti
tika-s0401t:922_13: abhilambanti”ti vacanato sāyanhe mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā viya āsannamaraṇassa
tika-s0401t:922_14: sattassa citte supine viya vipaccituṃ katokāsaṃ kammaṃ, tassa nimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ
tika-s0401t:922_15: upatiṭṭhateva. Calatīti parivattati. Ekena hi kammunā tajje nimitte upaṭṭhite paccayavisesavasena
tika-s0401t:922_16: tato aññena kammunā tadaññassa nimittassa upaṭṭhānaṃ parivattanaṃ. Sesā niccalā avasesā
tika-s0401t:923_0: Sunakhavājikoti sunakhehi migavājavasena vajanasīlo, sunakhaluddakoti attho. Talasantharaṇapūjanti
tika-s0401t:923_1: bhūmitalassa pupphehi santharaṇapūjaṃ. Āyūhanacetanā kammasamaṅgitāvasenāti kāyaduccaritassa
tika-s0401t:923_2: aparāparaṃ āyūhanena sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tasseva pakappane kammakkhayakarañāṇena
tika-s0401t:924_0: Kammanti akusalakammaṃ. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇeti āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva. Tassāti kammasamaṅgino
tika-s0401t:924_1: puggalassa saggo vārito, tañce kammaṃ vipākavāraṃ labheyyāti adhippāyo. Saggo vāritoti
tika-s0401t:924_2: ca nidassanamattaṃ. Manussalokopissa vāritovāti. Apare pana purimehi vipākāvaraṇassa
tika-s0401t:924_3: anuddhaṭattā “tasmiṃyeva khaṇe”ti ca avisesena vuttattā taṃ dosaṃ pariharituṃ “āyūhitakammaṃ
tika-s0401t:924_4: nāmā”tiādimāha. Yadā kammaṃ vipākavāraṃ labhatīti idaṃ katokāsassa appaṭibāhiyattā
tika-s0401t:924_5: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā tatiyapārājikavatthusmiṃ paṭisallīyi, imasmiṃ sutte “kāyaduccaritasamaṅgī”ti
tika-s0401t:929_1: viyāti āha – “ekasabhāvo”ti. Ekantenāti ekaṃsena, avassanti attho. Vaṭṭeti saṃsāravaṭṭe.
tika-s0401t:929_3: palujjanāya. Tenevāha – “vigamāyā”ti. Rāgādīnaṃ nirodhāyāti maggañāṇena rāgādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:929_4: nirodhanatthāya. Maggañāṇena nirodhanaṃ nāma accantaṃ appavattikaraṇanti āha – “appavattikaraṇatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0401t:929_5: Yathā khādanīyassa mukhe katvā khādanaṃ nāma yāvadeva ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ, evaṃ rāgādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:929_7: Yasmā kilesesu khīṇesu itaraṃ vaṭṭadvayampi khīṇameva hoti, tasmā mūlameva gaṇhanto
tika-s0401t:929_8: “upasamāyāti kilesavūpasamanatthāyā”ti āha. Saṅkhatadhammānaṃ abhijānanaṃ nāma tattha
tika-s0401t:929_10: nāma cattāri ariyasaccāni tabbinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato. “Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ bujjhanatthāyā”ti
tika-s0401t:929_11: vatvā tayidaṃ bujjhanaṃ yassa ñāṇassa vasena ijjhati, tassa ñāṇassa vasena dassetuṃ
tika-s0401t:930_0: Ussāhajananatthanti kammaṭṭhāne abhiruciuppādanāya. Visakaṇṭakoti guḷassa vāṇijasamaññā.
tika-s0401t:930_1: “Kismiñci dese desabhāsā”ti keci. Ucchuraso samapākapakko cuṇṇādīhi missetvā piṇḍīkato
tika-s0401t:930_2: guḷo, apiṇḍīkato phāṇitaṃ. Pākavisesena khaṇḍakhaṇḍasedito khaṇḍo, malābhāvaṃ āpanno sakkarā.
tika-s0401t:931_0: Saratīti sati. Anu anu saratīti anussati, anu anurūpā satītipi anussati. Duvidhaṃ
tika-s0401t:931_1: hotīti payojanavasena duvidhaṃ hoti. Cittasampahaṃsanatthanti pasādanīyavatthusmiṃ
tika-s0401t:931_3: Upacārasamādhinā hi citte samāhite vipassanāsukhena ijjhati. Cittuppādoti bhāvanāvasena
tika-s0401t:931_4: pavatto cittuppādo. Upahaññati patihaññati paṭikūlattā ārammaṇassa. Tato eva ukkaṇṭhati,
tika-s0401t:931_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ riñcati, nirassādo hoti bhāvanassādassa alabbhanato. Pasīdati buddhaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:931_6: pasādanīyattā. Tathā ca kaṅkhādicetokhilābhāvena vinīvaraṇo hoti. Dametvāti nīvaraṇanirākaraṇena
tika-s0401t:931_7: nibbisevanaṃ katvā. Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānantarānuyuñjanena cittaparidamanassa upamaṃ dassento, “katha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:932_0: Ko ayaṃ…pe… anussarīti ko ayaṃ mama abbhantare ṭhatvā anussari. Pariggaṇhantoti bāhirakaparikappitassa
tika-s0401t:932_1: anussarakassa sabbaso abhāvadassanametaṃ. Tenāha – “na añño kocī”ti. Disvāti pariyesananayena
tika-s0401t:932_2: vuttappakāraṃ cittameva anussarīti disvā sabbampetanti etaṃ hadayavatthuādippabhedaṃ
tika-s0401t:932_3: sabbampi. Idañca rūpaṃ purimañca arūpanti idaṃ ruppanasabhāvattā rūpaṃ, purimaṃ ataṃsabhāvattā
tika-s0401t:932_4: arūpanti saṅkhepato rūpārūpaṃ vavatthapetvā. Pañcakkhandhe vavatthapetvāti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:932_5: Sambhāvikāti samuṭṭhāpikā. Tassāti samudayasaccassa. Nirodhoti nirodhanimittaṃ. Appanāvāroti
tika-s0401t:933_0: 297. Eseva nayoti iminā yvāyaṃ “taṃ paneta”ntiādinā atthanayo buddhānussatiyaṃ vibhāvitoti
tika-s0401t:933_1: atidisati, svāyaṃ atideso payojanavasena navasupi anussatīsu sādhāraṇavasena vuttopi
tika-s0401t:933_2: ānāpānassatiādīsu tīsu vipassanatthāneva hontīti iminā apavādena nivattitoti tāsaṃ
tika-s0401t:933_3: ekappayojanatāva daṭṭhabbā. Dhamme anussati dhammānussatīti samāsapadavibhāgadassanampi
tika-s0401t:933_4: vacanatthadassanapakkhikamevāti āha – “ayaṃ panettha vacanattho”ti. Dhammaṃ ārabbhāti
tika-s0401t:933_5: hi dhammassa anussatiyā visayabhāvadassanametaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Sīlaṃ ārabbhāti
tika-s0401t:933_6: attano pārisuddhisīlaṃ ārabbha. Cāgaṃ ārabbhāti attano cāgaguṇaṃ ārabbha. Devatā
tika-s0401t:933_7: ārabbhāti ettha devatāguṇasadisatāya attano saddhāsīlasutacāgapaññāsu devatāsamaññā.
tika-s0401t:933_8: Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “tāni osadhāni, esa brahmadatto”ti ca. Tenāha
tika-s0401t:933_9: – “devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā”tiādi. Tattha devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya
tika-s0401t:933_10: saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā
tika-s0401t:933_11: saṃvijjati. Yathārūpena sīlena, yathārūpena sutena, yathārūpena cāgena, yathārūpāya
tika-s0401t:933_12: paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā paññā
tika-s0401t:933_13: saṃvijjatī”ti evaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā. Assāsapassāsanimittaṃ nāma tattha
tika-s0401t:934_0: Upasammati ettha dukkhanti upasamo, nibbānaṃ. Accantameva ettha upasammati vaṭṭattayanti
tika-s0401t:934_1: accantūpasamo, nibbānameva. Khiṇoti khepeti kileseti khayo, ariyamaggo. Te eva upasametīti
tika-s0401t:934_2: upasamo, ariyamaggo eva. Khayo ca so upasamo cāti khayūpasamo. Tatracāyaṃ upasamo
tika-s0401t:934_3: dhammo evāti dhammānussatiyā upasamānussati ekasaṅgahoti? Saccaṃ ekasaṅgaho dhammabhāvasāmaññe
tika-s0401t:934_4: adhippete, saṅkhatadhammato pana asaṅkhatadhammo sātisayo uḷāratamapaṇītatamabhāvatoti
tika-s0401t:934_5: dīpetuṃ visuṃ nīharitvā vuttaṃ. Imameva hi visesaṃ sandhāya bhagavā – “dhammānussatī”ti
tika-s0401t:934_6: vatvāpi upasamānussatiṃ avoca anussarantassa savisesaṃ santapaṇītabhāvena upaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0401t:934_7: Evañca katvā idha khayūpasamaggahaṇampi samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yatheva hi samānepi
tika-s0401t:934_8: lokuttaradhammabhāve “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo
tika-s0401t:934_9: tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādivacanato maggaphaladhammehi nibbānadhammo sātisayo, evaṃ
tika-s0401t:934_10: phaladhammato maggadhammo kilesappahānena acchariyadhammabhāvato, tasmā accantūpasamena
tika-s0401t:934_11: saddhiṃ khayūpasamopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipassanatthāneva hontīti kasmā vuttanti?
tika-s0401t:934_12: “Ekantanibbidāyātiādivacanato”ti keci, taṃ akāraṇaṃ buddhānussatiādīsupi tathā desanāya
tika-s0401t:934_13: āgatattā. Yathā pana buddhānussatiādīni kammaṭṭhānāni vipassanatthāni honti, nimittasampahaṃsanatthānipi
tika-s0401t:934_14: honti, na evametāni, etāni pana vipassanatthānevāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:938_0: 298. Micchā passati tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanameva vā tanti micchādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0401t:938_1: yaṃ kiñci viparītadassanaṃ. Tenāha – “dvāsaṭṭhividhāyā”tiādi. Micchādiṭṭhi etassāti
tika-s0401t:939_0: 299. Sammā passati tāya, sayaṃ vā sammā passati, sammādassanamattameva vā tanti sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0401t:941_0: 303. “Anicca”ntiādinā pavatto upāyamanasikāro. Yāva niyāmokkamanāti yāva micchattaniyāmokkamanā.
tika-s0401t:941_1: Micchattaniyāmokkamananayo pana sāmaññaphalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ taṭṭīkāya ca vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:942_0: 304. Ayaṃ tividhā saggāvaraṇā ceva hotīti kammapathappattiyā mahāsāvajjabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:942_1: Saggāvaraṇāya hontiyā maggavibandhakabhāve vattabbameva natthīti vuttaṃ – “maggāvaraṇā
tika-s0401t:942_2: cā”ti. “Sassato loko”tiādikā dasavatthukā antaggāhikā micchādiṭṭhi. Maggāvaraṇāva
tika-s0401t:942_3: hoti viparītadassanabhāvato, na saggāvaraṇā akammapathapattitoti adhippāyo. Idaṃ
tika-s0401t:942_4: pana vidhānaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti viparītadassanañca na maggāvaraṇañcāti viruddhametaṃ
tika-s0401t:942_5: uddhammabhāvato. Tathā hi sati appahīnāya eva sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā maggādhigamena bhavitabbanti
tika-s0401t:942_6: adhippāyena yathāvuttavidhānaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. “Na saggāvaraṇā”ti saggūpapattiyā avibandhakattaṃ
tika-s0401t:942_7: vadantehi diṭṭhiyā saggāvahatāpi nāma anuññātā hotīti taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipantena “diṭṭhi
tika-s0401t:942_8: nāma saggaṃ upanetuṃ samatthā nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Ekantagarutarasāvajjabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:943_0: 305. Vaṭṭaṃ viddhaṃsetīti maggasammādiṭṭhi kilesavaṭṭaṃ kammavaṭṭañca viddhaṃseti.
tika-s0401t:943_1: Vipākavaṭṭaṃ kā nu viddhaṃseti nāma. Evaṃ pana attano kāraṇena viddhastabhavaṃ phalasammādiṭṭhi
tika-s0401t:943_2: paṭibāhatīti vuttaṃ avasaradānato. Iccetaṃ kusalanti arahattaṃ pāpetuṃ sace sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:943_3: evametaṃ vipassanāya paṭisandhianākaḍḍhanaṃ kusalaṃ anavajjaṃ. Satta bhave detīti
tika-s0401t:943_4: sotāpattimaggassa paccayabhūtā vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi tassa puggalassa satta bhave
tika-s0401t:943_5: deti. Evamayanti pañcavidhampi sammādiṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “lokiyalokuttarā
tika-s0401t:943_6: sammādiṭṭhi kathitā”ti. Imasmiṃ panattheti “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi
tika-s0401t:943_7: samanupassāmī”tiādinā vutte gatimaggasaṅkhāte atthe. “Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti
tika-s0401t:944_0: 306. Yathādiṭṭhīti atthabyāpanicchāyaṃ yathā-saddo, tena uttarapadatthappadhāno samāsoti
tika-s0401t:944_1: āha – “yā yā diṭṭhī”ti. Tassā tassā anurūpanti taṃtaṃdiṭṭhianurūpanti attho. Samattanti
tika-s0401t:944_2: anavasesaṃ. Tenāha – “paripuṇṇa”nti. Samādinnanti ādimajjhapariyosānesu samaṃ ekasadisaṃ
tika-s0401t:944_3: katvā ādinnaṃ gahitaṃ anissaṭṭhaṃ. Tadetanti yadetaṃ “yañceva kāyakamma”ntiādinā
tika-s0401t:944_4: vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Yathādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitakāyakammanti yā pana diṭṭhi “natthi
tika-s0401t:944_5: tatonidānaṃ pāpa”ntiādinā pavattā, tassaṃ diṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitakassa ṭhitamattassa anissaṭṭhassa
tika-s0401t:944_6: taṃdiṭṭhikassa kāyakammaṃ. Diṭṭhisahajātaṃ kāyakammanti tassa yathādiṭṭhikassa paresaṃ
tika-s0401t:944_7: hatthamuddādinā viññāpanakāle tāya diṭṭhiyā sahajātaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Na cettha vacīkammāsaṅkā
tika-s0401t:944_8: uppādetabbā pāṇaghātādīnaṃyeva adhippetattā. Diṭṭhānulomikaṃ kāyakammanti yathā paresaṃ
tika-s0401t:944_9: pākaṭaṃ hoti, evaṃ diṭṭhiyā anulomikaṃ katvā pavattitaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Tenāha – “samādinnaṃ
tika-s0401t:944_10: gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭha”nti. Tatthātiādi suviññeyyameva. Eseva nayoti iminā yathāvuttāya
tika-s0401t:944_11: diṭṭhiyā ṭhitavacīkammaṃ, diṭṭhisahajātaṃ vacīkammaṃ, diṭṭhānulomikaṃ vacīkammanti
tika-s0401t:944_12: tividhaṃ hotīti evamādi atidisati. Micchādiṭṭhikassāti kammapathappattāya micchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0401t:944_13: micchādiṭṭhikassa. “Yāya kāyaci micchādiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhikassa sato”ti apare.
tika-s0401t:945_0: Diṭṭhisahajātāti yathāvuttāya diṭṭhiyā sahajātā cetanā. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Patthanāti
tika-s0401t:945_2: vasena. Cittaṭṭhapanāti cittassa paṇidahanā. Phassādayoti cetanādiṭṭhitaṇhādivinimuttā
tika-s0401t:945_3: phassādidhammā. Yasmā diṭṭhi pāpikā, tasmā tassa puggalassa sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya…pe…
tika-s0401t:945_4: saṃvattantīti yojanā. Purimassevāti tittakapadasseva. Tittakaṃ kaṭukanti ca ubhayaṃ
tika-s0401t:945_5: idha aniṭṭhapariyāyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “pacchā te kaṭukaṃ bhavissatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0401t:946: Amboyanti ambo ayaṃ. Tameva pūjanti tameva pubbe laddhaparisiñcanadānādipūjaṃ. Nivesareti pavisiṃsu. Asātasannivāsenāti amadhuranimbamūlasaṃsaggena.
tika-s0401t:947_0: Taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā…pe… vuttanti sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhi ekantasāvajjattā aniṭṭhāya
tika-s0401t:947_1: dukkhāya saṃvattatīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Anantarasutteti dasamasutte. Yojetvā veditabbānīti
tika-s0401t:947_2: navamasutte viya yojetvā veditabbāni. Cittaṭṭhapanāva patthanāti ettha paṇidhi cāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:951_0: 308. Tatiyassa paṭhame ayāthāvadiṭṭhikoti aniccādibhāvesu dhammesu niccātiādinā uppannadiṭṭhiko.
tika-s0401t:951_1: Tenāha – “tāyeva micchādiṭṭhiyā viparītadassano”ti saddhammāti ettha santo pasattho
tika-s0401t:951_2: sundaro dhammo, yo manussadhammotipi vuccati. Tato hi micchādiṭṭhiko paraṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-s0401t:951_3: na ariyadhammato. Tenāha – “dasakusalakammapathadhammato”ti. Evarūpāti iminā pāthikaputtādike saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:952: 309. Sabbaññubodhisattoti sabbaññubhāgī bodhisatto. Ādi-saddena pūritapāramikā paccekabodhisattā ekaccasāvakabodhisattā ca saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0401t:953_0: 310. Paramāti mahāsāvajjabhāvena paramā, ukkaṃsagatāti attho. Tesanti ānantariyakammānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:953_1: Paricchedoti vipākavasena pariyosānaṃ. Vaṭṭassa mūlaṃ, tato taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo vaṭṭassa
tika-s0401t:953_2: khāṇūti vuccati. Tenāha – “tāyā”tiādi. Tañce gāhaṃ na vissajjeti, tassa punapi tabbhāvāvahattā
tika-s0401t:953_3: vuttaṃ – “bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ natthī”ti, na pana sabbaso vuṭṭhānassa abhāvato. Yādise
tika-s0401t:953_4: hi paccaye paṭicca ayaṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto puna kadāci tappaṭipakkhe paccaye paṭicca
tika-s0401t:953_5: tato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Akusalañhi nāmetaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ,
tika-s0401t:953_6: na kusalaṃ viya mahābalaṃ. Aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmopi accantiko
tika-s0401t:953_7: siyā, na ca micchattaniyāmo accantiko. Teneva papañcasūdaniyaṃ –
tika-s0401t:954: “Kiṃ panesa ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve niyato hoti, udāhu aññasmimpīti? Ekasmiṃyeva niyato, āsevanavasena bhavantarepi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ roceti evā”ti –
tika-s0401t:956_0: “Ye vā pana tesaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhāne divāṭṭhāne nisinnā sajjhāyanti vīmaṃsanti,
tika-s0401t:956_1: tesaṃ ‘karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ, natthi hetu, natthi paccayo, mato ucchijjatī’ti
tika-s0401t:956_2: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, javanāni javanti. Paṭhamajavane
tika-s0401t:956_3: satekicchā honti, tathā dutiyādīsu. Sattame buddhānampi atekicchā anivattino ariṭṭhakaṇṭakasadisā,
tika-s0401t:956_4: tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve, koci tīṇipi, ekasmiṃ okkantepi dvīsu
tika-s0401t:956_5: tīsu okkantesupi niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hoti. Patto saggamaggāvaraṇañceva mokkhamaggāvaraṇañca,
tika-s0401t:956_6: abhabbo tassattabhāvassa anantaraṃ saggampi gantuṃ, pageva mokkhaṃ, vaṭṭakhāṇu nāmesa
tika-s0401t:956_7: satto pathavigopako, yebhuyyena evarūpassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-s0401t:957_0: Piṭṭhicakkavāḷeti jhāyamānacakkavāḷassa parato ekasmiṃ okāse. Yaṃ jhāyamānānaṃ ajjhāyamānānañca
tika-s0401t:957_1: cakkavāḷānamantaraṃ, yattha lokantarikanirayasamaññā, tādise ekasmiṃ okāse. Paccatiyevāti
tika-s0401t:957_2: cakkavāḷe jhāyamāne ajjhāyamānepi attano kammabalena paccatiyeva.
tika-s0401t:958_0: 311. Catutthe “mā khalī”ti vacanaṃ upādāya evaṃladdhanāmoti taṃ kira sakaddamāya
tika-s0401t:958_1: bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta, mā khalī”ti sāmiko āha. So pamādena
tika-s0401t:958_2: khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho. Sāmiko upadhāvitvā sāṭakakaṇṇe
tika-s0401t:958_3: aggahesi. So sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāto paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi
tika-s0401t:958_4: ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi. Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho,
tika-s0401t:958_5: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamitvā “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena
tika-s0401t:958_6: idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi, tadeva ca pabbajjaṃ
tika-s0401t:958_7: aggahesi. Tassa santike aññepi aññepīti pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
tika-s0401t:958_8: vuttaṃ – “mā khalīti vacanaṃ upādāya evaṃladdhanāmo titthakaro”ti.
tika-s0401t:959_0: Samāgataṭṭhāneti dvinnaṃ nadīnaṃ udakappavāhassa sannipātaṭṭhāne. Dvinnaṃ udakānanti
tika-s0401t:959_1: dvinnaṃ udakappavāhānaṃ. Yathāvuttaṭṭhāne macchaggahaṇatthaṃ khipitabbato khippaṃ,
tika-s0401t:959_2: kuminaṃ, tadeva idha khippanti vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “kumina”nti. Ucchūhīti udakaucchūhi.
tika-s0401t:959_3: Tucchapuriso ariyadhammābhāvato. Jhānamattampi hi tassa nattheva, kuto ariyamaggo.
tika-s0401t:959_4: Manussakhippaṃ maññeti manussā patitvā byasanappattiatthaṃ oṭṭitaṃ kuminaṃ viya.
tika-s0401t:960_0: 312. Pañcamādīsu bāhirakasāsananti avisesena vuttaṃ – tassa sabbassapi aniyyānikattā
tika-s0401t:960_1: satthupaṭiññassapi asabbaññubhāvato. Tenāha – “tattha hī”tiādi. Gaṇoti sāvakagaṇo.
tika-s0401t:960_2: Tathābhāvāyāti ācariyena vuttākāratāya samaṅgibhāvatthaṃ. Jaṅghasatanti bahū aneke
tika-s0401t:960_3: satte. Samakameva akusalaṃ pāpuṇātīti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ekajjhaṃ samādapanepi tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:960_4: akusalena samakameva akusalaṃ pāpuṇāti ekajjhaṃ bahūnaṃ samādapanepi tathā ussahanassa
tika-s0401t:960_5: balavabhāvato. Visuṃ visuṃ samādapane vattabbameva natthi. Yathā hi dhammacariyāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:960_6: samakamevāti vattabbā kalyāṇamittatā, evaṃ adhammacariyāyaṃ akalyāṇamittatāti.
tika-s0401t:961_0: 313. Suṭṭhu akkhāteti ekantato niyyānikabhāvena akkhāte. Satthā ca sabbaññū hotīti
tika-s0401t:961_1: asabbaññuno niyyānikabhāvena kathetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Dhammo ca svākkhāto sammāsambuddhappaveditattā.
tika-s0401t:961_2: Gaṇo ca suppaṭipanno satthārā suvinītattā. Samādapako hītiādi suppaṭipattiyā nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:962_0: 314. Pamāṇaṃ jānitabbanti “ayaṃ ettakena yāpeti, imassa ettakaṃ dātuṃ yutta”nti evaṃ
tika-s0401t:962_1: pamāṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Atireke…pe… nibbānasampatti vā natthi durakkhātattā dhammassa.
tika-s0401t:962_2: Tassāti paṭiggāhakassa. Appicchapaṭipadā nāma natthi durakkhāte dhammavinayeti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:963_0: 315. Dāyakassa vaso nāma uḷāruḷāratābhedo ajjhāsayo. Deyyadhammassa pana thokabahutāva
tika-s0401t:963_1: deyyadhammassa vaso nāma. Attano thāmoti yāpanappamāṇaṃ. Yadi hītiādi “katha”ntiādinā
tika-s0401t:963_2: saṅkhepato vuttassa atthassa vivaraṇaṃ. Anuppannassāti anuppanno assa puggalassa.
tika-s0401t:963_3: Cakkhubhūto hotīti mahājanassa cakkhu viya hoti. Sāsanaṃ ciraṭṭhititaṃ karotīti anuppannalābhuppādanena
tika-s0401t:964_1: gehe nisīditvā bhuñjanatthāya. Gahetvā gamanatthāyāti gehato bahi gahetvā gamanatthāya.
tika-s0401t:964_2: Dhurabhattānīti niccabhattāni. Cūḷupaṭṭhākanti veyyāvaccakaraṃ. Vīmaṃsitvāti yathā
tika-s0401t:964_3: uddissa kataṃ na hoti, evaṃ vīmaṃsitvā. Mahājano appiccho bhavituṃ maññatīti mahājano
tika-s0401t:964_4: sayaṃ appiccho bhavituṃ maññati diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanena. Mahājanassāti bahujanassa.
tika-s0401t:965_0: 316. Pañcātapatappanaṃ catūsu passesu aggisantāpassa upari sūriyasantāpassa ca tappanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:965_1: tañca kho gimhakāle. Chinnappapātapabbatasikharato patanaṃ maruppapātapatanaṃ. Pubbaṇhādīsu
tika-s0401t:966: 317. Ayampīti svākkhāte dhammavinaye kusītopi. Sāmaññanti tapacaraṇaṃ. Dupparāmaṭṭhanti micchācaritaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Nirayāyupakaḍḍhatīti nirayadukkhāya naṃ kaḍḍhati.
tika-s0401t:968: 319. Evanti vuttappakārāya cittappasādavhayasuppaṭipattiyā. Tena samaṇadhammakaraṇasukhañca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:969_0: 320. Navakanipāteti imasmiṃyeva aṅguttaranikāye vakkhamānaṃ navakanipātaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0401t:969_1: Nava puggalāti sattakkhattuparamakolaṃkolādayo nava puggalā. Sabbatthāti imasmiṃ
tika-s0401t:973_1: pañcadasayojanakkhandhaparikkhepā. Yathā cāti ca-saddena kadambarukkhādīnaṃ kappaṭṭhāyibhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:973_2: viya yojanasatubbedhādibhāvaṃ samuccinoti, na pana jambuyā jambudīpassa viya tehi
tika-s0401t:973_3: aparagoyānādīnaṃ saññāṇabhāvaṃ. Rāmaṇeyyakanti ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ. Sesapadesūti vanarāmaṇeyyakādipadesu.
tika-s0401t:973_4: Uggataṃ kūlaṃ ussitabhāvo etassāti ukkūlaṃ, vigataṃ apagataṃ kūlaṃ etassāti vikūlanti
tika-s0401t:974_0: 323. Dutiyādīsu cattāro apāyā aññatra manussehīti adhippetā, na devā aññatra manussehīti
tika-s0401t:974_1: hīnāya jātiyā adhippetattā. Upādāyupādāyāpi majjhimadeso labbhati, yattha gati bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0401t:974_2: bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ aññesampi kammavādikiriyavādiviññujātikānaṃ, yo
tika-s0401t:976: 326. Tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā cakkhunāpi dassanaṃ dassanameva, ajānitvā pana dassanaṃ tiracchānagatānampi hotiyevāti āha – “ye tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:978: 328. Sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ asammoso dhāraṇanti āha – “dhārentīti na pammussantī”ti.
tika-s0401t:979_0: 329. Atthānatthaṃ upaparikkhantīti “ayaṃ imissā pāḷiyā attho, ayaṃ na attho”ti atthānatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:979_1: upaparikkhanti. Anatthaparihārena hi atthaggahaṇaṃ yathā adhammaparivajjanena dhammappaṭipatti.
tika-s0401t:981: 331. Saṃvegajanakesu kāraṇesūti saṃvegajanakesu jātiādīsu kāraṇesu. Saṃvejanīyesu ṭhānesu sahottappañāṇaṃ saṃvego.
tika-s0401t:982: 332. Upāyenāti yena upāyena vaṭṭūpacchedo, tena upāyena. Padhānavīriyaṃ karontīti sammappadhānasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ karonti uppādenti.
tika-s0401t:983: 333. Vavassajīyanti vissajjīyanti ettha saṅkhārāti vavassaggo, asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha – “vavassaggo vuccati nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0401t:984_0: 334. Uttamannānanti uttamānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ. Uttamarasānanti uttamānaṃ rasānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:984_1: Uñchācārenāti uñchācariyāya kassaci apariggahabhūtassa kiñci ayācitvā gahaṇaṃ uñchācāro.
tika-s0401t:984_2: Ettha cātiādinā annādīnaṃ aggabhāvo nāma manāpaparamo icchitakkhaṇalābho, na tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:984_3: lābhitāmattanti dasseti. Paṭilabhantīti denti paṇītabhāvena. Bhattassa ekapātīti
tika-s0401t:984_4: ekapātipūraṃ bhattaṃ. Idaṃ kiṃ nāmāti “idaṃ annaggarasaggaṃ nāma hoti, na hotī”ti
tika-s0401t:984_5: pucchati. Uñchena kapālābhatenāti missakabhattena. Yāpenteti yāpanasīsena yāpanahetuṃ
tika-s0401t:984_6: bhattaṃ vadati. Upādāya aggarasaṃ nāmāti taṃ taṃ upādāyupādāya annaggarasaggaṃ daṭṭhabbanti
tika-s0401t:984_7: dasseti. Cakkavattiāhārato hi cātumahārājikānaṃ āhāro aggoti evaṃ yāva paranimmitavasavattidevā netabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:985_0: 335. Attharaso nāma cattāri sāmaññaphalāni “ariyamaggānaṃ phalabhūto raso”ti katvā.
tika-s0401t:985_1: Dhammaraso nāma cattāro maggā “sāmaññaphalassa hetubhūto raso”ti katvā vimuttiraso
tika-s0401t:989_0: 366. Addhamidanti sandhivasena pāḷiyaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, ma-kāro padasandhikaroti
tika-s0401t:989_1: āha – “addhā ida”nti. Ekaṃso esāti ekaṃso hetu esa lābhānaṃ. Pāpakaṃ nāmāti appakampi
tika-s0401t:989_2: pāpaṃ nāma byattaṃ ekaṃsena na karoti. Tathassāti tathā sammāpaṭipajjamānassa assa.
tika-s0401t:989_3: Āraññikattaṃ…pe… tecīvarikattanti imesaṃ dhutadhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva itaresampi taṃsabhāgānaṃ
tika-s0401t:989_4: gahitabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Thāvarappattabhāvoti sāsane thirabhāvappatti therabhāvo. Ākappassa
tika-s0401t:989_5: sampattīti “añño me ākappo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ vuttassa ākappassa sampatti. Kolaputtīti
tika-s0401t:989_7: vacanappayogassa madhurabhāvo mañjussaratā. Tenassa lābho uppajjatīti idaṃ na lābhuppādanūpāyadassanaparaṃ,
tika-s0401t:989_8: atha kho evaṃ sammāpaṭipajjamānassa anicchantasseva lābho uppajjatīti lābhassa abyabhicārahetudassanaparaṃ
tika-s0401t:990: “Ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lābhī assaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānanti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti.
tika-s0401t:993_0: 382. Idampi suttanti ettha pi-saddo heṭṭhā vuttacūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0401t:993_1: Cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasutte appanaṃ appattāya mettāya tāvamahanto vipāko dassito, kimaṅgaṃ
tika-s0401t:993_2: pana imissā appanāppattāya mettāyāti dassetuṃ – “appanāppattāya hī”tiādimāha. Vipākakathāyeva
tika-s0401t:993_3: natthīti vipāke kathāyeva natthi, ayameva vā pāṭho. Gaṇanānupubbatāti gaṇanānupubbatāya.
tika-s0401t:993_4: Paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhamaṃ, paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:993_5: Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ
tika-s0401t:993_6: sakkoti, matthakato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi, antarantarā okkantopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti
tika-s0401t:993_7: eva. Pubbuppattiyaṭṭhena pana paṭhamaṃ nāma hoti. Vibhaṅgeti jhānavibhaṅge. Vipassanaṃ
tika-s0401t:993_9: Apica vipassanāya lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ maggena uppannena sijjhati itarathā parivattanato,
tika-s0401t:993_10: tasmā maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ, na aniccādilakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato. Yathā phalaṃ
tika-s0401t:993_11: nibbānassa asaṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upanijjhāyati, evaṃ maggopi. Evampissa
tika-s0401t:993_12: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānataṃ veditabbaṃ. Vattabbameva natthi arittajjhānatāya. Sesaṃ visesaṃ,
tika-s0401t:994_0: 386-387. Hitapharaṇanti sattesu hitānurūpaṃ jhānassa pharitvā pavattanaṃ. Cetopaṭipakkhato
tika-s0401t:994_1: vimuccati etāyāti cetovimutti, appanāppattā mettā. Tenāha – “idhā”tiādi. Eseva nayoti
tika-s0401t:994_2: iminā karuṇādīnampi appanāppattataṃ atidisati. Vaṭṭaṃ honti kammavaṭṭabhāvato. Vaṭṭapādā
tika-s0401t:995_1: aṭṭhārasappabhede. Kāyeti rūpakāye. Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca
tika-s0401t:995_2: dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto. Samūhavisayatāya
tika-s0401t:995_3: cassa kāyasaddassa samudāyūpādanatāya ca asubhākārassa “kāye”ti ekavacanaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0401t:995_4: ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0401t:995_5: “citte”ti ekavacanaṃ kataṃ. Kāyānupassīti imassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ – “tameva kāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:995_6: paññāya anupassanto”ti āha. Tameva kāyanti ca avadhāraṇena vedanādianupassanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0401t:995_7: Tena ca puna kāyaggahaṇassa payojanaṃ sūcitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kāye”ti hi vatvāpi puna
tika-s0401t:995_9: kataṃ. Tena vedanādayopi ettha sitā, ettha paṭibaddhāti kāyavedanādianupassanappasaṅgepi
tika-s0401t:995_10: āpanne na kāye vedanānupassī cittānupassī dhammānupassī vā. Atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti
tika-s0401t:995_11: kāyasaṅkhātavatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ
tika-s0401t:995_12: hoti. Tathā na kāye aṅgapaccaṅgavinimuttaekadhammānupassī, nāpi kesalomādivinimuttaitthipurisānupassī.
tika-s0401t:995_13: Yopi cettha kesalomādiko bhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhāto kāyo, katthapi na bhūtupādāyavinimuttaekadhammānupassī,
tika-s0401t:995_14: atha kho rathasambhārānupassako viya aṅgapaccaṅgasamūhānupassī, nāgarāvayavānupassako
tika-s0401t:995_16: viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0401t:995_17: vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti. Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto
tika-s0401t:995_18: kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati, yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva
tika-s0401t:995_19: pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
tika-s0401t:996_1: Tīsu bhavesu kilese ātapetīti ātāpo, vīriyassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Yadipi hi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ
tika-s0401t:996_2: ātāpananti, taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva. Ātapasaddo viya pana ātāpasaddopi vīriyeva
tika-s0401t:996_3: niruḷho. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa
tika-s0401t:996_4: vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati, na aññadhammā, tasmā
tika-s0401t:996_5: ātāpoti vīriyassa nāmaṃ, so assa atthīti ātāpī. Ayañca īkāro pasaṃsāya atisayassa
tika-s0401t:996_6: vā dīpakoti ātāpiggahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Tenevāha – “ātāpīti…pe…
tika-s0401t:996_7: vīriyena vīriyavā”ti. Sampajānoti sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Tenāha
tika-s0401t:996_8: – “aṭṭhārasavidhena…pe… sammā pajānanto”ti. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho – sammā samantato
tika-s0401t:996_9: sāmañca pajānanto sampajāno, asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena sammā
tika-s0401t:996_10: aviparītaṃ sabbākārappajānena samantato uparūparivisesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sammā pajānantoti attho.
tika-s0401t:997_0: Kāyo ca idha lujjanappalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippetoti āha – “tasmiṃyeva kāyasaṅkhāte
tika-s0401t:997_1: loke”ti. Pañcakāmaguṇikataṇhanti rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu pavattamānaṃ taṇhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:997_2: Yasmā panettha abhijjhāgahaṇena kāmacchando, domanassaggahaṇena byāpādo saṅgahaṃ
tika-s0401t:997_4: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Visesena cettha abhijjhāvinayena kāyasampattimūlakassa anurodhassa,
tika-s0401t:997_5: domanassavinayena kāyavipattimūlakassa virodhassa, abhijjhāvinayena ca kāye abhiratiyā,
tika-s0401t:997_6: domanassavinayena kāyabhāvanāya anabhiratiyā, abhijjhāvinayena kāye abhūtānaṃ subhasukhabhāvādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:997_7: pakkhepassa, domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca
tika-s0401t:997_8: pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti. Yogānubhāvo
tika-s0401t:997_9: hi esa, yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito
tika-s0401t:997_10: ca hoti. Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca
tika-s0401t:997_11: anapanento yogasamattho hotīti. Suddharūpasammasanameva kathitanti kevalaṃ kāyānupassanābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:998_1: Tattha sukhayatīti sukhā, sampayuttadhamme kāyañca laddhassāde karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu
tika-s0401t:998_2: vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca ābādhanti sukhā, sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti
tika-s0401t:998_3: vā sukhā. Dukkhayatīti dukkhā, sampayuttadhamme kāyañca pīḷeti vibādhatīti attho.
tika-s0401t:998_4: Duṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sātanti dukkhā, dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ
tika-s0401t:998_5: etissāti vā dukkhā. Dukkhasukhappaṭikkhepena adukkhamasukhāti upekkhā vuttā. Vediyati
tika-s0401t:998_6: ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti vedanā. Vediyamānoti anubhavamāno. Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti
tika-s0401t:998_7: pajānātīti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno “ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
tika-s0401t:998_8: vediyāmī”ti pajānātīti attho. Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi dārakā thaññapivanādikāle
tika-s0401t:998_9: sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamānā “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmā”ti pajānanti, na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ
tika-s0401t:998_10: pajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evarūpañhi jānanaṃ sattupaladdhiṃ na jahati, attasaññaṃ
tika-s0401t:998_11: na ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti. Imassa pana bhikkhuno
tika-s0401t:998_12: jānanaṃ sattupaladdhiṃ jahati, attasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānañceva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā
tika-s0401t:998_13: ca hoti. Idañhi “ko vediyati, tassa vedanā, kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ sampajānantassa
tika-s0401t:999_0: Tattha ko vediyatīti? Na koci satto vā puggalo vā vediyati. Kassa vedanāti? Na kassaci
tika-s0401t:999_1: sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā. Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti? Vatthuārammaṇā ca panassa
tika-s0401t:999_2: vedanāti. Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ rūpādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:999_3: katvā vedanāva vediyati, taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya ‘ahaṃ vediyāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ
tika-s0401t:999_4: hotī”ti. Evaṃ “sukhādīnaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ rūpādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vediyatī”ti
tika-s0401t:999_5: sallakkhento esa “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmī”ti pajānātīti veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1000_0: Atha vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya
tika-s0401t:1000_1: abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃyeva vediyāmī”ti pajānāti. Tena
tika-s0401t:1000_2: yā pubbe bhūtapubbā dukkhā vedanā, tassā idāni abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya
tika-s0401t:1000_3: ito paraṃ paṭhamaṃ abhāvato “vedanā nāma aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti itiha
tika-s0401t:1000_4: tattha sampajāno hoti. Dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0401t:1001_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu yasmā kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisā nāma pañca kāmaguṇā. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0401t:1001_1: saha āmisehīti sāmisā, tasmā sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā chasu dvāresu
tika-s0401t:1001_2: uppannā chagehassitā somanassavedanā. Sāmisā dukkhā nāma chagehassitā domanassavedanā.
tika-s0401t:1001_3: Sā ca chasu dvāresu “iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nānubhavissāmi nānubhavāmī”ti vitakkayato uppannā
tika-s0401t:1001_4: kāmaguṇanissitā domanassavedanā veditabbā. Nirāmisā sukhā nāma chanekkhammassitā
tika-s0401t:1001_5: somanassavedanā. Sā ca chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1001_6: paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ sakkontassa “ussakkitā me vipassanā”ti somanassajātassa
tika-s0401t:1002_0: Nirāmisā dukkhā nāma chanekkhammassitā domanassavedanā. Sā pana chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-s0401t:1002_2: aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ asakkontassa “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi
tika-s0401t:1002_3: māsaṃ imampi saṃvaccharaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti
tika-s0401t:1003_0: Sāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma chagehassitā upekkhāvedanā. Sā ca chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-s0401t:1003_1: āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍake nilīnamakkhikā viya rūpādīni anuvattamānā tattheva laggā laggitā
tika-s0401t:1003_2: hutvā uppannā kāmaguṇanissitā upekkhāvedanā. Nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma chanekkhammassitā
tika-s0401t:1003_3: upekkhāvedanā. Sā pana chasu dvāresu iṭṭhādiārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa,
tika-s0401t:1003_4: aniṭṭhe adussantassa, asamapekkhanena amuyhantassa uppannā vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā
tika-s0401t:1003_5: upekkhāvedanā. Evaṃ vuttanti mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte vuttaṃ. Sāva vedanā veditabbāti
tika-s0401t:1004_0: Evaṃ vitthāriteti “sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti pajānāti, vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe…
tika-s0401t:1004_1: sadosaṃ vā cittaṃ, vītadosaṃ vā cittaṃ, samohaṃ vā cittaṃ, vītamohaṃ vā cittaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ
tika-s0401t:1004_2: vā cittaṃ, vikkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ, mahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ, amahaggataṃ vā cittaṃ, sauttaraṃ
tika-s0401t:1004_3: vā cittaṃ, anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ, asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ, vimuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:1004_4: vā cittaṃ, avimuttaṃ vā cittanti pajānātī”ti evaṃ satipaṭṭhānasutte vitthāretvā dassite soḷasavidhe citte.
tika-s0401t:1005_0: Tattha sarāganti aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhasahagataṃ. Vītarāganti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ. Idaṃ
tika-s0401t:1005_1: pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ, tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na labbhati.
tika-s0401t:1005_2: Sesāni cattāri akusalacittāni neva purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti. Sadosanti
tika-s0401t:1005_3: duvidhaṃ domanassasahagataṃ. Vītadosanti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ. Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni
tika-s0401t:1005_4: neva purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti. Samohanti vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcāti
tika-s0401t:1005_5: duvidhaṃ. Yasmā pana moho sabbākusalesu uppajjati, tasmā sesānipi idha vattantiyeva.
tika-s0401t:1005_6: Imasmiññeva hi duke dvādasākusalacittāni pariyādinnānīti. Vītamohanti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ.
tika-s0401t:1006_0: Saṃkhittanti thinamiddhānupatitaṃ. Etañhi saṅkucitacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe saṅkocavasena
tika-s0401t:1006_1: pavattanato. Vikkhittanti uddhaccasahagataṃ. Etañhi pasaṭacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe savisesaṃ
tika-s0401t:1006_2: vikkhepavasena visaṭabhāvena pavattanato. Mahaggatanti rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca.
tika-s0401t:1006_3: Amahaggatanti kāmāvacaraṃ. Sauttaranti kāmāvacaraṃ. Anuttaranti rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca.
tika-s0401t:1006_4: Tatrāpi sauttaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, anuttaraṃ arūpāvacarameva. Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi
tika-s0401t:1006_5: vā upacārasamādhi vā atthi. Asamāhitanti ubhayasamādhivirahitaṃ. Vimuttanti tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttīhi
tika-s0401t:1006_7: pana idha okāsova natthi, okāsābhāvo ca sammasanacārassa adhippetattā veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1007_0: Upādānassa khandhā upādānakkhandhā, upādānassa paccayabhūtā dhammapuñjā dhammarāsayoti
tika-s0401t:1007_1: attho. Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā. Cha
tika-s0401t:1007_2: ajjhattikabāhirāyatanānīti cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo manoti imāni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni
tika-s0401t:1007_3: ceva, rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo dhammāti imāni cha bāhirāyatanāni ca. Ettha
tika-s0401t:1007_4: pana lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā sammasanacārassa adhippetattā. Satta sambojjhaṅgāti
tika-s0401t:1007_5: satisambojjhaṅgādayo satta sambojjhaṅgā. Satiādayo hi sambodhissa, sambodhiyā vā
tika-s0401t:1007_6: aṅgāti sambojjhaṅgā. Tathā hi sambujjhati āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti
tika-s0401t:1007_7: sambodhi, yāya vā so satiādikāya sattadhammasāmaggiyā sambujjhati, kilesaniddāto
tika-s0401t:1007_8: uṭṭhāti, saccāni vā paṭivijjhati, sā dhammasāmaggī sambodhi, tassa sambodhissa, tassā
tika-s0401t:1008_1: evaṃ vuttāni cattāri ariyasaccāni. Tattha purimāni dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ pavattihetubhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1008_2: Pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ nivaṭṭatadadhigamūpāyabhāvato. Tesu bhikkhuno vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso
tika-s0401t:1008_3: hoti sarūpato pariggahasambhavato. Vivaṭṭe natthi abhiniveso avisayattā avisayatte
tika-s0401t:1008_4: ca payojanābhāvato. Pañcadhā vuttesūti satipaṭṭhānasutte vuttesu. Suddhaarūpasammasanamevāti
tika-s0401t:1008_5: rūpena amissitattā kevalaṃ arūpasammasanameva. Khandhāyatanasaccakoṭṭhāsānaṃ pañcakkhandhasaṅgahato
tika-s0401t:1008_6: “rūpārūpasammasana”nti vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāgiyānampi satipaṭṭhānānaṃ saṅgahitattā “lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva kathitānī”ti āha.
tika-s0401t:1009_0: 394. Anibbattānanti ajātānaṃ. Payogaṃ parakkamanti ettha bhusaṃ yogo payogo, payogova
tika-s0401t:1009_1: parakkamo, payogasaṅkhātaṃ parakkamanti attho. Cittaṃ ukkhipatīti kosajjapakkhe patituṃ
tika-s0401t:1009_4: kassapasaṃyutte āgatasuttena “uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya
tika-s0401t:1010_0: Samathavipassanāvāti avadhāraṇena maggaṃ nivattetvā tassa nivattane kāraṇaṃ dassento,
tika-s0401t:1010_1: “maggo panā”tiādimāha. Sakiṃ uppajjitvāti idaṃ bhūtakathanamattaṃ. Niruddhassa puna
tika-s0401t:1010_2: anuppajjanato “na koci guṇo”ti āsaṅkeyyāti āha – “so hī”tiādi. Anantarameva yathā
tika-s0401t:1010_3: phalaṃ uppajjati, tathā pavattiyevassa paccayadānaṃ. Purimasmimpīti “anuppannā me
tika-s0401t:1010_4: kusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti etthapi. Vuttanti porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1010_5: Taṃ pana tathāvuttavacanaṃ na yuttaṃ dutiyasmiṃ viya purimasmiṃ maggassa aggahaṇe
tika-s0401t:1010_6: kāraṇābhāvato. Purimasmiṃ aggahite magge anuppajjamāno maggo anatthāya saṃvatteyyāti
tika-s0401t:1010_7: āpajjeyya, na cetaṃ yuttaṃ āpajjamāne tasmiṃ padhānatthasambhavato. Catukiccasādhanavasenāti
tika-s0401t:1011_2: uppannaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ. Tañhi uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā uddhaṃ pannaṃ pattanti
tika-s0401t:1011_3: nippariyāyato “uppanna”nti vuccati. Anubhavitvā bhavitvā ca vigataṃ bhutvāvigataṃ.
tika-s0401t:1011_4: Anubhavanabhavanāni hi bhavanasāmaññena bhutvā-saddena vuttāni. Sāmaññameva hi upasaggena
tika-s0401t:1011_5: visesīyati. Idha vipākānubhavanavasena tadārammaṇaṃ avipakkavipākassa sabbathā avigatattā
tika-s0401t:1011_7: viya rajjanādivasena anubhūtāpagataṃ javanaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhatāvasena bhūtāpagatañca
tika-s0401t:1011_8: saṅkhataṃ bhūtāpagatuppannanti. Tasmā idha okāsakatuppannaṃ vipākameva vadati, na
tika-s0401t:1011_9: tattha viya kammampi. Aṭṭhasāliniyañhi bhūtāvigatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannañca aññathā
tika-s0401t:1012_1: anuppatvā niruddhaṃ bhūtāpagatasaṅkhātaṃ sesasaṅkhatañca bhūtāpagatuppannaṃ nāma.
tika-s0401t:1012_2: ‘Yānissa tāni pubbe katāni kammānī’ti evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ kammaṃ atītampi samānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1012_3: aññaṃ vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassokāsaṃ katvā ṭhitattā, tathākatokāsañca
tika-s0401t:1012_4: vipākaṃ anuppannampi samānaṃ evaṃ kate okāse ekantena uppajjanato okāsakatuppannaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0401t:1013: Idha pana sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannañca dassitaṃ. Vuttañhi, sammohavinodaniyaṃ –
tika-s0401t:1014_0: “Kamme pana jahite ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā niruddho vipāko bhutvāvigataṃ nāma.
tika-s0401t:1014_1: Kammaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ bhutvāvigataṃ nāma. Tadubhayampi bhutvāvigatuppannanti
tika-s0401t:1014_2: saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ aññakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa
tika-s0401t:1014_3: okāsaṃ karoti. Evaṃ kate okāse vipāko uppajjamāno okāsakaraṇato paṭṭhāya uppannoti
tika-s0401t:1015_0: Tattha aṭṭhasāliniyā ayamadhippāyo – “satipi sabbesampi cittuppādānaṃ saṃvedayitasabhāvā
tika-s0401t:1015_1: ārammaṇānubhavane savipallāse pana santāne cittābhisaṅkhāravasena pavattito abyākatehi
tika-s0401t:1015_2: visiṭṭho kusalākusalānaṃ sātisayo visayānubhavanākāro. Yathā vikappaggāhavasena rāgādīhi
tika-s0401t:1015_3: tabbipakkhehi ca akusalaṃ kusalañca nippariyāyato ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, na tathā
tika-s0401t:1015_4: vipāko kammavegakkhittattā, nāpi kiriyā ahetukānaṃ atidubbalatāya, sahetukānañca
tika-s0401t:1015_5: khīṇakilesassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato uppajjamānānaṃ atisantavuttittā, tasmā rajjanādivasena
tika-s0401t:1015_6: ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ sātisayanti akusalaṃ kusalañca uppajjitvā niruddhatāsāmaññena
tika-s0401t:1015_7: sesasaṅkhatañca bhūtāpagata”nti vuttaṃ. Sammohavinodaniyā pana vipākānubhavanavasena
tika-s0401t:1015_8: tadārammaṇaṃ avipakkapākassa sabbathā avigatattā bhavitvāvigatamattavasena kammañca
tika-s0401t:1015_9: bhutvāpagatanti vuttaṃ. Teneva tattha okāsakatuppannanti vipākamevāha, na kammampi,
tika-s0401t:1015_10: tasmā idhāpi sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhutvāpagatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannañca
tika-s0401t:1016_0: Pañcakkhandhā pana vipassanāya bhūmi nāmāti sammasanassa ṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ. Tesūti
tika-s0401t:1016_1: atītādibhedesu. Anusayitakilesāti appahīnā maggena pahātabbā adhippetā. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1016_2: “atītā vā…pe… na vattabbā”ti. Hontu tāva “atītā”ti vā “paccuppannā”ti vā na vattabbā,
tika-s0401t:1016_3: “anāgatā”ti pana kasmā na vattabbā, nanu kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā appahīnaṭṭhena
tika-s0401t:1016_4: thāmagatā kilesā anusayāti vuccantīti? Saccametaṃ, anāgatabhāvopi nesaṃ na paricchinno
tika-s0401t:1016_5: itarānāgatakkhandhānaṃ viyāti “anāgatā vāti na vattabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi hi nesaṃ
tika-s0401t:1016_6: paricchinno anāgatabhāvo siyā, tato “paccuppannā, atītā”ti ca vattabbā siyuṃ, paccayasamavāye
tika-s0401t:1016_7: pana uppajjanārahataṃ upādāya anāgatavohāro tattha veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1017_0: Idaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāmāti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ kilesajātaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ
tika-s0401t:1017_1: nāma kāraṇalābhe sati vijjamānakiccakaraṇato. Tāsu tāsu bhūmisūti manussadevādiattabhāvasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0401t:1017_2: upādānakkhandhesu. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena hi bhavanti ettha kilesāti bhūmiyo, upādānakkhandhā.
tika-s0401t:1017_3: Asamugghātagatāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ santāne anuppattidhammataṃ anāpāditatāya samugghātaṃ
tika-s0401t:1017_4: samucchedaṃ na gatāti asamugghātagatā. Bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāmāti ettha laddhabhūmikaṃ
tika-s0401t:1017_5: bhūmiladdhanti vuttaṃ aggiāhito viya. Okāsakatuppannasaddepi ca aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ āgatanayena
tika-s0401t:1017_6: okāso kato etena kusalākusalakammena, okāso kato etassa vipākassāti ca duvidhatthepi
tika-s0401t:1017_7: evameva katasaddassa paranipāto veditabbo. Idha pana okāsakatuppannasaddena vipākasseva
tika-s0401t:1017_8: gahitattā “okāso kato etassa vipākassā”ti evaṃ viggaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:1018_1: Ārammaṇaṃ adhiggayha daḷhaṃ gahetvā pavattaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahituppannaṃ. Vikkhambhanappahānavasena
tika-s0401t:1018_2: appahīnā avikkhambhitā. Samucchedappahānavasena appahīnā asamugghātitā. Nimittaggāhavasena
tika-s0401t:1018_3: ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe kilesuppattihetubhāvena
tika-s0401t:1018_4: upatiṭṭhanato adhiggahitameva nāmaṃ hotīti āha – “ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā”ti.
tika-s0401t:1018_5: Ettha ca āhaṭakhīrarukkho viya nimittaggāhavasena adhiggahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, anāhaṭakhīrarukkho
tika-s0401t:1018_6: viya avikkhambhitatāya antogatakilesaārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nimittaggāhikā avikkhambhitakilesā
tika-s0401t:1018_7: vā puggalā vā āhaṭānāhaṭakhīrarukkhasadisā. Purimanayenevāti avikkhambhituppanne
tika-s0401t:1018_8: vuttanayeneva. Vitthāretabbanti “imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantī”ti na vattabbā.
tika-s0401t:1018_9: Kasmā? Asamugghātitattā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā sace khīrarukkhaṃ kuṭhāriyā āhaneyyuṃ,
tika-s0401t:1018_10: imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhameyyāti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ. Idaṃ asamugghātituppannaṃ
tika-s0401t:1019_0: Imesu uppannesūti yathāvuttesu aṭṭhasu uppannesu. Idaṃ na maggavajjhaṃ appahātabbavatthuttā.
tika-s0401t:1019_1: Maggavajjhaṃ maggena paheyyavatthuttā. Rattoti rāgena samannāgato. Esa nayo duṭṭho
tika-s0401t:1019_2: mūḷhoti etthāpi. Vinibaddhoti mānasaṃyojanena virūpaṃ nibandhito. Parāmaṭṭhoti diṭṭhiparāmāsena
tika-s0401t:1019_3: dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato āmaṭṭho. Aniṭṭhaṅgatoti niṭṭhaṃ agato, saṃsayāpannoti
tika-s0401t:1019_4: attho. Thāmagatoti anusayavasena daḷhataṃ upagato. Yuganaddhāti pahātabbappahāyakayuge
tika-s0401t:1019_5: naddhā viya vattanakā ekakālikattā. Saṃkilesikāti saṃkilesadhammasahitā.
tika-s0401t:1020_0: Pāḷiyanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ. Tikālikesupi kilesesu vāyāmābhāvadassanatthaṃ ajātaphalataruṇarukkho
tika-s0401t:1020_1: pāḷiyaṃ nidassito, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana jāto satto asamudāhaṭakileso nāma natthīti
tika-s0401t:1020_2: “jātaphalarukkhena dīpetabba”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1020_3: Atha vā maggena pahīnakilesānameva atītādibhedena tidhā navattabbataṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ
tika-s0401t:1020_4: ajātaphalarukkho upamāvasena pāḷiyaṃ ābhato, atītādīnaṃ appahīnatādassanatthampi
tika-s0401t:1020_5: “jātaphalarukkhena dīpetabba”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā acchinne rukkhe
tika-s0401t:1020_6: nibbattanārahāni phalāni chinne anuppajjamānāni kadāci sasabhāvāni ahesuṃ, honti,
tika-s0401t:1020_7: bhavissanti vāti atītādibhāvena na vattabbāni, evaṃ maggena pahīnakilesā ca daṭṭhabbā
tika-s0401t:1020_8: magge anuppanne uppattirahānaṃ uppanne sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato. Yathā ca chede asati
tika-s0401t:1020_9: phalāni uppajjissantīti chedanassa sātthakatā, evaṃ maggabhāvanāya ca sātthakatā
tika-s0401t:1020_10: yojetabbā. Nāpi na pajahatīti uppajjanārahānaṃ pajahanato vuttaṃ. Uppajjitvāti lakkhaṇe
tika-s0401t:1021_0: Tepi pajahatiyevāti ye tehi kilesehi janetabbā upādinnakkhandhā, tepi pajahatiyeva
tika-s0401t:1021_3: etasmiṃ sotāpattimaggañāṇe hetubhūte. Eteti nāmarūpasaññitā saṅkhārā. Sabbabhavehi
tika-s0401t:1021_4: vuṭṭhātiyevātipi vadantīti arahattamaggo sabbabhavehi vuṭṭhātiyevāti vadanti taduppattito
tika-s0401t:1022_0: Ekacittakkhaṇikattā maggassāti adhippāyena “kathaṃ anuppannānaṃ…pe… ṭhitiyā bhāvanā
tika-s0401t:1022_2: Maggo hītiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati. Anuppanno nāma vuccati, tasmā tassa bhāvanā anuppannānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1022_3: uppādāya bhāvanā vuttāti yojetabbā. Vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti yāvatā maggassa pavattiyeva
tika-s0401t:1023_1: āha – “chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhi chandasamādhī”ti padhānasaṅkhārāti catukiccasādhakassa
tika-s0401t:1023_4: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro, sabbaṃ vīriyaṃ. Tattha catukiccasādhakato
tika-s0401t:1023_5: sesanivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇanti, padhānabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtāti attho. Catubbidhassa
tika-s0401t:1023_6: pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso kato. Tehi dhammehīti chandasamādhinā
tika-s0401t:1023_7: padhānasaṅkhārehi ca. Iddhipādanti ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti
tika-s0401t:1023_8: attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontītipi iddhi. Paṭhamenatthena
tika-s0401t:1023_9: iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Dutiyenatthena iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo,
tika-s0401t:1023_10: pādoti patiṭṭhā, adhigamūpāyoti attho. Tena hi yasmā uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ
tika-s0401t:1023_11: pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā pādoti vuccati. Tenāha – “iddhiyā pādaṃ, iddhibhūtaṃ vā
tika-s0401t:1024_0: Atha vā iddhipādanti nipphattipariyāyena ijjhanaṭṭhena, ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā
tika-s0401t:1024_1: vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1024_3: attho. Teneva iddhipādavibhaṅge “iddhipādoti tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti
tika-s0401t:1024_4: vuttaṃ. Sā eva ca tathāvuttā iddhi yasmā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimāya uparimāya tayo
tika-s0401t:1024_6: vā pāda”nti. Tathā heṭṭhā dhammā iddhipi honti iddhipādāpi, sesā pana sampayuttakā
tika-s0401t:1024_8: tayo tayo dhammā iddhipi honti iddhipādāpi, sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva.
tika-s0401t:1025_0: Apica pubbabhāgo pubbabhāgo iddhipādo nāma, paṭilābho paṭilābho iddhi nāmāti veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1025_1: Ayamattho upacārena vā vipassanāya vā dīpetabbo. Paṭhamajjhānaparikammañhi iddhipādo
tika-s0401t:1025_2: nāma, paṭhamajjhānaṃ iddhi nāma. Dutiyajhāna… tatiyajhāna… catutthajhāna… ākāsānañcāyatana…
tika-s0401t:1025_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ iddhi nāma. Sotāpattimaggassa vipassanā iddhipādo nāma, sotāpattimaggo
tika-s0401t:1025_5: iddhi nāma. Sakadāgāmi-anāgāmi-arahattamaggassa vipassanā iddhipādo nāma, arahattamaggo
tika-s0401t:1025_6: iddhi nāma. Paṭilābhenapi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paṭhamajjhānañhi iddhipādo nāma, dutiyajjhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1025_7: iddhi nāma. Dutiyajjhānaṃ iddhipādo nāma, tatiyajjhānaṃ iddhi nāma…pe… anāgāmimaggo
tika-s0401t:1026_0: Sesesupīti vīriyasamādhiādīsupi. Tattha hi vīriyaṃ, cittaṃ, vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā
tika-s0401t:1026_1: paṭiladdhasamādhi vīriyasamādhi, cittasamādhi, vīmaṃsāsamādhīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1026_2: Chandādīsu ekanti chandādīsu catūsu ādito vuttattā ādibhūtaṃ ekaṃ padhānaṃ chandanti
tika-s0401t:1026_3: adhippāyo. Tenevāha – “tadāssa paṭhamiddhipādo”ti. Evaṃ sesāpīti etena vīriyaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0401t:1026_4: vīmaṃsaṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇantānaṃ vasena dutiyavīriyiddhipādādayo
tika-s0401t:1026_5: yojetabbāti dasseti. Iminā hi suttantena catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ matthakappattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1026_6: dassitaṃ. Eko hi bhikkhu chandaṃ avassayati, kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena atthanipphattiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1026_7: sati “ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro”ti
tika-s0401t:1026_8: chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-s0401t:1026_9: Eko vīriyaṃ avassayati, eko cittaṃ, eko paññaṃ avassayati, paññāya atthanipphattiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1026_10: sati “ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro”ti
tika-s0401t:1026_11: paññaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-s0401t:1027_0: Kathaṃ? Yathā hi catūsu amaccaputtesu ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā vicarantesu eko upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1027_1: avassayati, eko sūrabhāvaṃ, eko jātiṃ, eko mantaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tesu hi paṭhamo upaṭṭhāne
tika-s0401t:1027_2: appamādakāritāya atthanipphattiyā sati labbhamānaṃ “lacchāmetaṃ ṭhānantara”nti upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1027_3: avassayati. Dutiyo upaṭṭhāne appamattopi “ekacco saṅgāme paccupaṭṭhite saṇṭhātuṃ
tika-s0401t:1027_4: na sakkoti, avassaṃ pana rañño paccanto kuppissati, tasmiṃ kuppite rathassa purato
tika-s0401t:1027_5: kammaṃ katvā rājānaṃ ārādhetvā āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara”nti sūrabhāvaṃ avassayati.
tika-s0401t:1027_6: Tatiyo “sūrabhāvepi sati ekacco hīnajātiko hoti, jātiṃ sodhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ dento
tika-s0401t:1027_7: mayhaṃ dassatī”ti jātiṃ avassayati. Catuttho “jātimāpi eko amantanīyo hoti, mantena
tika-s0401t:1027_8: kattabbakicce uppanne āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara”nti mantaṃ avassayati. Te sabbepi
tika-s0401t:1028_0: Tattha upaṭṭhāne appamatto hutvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya chandaṃ avassāya kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena
tika-s0401t:1028_1: “atthanipphattiyaṃ sati ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa
tika-s0401t:1028_2: nibbattane sāro”ti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako
tika-s0401t:1028_3: daṭṭhabbo raṭṭhapālatthero viya. So hi āyasmā “chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantī”ti
tika-s0401t:1028_4: sattāhampi bhattāni abhuñjitvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā chandameva avassāya
tika-s0401t:1028_5: lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Sūrabhāvena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya
tika-s0401t:1028_6: vīriyaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ vīriyaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako
tika-s0401t:1028_7: daṭṭhabbo soṇatthero viya. So hi āyasmā vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_0: Jātisampattiyā ṭhānantaraṃ pattoviya cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0401t:1029_1: katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo sambhūtatthero viya. So hi āyasmā cittaṃ
tika-s0401t:1029_2: jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Mantaṃ
tika-s0401t:1029_3: avassāya ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ vīmaṃsaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0401t:1029_4: katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo thero mogharājā viya. So hi āyasmā vīmaṃsaṃ
tika-s0401t:1029_5: jeṭṭhakaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ vīmaṃsaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_6: Tassa hi bhagavā “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti suññatākathaṃ kathesi. Paññānissitamānaniggahatthañca
tika-s0401t:1029_7: dvikkhattuṃ pucchito pañhaṃ na kathesi. Ettha ca punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ tosanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1029_8: viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā, thāmabhāvato vīriyassa sūrattasadisatā,
tika-s0401t:1030_0: 402-406. Attano saddhādhureti attano saddhākicce saddahanakiriyāya. Indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
tika-s0401t:1030_1: anuvattanavasena sampayuttadhammesu indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti, tasmā ādhipateyyaṭṭhena saddhā
tika-s0401t:1030_2: eva indriyanti saddhindriyaṃ. Tathā vīriyādīnaṃ sakasakakiccesūti āha – “vīriyindriyādīsupi
tika-s0401t:1031_0: Assaddhe puggale parivajjayatoti buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena saddhārahite lūkhapuggale
tika-s0401t:1031_1: sabbaso vajjayato. Saddhe puggale sevatoti buddhādīsu saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise
tika-s0401t:1031_2: sevato. Pasādanīyeti pasādāvahe sampasādanīyasuttādike. Paccavekkhatoti pāḷito atthato
tika-s0401t:1031_3: ca pati pati avekkhantassa cintentassa. Visujjhatīti paṭipakkhamalavigamato paccayavasena
tika-s0401t:1031_4: sabhāvasaṃsuddhito visuddhaphalanibbattito ca saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati. Esa nayo
tika-s0401t:1031_5: sesesupi. Sammappadhāneti sammappadhānappaṭisaṃyutte suttante. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0401t:1031_6: Jhānavimokkheti paṭhamajjhānādijjhānāni ceva paṭhamavimokkhādivimokkhe ca. Kāmañcettha
tika-s0401t:1031_7: jhānāniyeva vimokkhā, pavattiākāravasena pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1032_1: Khandhantaranti sabhāvajātibhūmiādivasena khandhānaṃ nānattaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0401t:1032_2: Akatābhinivesoti pubbe akatabhāvanābhiniveso. Saddhādhurādīsūti saddhādhure paññādhure
tika-s0401t:1032_3: ca. Avasāneti bhāvanāpariyosāne. Vivaṭṭetvāti saṅkhārārammaṇato vivaṭṭetvā nibbānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1032_4: ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Arahattaṃ gaṇhātīti maggaparamparāya arahattaṃ gaṇhāti. Akampiyaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0401t:1032_5: paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvena. Etenevassa sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi vibhāvito
tika-s0401t:1032_6: daṭṭhabbo. Na hi sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena vinā paṭipakkhehi akampiyatā sambhavati.
tika-s0401t:1032_7: Sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāveneva hi akusalānaṃ abyākatānañca nesaṃ balavabhāvūpapatti.
tika-s0401t:1032_8: Assaddhiyeti assaddhiyahetu. Nimittatthe hetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0401t:1033_2: Upatiṭṭhanañca ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, avissajjanaṃ vā ārammaṇassa. Apilāpanalakkhaṇāti
tika-s0401t:1033_3: asammussanasabhāvā, udake alābu viya ārammaṇe plavitvā gantuṃ appadānaṃ, pāsāṇassa
tika-s0401t:1033_4: viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhakaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ. Sāpateyyanti
tika-s0401t:1033_5: santakaṃ. Apilāpanaṃ asammuṭṭhaṃ karoti apilāpeti, sāyaṃ pātañca rājānaṃ issariyasampattiṃ
tika-s0401t:1033_6: sallakkhāpeti sāretīti attho. Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhammeti kaṇhasukkasaṅkhāte
tika-s0401t:1033_7: sappaṭibhāge dhamme. Kaṇho hi dhammo sukkena, sukko ca kaṇhena sappaṭibhāgo. Vitthāra-saddo
tika-s0401t:1033_8: ādisaddattho. Tena “ime cattāro dhammā sammappadhānā, ime cattāro iddhipādā, imāni
tika-s0401t:1033_9: pañcindriyāni, imāni pañca balāni, ime satta bojjhaṅgā, ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
tika-s0401t:1033_10: ayaṃ samatho, ayaṃ vipassanā, ayaṃ vijjā, ayaṃ vimutti, ime lokuttaradhammāti evaṃ
tika-s0401t:1033_11: kho, mahārāja, apilāpanalakkhaṇā satī”ti imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Therenāti nāgasenattherena.
tika-s0401t:1033_12: So hi dhammānaṃ kiccaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā asseti “apilāpanalakkhaṇā sati, ākoṭanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0401t:1033_13: vitakko”tiādinā. Evañhi dhammā subodhā hontīti. Sammosapaccanīkaṃ kiccaṃ asammoso,
tika-s0401t:1033_14: na sammosābhāvamattanti āha – “asammosarasā vā”ti. Yassa dhammassa balena sampayuttadhammā
tika-s0401t:1033_15: ārammaṇābhimukhā bhavanti, sā sati. Tasmā sā tesaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpesi,
tika-s0401t:1033_17: Sammā pasattho bojjhaṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo. Bodhiyā vakkhamānāya dhammasāmaggiyā, bodhissa
tika-s0401t:1033_18: vā ariyasāvakassa aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo. Yā hītiādinā tameva saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0401t:1033_19: “Yā hi ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī”ti etassa “bodhīti vuccatī”ti iminā sambandho. Dhammasāmaggiyāti
tika-s0401t:1033_20: dhammasamūhena, yāya dhammasāmaggiyāti sambandho. Patiṭṭhānāyūhanā oghataraṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1033_21: “kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā. Taṇhā diṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1033_22: avasesakilesābhisaṅkhārehi āyūhanā. Taṇhāvasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhivasena āyūhanā.
tika-s0401t:1033_23: Sassatadiṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhānaṃ, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā. Līnavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, uddhaccavasena
tika-s0401t:1033_26: evaṃ vuttesu sattasu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā. Paṭipakkhabhūtāyāti
tika-s0401t:1033_29: dhammasāmaggī paṭipakkho. Sati pana ubhayatthāpi icchitabbā. Tathā hi sā “sabbatthikā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0401t:1034_0: Kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatīti etena sikhāppattavipassanāya sahagatānampi satiādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:1034_1: bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā hi kilese nirodhentī eva pavattatīti.
tika-s0401t:1034_2: Cattāri vātiādinā pana maggaphalasahagatānaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti. Sattahi bojjhaṅgehi
tika-s0401t:1034_3: bhāvitehi saccappaṭivedho hotīti kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha – “yathāhā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:1034_5: dasseti. Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1035_0: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti kāraṇattho aṅgasaddoti katvā vuttaṃ. Bujjhantīti
tika-s0401t:1035_1: bodhiyo, bodhiyo eva aṅgāni bojjhaṅgānīti vuttaṃ – “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti. Vipassanādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:1035_2: kāraṇādīnaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītatāya
tika-s0401t:1035_3: sammā ca bujjhantīti evaṃ atthavisesadīpakehi upasaggehi “anubujjhantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1035_4: Bodhisaddo hi sabbavisesayuttabujjhanaṃ sāmaññena saṅgaṇhāti. Saṃ-saddo pasaṃsāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1035_5: sundarabhāve ca dissatīti āha – “pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0401t:1036_0: Dhamme vicinatīti dhammavicayo. Tattha dhammeti catusaccadhamme tabbinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa
tika-s0401t:1036_1: abhāvato. Tato eva so pavicayalakkhaṇo. Obhāsanarasoti visayobhāsanaraso. Asammuyhanākārena
tika-s0401t:1037_0: Vīrassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vāti vīriyaṃ. Īrayitabbatoti pavattetabbato. Paggahalakkhaṇanti
tika-s0401t:1037_1: kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggahalakkhaṇaṃ. Tato eva sampayuttadhamme
tika-s0401t:1038_0: Pīṇayatīti tappeti. Pīṇanakiccena sampayuttadhammānaṃ viya taṃsamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi
tika-s0401t:1038_1: kāyassābyapanaṃ. Pharaṇapītivasena hetaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā rasoti. Udaggabhāvo
tika-s0401t:1038_2: odagyaṃ, taṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā. Ubbegapītivasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1039_2: attho. Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. Daratho sārambho, dukkhadomanassapaccayānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1039_3: uddhaccādikānaṃ kilesānaṃ, tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1040_0: Sammā cittassa ṭhapanaṃ samādhānaṃ. Avikkhepo sampayuttānaṃ avikkhittatā. Yena sampayuttā
tika-s0401t:1040_1: avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepo. Avisāro attano eva avisaraṇabhāvo. Atha vā
tika-s0401t:1040_2: vikkhepappaṭipakkhatāya avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Nhānīyacuṇṇassa udakaṃ viya sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1040_3: sampiṇḍanakiccatāya avisārabhāvena lakkhitabbo avisāralakkhaṇo. Nivāte dīpacciṭṭhiti
tika-s0401t:1041_0: Ajjhupekkhanatoti samappavattesu assesu sārathi viya sampayuttadhammānaṃ ajjhupekkhanato.
tika-s0401t:1041_2: Samavāhitalakkhaṇāti samaṃ avisamaṃ yathāsakakiccesu sampayuttadhammānaṃ pavattanalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0401t:1041_3: Udāsīnabhāvena pavattamānāpi sesasampayuttadhamme yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti, yathā
tika-s0401t:1041_4: rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakaṃ kiccesu appamatto pavatteti.
tika-s0401t:1041_6: “idaṃ nihīnakiccaṃ hotu, idaṃ atirekatarakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātanavasena viya pavatti
tika-s0401t:1041_7: pakkhapāto, taṃ upacchindantī viya hotīti pakkhapātupacchedanarasā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1042_0: Sati ca sampajaññañca satisampajaññaṃ, satipadhānaṃ vā sampajaññaṃ satisampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1042_1: Taṃ sabbattha satokāribhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti. Yathā paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1042_2: anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavivajjanā,
tika-s0401t:1042_3: satokāripuggalasevanā, tattha ca yuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:1042_5: hoti, ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti,
tika-s0401t:1042_6: saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī
tika-s0401t:1042_7: hoti, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite
tika-s0401t:1042_8: tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hotī”ti evaṃ vuttesu abhikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu. Tissadattatthero
tika-s0401t:1042_9: nāma yo bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā “aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya dhammaṃ
tika-s0401t:1042_10: kathemī”ti parisaṃ padhāresi. Abhayattheroti dattābhayattheramāha. Abhinivesanti
tika-s0401t:1043_0: Paripucchakatāti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye
tika-s0401t:1043_1: saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ taṃ “idaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1043_2: bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa hi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
tika-s0401t:1044_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti ettha cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ tappaṭibaddhāni
tika-s0401t:1044_1: cīvarādīni ca vatthūnīti adhippetāni. Tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā
tika-s0401t:1044_2: karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadakiriyā. Tenāha – “ajjhattikabāhirāna”ntiādi. Ussannadosanti vātapittādivasena
tika-s0401t:1044_3: upacitadosaṃ. Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1044_4: Ca-saddena aññampi sarīrassa pīḷāvahaṃ accāsanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Senāsanaṃ vāti vā-saddena
tika-s0401t:1044_5: malaggahitapattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Paribhaṇḍakaraṇādīhīti ādi-saddena pattapacanādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:1044_6: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Avisadeti vatthumhi avisade sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa
tika-s0401t:1044_7: tāni ajjhattikabāhiravatthūni visayo? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1044_8: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. Cittacetasikesūti
tika-s0401t:1044_9: nissayādipaccayabhūtesu cittacetasikesu. Ñāṇampīti api-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena
tika-s0401t:1044_10: “na kevalaṃ vatthuyeva, atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotī”ti
tika-s0401t:1044_11: nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayino
tika-s0401t:1045_0: Samabhāvakaraṇanti kiccato anūnādhikabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, saddheyyavatthusmiṃ
tika-s0401t:1045_1: paccayavasena adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca
tika-s0401t:1045_2: sithilatādinā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “itarāni mandānī”ti. Tatoti tasmā,
tika-s0401t:1045_3: saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattāti attho. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ
tika-s0401t:1045_4: adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho. Paggahova kiccaṃ
tika-s0401t:1045_5: paggahakiccaṃ. Kātuṃ na sakkotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1045_6: anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ. Vikkhepappaṭipakkho, yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti,
tika-s0401t:1045_7: so avikkhepo. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ
tika-s0401t:1045_8: dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena adhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu
tika-s0401t:1045_9: hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekadesatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0401t:1045_10: na aññathā. Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. Tanti saddhindriyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1045_11: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyassa vatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa
tika-s0401t:1045_12: sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato
tika-s0401t:1045_13: yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena yāthāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro
tika-s0401t:1045_14: adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo”ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa
tika-s0401t:1045_15: sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0401t:1045_16: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāpetabba”nti.
tika-s0401t:1046_0: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1046_1: tenākārena bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa
tika-s0401t:1046_2: balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0401t:1046_3: Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto
tika-s0401t:1046_4: vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:1046_5: paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1047_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpadassanappasuto
tika-s0401t:1047_1: eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho,
tika-s0401t:1047_2: vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”tiādinā nayena ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi
tika-s0401t:1047_3: taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ satthā
tika-s0401t:1050_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehi, vakkalī”ti āha. So teneva amatena abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā
tika-s0401t:1050_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, saddhāya pana balavabhāvena vipassanāvīthiṃ na otari. Taṃ
tika-s0401t:1050_2: ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattappaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā
tika-s0401t:1050_3: dinnanaye ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena
tika-s0401t:1050_4: vuttaṃ – “vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana”nti. Etthāti saddhindriyassa adhimattabhāve
tika-s0401t:1050_6: ādi-saddena samādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ saṅgaho. Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa
tika-s0401t:1050_7: balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā
tika-s0401t:1050_8: passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā. Tathā hi samādhindriyassa
tika-s0401t:1050_9: adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ
tika-s0401t:1050_10: uddhaccapātato rakkhantī passaddhādibhāvanā ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena vuttaṃ – “passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabba”nti.
tika-s0401t:1051_0: Soṇattherassa vatthūti sukhumālasoṇattherassa vatthu. So hi āyasmā satthu santike
tika-s0401t:1051_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva
tika-s0401t:1051_2: sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya
tika-s0401t:1051_3: padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1051_4: karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena
tika-s0401t:1051_5: ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ visodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0401t:1051_6: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanampi ussukkāpetvā
tika-s0401t:1051_7: arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba”nti. Sesesupīti
tika-s0401t:1052_0: Samatanti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnādhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0401t:1052_1: hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānativattanaṃ visesato
tika-s0401t:1052_2: icchitabbaṃ, yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1052_4: sammadeva appanā ijjhati. Balavasaddhotiādi byatirekamukhena vuttassevatthassa samatthanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1052_5: Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so mudhappasanno hoti,
tika-s0401t:1052_6: na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. Kerāṭikapakkhanti
tika-s0401t:1052_8: vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetuppaṭirūpakehi
tika-s0401t:1052_9: vañcito, evaṃbhūto sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati, saññattiṃ
tika-s0401t:1052_10: na gacchati. Tenāha – “bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī”ti. Yathā cettha
tika-s0401t:1052_11: saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, anatthāvaho visamabhāvo, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1052_12: aññamaññaṃ avikkhepāvaho samabhāvo, itaro vikkhepāvaho cāti kosajjaṃ abhibhavati,
tika-s0401t:1052_13: tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Uddhaccaṃ abhibhavatīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0401t:1052_14: Taṃ ubhayanti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ samādhivīriyadvayañca. Samaṃ kattabbanti samarasaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1053_0: Samādhikammikassāti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. Evanti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve
tika-s0401t:1053_1: satīti attho. Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti
tika-s0401t:1053_2: acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
tika-s0401t:1053_3: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anuppavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0401t:1053_4: Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati samādhippadhānattā jhānassa. Ubhinnanti samādhipaññānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1053_5: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatā viya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha
tika-s0401t:1053_6: – “samatāyapī”ti, samabhāvenapīti attho. Appanāti lokiyaappanā. Tathā hi “hotiyevā”ti
tika-s0401t:1053_7: sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha – “samathavipassanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1054_0: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samatāva icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha
tika-s0401t:1054_1: – “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti. Sabbatthāti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu pañcasu
tika-s0401t:1054_2: indriyesu. Uddhaccapakkhike gaṇhanto “saddhāvīriyapaññāna”nti āha. Aññathāpīti ca
tika-s0401t:1054_3: gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi kosajjapakkhikena ca samādhināicceva vuttaṃ, na “passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī”ti.
tika-s0401t:1054_4: Sāti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto sabbakammiko. Tenāti tena sabbattha icchitabbatthena
tika-s0401t:1054_5: kāraṇena. Āha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā sabbatthikā sabbattha līne uddhate
tika-s0401t:1054_6: ca citte icchitabbattā, sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgagaṇena atthetabbāti
