tika-s0401t:1054_7: sabbatthā, sāva sabbatthikā. Cittanti kusalacittaṃ. Tassa hi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1055_2: bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha – “samapaññāsa…pe…
tika-s0401t:1055_4: āha – “gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti. Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya
tika-s0401t:1055_5: paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ. Tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti
tika-s0401t:1056_0: Pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti
tika-s0401t:1056_1: devadūtasuttādīsu ādito vuttattā ca āha – “pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāyā”ti.
tika-s0401t:1056_2: Sakaṭavahanādikāleti ādi-saddena tadaññaṃ manussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhitabbakālaṃ
tika-s0401t:1056_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ aparāparesu petesuyeva uppajjanakasattavasena
tika-s0401t:1056_4: vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya dīghāyukatā siyāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1056_5: Tathā hi kāḷo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ labhitvā ṭhitopi metteyyassapi
tika-s0401t:1056_6: bhagavato sammukhībhāvaṃ labhissatīti vadanti, yatassa kappāyukatā vuttā.
tika-s0401t:1057_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokiyo lokuttaro ca visesādhigamoti
tika-s0401t:1057_1: evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. Gamanavīthinti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1057_2: saha vipassanāya ariyamaggappaṭipāṭi, sattavisuddhiparamparā vā. Sā hi “bhikkhuno
tika-s0401t:1057_3: vaṭṭaniyyānāya gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadā”ti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0401t:1058_0: Kāyadaḷhībahuloti yathā tathā kāyassa daḷhīkammappasuto. Piṇḍapātanti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1058_1: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena
tika-s0401t:1059_0: Nīharantoti pattatthavikato nīharanto. Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasālādvāre
tika-s0401t:1059_1: ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā. Manussasampatti, dibbasampatti, nibbānasampattīti
tika-s0401t:1059_2: imā tisso sampattiyo. Dātuṃ sakkhissasīti tayi katena dānamayena veyyāvaccamayena
tika-s0401t:1059_3: ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena aparāparaṃ devamanussānaṃ sampattiyo
tika-s0401t:1059_4: ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasīti thero attānaṃ pucchati. Sitaṃ karontoti
tika-s0401t:1059_5: “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto.
tika-s0401t:1060_0: Nipparissayakāloti nirupaddavakālo, tadā bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhā paccayā hontīti
tika-s0401t:1060_1: paccayahetukā cittapīḷā natthīti adhippāyo. Passantānaṃyevāti anādare sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1060_2: Khīradhenunti khīradāyikaṃ dhenuṃ. Kiñcideva katvāti kiñcideva bhatikammaṃ katvā.
tika-s0401t:1060_3: Ucchuyantakammanti ucchuyantasālāya kātabbaṃ kiccaṃ. Tameva magganti upāsakena paṭipannamaggaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1060_5: Evanti yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro
tika-s0401t:1060_6: hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī, evaṃ kusītopi teneva kusītabhāvena na sammāpaṭipanno
tika-s0401t:1060_7: satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī. Āraddhavīriyova labhati sammāpaṭipajjanato.
tika-s0401t:1061: Mahāti sīlādiguṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo. Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:1062: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjūpagamanena sakyaputtiyabhāvo sañjāyati, tasmā buddhaputtabhāvaṃ dassento “asambhinnāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:1063_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-s0401t:1063_1: seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānagatikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato vajjanā kusītapuggalaparivajjanāti
tika-s0401t:1063_2: āha – “kucchiṃ pūretvā ṭhitaajagarasadise”tiādi. “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi
tika-s0401t:1063_3: dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhessāmā”tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1063_6: dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, thinamiddhavinodanatā sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇatāti idaṃ dvayaṃ
tika-s0401t:1063_7: gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa
tika-s0401t:1063_8: vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato, thinamiddhavinodanaṃ pana tadadhimuttatāya eva gahitaṃ
tika-s0401t:1063_9: hoti. Vīriyuppādane yuttappayuttassa thinamiddhavinodanaṃ atthasiddhamevāti. Tattha
tika-s0401t:1064_1: pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno, dhammasaṅghaguṇe
tika-s0401t:1064_2: anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti
tika-s0401t:1064_3: evaṃ sesaanussatīsu, pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya ca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena
tika-s0401t:1064_4: taggatikattā. Evarūpe kāleti “dubbhikkhabhayādīsū”ti vuttakāle. Samāpatti…pe… na
tika-s0401t:1064_5: samudācarantīti idaṃ upasamānussatiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Saṅkhārānañhi vasena sappadesavūpasamepi
tika-s0401t:1064_6: nippadesavūpasame viya tathā saññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho
tika-s0401t:1064_8: upādāya hotīti. Tattha “vikkhambhitā kilesā”ti pāṭho. Na samudācarantīti iti-saddo
tika-s0401t:1064_9: kāraṇattho. Yasmā na samudācaranti, tasmā taṃ nesaṃ asamudācāraṃ paccavekkhantassāti
tika-s0401t:1064_10: yojanā. Na hi kilese paccavekkhantassa bojjhaṅguppatti yuttā, pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu
tika-s0401t:1064_11: pasādasinehābhāvena lūkhahadayatāya lūkhatā. Sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti
tika-s0401t:1065_1: sappāyautuiriyāpathaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa
tika-s0401t:1065_2: kalyatāpādanavasena cittassa kalyataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1065_3: Ahetukasattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti pana
tika-s0401t:1065_4: ayaṃ dutiyo. Ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0401t:1065_5: Majjhatto payogo yassa so majjhattapayogo, tassa bhāvo majjhattapayogatā. Ayañhi
tika-s0401t:1065_6: sabhāvāsāraddhatāya taṃpassaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hoti, passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati. Eteneva
tika-s0401t:1066: Vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattappaṭipādanā ca paññāvahā vuttā, samādhānāvahāpi tā honti. Samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ – “vatthuvisadakiriyā…pe… veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0401t:1067_2: ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asubhanimittādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa
tika-s0401t:1067_3: uggahakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti. Atisithilavīriyatādīhīti ādi-saddena paññāpayogamandataṃ
tika-s0401t:1067_4: payogavekallañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa paggaṇhananti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0401t:1068_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0401t:1068_1: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0401t:1068_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1068_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa. So tattha sukkhāni
tika-s0401t:1068_4: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0401t:1068_5: mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ
tika-s0401t:1069: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva.
tika-s0401t:1070_1: Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0401t:1071_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0401t:1071_1: bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0401t:1071_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1071_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
tika-s0401t:1071_4: allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, allāni ca gomayāni nikkhipeyya, allāni ca kaṭṭhāni
tika-s0401t:1071_5: pakkhipeyya, mukhavātañca na dadeyya, paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso
tika-s0401t:1072_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti
tika-s0401t:1072_1: veditabbā. Tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva, samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0401t:1073_0: Paññāpayogamandatāyāti paññābyāpārassa appakabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhappadhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1073_1: sīlaṃ adosappadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0401t:1073_2: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti. Anabhisaṅgato viya āhāro purisassa,
tika-s0401t:1073_3: yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva
tika-s0401t:1073_4: avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati, tenapi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0401t:1073_6: tikicchananti taṃ dassento, “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni
tika-s0401t:1073_8: apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ
tika-s0401t:1073_9: gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā
tika-s0401t:1073_10: āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇajīvitadukkhaṃ
tika-s0401t:1073_11: aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatāti
tika-s0401t:1073_12: ayaṃ bhāvanācittassa sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayeneva saṃvegajananavasena ceva
tika-s0401t:1073_13: pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā, saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena tosanāti attho.
tika-s0401t:1074_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ
tika-s0401t:1074_1: sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma. Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya
tika-s0401t:1074_2: alīnaṃ, uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ anadhimattatāya anuddhataṃ, paññāpayogasampattiyā upasamasukhādhigamena
tika-s0401t:1074_3: ca anirassādaṃ, tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ. Alīnānuddhatāhi
tika-s0401t:1074_4: vā ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ. Samappavattiyā
tika-s0401t:1074_5: vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha alīnatāya
tika-s0401t:1074_6: paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0401t:1074_7: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa
tika-s0401t:1074_9: vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi
tika-s0401t:1074_11: – “upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā”ti. Esa uppajjatīti esa samādhisambojjhaṅgo anuppanno uppajjati.
tika-s0401t:1075_1: sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato, so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti
tika-s0401t:1075_2: āha – “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti. Tadubhayena ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya
tika-s0401t:1075_5: rāgo paṭipakkho. Tathā cāha – “upekkhā rāgabahulassa visuddhimaggo”ti. Dvīhākārehīti
tika-s0401t:1075_6: kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ, attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti, imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. Dvīhevāti
tika-s0401t:1075_7: avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhyāsamānatādassanatthaṃ. Saṅkhyā eva hettha samānā, na saṅkhyeyyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1075_8: sabbathā samānanti. Assāmikabhāvo anattaniyatā. Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena
tika-s0401t:1075_9: cīvaraṃ aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so pana koci natthevāti adhippāyo. Anaddhaniyanti
tika-s0401t:1075_10: na addhānakkhamaṃ, na ciraṭṭhāyī ittaraṃ aniccanti attho. Tāvakālikanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1076: Mamāyatīti mamattaṃ karoti, mamāti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. Dhanāyantāti dhanaṃ dabbaṃ karontā.
tika-s0401t:1077_0: 419. Sammādassanalakkhaṇāti sammā aviparītaṃ aniccādivasena dassanasabhāvā. Sammāabhiniropanalakkhaṇoti
tika-s0401t:1077_1: sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanasabhāvo. Caturaṅgasamannāgatā vācā janaṃ
tika-s0401t:1077_3: sampayutte ca pariggaṇhanakiccavatī hotīti “pariggahalakkhaṇā”ti vuttā. Visaṃvādanādikiccatāya
tika-s0401t:1077_4: hi lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ musāvādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā siniddhabhāvena pariggahaṇasabhāvā
tika-s0401t:1077_6: ca pariggaṇhantī pavattatīti pariggahalakkhaṇā. Yathā cīvarakammādippayogasaṅkhāto
tika-s0401t:1077_7: kammanto kātabbaṃ cīvararajanādikaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti nipphādeti, taṃtaṃkiriyānipphādako
tika-s0401t:1077_8: vā cetanāsaṅkhāto kammanto hatthacalanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, evaṃ sāvajjakattabbakiriyāsamuṭṭhāpakamicchākammantappahānena
tika-s0401t:1077_9: sammākammanto niravajjassa kattabbassa niravajjākārena samuṭṭhāpanakiccavā hotīti
tika-s0401t:1077_11: kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Sammāvodāpanalakkhaṇoti jīvamānassa puggalassa,
tika-s0401t:1077_12: sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā jīvitindriyavuttiyā, ājīvasseva vā sammadeva sodhanaṃ vodāpanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1077_13: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sammāvodāpanalakkhaṇo. Atha vā kāyavācānaṃ khandhasantānassa ca
tika-s0401t:1078_0: Paññāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvato sabbepi akusalā dhammā tassā paṭipakkhāvāti
tika-s0401t:1078_1: vuttaṃ – “aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhi”nti. Atha vā attano paccanīkakilesā
tika-s0401t:1078_2: diṭṭhekaṭṭhā avijjādayo paññāya ujupaccanīkabhāvato. Passatīti passantī viya hoti
tika-s0401t:1078_5: iminā attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhinti imamatthaṃ anukaḍḍhati. Visesatoti sammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0401t:1079_0: Esā sammādiṭṭhi nāmāti lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca ekajjhaṃ katvā vadati missakatābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1079_1: Tenāha – “pubbabhāge”tiādi. Ekārammaṇā nibbānārammaṇattā. Kiccatoti pubbabhāge dukkhādīhi
tika-s0401t:1079_2: ñāṇehi kātabbakiccassa idha nipphattito, imasseva vā ñāṇassa dukkhādippakāsanakiccato.
tika-s0401t:1079_3: Cattāri nāmāni labhati dukkhapariññādicatukiccasādhanato. Tīṇi nāmāni labhati kāmasaṅkappādippahānakiccanipphattito.
tika-s0401t:1079_4: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “viraticetanā taṃsampayuttā ca dhammā sikkhāpadānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0401t:1079_5: tattha padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena “viratiyopi honti cetanādayopī”ti āha. “Sammā
tika-s0401t:1079_6: vadati etāyā”tiādinā atthasambhavato sammāvācādayo tayo viratiyopi honti cetanādayopi.
tika-s0401t:1079_7: Musāvādādīhi viramaṇakāle viratiyo, subhāsitādivācābhāsanādikāle cetanādayo yojetabbā.
tika-s0401t:1079_8: Maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova maggalakkhaṇappattito. Na hi cetanā niyyānasabhāvā. Atha
tika-s0401t:1079_9: vā ekassa ñāṇassa dukkhādiñāṇatā viya ekāya viratiyā musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca
tika-s0401t:1080_0: Cattāri nāmāni labhatīti catusammappadhānacatusatipaṭṭhānavasena labhati. Maggakkhaṇeti
tika-s0401t:1080_1: ānetvā sambandho. Pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhi evāti yadipi samādhiupakārakānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1080_4: sati viya ca asubhāsukhāniccānattesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāpahānalakkhaṇaṃ catusatikiccaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1080_5: eko samādhi catujjhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādhetīti pubbabhāgepi paṭhamajjhānasamādhi,
tika-s0401t:1080_6: paṭhamajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇepi, tathā pubbabhāgepi catutthajjhānasamādhi,
tika-s0401t:1081_0: “Kiṃ panāyaṃ maggadhammānaṃ desanānukkamo, kevalaṃ vācāya kamavattinibhāvato, udāhu
tika-s0401t:1081_1: kañci visesaṃ upādāyā”ti vicāraṇāyaṃ kañci visesaṃ upādāyāti dassento āha – “imesū”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:1081_2: Tattha bhāvanānubhāvā hitaphalāya sātisayaṃ tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā acchariyabbhutasamatthatāyogena
tika-s0401t:1081_3: sabbaso paṭipakkhavidhamanena yāthāvato dhammasabhāvabodhanena ca sammādiṭṭhiyā bahukāratā
tika-s0401t:1082: Tassāti sammādiṭṭhiyā. Bahukāroti dhammasampaṭivedhe bahūpakāro. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ, “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1083_1: upakārako evāti āha – “svāyaṃ…pe… sammāvācāyapi upakārako”ti. Sammāsaṅkappo hi saccavācāya
tika-s0401t:1084_1: icchitabbanti virativācāvasena saṃvidahanaṃ viratikammantasseva payojanañca nidassitanti
tika-s0401t:1084_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ hissa sammāvācāya sammākammantassāpi bahukāratā jotitā siyā. Vacībhedaniyāmikā
tika-s0401t:1084_3: hi vacīduccaritavirati kāyikakiriyaniyāmikāya kāyaduccaritaviratiyā upakārikā. Tathā
tika-s0401t:1084_4: hi visaṃvādanādimicchāvācato avirato micchākammantatopi na viramateva. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:1084_5: “ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassa…pe… natthi pāpaṃ akāriya”nti. Tasmā avisaṃvādanādisammāvācāya
tika-s0401t:1084_6: ṭhito sammākammantampi pūretiyevāti vacīduccaritavirati kāyaduccaritaviratiyā upakārikā.
tika-s0401t:1085_0: Yasmā ājīvapārisuddhi nāma dussīlyappahānapubbikā, tasmā sammāvācākammantānantaraṃ
tika-s0401t:1085_1: sammāājīvo desitoti dassetuṃ – “catubbidhaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettāvatāti parisuddhasīlājīvikāmattena.
tika-s0401t:1086_0: Vīriyārambhopi sammāsatipariggahito eva nibbānāvaho, na kevaloti dassetuṃ – “tato”tiādi
tika-s0401t:1086_1: vuttaṃ. Sūpaṭṭhitāti bahiddhāvikkhepaṃ pahāya suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā kātabbā. Samādhissa
tika-s0401t:1086_3: veditabbā. Gatiyoti nipphattiyo. Samanvesitvāti sammā pariyesitvā.
tika-s0401t:1087_0: 427. Yathā itthīsu kathā pavattā adhitthīti vuccati, evaṃ attānaṃ adhikicca pavattā
tika-s0401t:1087_1: ajjhattaṃ. “Evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ ‘attā’ti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmā”ti iminā viya adhippāyena
tika-s0401t:1087_2: attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā sattasantatipariyāpannā ajjhattaṃ. Tasmiṃ ajjhattarūpe,
tika-s0401t:1087_3: attano kesādivatthuke kasiṇarūpeti attho. Parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññīti parikammakaraṇavasena
tika-s0401t:1087_4: ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī, na appanāvasena. Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā
tika-s0401t:1087_5: sambhavati. Taṃ pana ajjhattaṃ parikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ avisuddhameva
tika-s0401t:1087_6: hoti, na bahiddhā parikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ. Tenāha – “taṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:1088_0: Yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannanti yassa puggalassa evaṃ vuttappakārena ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0401t:1088_1: parikammaṃ jātaṃ. Nimittaṃ pana bahiddhāti paṭibhāganimittaṃ sasantatipariyāpannaṃ
tika-s0401t:1088_2: na hotīti bahiddhā. Parittānīti yathāladdhāni suppasarāvamattāni. Tenāha – “avaḍḍhitānī”ti.
tika-s0401t:1088_3: Parittavasenevāti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1088_4: vuttaṃ parittatā hettha abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhavatīti
tika-s0401t:1088_5: abhibhu, parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā. Abhibhu āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ, jhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1088_6: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ. Atha vā ārammaṇābhibhavanato
tika-s0401t:1088_7: abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0401t:1088_8: cāti sasampayuttajjhānaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ. Abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva
tika-s0401t:1088_9: sambhavati, na itarassāti āha – “ñāṇuttariko puggalo”ti. Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatīti
tika-s0401t:1088_11: āha – “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti. Saha nimittuppādenāti ca appanāparivāsābhāvassa
tika-s0401t:1088_12: lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ. Yo khippābhiññoti vuccati, tatopi ñāṇuttarasseva abhibhāyatanabhāvanā.
tika-s0401t:1088_13: Etthāti etasmiṃ nimitte. Appanaṃ pāpetīti bhāvanāappanaṃ neti.
tika-s0401t:1089_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā
tika-s0401t:1089_1: pavattanti, te upacārajjhānapakkhikā eva, tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārasevanāya
tika-s0401t:1089_2: ca vinā appanā hoti, saha nimittuppādeneva appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1089_3: Na hi pārivāsikaparikammena appanāvāro icchito, nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya
tika-s0401t:1089_4: upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā. Tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ
tika-s0401t:1089_6: pāpetī”ti vutto. Saha nimittuppādenāti ca adhippāyikamidaṃ vacanaṃ, na nītatthaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1089_7: tattha adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa
tika-s0401t:1089_8: asambhavato. Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ
tika-s0401t:1089_9: abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “imināssa
tika-s0401t:1089_10: pubbābhogo kathito”ti vuttaṃ. Antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā jhānasaññāyapīti
tika-s0401t:1090_0: Vaḍḍhitappamāṇānīti vipulappamāṇānīti attho, na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivaḍḍhiṃ pāpitāni
tika-s0401t:1090_2: bhuñjanabhājane vaḍḍhetvā dinnaṃ bhattaṃ, ekāsane purisena bhuñjitabbabhattato upaḍḍhabhattanti attho.
tika-s0401t:1091_0: Rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, sā assa atthīti rūpasaññī, na rūpasaññī arūpasaññī. Saññāsīsena
tika-s0401t:1091_1: jhānaṃ vadati. Rūpasaññāya anuppādanamevettha alābhitā. Bahiddhāva uppannanti bahiddhāvatthusmiṃyeva
tika-s0401t:1092_0: “Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0401t:1092_1: rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī
tika-s0401t:1092_2: bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā
tika-s0401t:1093_0: Evamidha cattāri abhibhāyatanāni āgatāni. Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā
tika-s0401t:1093_1: rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti evamāgatāni.
tika-s0401t:1093_2: Tattha ca kāraṇaṃ abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ –
tika-s0401t:1094_0: “Kasmā pana yathā suttante ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī’tiādi
tika-s0401t:1094_1: vuttaṃ, evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttāti.
tika-s0401t:1094_2: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato. Tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
tika-s0401t:1095_0: Tatrāpi idhapi vuttāni “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti idaṃ pana satthu
tika-s0401t:1095_1: desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – idha vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni
tika-s0401t:1095_2: ca sabbāni parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyāti. Pariyāyakathā hi suttantadesanāti.
tika-s0401t:1095_3: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni, tathā sahitāni.
tika-s0401t:1095_4: Atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavanavisesoti. Tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi
tika-s0401t:1095_7: tatiyavimokkho ca abhibhavanapattito saṅgahito. Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā
tika-s0401t:1095_8: vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato desetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
tika-s0401t:1095_9: Sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni. Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0401t:1095_10: rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato
tika-s0401t:1095_11: “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati.
tika-s0401t:1096_0: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatoti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi “ajjhattarūpāni passatī”ti
tika-s0401t:1096_1: avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ – “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti, tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tena
tika-s0401t:1096_2: yaṃ aññahetukaṃ suttante “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vacanaṃ, taṃ tena hetunā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1096_3: Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ, na
tika-s0401t:1096_4: tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti. Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:1096_5: bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā. Desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena veditabbo
tika-s0401t:1096_6: veneyyajjhāsayavasena vijjamānapariyāyakathanabhāvato. Desanāvilāso hi nāma veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0401t:1096_7: vijjamānassa ca pariyāyassa vibhāvanaṃ, na yassa kassaci, tasmā “idha pariyāyadesanattā”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:1097_0: Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce? Na
tika-s0401t:1097_1: nīlādīsu katādhikārānaṃ nīlādibhāvasseva abhibhavanakāraṇattā. Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1097_2: parittatā appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ, atha kho nīlādibhāvo evāti. Etesu ca
tika-s0401t:1097_3: parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃyaṃcaritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0401t:1098_2: Obhāsavasenāti sappabhāsatāya avabhāsanavasena. Vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti añjanarajatavatthādivaṇṇadhātuyā.
tika-s0401t:1099_0: 435. Rūpīti ettha yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato, taṃ yassa jhānassa
tika-s0401t:1099_1: hetubhāvena visiṭṭharūpaṃ hoti. Yena visiṭṭhena rūpīti vucceyya, tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpanimittaṃ
tika-s0401t:1099_2: jhānaṃ. Idha pana paramatthato rūpibhāvasādhakanti āha – “ajjhattaṃ kesādīsū”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:1100_0: Subhantveva adhimutto hotīti ayaṃ tatiyavimokkho. Idha suparisuddhanīlādivaṇṇakasiṇajjhānavasena
tika-s0401t:1100_1: vuttoti dassetvā idāni paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ tassa brahmavihārajjhānavasena āgatabhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:1100_2: dassetuṃ – “paṭisambhidāmagge panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Idha pana uparipāḷiyaṃyeva brahmavihārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1100_3: āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā parisuddhanīlādivaṇṇakasiṇavaseneva subhavimokkho anuññāto.
tika-s0401t:1101_1: Uggahanimittādīnaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti nāmaṃ nissite nissayavohāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1102_0: Sīlānīti pātimokkhasaṃvarādīni cattāri sīlāni. Sodhetvāti anāpajjanena āpannavuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0401t:1102_1: kilesehi appaṭipīḷanena ca visodhetvā. Tividhañhi sīlassa visodhanaṃ nāma – anāpajjanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1102_2: āpannavuṭṭhāpanaṃ kilesehi ca appaṭipīḷananti. Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ paribundheti uparodheti
tika-s0401t:1102_3: pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho rakārassa lakāraṃ katvā, paribandhoti attho. Upacchinditvāti
tika-s0401t:1102_4: samāpannena saṅgāhaṇena vā uparundhitvā, apalibodhaṃ katvāti attho. Kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti –
tika-s0401t:1104: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –
tika-s0401t:1105: Evamādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantahitesiṃ vuddhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā.
tika-s0401t:1106: Ananurūpaṃ vihāranti aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgataṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu –
tika-s0401t:1108: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-s0401t:1110: Paccantasīmā sappāyaṃ, yattha mitto na labbhati.
tika-s0401t:1113: Anurūpeti gocaragāmato nātidūranaccāsannatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgate. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0401t:1114_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1114_1: nātidūraṃ hoti naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ
tika-s0401t:1114_4: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā
tika-s0401t:1114_5: vinayadharā mātikādharā. Te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1114_6: bhante, kathaṃ imassa ko attho’ti. Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca
tika-s0401t:1114_7: uttāniṃ karonti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0401t:1114_8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0401t:1115_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1115_2: ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa…pe… parikkhārāti ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana
tika-s0401t:1115_3: senāsane therā…pe… kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentīti ekanti evaṃ pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0401t:1116: Khuddakapalibodhaṃ upacchinditvāti dīghakesanakhalomānaṃ chedanena cīvarakammacīvararajanapattapacanamañcapīṭhādisodhanavasena khuddakapalibodhaṃ upacchinditvā.
tika-s0401t:1117_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ
tika-s0401t:1117_2: samuggatena sūnabhāvena dhumātattā uddhumātaṃ, uddhumātameva uddhumātakaṃ, paṭikūlattā
tika-s0401t:1117_3: vā kucchitaṃ uddhumātanti uddhumātakaṃ, tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1117_4: Vinīlaṃ vuccati viparibhinnanīlavaṇṇaṃ, vinīlameva vinīlakaṃ, paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ
tika-s0401t:1117_5: vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ, maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa, pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa,
tika-s0401t:1117_6: yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nilaṭṭhāne nīlasāṭakapārutasseva chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1117_7: Paribhinnaṭṭhānesu vissandamānapubbaṃ vipubbaṃ, vipubbameva vipubbakaṃ, paṭikūlattā
tika-s0401t:1117_8: vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ, tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vicchiddaṃ
tika-s0401t:1117_9: vuccati dvidhā chindanena apadhāritaṃ, vicchiddameva vicchiddakaṃ, paṭikūlattā vā
tika-s0401t:1117_10: kucchitaṃ vicchiddanti vicchiddakaṃ, vemajjhe chinnassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1117_11: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitaṃ vikkhāyitaṃ, vikkhāyitameva
tika-s0401t:1117_12: vikkhāyitakaṃ, paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vikkhāyitanti vikkhāyitakaṃ, tathārūpassa
tika-s0401t:1118_0: Vividhā khittaṃ vikkhittaṃ, vikkhittameva vikkhittakaṃ, paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ
tika-s0401t:1118_1: vikkhittanti vikkhittakaṃ, aññena hatthaṃ, aññena pādaṃ, aññena sīsanti evaṃ tato
tika-s0401t:1118_2: tato vikkhittassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Hatañca taṃ purimanayeneva vikkhittakañcāti
tika-s0401t:1118_3: hatavikkhittakaṃ, kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayeneva vikkhittassa
tika-s0401t:1118_4: chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Lohitaṃ kirati vikkhipati ito cito ca paggharatīti
tika-s0401t:1118_5: lohitakaṃ, paggharitalohitamakkhitassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Puḷavā vuccanti
tika-s0401t:1118_6: kimayo, puḷave kiratīti puḷavakaṃ, kimiparipuṇṇassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1118_7: Aṭṭhiyeva aṭṭhikaṃ, paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ aṭṭhīti aṭṭhikaṃ, aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāyapi
tika-s0401t:1118_8: ekaṭṭhikassapi etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Imesu dasasu asubhesu paṭhamajjhānameva uppajjati,
tika-s0401t:1118_9: na dutiyādīni. Tenāha – idha “paṭhamajjhānasahagatā saññā”ti. Tathā hi aparisaṇṭhitajalāya
tika-s0401t:1118_10: sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati, vinā arittena na sakkā ṭhapetuṃ.
tika-s0401t:1118_11: Evamevaṃ dubbalattā ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, vinā
tika-s0401t:1118_12: vitakkena na sakkā ṭhapetuṃ. Tasmā paṭhamajjhānamevettha hoti, na dutiyādīni. Ārammaṇassa
tika-s0401t:1118_13: dubbalatā cettha paṭikūlabhāvena cittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ asamatthatā.
tika-s0401t:1119_0: “Rukkho mato, lohaṃ mata”ntiādīsu yaṃ khandhappabandhaṃ upādāya rukkhādisamaññā,
tika-s0401t:1119_1: tasmiṃ anupacchinnepi allatādivigamanaṃ nissāya matavohāro sammutimaraṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1119_2: khaṇabhaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ khaṇikamaraṇaṃ. Samucchedamaraṇanti arahato santānassa sabbaso
tika-s0401t:1119_3: ucchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ. Vipassanābhāvanāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Maraṇānussatibhāvanāyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1119_4: pana tividhampetaṃ nādhippetaṃ asaṃvegavatthuto anupaṭṭhahanato abāhullato ca. Maraṇānussatiyañhi
tika-s0401t:1119_5: ekena bhavena paricchinnassa jīvitindriyappabandhassa vicchedo maraṇanti adhippeto
tika-s0401t:1119_6: saṃvegavatthuto upaṭṭhahanato bāhullato ca. Idāni imameva maraṇaṃ sandhāya vikappantaraṃ
tika-s0401t:1120_1: attho kālabhedavacanicchāya abhāvato yathā “duddha”nti. Kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro,
tika-s0401t:1120_2: āharīyatīti āhāro, kabaḷīkāro ca so āhāro cāti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Vatthuvasena cetaṃ
tika-s0401t:1120_3: vuttaṃ. Savatthuko eva hi āhāro idha kammaṭṭhānabhāvena adhippeto. Ojālakkhaṇo pana
tika-s0401t:1120_4: āhāro ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāroti vuccati. So idha nādhippeto paṭikūlākāraggahaṇassa
tika-s0401t:1120_6: nava paṭikūlāni. Samakkhanappaṭikūlaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānattā idha visuṃ
tika-s0401t:1120_7: na gahitaṃ, aññathā tena saddhiṃ “dasa paṭikūlānī”ti vattabbaṃ. Visuddhimagge pana
tika-s0401t:1120_8: samakkhanaṃ paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikūlanti visuṃ
tika-s0401t:1121_2: vipassanāya āgato, “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopākarūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā ekaṭṭhā,
tika-s0401t:1121_3: udāhu nānaṭṭhā”tiādīsu samathe āgato. Idha pana samathassa parikamme daṭṭhabbo. Āhārehi
tika-s0401t:1121_4: paṭikūlākāraggahaṇaṃ, tappabhāvitaṃ vā upacārajjhānaṃ idha “āhāre paṭikūlasaññā”ti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1122_0: Ukkaṇṭhitasaññanti nibbindanākārena uppajjanakasaññaṃ. Aniccasaññanti ettha aniccaṃ
tika-s0401t:1122_1: khandhapañcakaṃ uppādavayaññathattabhāvato, hutvā abhāvato vā, tasmiṃ anicce khandhapañcake
tika-s0401t:1122_2: aniccanti uppajjamānā aniccalakkhaṇapariggāhikā saññā aniccasaññā. Tenāha – “pañcannaṃ
tika-s0401t:1122_3: upādānakkhandhāna”ntiādi. Tattha udayo nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, vayo vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1122_4: aññathattaṃ jarā. Udayabbayaññathattaggahaṇena aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Uppādavayaññathattabhāvato
tika-s0401t:1122_5: hi khandhapañcakaṃ aniccanti vuccati. Yassa ca sabhāvena khandhapañcakaṃ aniccanti
tika-s0401t:1122_6: vuccati, taṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ. Tena hi taṃ aniccanti lakkhīyati, aniccalakkhaṇañca
tika-s0401t:1122_7: udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti, udayabbayaṃ pana
tika-s0401t:1122_8: pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Na hi
tika-s0401t:1122_9: sammadeva udayabbayaṃ sallakkhentassa pubbāpariyena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññoññabhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:1122_10: sallakkhaṇena santatiyā ugghāṭitāya dhammā sambandhabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti, atha kho
tika-s0401t:1122_11: ayosalākā viya asambandhabhāvenāti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1123_0: “Yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato
tika-s0401t:1123_1: dukkhaṃ, abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanākāro pana dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ. Tenevāha – “anicce khandhapañcake…pe…
tika-s0401t:1123_2: saññaṃ bhāvetī”ti. Tattha paṭipīḷanaṃ nāma yathāpariggahitaṃ udayavayavasena saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1123_4: amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti, abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ pana
tika-s0401t:1123_5: manasi karitvā iriyāpathe labbhamānadukkhappaṭicchādakabhāve ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1123_6: yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Tathā hi iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na
tika-s0401t:1123_7: upaṭṭhāti, te ca iriyāpathā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātā. Ekasmiñhi
tika-s0401t:1123_8: iriyāpathe uppannassa dukkhassa vinodakaṃ iriyāpathantaraṃ tassa paṭicchādakaṃ viya
tika-s0401t:1123_9: hoti, evaṃ sesāpi. Iriyāpathānaṃ pana taṃtaṃdukkhapatitākārabhāve yāthāvato ñāte
tika-s0401t:1123_10: tesaṃ dukkhappaṭicchādakabhāvo ugghāṭito nāma hoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ dukkhābhitunnatāya
tika-s0401t:1123_11: pākaṭabhāvato. Tasmā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasi karitvā iriyāpathe labbhamānadukkhappaṭicchādakabhāve
tika-s0401t:1124_0: “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”ti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ avasavattanato anattā,
tika-s0401t:1124_2: nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti, nānādhātuyo
tika-s0401t:1124_3: pana vinibbhujjitvā “aññā pathavīdhātu, aññā āpodhātū”tiādinā, “añño phasso, aññā
tika-s0401t:1124_4: vedanā”tiādinā ca visuṃ visuṃ katvā ghanavinibbhoge kate samūhaghane kiccārammaṇaghane
tika-s0401t:1124_5: ca bhedite anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Yā hesā aññamaññūpatthambhesu
tika-s0401t:1124_7: samūhaghanatā, tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccabhedassa satipi paṭiniyatabhāve ekato
tika-s0401t:1124_8: gayhamānā kiccaghanatā, tathā sārammaṇadhammānaṃ satipi ārammaṇakaraṇabhede ekato
tika-s0401t:1124_9: gayhamānā ārammaṇaghanatā. Sā catūsu dhātūsu ñāṇena vinibbhujitvā dissamānāsu hatthena
tika-s0401t:1124_10: parimaddiyamāno pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīnaṃ āgacchati, yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā suññā
tika-s0401t:1124_11: ete dhammamattāti avasavattanākārasaṅkhātaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1127_0: 563. Cetasā phuṭoti cittena pharito. Cittena pharaṇañca samuddassa dvidhā sambhavatīti
tika-s0401t:1127_1: āha – “duvidhaṃ pharaṇa”ntiādi. Purimena atthenāti “sampayogavasena vijjaṃ bhajantī”ti
tika-s0401t:1127_2: vuttena atthena. Pacchimenāti “vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantī”ti vuttena.
tika-s0401t:1128_0: 564. Mahato saṃvegāya saṃvattatītiādīsu ayaṃ pana aparo nayo. Yāthāvato kāyasabhāvappavedanato
tika-s0401t:1128_1: mahato saṃvegāya saṃvattati. Atthāyāti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthāya. Yogakkhemāyāti catūhi
tika-s0401t:1128_2: yogehi khemabhāvāya. Satisampajaññāyāti sabbattha satiavippavāsāya sattaṭṭhāniyasampajaññāya
tika-s0401t:1128_4: tisso vijjā cittassa adhimutti nibbānaṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalānīti etesaṃ paccakkhakaraṇāya.
tika-s0401t:1129_0: 584. Paññāpaṭilābhāyātiādīsu soḷasasu padesu paññāpaṭilābhāya paññāvuddhiyā paññāvepullāya
tika-s0401t:1129_1: paññābāhullāyāti imāni cattāri paññāvasena bhāvavacanāni, sesāni dvādasa puggalavasena
tika-s0401t:1129_2: bhāvavacanāni. Sappurisasaṃsevoti sappurisānaṃ bhajanaṃ. Saddhammassavananti tesaṃ
tika-s0401t:1129_3: sappurisānaṃ santike sīlādippaṭipattidīpakassa saddhammavacanassa savanaṃ. Yoniso
tika-s0401t:1129_4: manasikāroti sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhāvasena upāyena manasikāro. Dhammānudhammappaṭipattīti
tika-s0401t:1130_1: Tesattatīnaṃ ñāṇānanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ “sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ, sutvāna
tika-s0401t:1130_2: saṃvare paññā sīlamaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā ñāṇakathāya niddiṭṭhānaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1130_3: ñāṇānaṃ. Imesañhi tesattatiñāṇānaṃ sutamayañāṇādīni sattasaṭṭhiñāṇāni sāvakassa sādhāraṇāni,
tika-s0401t:1130_4: “indriyaparopariyatte ñāṇaṃ, sattānaṃ āsayānusaye ñāṇaṃ, yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇaṃ, mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā
tika-s0401t:1130_5: ñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, anāvaraṇañāṇa”nti imāni cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sāvakehi.
tika-s0401t:1132_0: “Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇaṃ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇaṃ. Atītampi
tika-s0401t:1132_1: addhānaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇaṃ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1132_2: Anāgatampi addhānaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇaṃ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti
tika-s0401t:1132_3: ñāṇaṃ. Yampissa taṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, tampi khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ
tika-s0401t:1132_4: nirodhadhammanti ñāṇaṃ. Bhavapaccayā jātīti ñāṇaṃ…pe… upādānapaccayā bhavoti ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1132_5: taṇhāpaccayā upādānanti ñāṇaṃ, vedanāpaccayā taṇhāti ñāṇaṃ, phassapaccayā vedanāti
tika-s0401t:1132_6: ñāṇaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti ñāṇaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatananti ñāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā
tika-s0401t:1132_7: nāmarūpanti ñāṇaṃ, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti ñāṇaṃ, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1132_8: asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti ñāṇaṃ, atītampi addhānaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti
tika-s0401t:1132_9: ñāṇaṃ, asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti ñāṇaṃ, anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjāpaccayā
tika-s0401t:1132_10: saṅkhārāti ñāṇaṃ, asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti ñāṇaṃ, yampissa taṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1132_11: tampi khayadhamaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti ñāṇa”nti –
tika-s0401t:1133: Bhagavatā nidānavagge jarāmaraṇādīsu ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu paccekaṃ satta satta katvā vuttāni sattasattatiñāṇāni.
tika-s0401t:1134_0: Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paccayākārañāṇaṃ. Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattisaṅkhātāya
tika-s0401t:1134_1: ṭhitiyā kāraṇattā “dhammaṭṭhitī”ti vuccati, tattha ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, “jātipaccayā
tika-s0401t:1134_2: jarāmaraṇa”ntiādinā vuttasseva chabbidhassa ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Khayadhammanti
tika-s0401t:1135_0: Lābhotiādīsu lābhoyeva upasaggena visesetvā “paṭilābho”ti vutto. Puna tasseva atthavivaraṇavasena
tika-s0401t:1135_1: “patti sampattī”ti vuttaṃ. Phusanāti adhigamanavasena phusanā. Sacchikiriyāti paṭilābhasacchikiriyā.
tika-s0401t:1136_0: Sattannañca sekkhānanti tisso sikkhā sikkhantīti sekkhasaññitānaṃ sotāpattimaggaṭṭhādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:1136_1: sattannaṃ. Puthujjanakalyāṇakassa cāti nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya yuttattā sundaraṭṭhena
tika-s0401t:1136_2: kalyāṇasaññitassa puthujjanassa. Vaḍḍhitaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ ekāyāti vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhanā. Yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1136_3: aṭṭhannampi paññānaṃ vasena visesatova arahato paññāvasena paññāvuddhiyā. Tathā paññāvepullāya.
tika-s0401t:1137_0: Yassa kassacipi visesato anurūpadhammassa mahantaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti
tika-s0401t:1137_1: tadassa kiccasiddhiyā dassento “mahante atthe pariggaṇhātī”tiādimāha. Tattha atthādīnaṃ
tika-s0401t:1137_2: mahantabhāvo mahāvisayatāya veditabbo, mahāvisayatā ca tesaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge āgatanayena
tika-s0401t:1137_3: veditabbā. Sīlakkhandhassa pana hetumahantatāya, paccayamahantatāya, nissayamahantatāya,
tika-s0401t:1137_4: pabhedamahantatāya, kiccamahantatāya, phalamahantatāya, ānisaṃsamahantatāya ca mahantabhāvo
tika-s0401t:1137_5: veditabbo. Tattha hetu alobhādayo. Paccayo hirottappasaddhāsativīriyādayo. Nissayo
tika-s0401t:1137_6: sāvakabodhipaccekabodhiniyatatā taṃsamaṅgino ca purisavisesā. Pabhedo cārittavārittādivibhāgo.
tika-s0401t:1137_7: Kiccaṃ tadaṅgādivasena paṭipakkhavidhamanaṃ. Phalaṃ saggasampadā nibbānasampadā ca.
tika-s0401t:1137_8: Ānisaṃso piyamanāpatādi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu
tika-s0401t:1137_9: ca āgatanayena veditabbo. Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ
tika-s0401t:1137_10: niddhāretvā vattabbā. Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ mahantabhāvo pana mahāvisayatāya veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1137_11: Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasuttādīsu āgatanayena veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1138_1: ariyasaccānaṃ sakalayānasaṅgāhakato saccavibhaṅge taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ca āgatanayena,
tika-s0401t:1138_2: satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgādīsu taṃsaṃvaṇṇanādīsu ca āgatanayena, sāmaññaphalānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1138_3: mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato
tika-s0401t:1138_6: ca mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Pariggaṇhātīti sabhāvādito paricchijja gaṇhāti jānāti,
tika-s0401t:1139_0: Puthupaññāti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – puthu
tika-s0401t:1139_1: nānākkhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho
tika-s0401t:1139_2: nāmā”ti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tesupi ekavidhena
tika-s0401t:1139_3: rūpakkhandho…pe… ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho. Ekavidhena vedanākkhandho…pe… bahuvidhena
tika-s0401t:1139_4: vedanākkhandho. Ekavidhena saññākkhandho…pe… bahuvidhena saññākkhandho. Ekavidhena
tika-s0401t:1139_6: bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandhoti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādivasenapi
tika-s0401t:1140_0: Puthu nānādhātūsūti “ayaṃ cakkhudhātu nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha
tika-s0401t:1140_1: soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmikā”ti evaṃ dhātūsu nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1140_2: pavattati. Tayidaṃ upādinnadhātuvasena vuttaṃ. Paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1140_3: upādinnadhātūsu eva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tañca kho ekadesatova, na
tika-s0401t:1140_4: nippadesato. Bahiddhā anupādinnadhātūnaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ tesaṃ avisayova, sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva
tika-s0401t:1140_5: pana “imāya dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti, imassa kāḷo, imassa
tika-s0401t:1140_6: maṭṭho, imassa kharo, imassa bahalataco, imassa sukkhataco. Imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena
tika-s0401t:1140_7: evarūpaṃ. Imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ, pītaṃ, lohitaṃ, odātaṃ, sugandhaṃ, duggandhaṃ, missakagandhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1140_8: Phalaṃ khuddakaṃ, mahantaṃ, dīghaṃ, vaṭṭaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ, dubbaṇṇaṃ, maṭṭhaṃ, pharusaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1140_9: sugandhaṃ, duggandhaṃ, madhuraṃ, tittakaṃ, ambilaṃ, kaṭukaṃ, kasāvaṃ. Kaṇṭako tikhiṇo,
tika-s0401t:1140_10: atikhiṇo, ujuko, kuṭilo, tambo, nīlo, lohito, odāto”tiādinā dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1141: Puthu nānāāyatanesūti “idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma. Tattha dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”ti evaṃ āyatananānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1142_0: Puthu nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato santānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu
tika-s0401t:1142_1: paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Avijjādiaṅgāni hi paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaññitāni. Tenāha
tika-s0401t:1143_1: tato eva itthipurisaattattaniyādivasena anupalabbhamānasabhāvesu. Ma-kāro hettha padasandhikaro.
tika-s0401t:1144_3: imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti tathā tathā paṭibhānato upatiṭṭhanato paṭibhānānīti
tika-s0401t:1145_0: Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva, itaresaṃ
tika-s0401t:1145_1: pana vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyattā pākaṭameva. Yaṃ pana abhinnaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1145_2: tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha – “puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme
tika-s0401t:1145_3: samatikkammā”ti. Tenassa madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ paridīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1146_0: Vipule attheti mahante atthe. Mahantapariyāyo hi vipulasaddo. Gambhīresūti sasādīhi
tika-s0401t:1146_1: viya mahāsamuddo anupacitañāṇasambhārehi alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhesu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1146_2: pavattatīti visayassa gambhīratāya ñāṇassa gambhīratā vibhāvitā.
tika-s0401t:1147_0: Tikkhavisadabhāvādiguṇehi asādhāraṇattā paresaṃ paññāya na sāmantā, atha kho suvidūravidūreti
tika-s0401t:1147_1: asamantapaññā ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā. Keci “asamatthapaññā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ yathāvuttaguṇehi
tika-s0401t:1147_2: aññehi asādhāraṇattā natthi etissā kāyaci samatthanti asamatthā paññāti yojanā. Atthavavatthānatoti
tika-s0401t:1147_3: atthappabhedassa yāthāvato sanniṭṭhānato. Na añño koci sakkoti abhisambhavitunti
tika-s0401t:1147_4: ñāṇagatiyā sampāpuṇituṃ na añño kocipi sakkoti, tasmā ayaṃ suvidūravidūreti asamantapaññā.
tika-s0401t:1148_1: purisāsabho purisasīho purisanāgo purisājañño purisadhorayho anantañāṇo anantatejo
tika-s0401t:1148_2: anantayaso aḍḍho mahaddhano balavā netā vinetā anunetā paññāpetā vinijjhāpetā pekkhatā
tika-s0401t:1148_3: pasādetā. So hi bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā,
tika-s0401t:1148_4: anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido. Maggānugāmī ca pana
tika-s0401t:1149_0: “So hi bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto
tika-s0401t:1149_1: vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato, natthi tassa
tika-s0401t:1149_2: bhagavato aññātaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ aphassitaṃ paññāya. Atītaṃ anāgataṃ
tika-s0401t:1149_3: paccuppannaṃ upādāya sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ
tika-s0401t:1149_4: āgacchanti, yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma atthi taṃ sabbaṃ jānitabbaṃ, attattho vā parattho
tika-s0401t:1149_5: vā ubhayattho vā diṭṭhadhammiko vā attho samparāyiko vā attho uttāno vā attho gambhīro
tika-s0401t:1149_6: vā attho gūḷho vā attho paṭicchanno vā attho neyyo vā attho nīto vā attho anavajjo
tika-s0401t:1149_7: vā attho nikkileso vā attho vodāno vā attho paramattho vā attho, sabbaṃ taṃ antobuddhañāṇe parivattati.
tika-s0401t:1150_0: “Sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ buddhassa
tika-s0401t:1150_1: bhagavato ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṃ manokammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇānuparivatti.
tika-s0401t:1150_2: Atīte buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, anāgate buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_3: ñāṇaṃ, paccuppanne buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_4: ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ. Neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_5: neyyaṃ, neyyaṃ atikkamitvā ñāṇaṃ nappavattati, ñāṇaṃ atikkamitvā neyyapatho natthi,
tika-s0401t:1150_6: aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino te dhammā, yathā dvinnaṃ samuggapaṭalānaṃ sammā phusitānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_7: heṭṭhimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ uparimaṃ nātivattati, uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_8: nātivattati, aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino, evamevaṃ buddhassa bhagavato neyyañca ñāṇañca
tika-s0401t:1150_9: aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino. Yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_10: neyyaṃ, neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyyaṃ, neyyaṃ atikkamitvā ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1150_11: nappavattati, ñāṇaṃ atikkamitvā neyyapatho natthi. Aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino te
tika-s0401t:1150_12: dhammā. Sabbadhammesu buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1151_0: “Sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā
tika-s0401t:1151_1: cittuppādappaṭibaddhā, sabbasattesu buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Sabbesaṃ
tika-s0401t:1151_2: sattānaṃ buddho āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti,
tika-s0401t:1151_3: apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye
tika-s0401t:1151_4: bhabbā sabbe satte pajānāti, sadevako loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī
tika-s0401t:1152_0: “Yathā ye keci macchakacchapā antamaso timitimiṅgalaṃ upādāya antomahāsamudde parivattanti,
tika-s0401t:1152_1: evameva sadevako loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā antobuddhañāṇe
tika-s0401t:1152_2: parivattati. Yathā ye keci pakkhino antamaso garuḷaṃ venateyyaṃ upādāya ākāsassa
tika-s0401t:1152_3: padese parivattanti, evameva yepi te sāriputtasamā paññāya, tepi buddhañāṇassa padese
tika-s0401t:1152_4: parivattanti, buddhañāṇaṃ devamanussānaṃ paññaṃ pharitvā atighaṃsitvā tiṭṭhati. Yepi
tika-s0401t:1152_5: te khattiyapaṇḍitā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā gahapatipaṇḍitā samaṇapaṇḍitā nipuṇā kataparappavādā
tika-s0401t:1152_6: vālavedhirūpā, vobhindantā maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhigatāni, te te pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā
tika-s0401t:1153: Ādinā niddiṭṭhapāḷiṃ peyyālamukhena saṃkhipitvā dassento “paññāpabhedakusalo pabhinnañāṇo…pe… te pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā abhisaṅkharitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:1154_0: Tattha pabhinnañāṇoti atthādīsu pabhedagatañāṇo. “Pabhedañāṇo”tipi paṭhanti, soyeva
tika-s0401t:1154_1: attho. Te pañhanti te te attanā adhippetaṃ pañhaṃ. Niddiṭṭhakāraṇāti vissajjitakāraṇā.
tika-s0401t:1154_2: Upakkhittakāti bhagavato paññāveyyattiyena samīpe khittakā antevāsikā sampajjanti.
tika-s0401t:1155_0: Bhavati abhibhavatīti bhūri. Kiṃ? Rāgādiṃ. Upasagge satipi tadeva padaṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:1155_1: vadatīti upasaggena vināpi so attho viññeyyo anekatthattā dhātūnanti vuttaṃ – “abhibhuyyatī”ti.
tika-s0401t:1155_2: Kārakabyattayena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā rāgaṃ abhibhuyyatīti sā sā maggapaññā attanā
tika-s0401t:1155_3: attanā vajjhaṃ rāgaṃ abhibhuyyati abhibhavati, madatīti attho. Abhibhavatīti sā sā
tika-s0401t:1155_4: phalapaññā taṃ taṃ rāgaṃ bhavi abhibhavi maddīti bhūripaññā. “Abhibhavitā”ti vā pāṭho,
tika-s0401t:1155_5: “abhibhavitvā”tipi paṭhanti. Abhibhavitvāti ca kiriyāya siddhabhāvadassanaṃ. Paññā
tika-s0401t:1155_6: ce siddhā, rāgābhibhavo ca siddho evāti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0401t:1156_0: Rāgādīsu pana rajjanalakkhaṇo rāgo. Dussanalakkhaṇo doso. Muyhanalakkhaṇo moho. Kujjhanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0401t:1156_1: kodho, upanandhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Pubbakālaṃ kodho, aparakālaṃ upanāho. Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0401t:1156_2: makkho, yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso. Parasampattikhīyanalakkhaṇā issā, attano sampattiniggūhanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1156_3: macchariyaṃ. Attanā katapāpappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, attano avijjamānaguṇappakāsanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1156_4: sāṭheyyaṃ. Cittassa uddhumātabhāvalakkhaṇo thambho, karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho.
tika-s0401t:1156_5: Unnatilakkhaṇo māno, abbhunnatilakkhaṇo atimāno. Mattabhāvalakkhaṇo mado, pañcakāmaguṇesu
tika-s0401t:1156_6: cittavossaggalakkhaṇo pamādo. Bhavati abhibhavati arinti bhūri asarūpato parassa
tika-s0401t:1156_7: akārassa lopaṃ katvā. Tenāha – “ariṃ maddanipaññāti bhūripaññā”ti. Bhavati ettha
tika-s0401t:1156_8: thāvarajaṅgamanti bhūri vuccati pathavī yathā “bhūmī”ti bhūri viyāti bhūripaññā vitthatavipulaṭṭhena
tika-s0401t:1156_9: sabbaṃ sahatāya ca. Tenāha – “tāyā”tiādi. Tattha pathavisamāyāti vitthatavipulaṭṭheneva
tika-s0401t:1156_10: pathavisamāya. Vitthatāyāti pajānitabbe visaye vitthatāya, na ekadese vattamānāya.
tika-s0401t:1156_11: Vipulāyāti uḷārabhūtāya. Samannāgatoti puggalo. Iti-saddo kāraṇatthe, iminā kāraṇena
tika-s0401t:1156_12: puggalassa bhūripaññāya samannāgatattā tassa paññā bhūripaññā nāmāti attho. “Bhūripaññassa
tika-s0401t:1156_13: paññā bhūripaññapaññā”ti vattabbe ekassa paññāsaddassa lopaṃ katvā “bhūripaññā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1157_0: Apicāti paññāpariyāyadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāyametanti paññāya etaṃ. Adhivacananti
tika-s0401t:1157_1: adhikaṃ vacanaṃ. Bhūrīti bhūte atthe khandhādike ramati saccasabhāvena, diṭṭhi viya
tika-s0401t:1157_2: na abhūteti bhūri. Medhāti asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ
tika-s0401t:1157_3: gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā. Pariṇāyikāti yassuppajjati, taṃ sattaṃ attahitappaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-s0401t:1157_4: sampayuttadhamme ca yāthāvalakkhaṇappaṭivedhe pariṇetīti pariṇāyikā. Imeheva aññānipi
tika-s0401t:1158_0: Paññābāhullanti paññā bahulā assāti paññābahulo, tassa bhāvo paññābāhullaṃ. Tañca
tika-s0401t:1158_1: paññāya bāhullaṃ pavatti evāti tamatthaṃ paññāgarukassa puggalassa vasena dassento,
tika-s0401t:1158_2: “idhekacco paññāgaruko hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha idhekaccoti puthujjanakalyāṇako, ariyo
tika-s0401t:1158_3: vā. Paññā garu ekassāti paññāgaruko. Paññāya carito pavattito paññācarito, paññāya
tika-s0401t:1158_4: caritaṃ pavattaṃ assāti vā paññācarito. Anulomikakhantiādivibhāgā paññā āsayo etassāti
tika-s0401t:1158_5: paññāsayo. Paññāya adhimutto tanninnoti paññādhimutto. Samussitaṭṭhena paññā dhajo
tika-s0401t:1158_6: etassāti paññādhajo. Paññāketūti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Paññānimittaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ etassāti
tika-s0401t:1158_7: paññādhipateyyo. Paññāsaṅkhāto vicayo, dhammasabhāvavicinanaṃ vā bahulaṃ etassāti
tika-s0401t:1158_8: vicayabahulo. Nānappakārena dhammasabhāvavicinanaṃ bahulaṃ assāti pavicayabahulo.
tika-s0401t:1158_9: Okkhāyanaṃ yāthāvato dhammānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ bahulaṃ etassāti okkhāyanabahulo. Paññāya
tika-s0401t:1158_10: tassa tassa dhammassa sammāpekkhanā sampekkhā, sampekkhāya ayanaṃ pavattanaṃ sampekkhāyanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1158_11: sampekkhāyanaṃ dhammo pakati assāti sampekkhāyanadhammo. Sampekkhāyanaṃ vā yāthāvato
tika-s0401t:1158_12: dassanadhammo sabhāvo etassāti sampekkhāyanadhammo. Sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ
tika-s0401t:1159_0: Taccaritotiādīsu taṃ-saddena paññā paccāmaṭṭhā, tasmā tattha “paññācarito”tiādinā
tika-s0401t:1159_1: attho veditabbo. Sā paññā caritā garukā bahulā assāti taccarito taggaruko tabbahulo.
tika-s0401t:1159_2: Tassaṃ paññāyaṃ ninno poṇo pabbhāro adhimuttoti tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto.
tika-s0401t:1159_3: Sā paññā adhipati tadadhipati, tadadhipatito āgato tadādhipateyyo. Paññāgarukotiādīni
tika-s0401t:1159_4: “kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti, ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko”tiādīsu viya purimajātito
tika-s0401t:1159_5: pabhuti vuttāni. Taccaritotiādīni imissā jātiyā vuttāni. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ nidassanavasenapi
tika-s0401t:1160_0: Sīghapaññāti attano visaye sīghappavattikā paññā, yā samāraddhā attano paññākiccaṃ
tika-s0401t:1160_1: adandhāyantī avitthāyantī khippameva sampāpeti. Tenāha – “sīghaṃ sīghaṃ sīlāni paripūretī”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:1160_2: Tattha sīghaṃ sīghanti bahūnaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saṅgahatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlānīti
tika-s0401t:1160_3: cārittavārittavasena paññattāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlāni, ṭhapetvā vā indriyasaṃvaraṃ
tika-s0401t:1160_4: tassa visuṃ gahitattā itarāni tividhasīlāni. Indriyasaṃvaranti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ
tika-s0401t:1160_5: indriyānaṃ rāgappaṭighappavesaṃ akatvā satikavāṭena nivāraṇaṃ thakanaṃ. Bhojane mattaññutanti
tika-s0401t:1160_7: tīsu koṭṭhāsesu rattiyā paṭhamamajjhimakoṭṭhāsesu ca jāgarati na niddāyati, samaṇadhammameva
tika-s0401t:1160_8: karotīti jāgaro, jāgarassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā jāgariyaṃ, jāgariyassa anuyogo jāgariyānuyogo,
tika-s0401t:1160_9: taṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ. Sīlakkhandhanti sekkhaṃ vā asekkhaṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ. Evamitarepi
tika-s0401t:1160_10: khandhā veditabbā. Paññākkhandhanti maggapaññā ca sekkhāsekkhānaṃ lokiyapaññā ca.
tika-s0401t:1160_13: pana kalāpasammasananayena pavatto. Tikkhapaññāniddeso vīriyassa ussukkāpanavasena,
tika-s0401t:1160_14: nibbedhikapaññāniddeso sabbaloke anabhiratasaññāvasena pavatto. Tattha turitakiriyā
tika-s0401t:1161_0: Hāsabahuloti pītibahulo. Sesapadāni tasseva vevacanāni. Atha vā hāsabahuloti mūlapadaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1161_1: Vedabahuloti tassā eva pītiyā sampayuttasomanassavedanāvasena niddesapadaṃ. Tuṭṭhibahuloti
tika-s0401t:1161_3: Sīlāni paripūretīti haṭṭhappahaṭṭho udaggūdaggo sampiyāyamāno sīlāni sampādeti. Pītisomanassasahagatā
tika-s0401t:1161_4: hi paññā abhirativasena ārammaṇe phullitā vikasitā viya pavattati, na evaṃ upekkhāsahagatāti.
tika-s0401t:1162_0: Aniccato khippaṃ javatīti “khandhapañcakaṃ anicca”nti vegāyitena pavattati, paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena
tika-s0401t:1162_1: pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ avirajjhantī
tika-s0401t:1162_2: adandhāyantī aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vegasā paṭivijjhati, tasmā sā javanapaññā nāmāti attho.
tika-s0401t:1162_3: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0401t:1162_4: balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ – “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha khayaṭṭhenāti yattha
tika-s0401t:1162_5: yattha uppajjati, tattha tattheva bhijjanato khayasabhāvattā. Bhayaṭṭhenāti bhayānakabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1162_6: Asārakaṭṭhenāti attasāravirahato niccasārādivirahato ca. Tulayitvāti tulābhūtāya
tika-s0401t:1162_7: vipassanāpaññāya tuletvā. Tīrayitvāti tāya eva tīraṇabhūtāya tīretvā. Vibhāvayitvāti
tika-s0401t:1162_8: yāthāvato pakāsetvā pākaṭaṃ katvā. Atha vā tulayitvāti kalāpasammasanavasena tulayitvā.
tika-s0401t:1162_10: pākaṭaṃ katvā. Vibhūtaṃ katvāti saṅkhārupekkhānulomavasena phuṭaṃ katvā. Rūpanirodheti
tika-s0401t:1162_11: rūpakkhandhassa nirodhabhūte nibbāne. Khippaṃ javatīti ninnapoṇapabbhāravasena javati
tika-s0401t:1162_12: pavattati. Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetuṃ, puna “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1163_0: Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindanena veditabboti “khippaṃ
tika-s0401t:1163_1: kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā”ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento, “uppannaṃ
tika-s0401t:1163_3: asamūhatattā uppattidhammataṃ anatītatāya asamūhatuppannanti vuccati, taṃ idha “uppanna”nti
tika-s0401t:1163_4: adhippetaṃ. Nādhivāsetīti santānaṃ āropetvā na vāseti. Pajahatīti samucchedavasena
tika-s0401t:1163_5: pajahati. Vinodetīti khipati. Byantiṃ karotīti vigatantaṃ karoti. Anabhāvaṃ gametīti
tika-s0401t:1163_6: anu abhāvaṃ gameti, vipassanākkamena ariyamaggaṃ patvā samucchedavaseneva abhāvaṃ
tika-s0401t:1163_7: gamayatīti attho. Ettha ca kāmappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko kāmavitakko. “Ime sattā marantū”ti
tika-s0401t:1163_8: paresaṃ maraṇappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko byāpādavitakko. “Ime sattā vihiṃsiyantū”ti paresaṃ
tika-s0401t:1163_9: vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko vihiṃsāvitakko. Pāpaketi lāmake. Akusale dhammeti akosallasambhūte
tika-s0401t:1163_10: dhamme. Tikkhapañño nāma khippābhiñño hoti, paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha – “ekamhi
tika-s0401t:1164_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā
tika-s0401t:1164_1: vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti yāthāvato dassanena saccappaṭivedho ijjhati,
tika-s0401t:1164_2: na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ – “sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo
tika-s0401t:1164_3: hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ubbegabahuloti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sabbasaṅkhāresu
tika-s0401t:1164_4: abhiṇhappavattasaṃvego. Uttāsabahuloti ñāṇabhayavasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bahuso utrastamānaso.
tika-s0401t:1164_5: Tena ādīnavānupassanamāha. Ukkaṇṭhanabahuloti saṅkhārato uddhaṃ visaṅkhārābhimukhatāya
tika-s0401t:1164_6: ukkaṇṭhanabahulo. Iminā nibbidānupassanamāha. Aratibahulotiādinā tassā eva aparāparūpapattiṃ.
tika-s0401t:1164_7: Bahimukhoti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho. Tathā pavattitavimokkhamukho.
tika-s0401t:1164_8: Nibbijjhanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ nibbedho, so etissā atthīti nibbedhikā, nibbijjhatīti
tika-s0401t:1164_9: vā nibbedhikā, sā eva paññā nibbedhikapaññā. Anibbiddhapubbanti anamatagge saṃsāre
tika-s0401t:1164_10: antaṃ pāpetvā anividdhapubbaṃ. Appadālitapubbanti tasseva atthavacanaṃ, antakaraṇeneva
tika-s0401t:1164_11: appadālitapubbanti attho. Lobhakkhandhanti lobharāsiṃ, lobhakoṭṭhāsaṃ vā.
tika-s0401t:1167_0: 600-611. Natthi ettha mataṃ maraṇaṃ vināsoti amataṃ, nibbānanti āha – “maraṇavirahitaṃ
tika-s0401t:1167_1: nibbānaṃ paribhuñjantī”ti. Amatassa vā nibbānassa adhigamahetutāya amatasadisaatappakasukhapatitatāya
tika-s0401t:1167_2: ca kāyagatāsati “amata”nti vuttā. Paribhuñjantīti jhānasamāpajjanena vaḷañjanti.
tika-s0401t:1167_3: Viraddhanti anadhigamena virajjhitaṃ. Tenāha – “virādhitaṃ nādhigata”nti. Āraddhanti
tika-s0401t:1167_4: sādhitaṃ nipphāditaṃ. Tañca paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hotīti āha – “āraddhanti paripuṇṇa”nti.
